 atha bhagavatā akṣapādena niḥśreyasa hetau śāstre praṇīte vyutpādite ca bhagavatā pakṣila svāminā kim aparam avaśiṣyate yad artham vārttika ārambha iti śaṅkām nirācikīrṣuḥ sūtra ākāra ukta aśa astra prayojana anuvāda pūrvakam vārttika ārambha prayojanam darśayati yad akṣapāda iti yadi api bhāṣya kṛtā kṛta vyutpādanam etad  tathā api dignāga prabhṛtibhiḥ arvācīnaiḥ kṛhetu santamasa samutthāpanena acchaditam śāstram na tattva nirṇayāya paryāptam iti uddyota kareṇa sva nibandha uddyotena tad apanīyata iti prayojanavān ārambha iti sūtra ukta prayojana anuvādaḥ ca prayojanavat śāstra vyutpādanena sva nibandhasya prayojanavat tām prekṣāvat pravṛtti aṅgam darśayitum vyutpādana mātrasya ca kāka danta parīkṣā grantha sādhāraṇyena prekṣāvat pravṛtti anaṅga tvāt atra ca eka viśati prabheda bhinnasya duḥkhasya ātyantikī nivṛttiḥ śamaḥ tasmai kasya jagataḥ parama kārūṇikaḥ  hi bhagavān muniḥ jagat eva duḥkha paṅka magnām uddidhīrṣuḥ śāstram praṇītavān tatra yadi kaścid na pravarteta kim āyātam śāstrasya na ca anadhikṛta puruṣa vyutpādanena asya tapaḥ nidheḥ kaścid asti doṣaḥ tathā ca viśvāmitrāḥ triśaṅkum yājayāmāsa viśaṣṭhaḥ cadhama yoni jām akṣa mālām upayeme tapaḥ prabhāva eva hi tāddaśaḥ teṣām yata evaṃvidhāḥ pāpmānaḥ  vilīyanta iti na ca asmad ādīnām manda tapasā mayam prasaṅgaḥ na hi gajānām udaryam tejaḥ  vaṭakāṣṭham aśitam pacati iti asmad ādīnām api udaryeṇa tejasā tathā bhavitavyam ku tārkikaiḥ dignāga prabhutibhiḥ āhitam ajñānam kutārkikā jñānam iti avigīta śiṣṭa ācāra parampara prāptaḥ parama śiṣṭena vārttikakāreṇa kṛtaḥ  api iṣṭadevatā namaskāraḥ  na śāstre niveśitaḥ na khalu anyat api maṅgalyam śāstre niveśitam prasiddhatara tayā tu maṅgalya antaravat śiṣyā avagabhiṣyanti iti sarvam avadātam tatra saṃkṣepataḥ prathama sūtram anūdya tasya tātparyam āha pramāṇa ādi padārtha tattva jñānāt niḥ śreyasa adhigama iti etad śāstrasya ādi sūtram tasya śāstrasya abhisaṃbandha vākyam ādi grahaṇena krama prāptasya eva prathamam vyākhyānam yuktam na dvitīya ādeḥ iti darśitam abhimataḥ saṃbandhaḥ  abhisaṃbandhaḥ śāstra niḥśreyasayoḥ hetu hetumat bhāvaḥ tasya idam sūtrā vākyam ā abhisaṃbandha vākyam pramāṇa ādi padārtha tatva jñāna āditi atra hi jñāyate anena iti jñānam iti vyutpatyā tatva jñānam śāstram ucyate pañcamyā ca tasya hetu tvam na hi viṣa ghna mantravat sva rūpa mātreṇa tad avivakṣita artham niḥśreyasa hetuḥ iti padārtha tatva avagama karaṇa tayā śāstram apadiśati na tu sva rūpeṇa tena śāstrasya niḥśreyase kartavye pramāṇa āditatva avagamaḥ  avāntara vyāpāra ita yuktam bhavati tathā ca pramāṇa ādi padārthata tvam pratipadyam pratipādakam ca śāstram iti śāstra pramāṇa ādi padārtha ta tvayoḥ jñāpyajñāpaka bhāvaḥ ca pramāṇa ādi padārtha tatva jñāna niḥśreyasayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ ca saṃbandhaḥ sūcitaḥ  bhavati tad idam abhigheya saṃbandha prayojana pratipādana artha tvam prathama sūtrasya pad padārtha tattva jñānasya ca yathā niḥśreyasa adhigamam pratyupayogaḥ tathā agre nivedayiṣyate viniścita āpta bhāvaḥ ca muneḥ āpta tvena tad vākyāt  prayojana ādi viniścitya pravartsyanti āptatva aviniścaye tu artha saṃśayāt  na khalu kṛṣi ādau  api viriścita sasya ādi adhigamānām pravṛttiḥ antarā avagraha ādi pratibandhena phala anutpādasya api nyāya prāpta tvena tad abhidhānam anarthakam iti sāmpratam viśeṣa smṛti anapekṣasya saṃśayasya anutpādāt  vākyāt  tu viśeṣa smṛtiḥ iti na anarthakyam tad evam prathama sūtra tātparyam uktvā bhāṣyasya ādi vākyatātparyam āha pramāṇataḥ  artha pratipattau  iti evamādi tasya anusandhāna vākyam tasya śāstrasya niḥśreyasa adhigamena saha sūtreṇa ghaṭitasya kutaścid nimittāt  vighaṭana śaṅkāyām anu sūtra ghaṭanāyāḥ paścāt  sandhasanam ghaṭanam anusandhānam tasya vākyam anusandhāna vākyam iti evam kila atra śaṅkyate yad aśakya anuṣṭhāna upāya upadeśakam tad anarthakam yathā jvahara takṣaka cūḍāranta alaṅkāra upadeśakam vacanam tādṛśam ceda śāstram iti tathā hi prameya ādīnām tāvat padārthānām tattva jñānam pramāṇa tattva jñāna adhīnam na hi pramāṇam tattvena anavadhāritam bodhakatva mātraṇa sva gocara avadhāraṇāya alam tāvat mātrasya tad ābhāsa sādhāraṇyāt  api tu bodha katva eka artha samavetena avyabhicāri tvena tad eva hi pramāṇyam tad ca aśakya avadhāraṇam tad anavadhāraṇāt ca prameya ādayaḥ  duravadhāraṇāḥ tathā hi vijñānaḥ ca tāvat prāmāṇyam svatas  vā niścīyate paratas  vā na tāvat  pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ na khalu vijñāna māna ātma saṃvedanam ātmānam api gṛhṇīyāt  prāgava tad prāmāṇaṇyam na api vijñāna antaram tad vijñānam iti ava gṛhṇīyāt  na punar asya avi abhicāri tvem jñānatva mātram ca tad ābhāsa sādhāraṇam iti na svatas  prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam etena sva saṃvedana naye api avyabhicāra grahaṇam pratyuktam na api paratas  param hi tad gocaram vā jñānam abhyupeyeta artha kriyā nirbhāsam vā jñānam tad gocarana āntarīyaka artha antara darśanam vā tad ca sarvam svatas  anavadhārita prāmāṇyam ākulam sat  katham pūrvam pravartakam jñānam anākulayet  svatas  vā asya prāmāṇye kim aparāddham pravatāka jñānena yena tasmin  api tad na syāt  na ca prāmāṇyam jñāyate svatas  iti āveditam yadā ca saṃvedana prāmāṇyam aktena krameṇa duradhigamam tadā kā eva kathā indriya ādīnām avyabhicāri saṃvedana kārya vyaṅgya pramāṇa bhāvānām tad eva dṛṣṭa arthāḥ pramāṇa bhṛtām vyavahārā bhavantu sandehāt api yathā tathā adṛṣṭa arthāḥ tu bahu vitta vyāya āyāsa sādhyā vaidikā vyavahārā datta jalā jalayaḥ prasaktāḥ tasmāt  pramāṇa ādi padārtha tattva jñāpana dvāreṇa na śāstram niḥśreyasena saṃbadhyata iti sā iyam āśaṅkā prāmāṇya jñāna upāya kathanena ādi vākyena bhāṣya kṛtā nirākṛtā tathā hi pramāṇam arthavat iti nitya yoge matu p nitya tā ca avyabhicāritā tena artha avyabhicāri iti arthaḥ iyam eva ca artha avyabhicāritā pramāṇasya yad deśa kāla nara avastha antara avisaṃvādaḥ  artha svarūpa prakārayoḥ tad upadarśitayoḥ atra hetuḥ pravṛtti sāmarthyāt  samartha pravṛtti janaka tvāt  yadi punar etad arthavat na abhaviṣyat na samartha pravṛttim akariśyat  yathā pramāṇa ābhāsa iti vyatirekī hetuḥ anvayavyatirekī vā anumānasya svatas  pramāṇa tayā anvayasya api saṃbhavāt  pravṛtti janaka tvam tu pramāṇasya na sākṣāt  kim tu artha pratipatti janana dvāreṇa iti āha pramāṇataḥ  artha grati pattau  iti sarvasya ca asya upapattim vārtti kavya ākhyāna avasare nivedayiṣyāmaḥ syāt etad  bhavantu pramāṇa ādayaḥ padārthāḥ śakya jñānāḥ śāstreṇa tu te na abhidhīyanta iti na niḥśreyasena saṃgatiḥ śāstrasyetvata āha śāstrasya puruṣa śreyaḥ  abhidhāyaka tvāt  yadi api śreyaḥ  duḥkha nivṛttim ātyantikīm vakṣyati tathā api sa upāya eva sā atra śreyaḥ śabdena vivakṣitā tanmātrasya śāstra aviṣaya tvāt tad ayam arthaḥ śāstram tāvat etad  puruṣa śreyaḥ saha upāyena abhidhatta iti anubhava siddha  sat aśakyā anuṣṭhāna tayā apavaditavyam sā ced aśakyā anuṣṭhāna tāpanītā pramāṇata ityādinā saṃhitam niḥśreyasena saha śāstram iti śāstrasya ityādi grahaṇaka vākyam vivṛṇoti śāstram punar ityādinā upabhogāt  prakṣayeṇa iti antena pramāṇa ādi vācaka pada grahaṇena tad lakṣaṇāni ca tad parīkṣā aśva upalakṣayati tathā ca pañca adhyāyī śāstram iti aṅktam iti avirodhaḥ pañca adhyāci iti anena vyūhaḥ samūhinām ucita ānupūrvī upalakṣaka pada svarūpam āha padam punar ita ema smṛti samārūḍhā varṇā eka artha pratipādana avacchinnāḥ samūhaḥ evam sva artha smṛti avāntara vyāpārāṇām sūtrapadānām nānā padārtha viśiṣṭa eka padārtha rūpa vākya artha pratyāyana kārya avacchinnānām samūhaḥ  veditavyaḥ evam ca kvacid  kenacid arthena ekena sūtra vākyānām eka vākya tvam samūhaḥ prakaraṇam prakaraṇānām api kayācid  sva artha saṃgatyā samūha āhnikam evam tatra tatra veditavyam etāḥ ca prakaraṇa āhnika adhyāya artha saṃgatīḥ tatra tatra leśataḥ  darśayiṣyāmaḥ tad evam śāstra svarūpam darṃśayitvā na antareṇa tad artha kathanam puruṣa śreyaḥ  abhidhāyaka tvam asrū sidhyiti iti tad artham kathayati tad padārthā iti nanu pramāṇa ādīnām pratinaram ānantyena durjñāna tvam iti tad avastham eva ānarthakyam śāstrasya prasaktam ityata āha ṣoḍaśa ātmānaḥ ātmā svabhāvaḥ pramāṇa ādīnām pramāṇatva ādi sāmānya viśeṣa iti yāvat  etad uktam bhavati āntar gaṇika bhedāt ānantye api sva sāmānya viśeṣaiḥ saṃgṛhītā na durjñānā iti yatas  asya padārthāḥ pramāṇa ādayaḥ tad  tasmāt  śāstram puruṣa śreyaḥ  abhidhatte syāt etad  pramāṇa ādayaḥ padārthāḥ prāmāṇikā aprāmāṇikā vā aprāmāṇika tve kalpanā mātra nirmitāḥ katham niḥśreyasāya kalpante na ya ṣoḍaśa ātmānaḥ kalpanāḥ kośasya ananta prasara tvāt prāmāṇika tve vā pramāṇāt eva tad siddheḥ śāstrasya vaiyarthyam iti ata āha pratyakṣa iti pratyakṣa anumāna adhigata grahaṇena aprāmāṇika tvam niṣiddham ata eva vastu tattvam iti pramāṇa ādayaḥ padārthā na upamāna viṣayā iti na upamānam upanyastam yadi api prameyam ātma ādi apavarga anta lakṣaṇam āgamikam tathā api āgamasya āpta praṇetṛka tayā tatra api mūla bhūtam anumānam pratyakṣam vā asti iti pratyakṣa anumāne eva darśite nanu uktam prāmāṇika tve śāstra vaiyarthyam iti ata āha tasya viṣaya iti vyavaharamāṇā api pramāṇaiḥ laukikā vainayika buddhi virahiṇaḥ  na etān padārthān viviñcate aviviktāḥ cete na niḥśreyasāya kalpanta iti anadhigata iti aṅktam ādhyātmikī śaktiḥ śuśrūṣā ādiḥ puruṣati uktam tatra vivakṣitam puruṣa viśeṣam grahītum saṃbhavinaḥ puruṣa prakārān darśayati puruṣaḥ punar iti heyam darśayati tatra iti upādeyān āha itara iti apekṣā jijñāsā sā sandigdhasya tāvat asti viṣayasya vipratipannasya tu sākṣiṇām puratas  jalpa vitaṇḍābhyām viṣyamāṇasya vigalite ahaṅkāre sandigdhasya sa jāta jijñāsasya sa apekṣasya sataḥ apratipannasya api kenacid  prakāreṇa sandeham āpādya sa apekṣīkṛtasya pratipādyatā tad idam ukta k itare sa apekṣāḥ santaḥ pratipādyā iti asandigdhaḥ  api tattva pratipādanāya kārūṇikena sandigadhaḥ kṛtvā pratipādyata iti tad  kim sa apekṣam ādhikṛtya śāstram pravṛttam tathā ca pramātaṇām na pramāṇa antare pravṛttiḥ syāt iti ata āha te yadā iti kañcid  viṣayam jijñāsavaḥ  yedandriya ādi apekṣante tadā pratyakṣeṇa pratipādyāḥ evam uttaram api yojyam ayam abhisandhiḥ na dṛṣṭa prayojana upayogi vastu vijñāsā iha apekṣa abhimatā kim tu niḥśreyasa upayogi padārtha jijñāsā sā ca asmin  eva śāstre pravṛtti hetuḥ na anyatra tad idam uktam yadā punar iti parama puruṣa arthayasa dhanam tu jijñāsava iti śeṣaḥ iha abhimatam śreyaḥ  nirdhārayitum śreyaḥ mātra pramārān āha śreyaḥ punar  sukham ahita nivṛttiḥ ca tatra api avāntara prakārān āha tad śreyaḥ sukhan duḥkha nivṛttiḥ ca bhidyamānam dvidhā vyavatiṣṭhate tad āha dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa bhedena na vyāsajya kim tu pratyekam iti āha dṛṣṭam sukha strakcandana vanitā ādi bhoga janma adṛṣṭam sukham svarga ādi evam ca duḥkha nivṛttiḥ api śreyaḥ  dṛṣṭām adṛṣṭam ca iti yojanīyam cakāra lopāt ahita nivṛtteḥ śreyasa ātyantikān ātyantika tvena dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭasya bhedam āha ahita nivṛttiḥ api iti abhimatam śreyaḥ  nirdhārayati ātyantikī iti punar iti nirdhāraṇam avadyotayati ātyantika tvam nirvṛtteḥ nivṛttasya punar anutpādaḥ sa ca kārya kāraṇa tad anuṣaṅgi nivṛttyā lakṣyate na hi akāraṇam kāryam jāyate tad idam uktam ekaviṃśati prabhada bhinduḥ kha hānyeti gauṇa mukhya bhedena ca ekaviṃśateḥ śarīra dīnām duḥkhatva prakārān āha evaviṃśati iti ṣaṣṭham indriyam manaḥ tasya viṣaya icchā dveṣa prayatnāḥ yadi api viṣayaḥ śarīram api tathā api anyathā asya duḥkha hetu bhāva iti āha śarīram iti śarīra avacchinna ātma pradeśaḥ  duḥkha āyatanam iti śarīram duḥkha āyatanam uktam indriya viṣaya buddha dīnām duḥkhatva upacāre kāraṇam āha indriyāṇi iti tatra indriyāṇi tāvat  gandha ādi viṣaya bodhanāt viṣayā bodhya tvāt  buddhayaḥ tu sākṣāt  duḥkha sādhanāni iti duḥkha tvena upacaryante saṃkhasya duḥkhatva upacāra bījam āha sukham iti sādhana pāratantyam kṣayitvam kāma iti duḥkha hetavaḥ sakala sukhān asaṅginaḥ tasmāt  sukham api duḥkha anuṣaṅgi ukta prakāra duḥkha hāna sādhanam āha tasya hāniḥ iti saṃśaya ādi tattva jñāna pariśodhita parama nyāya mārgaḥ khalu heya upādeya bhūta dvādaśavidha prameya tattva paribhāvana bhavā prasaṃkhyānena nirmṛṣṭa nikhila pravṛtti hetu doṣa anuṣaṅgaḥ  apravartamānaḥ  na śarīra indriya ādi hetum apūrva dharma adharma pracayam ātanoti anādi bhava parampara upattam ca dharma adharma pracayam anantam api aniyata vipāka samayam api prasaṃkhyāna paripāka prabhāvāt paritas tad tad upabhoga bhāginaḥ kāyān nirmāya tad ttphala upabhāgāt prakṣiṇoti acintya sāmarthya atiśayaḥ  hi samādhiḥ yathā āhuḥ atrabhavantaḥ kaḥ  hi yoga prabhāvāt ṛte agastya ica samudram pibati sa iva ca daṇḍaka araṇyam sṛjati yoga bhāṣye iti sā iyam ātyantikī duḥkha nivṛttiḥ śreyaḥ tad idam uktam śāstrasya puruṣa śreyaḥ  abhidhāyaka tvāt iti syāt etad  kevalasya duḥkhasya ātyantikī nivṛttiḥ śreyaḥ puyaṣa pravṛtti aṅgam iyam tu duḥkhavat  sukhasya api ātyantikī nivṛttiḥ iti katham śreyaḥ katham ca prekṣāvat pravṛtti aṅgam ityata āha puruṣā rāgādimanta iti yadi api rāga ādimatā puthak janānām etad na pravṛtti aṅgam te hi madhu viṣa saṃpṛktam api annam madhura tayā āpāta ramaṇīyam viṣa viṅgattu mārayatu mā va mīmarat upayu jmahe tāvat āpāta sukham kaḥ  hi hasta gatam pāda gatam karoti iti vicintya upabhu jate vivekinaḥ tu āyatim ālocayantaḥ svargam api kupita phaṇi phaṇā maṇḍala  chāya pratima iti apajahati tena mā bhūt etad  rāga ādimatām pravṛtti aṅgam vivekinām tu bhaviṣyati avivekinām api ca apratipanna vipratipannānām viveka ādhāna upayaḥ pūrvam āveditaḥ śāstra pravṛtti aṅga mātram eva ca iha vivekaḥ  vairāgyam abhimatam iti pravṛtteḥ dvaividhyam aika rūpyam dvairūpyam ca puruṣa bhedaḥ  rāga vairāgyābhyām prāptavyasya sarvasya sukhasya duḥkha saṃbhedena aniṣṭa pakṣa nikṣepāt aniṣṭa pratiṣedha arthā eva pravṛttiḥ vivekinām eka rūpā eva avivekinām tu pravṛttiḥ dvi rūpa iti uktam tad anena prapañcena pramāṇataḥ  artha pratipatta viti ādi vākyasya tātparyam abhidhāya tad avayavam pravṛtti sāmarthyāt iti vivarītum bhūmim āracayati pravṛtteḥ api iti dṛṣṭam pravṛtti sāmarthyam hetuḥ iti rāga ādimad pravṛtti sāmarthyam upanyastam na tu vīta rāgānām na hi tad pravṛtteḥ niḥ śreyasā dhgima lakṣaṇa phala saṃbandhaḥ  dṛṣṭaḥ  niḥśreyasasya alaukika tvāt  pramāṇasya arthavat anarthaka tvāt  iti ayuktam pramāṇam anarthakam iti hi vipratiṣiddham iti ata āha pramāṇam tāvat iti na hi apramāṇam apramāṇam iti gṛhītam pravṛttyai kalpate kim tarhi pramāṇam iti na ca apramāṇe pramāṇa abhimānaḥ  vinā pramāṇa ādi sādharmyāt iti tad sādharmyam pṛcchati kim punar iti uttaram sāmānya paricchedaka tvam tad vivṛṇā iti pramāṇena api iti rajata vijñānam api puras varti śukla bhāsvaram sat dravyam paricchinatti śuktikā jñānam api kevalam ekasmin  ava viṣaye rajata samāropa apavādābhyām buddha corvādhaka bhāva iti bhāvaḥ tad evam ubhayatas  pravṛttiḥ samarthāt  pramāṇāt eva na apramāṇāt artha vyabhicāriṇa iti āha saḥ  ayam pramātā iti tatas ca siddhaḥ samarthāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ anarthavat vacatireka iti abhisandhiḥ tathā ca samarthā pravṛttiḥ anarthavat vacatireka saṃpanna pramāṇasya arthavat tve hetuḥ iti āha tasyāḥ samarthāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ hetoḥ punar  pramāṇasya arthavat tvam artha avyabhicāri tvam asamarthā tu anantarā api na saṃbadhyate yogayatā virahāt saṃprati ādi vākyam ākṣeptum anuvadati pramāṇata iti ākṣipati paraspara iti samādhatte na iti ākṣepa vākyam vibhajate yadi pramāṇata iti na tāvat artha pratipattiḥ pravṛtti hetuḥ api tu tad viniścayaḥ na ca tanmātram api tu tad artha jātīyasya śreyaḥ hetu tām asakṛt upalabhya saṃprati upalabhyamānasya arthasya tad jātīya tayā śreyaḥ hetu bhāva anumāna sahitaḥ  viniścayaḥ pravṛtti hetuḥ sā iyam śreyaḥ sādhana tā anumāna sahitā pramāṇataḥ  artha pratipattiḥ viniścatiḥ samartha pravṛtti nimitta muktā na ca artha vinaścayaḥ prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam antareṇa prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam ca śreyaḥ hetuta anumāna nimitta vyāpti grahaṇam ca na samarthām pravṛttim vinā na ca samarthā pravṛttiḥ tābhyām vivana iti paraspara āśraya tā tad idam uktam cadi pūrvam pramāṇataḥ  artha pratipattiḥ rviniścitiḥ apekṣita upayata anumāna sahitā pravṛtti samārthyam antareṇa kim iti pratipadyate niścinoti apekṣita upāya eva iti ca toyam eva iti ca iti samādhānam vibhajate tad ca na evam iti yad  tāvat uktam pramāṇasya duravadhāraṇa tvāt artha viniścaya abhāvāt na pravṛtti sāmarthyam iti tatra brūmaḥ satyam na svatas  prāmāṇyam śakya avadhāraṇam paratas tu dṛṣṭa artheṣu anabhyāsa daśa āpanneṣu pravṛtti sāmathyat iva tad  gamyate artha prati iti adhīnā tu pravṛttiḥ na artha avadhāraṇa adhīnā artha sandehāt api prekṣāvatām pravṛtteḥ naḥ khalu upāya tā vinaścayena api pravartamānā na anāgata phale sandihate tad amī saṃdihānā api pravartamānāḥ pravṛtti samārthyāt  pramāṇasya tattvam viniścatya tad jātīyasya anyasya abhyāsa daśa pannasya pravṛtti samārthyāt  prāk eva tad jātīya tvena liṅgena prāmājhaya avadhāraṇāt artha viniścayena pravartante evam ca dṛṣṭa artha mantra āyurveda prāmāṇyam pravṛtti sāmarthyena avadhārya tad jātīyasya āpta uktasya adṛṣṭa arthasya vedasya vinā api pravṛtti sāmarthyam prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam āpta ukta tvena nivedayiṣyate na ca phala jñānam parīkṣyate prekṣāvat dhiḥ tasya yādṛśa tādṛśasya api iṣṭatva āt iṣṭa lakṣaṇa tvāt ca phalasya tad sādhana tvam te parīkṣante tathā hi toya jñānam pipāsoḥ tatra pravṛttiḥ pravṛttasya tad āptiḥ āptasya pānam pānena ca udanyā upaśāntiḥ iti etāvatā eva pramātā kṛtī bhavati na punar udanya upaśamam api parīkṣate tasya yādṛśa tādṛśasya api iṣṭa tvāt iti kecid  vayam tu brūmaḥ phala jñānam api abhyāsadaśa āpannatayā tad jātīya tvena liṅgena avadhṛta avyabhicāram eva evam tad pūrvam tad pūrvataram tad pūrvatamam iti na ca saṃpratitanasya phala jñānasya prāmāṇya avadhāraṇāya idānīm eva pūrvasya phala jñānasya tad jātīya tvena pramāṇya avadhāraṇe sati anavasthā iti vācyam pūrvatara sādharmyeṇa pūrvam eva pūrvasya avadhṛta prāmāṇya tvāt  evam pūrvatama sādharmyeṇa pūrvatarasya evam tad pūrva sādharmyeṇa pūrvatamasya iti anāditayā eva atra parihāraḥ eteṣu ca madhye yad phala jñānam svapna ādi upabhoga tulya tayā śaṅkita vyabhicāram tad anabhyāsa daśāpannam atas  pravṛtti sāmarthyam tatra prāmāṇya avadhāraṇāya vinivaśanīyam iti artha pratipatti pravṛtti sāmarthyayoḥ anādi tvam uktam anumānasya tu pravṛtti sāmarthya liṅga janmanaḥ  anyasya vā nirasta samasta vyabhicāra śaṅkasya svata eva prāmāṇyam anumeya avyabhicāri liṅga samuttha tvāt na hi liṅga ākāra jñānam liṅgam vinā na ca liṅgam liṅginam vinā iti svata eva gṛhīta avyabhicāliṅga samuttham niṣkampam upapadyate jñānam pratyakṣa jñānam tu arthāt utpadyamānam api na gṛhīta avyabhicārāt  api tu sattā mātreṇa avasthitāt  na ca kāraṇa antarāṇi api indriya ādīni asya arthena gṛhīta avyabhicārāṇi na ca arthena avyabhicārāṇi śābdam tu jñānu na arthāt utpadyate tad abhāve api sati śabde bhāvāt  na api liṅgasya iva śabdasya artha avi abhicāraḥ kim tu saṅketa grahaṇa mātrāt padārtha pratyāyanena vākya artham adhigamayati śabdaḥ tasmāt  pratyakṣa śābda vijñānayoḥ na svatas  avyabhicāra graha iti pravṛtti sāmarthyam tad jātīya tvam vā liṅgam artha avyabhicārāya anusaraṇīyam jñāna gata tad jātīyatva liṅga grāhiṇaḥ ca jñānasya mānasa pratyakṣasya tādṛśasya adṛṣṭa vyabhicāra tayā paritas  nirasta samasta vibhrama āśaṅkasya svatas  prāmāṇyam iti na anavasthā aitena upamānam vyākhyātam saṃvedanasya ca artha avarubhi cāritā kathanena tad kāraṇānām indriya ādīnām api pramāṇa tvam aktam veditavyam na hi avyabhicāri vijñāna janaka tvāt anyat eṣām prāmāṇyam na ca artha vyabhicāriṇām indriya ādīnām katham artha avyabhicāri vijñāna janaka tvam iti sāṃpratam kāraṇa sva bhāni yoga paryanuyogayoḥ aśakya tvāt  tasmāt artha sandehāt anabhyāsa daśa āpannāt  pramāṇa tā artha pratipattau pravṛtti samārthya saṃbhavāt  pravṛtti samārthya jñānasya ca abhyāsa daśa āpannasya tad jātīya tvena prāmāṇya anumānāt anabhyāsa daśā āpannasya tu pravṛtti sāmarthya antara jñānena prāmāṇya anumānāt anāditva at na artha pratipravṛtti sāmarthyayoḥ paraspara āśraya tvam asti iti arthasya apekṣita upāyata anumāna pravṛtti sāmarthyayoḥ paraspara apekṣa tvam avaśiṣyate tatra api anāditā parihāraḥ utpanna mātrakasya hi bālakasya stanam dṛṣṭvā prāk bhavīyaḥ tad jātīya apekṣita anubhava janitaḥ saṃskāra āvirasti tatas ca smaraṇam tatas  apekṣita upāya ta anumānam tatas  pravṛttiḥ tatas tasyāḥ sāmarthyam evam pūrvasmin pūrvasmin janmani iti anāditayā na bīja aṅkuravat  paraspara apekṣitā iti artha pratipattiḥ iti artha pratipatti śva arthasya apekṣita upāya tā pratipattiḥ ca iti arthaḥ tasmāt  sarvam avadātam tad anena uktena krameṇa pramāṇataḥ  artha pratipatau  iti asya śāstra anusandhāna vākyatva tātparyam ca samāhitam idānīm asya eva tātparya antaram āha pramāṇa pravṛtya ūrvā iti tatra idam amāśāṅkyate muniḥ hi pratyakṣa saṃśaya ādi vyutpādana dvāreṇa sākṣāt ca anena śāstreṇa anvīkṣikpā heya upādeya bhāva avasthita dvādaśavidha prameya vyutpādakam nyāyam anumāna para nāmānam niḥśreyasa siddhaye vyutpādayāṃbabhūva na ca nyāyataḥ pramāṇāt  prameya tattva niścaya mātrāt niḥśreyasa adhigamaḥ api tvādi anta varjjam daśānām prameyāṇām duḥkha saṃjñā bhāvanam ātmanaḥ ca yāthātmya bhāvanam ityādibhyaḥ pravṛttibhya ātma tattva sākṣātkāra vairāgya paripāka krameṇa apūrvayoḥ dharma adharmayoḥ anutpādena utpannayā uśva upabhogāt prakṣayeṇa iti tathā ca niḥśreyasam pratyantaraṅga tvāt  pramāṇān nyāyāt  pravṛttiḥ eva balīyasī na nyāyaḥ tasmāt  pravṛttiḥ eva vyutpādanīyā na pramāṇam niḥśreyasa hetuḥ api pravṛtteḥ antaraṅga tvāt tatra it abhupatiṣṭhate pramāṇataḥ  artha pratipattau satyā pravṛtteḥ samārthyam phalena abhisaṃbandhaḥ  na tu pramāṇataḥ  asatya artha pratipattau tasmāt arthavat  prayojanavat  pramāṇam api pravṛttivat eva etad uktam bhavati yathā antaraṅga tayā pravṛttiḥ balīyasī evam mūla kāraṇa tayā pramāṇam api na hi apramāṇāt  pravṛttiḥ phalena abhisaṃbadhyate tasmāt  tulyam ubhayam api tathā api pramāṇa vyutpādanena pravṛttiḥ api vyutpāditā bhavati iti pramāṇasya vyutpādanam akāri śāstreṇa na tu pravṛtteḥ sāmānya abhidhānam ca parama nyāya param tasya eva prakṛta tvāt iti prāmāṇya jñāna upāya pratipādana para tayā anusandhāna vakya tvam asya pūrvam uktam saṃprati para paryanuyoga mukhena asya anusandhāna vākya tvu pratipādayati loka vṛttā iti yathā hi pramāṇa pratipatti upāyam pratyācakṣāṇaka evam praṣṭāvyaḥ  jāyate kim bhavān pramāṇena pramāṇa jñāna upāyam pratyācaṣṭe apramāṇena vā iti yadi brūyāt  pramāṇena iti sa prativaktavyaḥ pramāṇa jñāna upāyam avidvān katham bhavān evamāha iti apramāṇena iti ced anujñayā vartitavyam atha pramāṇena agṛhīta prāmāṇyena iti vā manasayoḥ visaṃvādaḥ tasmāt anicchatā api tvayā loka vṛttam anusaraṇīyam anyathā na asi laukikaḥ  na parīkṣaka iti unmattavat upekṣaṇīyaḥ syā iti tad idam loka vṛttam ākṣeptāram bodhayitum anena bhāṣyeṇa anūdyate pramāṇataḥ  artha pratipatau pravṛtti sāmarthyāvat  pramāṇa yatas  atas  sarvaḥ pramātā pramāṇena avagata arthavat tvena artham avadhārya pravartamānaḥ phalam upalabhata iti loka vṛttam tad  pramāṇata ityādinā vākyena kāraṇa pradarśana dvāreṇa anūdyate asya eva bhāṣyasya tātparya antaram vaktu bhūmim āracayati heya hāna iti arthaḥ  artha śabdaḥ pramāṇataḥ  artha pratipattau  iti atra sthitaḥ padam vāyakam yeṣām tāni tathā etad vāttika granthasya etādṛśaṃvyākhyānam bhāṣya gatasya tu anyathā bhaviṣyati upāyaḥ śāstram iti śāstra śabdaḥ tad artha paraḥ arthasya api śabdavat śāstra śarīra tvāt atra ca heya hāna adhigantavya padaiḥ pramāṇa prameyayaḥ rūpa ādānāt  gaḥ balīvarda nyāyena saṃśaya ādiṣu nigraha sthāna anteṣu śāstra padam pravartate tena upāya padena saṃśayāt ayaḥ  nigraha sthāna antaḥ  eva uktā iti grahaṇaka vākyam vivṛṇa iti heyam iti tātparyam āha etasmin  ca iti cena pramāṇa pramā pra mātṛ prameya rūpam caturvarga antaram api sūcayati tatra heya ādi caturvarge cāryamāṇa tayā artha pada sūcite pramāṇa ādi caturvarge ca pramāṇasya prādhānya pradarśana artham idam bhāṣyam yadi api caturvarga dvaya tattva avagamaḥ  niḥśreyasa adhigama hetuḥ tathā api pramāṇam eva pradhānam tad mūla tvāt itara siddheḥ tad idam uktam arthavat iti atiśāyane matu p pramātṛ ādi apekṣayā heya ādi epa kṣayā ca atiśayena prayojanavat  pramāṇam kasmāt  pramāṇataḥ  artha pratipattau satyām pravṛttasya pramātuḥ tad itara pratilambhāt  pramāyāḥ ca tad kāryatvāt tad idam uktam pravṛtti sāmarthyāt iti tad etasmāt  prādhānyāt  vivakṣā bhedena trivarga dvayāt prāk uddeśaḥ pramāṇasya iti etena yad ā āhuḥ eke yadi prādhānyāt  prāthamyam tad  prameyasya eva atha uṣāya tvāt  tad  saṃśaya ādīnām teṣām pramāṇa upāya tvāt kasmāt ca pramātṛ ādibhyaḥ prāthamyam pramāṇasya iti tad nirastam bhavati pramāṇa upāyānām api saṃśaya ādīnām pramāṇa adhīna tvāt iti nanu avagatam artha pada tayā heya ādi caturvargaḥ  darśita itiḥ pramāṇa ādi caturvargaḥ tu katham pradarśita iti pṛcchati katham punar iti uttaram pramāṇa grameya adhigataya iti tad evam tātparyam vyākhyāya avayava artham vyākhyātum upakramate tad idam vākyām avayavaśa upanyasya varṇyate vyākhyāyate avayavaśa iti tatra asya avayaveṣu vyākhyātavyeṣu prāthamyāt  pramāṇata iti vivṛṇoti tatra iti vibhajate pramāṇata iti iyam nimitta pañcamī nimitta pañcamī ced  kasmāt  pramāṇāt iti na abhihitam iti ata āha asya iti pramāṇata iti evaṃrūpasya abhidhānam vacana vyāpti artham vibhakti vyāpti artham ca iti vacana vyāpti artham iti mṛśyāmahe na tu vibhakti vyāpti artham iti pañcamī vyatirekeṇa taseḥ abhāvāt iti āha katham punar iti pariharati labhyata iti vyāpteḥ prayojanam pṛcchati kim siddham bhavati iti uttaram vacana vyāptyā saṃplavaḥ  vyavasthā ca tad ubhayam vibhajate pramāṇena iti yatra dvayoḥ bahūnām vā saṃpalvaḥ pramāṇānām tatra ekaikasya api asti pratipatti sādhana tvam pramāṇasya iti kathayitum saṃplava avasare api pramāṇena iti aṅktam ata eva vyavasthāyām eva kāraḥ pramāṇena eva iti vibhakti vyāpteḥ prayojana māha vibhakti vaya āptyā heta tu karaṇa bhāvaḥ gamyate iti anuṣajyate tad vibhajate pramāṇāt artha adhigatiḥ bhavati iti hetu tvam gamyate pramāṇena artha adhigatiḥ bhavati iti karaṇa rūpaḥ  arthaḥ  gamyata iti saṃbandhaḥ kasmāt  punar  karaṇa arthaḥ  gamyata iti ata āha pramāṇena iti artham artha adhigati sādhayati iti sādhakatama tvāt  atra ca karaṇa bhāvanā antarīyakasya hetu bhāvasya pañcamya abhidhānam pramāṇa phalayoḥ tādātmya pratiṣedha artham bheda adhiṣṭhāna tvāt hetu phala bhāvasya na khalu paraśuḥ eva cchidā iti pramāṇa prātipadika labdha karaṇatva anuvādaḥ ca pramākāraka antarebhyaḥ  abhyarhita tvena asya vyutpādya tvam ca prāthamyam ca yuktam iti darśayitum saṃplavam ākṣipati saṃplava iti samādhatte na iti ākṣepu vibhajate syāt matiḥ iti viśiṣṭaḥ  bhinnaḥ viṣayaḥ  yeṣām tāni tathā bahuvacanam āntar gaṇika bheda abhiprāyam artha sāmarthya samuttham hi pratyakṣam artha gocaram sa eva arthaḥ pratyakṣa gocaraḥ  yaḥ  jñāna pratibhāsam ātmanaḥ  anvaya vyatirekau  anukārayati na ca sāmānyam nirasta samasta artha kriyā sāmarthyam evam bhavitum arhati sva lakṣaṇam tu syāta tad eva hi paramārtha sat  artha kriyā sāmarthya lakṣaṇa tvāt  vastunaḥ etad eva asya svam asādhāraṇam lakṣaṇam yad deśataḥ  ananugamena ādeśa ātmakasya parama aṇu tvam kālataḥ  ananugamena ca kṣaṇika tvam tasmāt  sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam pratyakṣam na ca sva lakṣaṇam anumānasya api gocaraḥ tad hi gṛhīta pratibandha liṅga hetukam pratibanṇaḥ ca tādātmya tad utpatti lakṣaṇaḥ sva lakṣaṇa viṣayaḥ  aśakya graha iti sāmānya dharmau  āśrayate na ca sāmānyam ekam aneka deśa kāla avasthā saṃsargi bhavitum arhati tad idam anādi vāsanā udbhūta vikalpa dhiṣṭhānam vikalpa ākārasya vā alīkasya vā bāhya tvam anumāna gācaraḥ  abhyupeyam tad ca bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇyāt ca bāhya sādṛśyat ca niyata pratibhāsa tvāt ca anya vyāvṛtti niṣṭham yad  khalu bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇam tad anya vyāvṛtti niṣṭham eva yathā amūrta tvam tad  vijñāna ādau bhāve śaśa viṣāṇa ādau ca abhāve sādhāraṇam bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇaḥ ca vikalpa gocaraḥ  asti ghaṭaḥ  na asti ghaṭa iti yadi punar asādhāraṇaḥ  bhāvaḥ bhavet  asti śabdaḥ  na prayujyeta punarukta tvāt  na astīyapi na vaktavyam virodhāt  evam abhāva asādhāraṇye api vācyam na cālīkasya sarva sāmarthya virahiṇaḥ parama artha sattā sva lakṣaṇena sādṛśyam manyate anya vyāvṛteḥ na ca gauḥ iti niyatau buddhi vyapadeśau vināḥ ca ādi vyāvṛttim tasmāt  sāmānya m anya vyāvṛtti rūpam abāhyam bāhya bheda āgrahād bāhya tvena avagāhyamānam anumānam bāhyaḥ  pravartayati pāramparyeṇa ca bāhya pratibandhāt  bāhyam prāpayat  saṃvādakam sat  bhrāntam api pramātṛ āśaya vaśāt  pramāṇam tad asya na sva lakṣaṇam gocaraḥ pratyakṣam apita na sāmānya gocaram iti āveditam na ca abhyām anyat  pramāṇam asti pramāṇasya sataḥ  atra eva antar bhāvāt  anantarbhāve vā pramāṇatva anupapattaḥ na ca sāmānya viśeṣābhyām anyat asti prameya antaram yatra ete tad  saṃploṣyete iti arthaḥ samādhāna vākyam vivṛṇoti etad ca na iti yathā ca etad  tathā tatra tatra nivedayiṣyate viśeṣaḥ  vyavacchedakaḥ sa ca vakra koṭara ādiḥ antyaḥ ca vyavasthā saṅkara udāharaṇāni āha indriyavat iti saṃplavam amṛṣyamāṇa  āha adhigata tvāt iti samādhattena anyathā iti ākṣepam vivṛṇoti yadi iti syāt etad  na asti vaiyarthyam adhigatī nām ā aśutara vināśi tayā tad gocara adhigati antara utpādam prati pramāṇa antarasya arthavat tvāt ityata āha adhigatam ca artham adhigamayatā pramāṇena iti yadi api adhigataya āśutara vināśinyaḥ tathā api ekatara pramāṇa janita artha adhigalibdha janmanaḥ saṃskārāt eva sthāyinaḥ tad artha smṛti santati saṃbhāvāt  adhigamartham adhigamayatā pramāṇena piṣṭam piṣṭam syāt iti samādhi vākyam vivarītum anuvadati na anyathā iti vivṛṇoti na brūma iti ayam abhisandhi na hi pramāṇa kāraṇāni prekṣā vantiḥ yena evam ālocayeyuḥ janitam eva pramāṇam anyam ena asmāsu vayam iha udāsmaha iti na api sva kāraṇa bala labdha janmāni pramāṇāni dirśitaḥ  ayam arthaḥ  anyatamena ca asmāsu pramāṇena kṛtam asmābhiḥ iti virantum arhanti pramātuḥ cetana tvāt ayam anayoga iti ced  na priyatamasya vastunaḥ  anena bhūyaḥ bhūyas  pramitsita tvāt  apramitsitasya api ca durjana vacana ādeḥ prameyasya anena pramīyamāṇa tvāt  tasmāt na pramātṛ abhisandhānāt  pramāṇasya pravṛttiḥ apravṛttiḥ vā arthe kim tu samārthya ut anyathā agni dāha ādi duḥkhasya apratyakṣatva prasaṅgaḥ cattu pramāṇam pramitsa adhīna pravṛtti tad yadi pramātā na vyāpārayet  kim āyātam pramāṇasya na hi toyam api pipāsunā na pīyata iti tasya pipāsā upaśamana śaktiḥ api iti tasmāt  pratyutpanna kāraṇa sāmagrī janitā buddhiḥ pramā tad janakāni ca pramāṇāni samāna viṣayāṇi api sa eva ca anena sāmagrī bhedaḥ pradarśitaḥ anyathā pratyakṣeṇa ityādinā yadi api sākṣātkāra āsākṣātkāra ādiḥ api prakāra bhedaḥ  asti tathā api asau prakṛta anupayogāt na uktaḥ yadi ca dravyam tvacā gṛhītam iti kṛtam cakṣuṣā cakṣuṣā vā gṛhītam iti kṛtam tvacā iti ucyeta na rūpa vijñānam vā sparśa vijñānam vā upajāyeta tad artham cakṣuḥ vā tvac vāmi upetavyam tathā ca saṃplava vaiyarthye api vyavasthāyām na vaiyarthyam iti āha viṣaya antara iti prakṛtam upasaṃharatitasmāt iti vibhakti artham nirūpya prātipadikā arthanirūpaṇam avatārayati pramāṇa iti atra ca avadhāryate anena iti avadhāraṇam vicāra iti vicāraṇāya bhāva bhavitārau pṛcchati kim punar iti kecid āhuḥ anadhigata artha gantṛ pramāṇam iti viṣaya sārūpyam sa ākārasya vijñānasya iti ante vijñānasya eva anākārasya ātmā nām aprakāśana sāmarthyam iti apare upalabdhi sādhanam iti vṛddhāḥ tasmāt  viprapitteḥ saṃśayāt  praśrnaḥ bhāva praśrna vyākhyānena bhavitṛśnaḥ vaya ākhyātaḥ uttaram upalabdhi hetuḥ pramāṇam na ca saṃśaya viparyāsa rūpa upalabdhi kāraṇayoḥ prasagḍaḥ arthavat iti adhikāra t tayā uśvepa darśita artha vyabhicāreṇa anarthavat tvāt naḥ khalu vikalpayamānam vastu asti artha kriyāsu vā upayujyate syāt etad  smṛti hetoḥ api prāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ na hi asau na upalabdhi hetuḥ na ca artha sahakāri pramāṇam iti saṃskārasya artha sahakāritā virahāt prāmāṇyam iti sāṃpratam nadī pūrasya pipīlikā aṇḍa saṃcaraṇasya ca atīta anāgata varṣa liṅgasya śabdasya atīta anāgata gocarasya artha sahakāritā virahiṇaḥ ca pramāṇatva prasaṅgāt  jñāpaka tvena kāryatvena vā kathañcid artha saṃbandhe saṃskārasya api tad  samānam iti tasya api smṛti rūpa upalabdhi hetoḥ prāmāṇyam prasaktam mā evam pramāṇa śabdena tasya apāsta tvāt pramāsādhanam hi pramāṇam na ca smṛtiḥ pramā loka adhīna avadhāraṇaḥ  hi śabda artha sabandhaḥ lokaḥ ca saṃskāra mātra janmanaḥ smṛteḥ anyām upalabdhim artha avyabhicāriṇīm pramāmācaṣṭe tasmāt  tad hetuḥ pramāṇam iti na smṛti hetau prasaṅgaḥ anadhigata artha gantṛ tvam ca dhārāvāhika vijñānānām adhigata artha gocarāṇām loka prasiddha pramāṇa bhāvānām pramāṇyam vihanti iti na adriya mahe na ca kāla bhedena anadhigagocara tvam dhārāvāhikānām iti yuktam parama sūkṣmāṇām kāla kalā bhedānām piśita locanaiḥ asmādṛśaiḥ anākalanāt  na ca ādyena eva vijñānena upadarśita tvāt arthasya pravartita tvāt  puruṣasya prāpti tvāt ca uttateṣām aprāmāṇyamam eva vijñānānām iti vācayam na hi vijñānasya artha prāpaṇam pravartanāt anyat  na ca pravartanam api artha pradarśanāt anyat  tasmāt artha pradarśana mātra vyāpāram eva jñānam pravartakam prāpakam ca pradarśana ca pūrvavat uttareṣām vijñānām abhinnam iti katham pūrvam eva vijñānam pramāṇa na uttarāṇi api puruṣa apekṣayā tu prāmāṇye candra tāraka ādi vijñānasya puruṣa anapekṣitasya aprāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ na ca ati davīḥ tayā tad arthasya heya tayā tad api puruṣasya apekṣitam tasya upekṣaṇīya artha viṣaya tvāt na ca upekṣaṇīyam api anupādeya tvāt heyam iti nivedayiṣyate upalabdhi hetum ca pramāṇam vadatā anadhigata artha gantṛ tvam ca artha sārūpyam ca ātmā anātma prakāśana śaktiḥ ca pramāṇam iti nirastāni bhavanti upalabdhi mātrasyatvāt heyam iti nivedayiṣyate upalabdhi hetum ca pramāṇam vadatā anadhigata artha gantṛ tvam ca artha sārūpyam ca ātmā anātma prakāśana śaktiḥ ca pramāṇam iti nirastāni bhavanti upalabdhi mātrasya artha avi abhicāriṇa smṛteḥ anyasya pramā śabdena abhidhānāt  hetu grahaṇena sārūpya śaktyoḥ phalāt abhinnayoḥ apākaraṇāt  hetu hetum at bhāvasya tādātmaye anupapatteḥ iti upalabdhi hetu tve ca pramāṇa tvam bhavitṛvyākhyānena bhāvaḥ vyākhyātaḥ tad evam jñānam ajñānam vā upalabdhi hetuḥ pramāṇam tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam iti sthitam tad etad ati vyāpaka tvena ākṣipati samāna tvāt iti samādhatte ayam viśeṣa iti ayam arthaḥ sarvaḥ karttā karaṇa gocara vyāpāraḥ  na tu sākṣāt  phale vyāpriyate karaṇam ca dvidhā siddham āsiddham ca tatra siddham para śu ādi dāru udvaidhībhāvāya udyamya udyamya dārūṇi nipātayan dārū cchinatti iti ucyate na tu sākṣāt  kartṛ vyāpāra gocaraḥ  dāru udvaidhībhāvaḥ kim tu sparśavat vegavataḥ karaṇībhūtasya paraśoḥ saṃyogasya udyamana nipātana lakṣaṇaḥ tu kartṛ vyāpāraḥ paraśu gocara eva evam svarga kāmaḥ  api kartā na sākṣāt  svarge vyāpriyate kim tu tad karaṇam yāgam siddham sādhayati svargaḥ tu yāga vyāpārāt eva apūrva abhidhānāt cetana āśrayāt  deśa kāla avasthā bheda āsādita pariṇati viśeṣāt sākṣāt utpadyate tadvat iha api pramātā siddham indriya ādi asiddham ca tad sannikarṣa ādi vyāpārayan  utpādayan vā karaṇa eva caritārthaḥ karaṇam tu indriya ādi tad sannikarṣa ādi vā na anyatra cārita artham iti sākṣāt upalabdhau  eva phale vyāpriyate prameyasya tu pratyakṣāt anyatra upalabdhi hetu bhāva eva tāvat na asti tatra api indriya saṃbandha mātre upayujyate prameyam indriyam eva tu tad tad sannikarṣa ādi vā sākṣāt  pramā hetuḥ tatas  siddham etad  na pramātā sākṣāt  pramā hetuḥ kartṛ tvāt yaḥ  yaḥ kartā sa sarvaḥ  na sākṣāt  phala hetuḥ yathā vraścana yajamāna ādiḥ tathā ca ayam tasmāt  tathā tathā pratyakṣam prameyam na sākṣāt  pramā hetuḥ prameya tvāt  yad  yad  prameyamvat tad sarvam na pramā hetuḥ anumeya ādivat  tathā ca etad  tasmāt  tathā iti tad idam pramātṛ prameyayoḥ pramāṇe caritārtha tvam acarita artha tvam ca pramāṇasya tasmāt  tad eva phala hetuḥ pramātṛ prameye tu phala uddeśena pravṛtte iti tad hetū kathañcid iti codayati akaraṇa iti na akaraṇaḥ kartā pramāṇam api vyāptum arhati iti arthaḥ pariharati na indriya artha iti yadā jñānam pramāṇa tadā jñānasya pramāṇasya utvattau  iti arthaḥ punar codayati yadi tarhāti pariharati tasmin  api iti codayati yadi pramātṛ prameyābhyām sadbhyām pramāṇam iti pramāṇam antareṇa pramāyā abhāvāt  pramātṛ prameyayoḥ asiddhiḥ iti arthaḥ pṛcchati katham iti uttaram pramāṇam iti iti artha sva rūpa mātram eva kārakam kasmāt na bhavati tad ca kriyā saṃbaddhasya purastāt api asti iti ata āha na ca dravya mātram iti astu tarhi tadīyaḥ  avāntara vyāpāraḥ pradhāna kriyāyām sādhyāyām kārakam tasya api pradhāna kriyāyām nimitta tvāt ityata āha na ca kriyā mātram iti na hi sva rūpeṇa devadattaḥ  vraścanaḥ na api tadīyaḥ  vyāpāra udyamana nipāta na ādiḥ loṣṭha ādyāśrarūḥ kva tarhi kāraka śabdaḥ pravartata iti ata āha kāraka śabdaḥ  hi iti pradhāna kriyā sādhane hetau avāntara kriyā viśeṣa yukte kāraka śabdaḥ pravartate dvaidhībhāve hi phale pradhāna vyāpāre kartuḥ karaṇa gocara udyamana nipātana ādiḥ avāntara vyāpāraḥ karmaṇaḥ ca dārūṇaḥ sparśavat vegavat tīkṣṇatara kuṭhā rasa yoga eva avāntara vyāpātaḥ tena hi dārū sva avayava parispanda labdha janmanaḥ  avayava vibhāgāt  dvaidhībhāvam anubhavati tasmāt avāntara pradhāna vyāpāra saṃpannam kārakam iti sāmānyatas  prasādhya prakṛte yojayati pramātṛ prameya śabdau ca iti tāvanreṇa kriyām pradhāna kriyām iti arthaḥ pariharati na pācaka ādi śabdavat iti loka adhīna avadhāraṇaḥ khalu ayam śabda artha saṃbandhaḥ lokaḥ ca atīta anāgata vartamāna kriyā saṃbandha mātra vivakṣayā kāraka śabdān prayuṅkte pācakam ānaya pakṣyati iti ca pācakaḥ  ayam apākṣīt iti ca pācakaḥ  ayam pacati iti ca tulyavat  traikālya viṣaya prayoga darśanam tad  kasya hetoḥ apacati api pāka saṃbandham pratyasti svaru upśaktiḥ devadatta ādau  iti dvayī hi śaktiḥ kārakāṇām kārya upajananam prati svarūpam ca sahakāri grāma samavadhānam ca tatra asati api sahakāri grāma samavadhāne kāraka śabdānām pravṛtteḥ sati api ca svarūpe trekālyavyāpini trekālya yogi kārya asaṃbhave apravṛtteḥ traikālya yogi kārya upahita maryādam eva svarūpam kāraka śabdānām pravṛtau nimittam iti asatī api pratyutpanna pramā hetu pramāṇa saṃbandhe pramātṛ prameya śabdayoḥ pravṛttiḥ iti upapannam pramātṛ prameyābhyām pramāṇa janyata iti tad  pramāṇam upalabdhi sādhanam sākṣāt  na pramātṛ prameye iti siddham sati api ca upalabdhi sādhana tve pramātṛ prameyayā ūrūpabdhi hetuḥ iti atra aprasaṅga sādhākatamāsādhaka tamayoḥ sādhakatame kārya saṃpratyayāt sa atiśaya tvena udbhūtattvāt tasya iti āha sādhakatama tvāt  vā iti sādhakatama artham pṛcchati kaḥ punar iti uttaram pramāṇasya bhāva abhāvayoḥ pramāyāḥ kāryasya tadvat tā bhāva abhāvavat tā sādhakatama arthaḥ lakṣya lakṣaṇayoḥ abheda vivakṣayā sāmānadhikaraṇyam na tu pramātṛ prameya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānam api asti pramāyā anvaya vyatirekayoḥ iti ata āha na pramātarī iti pramātṛ prameyābhyām saha pramotpādasya anya yoga vyavacchedena saṃbandhaḥ pramāṇena tu saṃbandhaḥ pramā utpādasya ayoga ani ayoga vyavacchedābhyām iti atiśayaḥ pramāṇasya pramātṛ prameye hi pramāṇa upakṣīṇa vṛttinī na pramāyām vyāpriyete tena antarāya saṃbhavat na avaśyam pramātṛ prameya vyāpāre sati pramā bhavati pramāṇasya vyāpāre tu pramā bhavati eva iti kalpa antaram āha yadvān vā pramimīte saḥ  atiśayaḥ pramimīta iti svatantram kartāram daśayati pratipādyāt  karaṇāt  vyavacchettum yadvā aneva iti ca sa avadhāraṇām tatra yad vā  iti kartṛ antaram vyavacchinatti na hi kartā kartṛmān kim tu pramāṇavān svatantraḥ  hi āśrayaḥ paratantreṇa āśrīyate kartṛ adhīnam hi karaṇam iti āveditam pramātā prameyavān api kvacid  bhavet  tad tantra tvāt prameyasya na tu prameyavān eva anumāna ādiṣu prameyasya atītatva ādinā tadvat tau  ihāt na tu liṅga dijñānavān na kadācid iti avadhāraṇa phalam saḥ  ayam viśeṣaḥ pramātṛ prameyābhyām pramāṇasya asya eva ca viśeṣasya atiśaya tvam anvaya vyatirekābhyām ādarśayati pramāṇe sati iti kalpa antaraka āha satārva iti pūrveṇa bhāva pradhānaḥ  atiśayaḥ  yādṛśasya darśitaḥ tādṛśasya eva iha vyatireka pradhānaḥ  atiśaya iti viśeṣaḥ akartṛ tvam ahetu tvam iti arthaḥ kalpa antaram āha saṃyogavat carama bhāvitā vā sa iti kartavya tākam hi vyāpriyamāṇam karaṇam na tu cakṣuḥ ādi svarūpam karaṇa ādi śabda pravṛtti nimitta mātram tu svarūpam syāt iti pūrvam āveditam tad ca siddham asiddha  vā pramātṛ prameya vyāpārasya paścāt eva tathā tvena saṃpadyata iti caram abhāvī iti ucyate saḥ  ayam asya carama bhāvita atiśayaḥ tathā tantūnām paṭe janayitavye antyāḥ saṃyoga bhedā yad anantaram paṭa utpadyata eva iti kalpa antaram āha prapipatteḥ ānantarya vā yata eva pramāṇam carama bhāvi ata eva tad anantaram pratipatteḥ pramāyā bhāvāt  pratipatteḥ ānarnyam eva pramāṇasya atiśayaḥ sa ca iti ca u avadhāraṇe idam api lakṣya lakṣaṇayoḥ abheda vivakṣayā uktam kalpa antaram āha asādhāraṇa kāraṇa tā vā catastraḥ khalu imāḥ pratyakṣa ādi pramiyaḥ  bhinna buddhi vyapadeśa bhājaḥ  anubhūyante na ca pramātā tad bheda hetuḥ sya sādhāraṇyāt  na ca prameyam ekasya api prameyasya saṃplave sarva pratipatti sādhāraṇyāt  pramāṇāni tu yathāyatham catasṛṣu api pramitiṣu asādhāraṇāni iti bhinna buddhi vyapadeśa nibandhanāni tad idam asādha araṇyam atiśayaḥ aśeṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pramātā atra vivakṣitaḥ kalpa antaram āha pramākāraṇa iti pramāyā asamavāyi kāraṇa khalu ātma manaḥ saṃyogaḥ sa ca sarva pramāsodhāraṇaḥ na asau pramātrā prameyeṇa vā śakyaḥ  viśeṣṭum tayoḥ api tadvat eva sādhāraṇyāt  asādhāraṇam tu pramāṇam yathāyatham ātma manaḥ saṃyogam avacchinatti eve sukha ādi prameyāṇām api mana eva asādhāraṇam vyavacchet aṅka draṣṭavyam saḥ  ayam asya atiśayaḥ atiśaya atiśayinoḥ abheda vivakṣayā atiśaya śabda vācyam iti uktam krama prāptam artha grahaṇam tātparyataḥ vyācaṣṭe artha grahaṇam iti kasmāt  punar niṣidhyate pramāṇa viṣayā pratipattiḥ iti ata āha yatas  na pramāṇa viṣaya iti itikartavya tā anuṣṭhānam tasmin arthyata iti arthaḥ toyakaṇṭaka ādiḥ tasya tathā amāvaḥ  arthanīya tvam tad ca sukha duḥkha sādhana tvam sukha sādhanam khalu upādeya tvena duḥkha sādhanam ca heya tvena arthye tātparya antaram āha upekṣaṇīya iti upekṣaṇīya viṣaye pramāṇe pravṛtti sāmarthyam na asti iti tad pratiṣadhyate na ca tad apramāṇam iti tasya api dṛṣṭa pramāṇa sādharmyeṇa liṅgena prāmāṇya anumānāt iti codayati pramāṇa agahaṇam iti samartha pravṛtti janikā hi pratipattiḥ na apramāṇāt bhāvati iti arthāt eva pramāṇāt iti gamyata iti arthaḥ pariharati na pramāṇa viśeṣa jñāpana artha tvāt ayam abhisandhiḥ pravṛtti sāmarthyena hi kāryeṇa pramāṇasya arthavat tvam anumātavyam na ca etad  sākṣāt  pramāṇasya kāryam kim tu artha pratipatteḥ tad anantaram hi samarthā pratipatti rūpajāyate artha pratipattiḥ tu pramāṇa kāryā iti samarthā pravṛttiḥ pramāṇa kāryā satī pramāṇasya arthavat tvam anumāpayati tasmāt artha gamyam api pramāṇam artha pratipatti karaṇa tvena dyotanīyam anyathā pramāṇam arthavat artha pratipatteḥ masartha pravṛtti janaka tvāt iti kim kena saṃgatam pramāṇasya viśeṣaḥ pramāṇa bhāsāt  vyāvṛttiḥ tasya jñāpanam sa eva arthaḥ  yasya pramāṇa grahaṇasya tad  tathā uktam tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam tasmāt etad uktam bhavati pramāṇa kāryāyāḥ  artha prapitteḥ pravṛtti sāmarthyam na tad ābhāsa kāryāyāḥ tasmāt  pramāṇasya arthavat tvam gamyata iti tad idam uktam tad  yā iha pramāṇena pratipattiḥ sā pravṛtti sāmarthyam pratipādayati pramāṇam ayam arthaḥ pramāṇa kartṛ  pravṛtti samārthyam pratipadyamānam prāpnuvat tad pratipādayati prāpayati pramāṇa kārya artha pratipattiḥ iti idam api pramāṇa grahaṇasya prayojanam iti āha na ca pramāṇa grahaṇam iti eka deśi vyākhyānam upanyasyati sukha iti na kevalam sukha duḥkha hetu tvāt arthyamāna tvāt  jñāyamāna tvāt ca dūṣayati na iti sarvasya sukha duḥkha tad hetu tvena heya pakṣa nikṣepāt  upādeyānām pramāṇa śāstra apavargāṇānām abhāva prasaṅgāt  vyāghātaḥ avivakṣita tvāt ca iti caśabda samuccitam aśakya hāna tvam hetu antaram ādarśayati na ca pramāṇa ādi hānam iti sukha daḥ khatat hetavaḥ  hi heyāḥ sane hāna upāyam apekṣante na ca pramāṇa ādeḥ anyaḥ tad upāyaḥ saṃbhavati na ca pramāṇa ādiḥ sva ucchedāya paryāptaḥ na ca asmāt apavargaḥ  na adhigamyate tasmāt na śakyam pramāṇa ādinā pramāṇa dihānam iti na ca etad niḥśreyasa hetum śāstram praṇayataḥ sūtrakārasya tad anuvartinaḥ  vā bhāṣya kārasya vivikṣitam iti āha na ca pramāṇa ādi hānam vivakṣitam tasmāt asmad vacā ākhyānam eva śobhanam iti āha kim tu iti pravṛtti sāmarthya ādhāna yogya vamam adhikāraḥ tasmāt  sukha duḥkha tad hetu rūpa artha pratipattiḥ eva hi samarthām pravṛttim ādhatte na tu artha mātrā pratipattiḥ iti arthaḥ na kevalam vyāghāta aśakya hāna avivakṣita tvaiḥ artha padena na sarva saṃgrahaḥ  aśakya tvāt api na sarva saṃgraha iti āha na saṃvida iti sukha duḥkha tad hetu tayā na saṃvidaḥ  grahaṇam saṃgrahaḥ sarva madhya patitāyā api kutas  anadhikārāt  sukha duḥkha tad hetu yogya tā virahāt na api arthyamāna tvena saṃgraha iti āha akarma tvāt ca na tāvat  sarvā eva saṃvidaḥ saṃvid gocarā manaḥ yonayaḥ saṃvedyā bhavitum arhanti eka nīla viṣaya saṃvid paramparā mātra eva puruṣa āyuṣa sahasra paryavasānāt  viṣaya antara saṃcāra abhāva prasaṅgāt ca tasmāt anavasthā abhayā t ante kasyāścid  saṃvidaḥ  asaṃvedya tayā phala mātra tvam abhyupeyam tathā ca sā na arthyate na ca sukha duḥkhe tatretuḥ iti na sarva saṃgrahaḥ saṃvidaḥ  asaṃgrahāt iti arthaḥ tad evamādi vākya vyākhyāya bhāṣya vākya antaram avatārya tatra ekaderśi vyākhyānam dūṣayitum upanyasyati saḥ  ayam pramāṇa artha  iti dūṣayati na ubhayasya api parisaṃkhyāta tvāt  arthaḥ tu sukham ityādinā bhāṣya granthena kārya kāraṇābhyām ubhaya tvam prāṇabhṛt bhedasya aparisaṃkhyeya tvāt iti ca hetuḥ śvetaḥ prāsādaḥ kākasya kārṣṇyāt itivat na pratijñā arthena saṅgacchate iti āha prāṇabhṛt bhedasya ca iti tad etad eka deśi mata dūṣaṇam asmin vyākhyāne na asti iti āha na artha śabdasya iti candranādi viṣayam pramāṇam sukha prayojanam eva kaṇṭaka ādi viṣayam ca pramāṇam duḥkha utpāda prayojanam eva iti etad ubhayam parisaṃkhyātum niyantum aśakyam iti arthaḥ evam kila atra śaṅkyate sukha duḥkha hetu bhāvaḥ  vastūnām svābhāvikaḥ  bhavet na vā svābhāvika tve nīla iva sarvān pratyarthaḥ sukha iti kara bhavat manuṣyāṇām api kaṇṭakaḥ sukhaḥ syāt  evam nidādhe api kuṅkumam sukham syāt  candanam ca hemantate api sukham bhavet  evam tṛṣṇaja iva apām suhitasya apaḥ sukhāḥ prasajyeran asvābhāvika tve tu anādi vāsanā vaicitrya labdha janma puruṣa dharma kalpanā anupātinaḥ sukha duḥkha āt ayaḥ  na pramāṇa prayojanam bhavitum arhanti iti tatra idam upatiṣṭhate saḥ  ayaṃpramāṇa artha  iti nivedayiṣye hi kṣaṇa bhaṅga adhikāre tathā sthema bhājām api vastu nāma kramāṇām api kramavat sahakāri kāraṇa samavadhāna vaśāt upajana apāya dharmāṇaḥ kramavantaḥ  dharmā bhavanti iti tad iha api yadi api na jātyā sukha duḥkha hetu bhāvaḥ  bhāvanām bhavati tathā api jāti deśa kāla avasthā puruṣa bheda sahakāri samavadhānāt upapatsyate sukha duḥkha hetu bhāvaḥ  avyavasthayā iti bhāvaḥ tad  siddham etad  pramāṇa arthaḥ  aniyataḥ aniyata prāṇabhṛt bheda hetuka tvāt  yad yad aniyata kāraṇakam kāryam tatva sarvam aniyatam eva yathā aniyata kāla megha udaya nibandhanam varṣam tathā ca ayam tasmāt aniyata iti kasmāt  punar  pramātṛ ādi caturvarge pramāṇasya eva arthavat tvam ucceta na pramātṛ ādīnām api iti āśaṅkā nirākaraṇa artham bhāṣyam anuvadan  eva vyācaṣṭe arthavati ca samarthe samyak arthe artha avyabhicāriṇī iti yāvat  pramāṇe arthavanti bhavan simarthāni samyak arthāni pramātṛ ādīni arthasya tu samyaktvam idam eva yad  yādṛśaḥ pramāṇena upadarśiḥ tasya tathā tvam na punar anyathā abhāva iti yadā tvādi bhāṣya vākye artha śabdaḥ prayojana vacanaḥ tadā evam vyākhyānam arthavati ca prayojanavati ca yatas  samartham śaktam pramāṇa pratipatti ādi krameṇa pūrva uktena prayojanam prati atas  samarthe pramāṇe pramātṛ ādīni arthavanti prayojanavanti bhavanti yatas tāni api pramāṇavat eva samarthāni śaktāni prayojanam prati iti atra hetaḥ anyatama apāya iti tasya artham vyācaṣṭe anyatamatva artha iti nanu anyatama śabdaḥ  bahuṣu anirdhānita viśeṣam ekam āha na tu sādhakatamam iti ata āha pramāraṇāt iti sādhāraṇa śabdaḥ  hi pramaraṇāt  viśeṣe vartate tad  yathā śivikā vahana pakrame puruṣam ānayā iti puruṣa śabdaḥ  viṣṭau tadvat iha api pramātrādi parihāṇyā pramāṇasya arthavattva abhidhāna niyama prakrama iti pramātṛ ādibhyaḥ pramāṇasya viśeṣaḥ  vācya iti tatra eva anyatama śabdaḥ  vartate yadi api artha pratipatti artha avyabhicāra dvāreṇa pramāṇasya avyabhicāraḥ  gamyate dṛṣṭe viṣaye tathā api adṛṣṭe viṣaye na tad janita prapitta yavi abhicāreṇa avi abhicāraḥ śabdasya pramāṇasya śakyaḥ  vijñātum pratīya vyabhicārasya pramāṇa avi abhicāra grahaṇa manreṇa aśakya jñānavat tasmāt  dṛṣṭa arthasya mantra āyurvedasya pravṛtti sāmarthya avadhṛta artha avyabhicārasya sādharmyāt āpta praṇītvāt agnihotra ādi vākyānām pramāṇānām avyabhicāra grahaṇa puraḥsaram eva trivargasya avyabhicāra grahaṇam na punar atra trivargasya avyabhicāraḥ śakyaḥ  anyatas  paricchettum adṛṣṭa artha viṣayasya ca caturvargasya iha arthavat tvena prayojanam dṛṣṭa arthe sandehāt api vyavahāra siddheḥ tad idam caturvarge pramāṇasya prādhānyam iti caturvarga vibhāga pare bhāṣye pramātā prathamam darśitaḥ tatas tasya lakṣaṇam āha pramātā svatantra iti svātantryam pṛcchati kim punar  svātantryam yasya abhisaṃbandhāt  svantra iti bhāṣya kṛtā pramāta upalakṣitaḥ  na lakṣitaḥ na khalu īpsā ajihāsayoḥ vā pravṛttau vā svāntryam pramātṛ tvam api tu pramāya arm ipsā ādi svātantryeṇa tu tad uttara kāla bhāvinā pramāyām svātantryam parva kāla abhāvi upalakṣim tena tad carim anuvartamānaḥ  vārtika kṛt  upalakṣaṇa antaram kartṛtva uttara kāla bhāvi āha kāraka phala upabhoktṛ tvam na hi sarvaḥ kartā samasta kāraka janyam svarga ādi vaudana ādi vā bhuṅkte ṛtvij pācaka ādiṣu ca vyabhicāra darśanāt  kārakasya tu sataḥ kartṛtva uttara kāla bhāvinī phala upabhoktṛ tā kartṛ vana antarīyaka tayā dupalakṣayati yajamānasya rājñaḥ ca praiṣādinā tad tadvayā pāre kartṛ tvāt yathā āhuḥ atrabhavantaḥ tad abhisandhi pūrvakam preṣaṇam adhyeṣaṇam va yuktam tasarvam paci arthaḥ iti svātantrya lakṣaṇam āha tad samavāyaḥ  vā kāraka abhidhānena sannidhāpitām kriyam tad iti sarvānāmnā parāmṛśati yasya hi vyāpāram prādhānyena dhātuḥ ākhyāta pratyayaḥ vā abhidhatte sa svatantraḥ kartā tathā hi viklidyantīyatra taṇḍula ādayaḥ kartāraḥ pacanti iti atra devadatta ādayaḥ tad  kasya hetoḥ ekatra taṇḍula ādeḥ vyāpāra upāttaḥ aparatra devadatta ādeḥ iti prādhānyena ca aśeṣa kāraka nivartti tvam pradhāna kriyāyāḥ avāntara vyāpāra bhede api pradhāna kriyā uddeśena samasta kāraka pravṛtteḥ iti puruṣa iti prakṛta kriyā apekṣam pramāyāḥ puruṣa āśraya tvāt iti lakṣaṇa antaram āha tad prayoktṛ tvam itarā prayojya tā vā tasya cetanasya sarva kārakāṇi prati prayoktṛ tvam taiḥ ca kārakaiḥ aprayojya tā vā acetanasya tu bhāktava kartṛ tvam na svābhāvikam iti bhāvaḥ parisamāpti padārtham vyācaṣṭe tattva parisamāptiḥ iti tattvam hi pramāṇa vyāpya tvam pramāṇa vyāpāra viṣaya tvam tad ca hāna upādāna upekṣābhiḥ paryavasyati paryavasānam parisamāptiḥ viniyojya iti vaktavye yogya tā grahaṇam īpsite api dṛṣṭe vastuni kutaścid  pratibandhāt  puruṣeṇa anupātte mā bhūt  tattva aparisamāptiḥ iti yadi api hi tad  puruṣeṇa anupāttam tathā api upādāna yogya tā pradarśanāt asti tattva parisamāptiḥ iti tad pratiṣedhaḥ ca iti atra tad śabdena hāna upādāna lakṣaṇam viniyogam parāmṛśati kim punar tattvam ityādi bhāṣyam vyācikhyāsuḥ tattvpratyaya prakṛteḥ tadaḥ  artham pṛcchati kiṃpunar iti uttaram sadasatī tad  praśnam vibhajate tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam iti atra iti uttaram vibhajate sat asatī tad atha kasmāt  prakṛti puruṣau vā pañca skandhā vā param brahmādvaitam vā jīva jīva stra vādayaḥ  vā sapta pṛthivī āpaḥ tejaḥ vayuḥ iti vā catvāri bhūtāni ityādi iti na tadaḥ  vācyāni bhavanti iti ata āha pramāṇa viṣaya tvena adhikārāt  sūtra bhāṣya vākya tad vivaraṇeṣu pramāṇa pramāṇa viṣayaḥ ca adhikṛtaḥ na ca saṃkhyā ādi siddhānta bheda anupātinaḥ  arthāḥ pramāṇa viṣayāḥ yathā ca etad  tathā atreva nivedayiṣyate upasaṃharati tasmāt iti prakṛti artham vyākhyāya pratyārtham vyācaṣṭe tad bhāva iti sat asatoḥ yathā saṃkhyam vidhāyaka prakāṇa viṣaya tā sataḥ  bhāvaḥ tad pratiṣedhaḥ ca asataḥ  bhāvaḥ tad iti vidhāyaka pramāṇa viṣaya tām parāmṛśati tad pratiṣadhena ca pratiṣadhakam pramāṇam upasthāpitam tena pratiṣedhaka pramāṇa viṣaya tvam eva tad pratiṣedha iti anena uktam bhavati etad  vibhajate tayoḥ khalu iti śaṅkate pramāṇa viṣaya tvāt iti sarva sāmarthya viraheṇa tu asat sataḥ  vyāvartate yadi ca asat api pramāṇa viṣayaḥ tarhi na asamartham tathā ca sat asatoḥ abheda iti arthaḥ nirāka rotina anaikāntāt  na vayam asāmarthyena asataḥ  bhedam ācakṣmahe yena evam upālabhyemahi iti bhāvaḥ śaṅkā vibhajate tatra bhavet iti nirākaraṇam vibhajate tad ca na iti gavā ādi cetanam acetanam ghaṭa ādi iti yadi sadasatī samarthe kutas tarhi tayoḥ meda iti ata āha svatantra iti asat upalabdhiḥ eva sat upalabdheḥ anyā anupalabdhiḥ nanu saṃyoga vibhāga ādiṣu satsu api taratantra upalabdhi karaṇatva matiḥ ta teṣām saṃyujyamāna vibhajyamāna ādi adhīna nirūpaṇa tvāt itya āha pratiṣedha mukhena pratipadyate pratīyate satām keṣāñcid  pāratantrye api na niṣedhya niṣedha adhikāraṇa pāratantryam iti arthaḥ saṃprati sat upalambhakasya pramāṇasya asadu upalambhaka tvam pratipipādayiṣatā bhāṣya kāreṇa pradīpaḥ  dṛṣṭānta upanyastaḥ satu sādhya samaḥ tasya api pramāṇa sāmagrī niveśat iti śaṅkyamānaḥ  atyanta loka prasiddha tayā asya dṛṣṭānta tvam samarthayate pradīpavat iti gopāla aṅganā api hi kim atra asti stenaḥ  asmad dhanam vā apavarake na vā iti sandihānā pradīpam upādāya samantāt avalokya apavarakam asti iha asmad dhanam na asti stena iti samam eva niścinvanti na tu stena abhāva niścayāya upāyantaram upādadate tena agāpālāj namā ca paṇḍita rūpebhyaḥ siddhaḥ pradīpaḥ  dṛṣṭāntaḥ tad idam uktam na hi asat pratipattau  upāya antaram āsthīyate lokena anāśrayaṇe hetum āha pradīpena dṛśyamāne hi ghaṭa ādike arthe svatantre na anena samāna jātīyam tulya upalambha yogyatam dṛśya antaram asti nīla pītau hi paraspara abhāvavantau tena nalī niṣedhe na avaśyam pīta vidhiḥ bhāva abhāvau tu paraspara abhāva ātmānau naḥ khalva bhāva abhāvaḥ  nāma kaścid anyaḥ  bhāva rūpāt  na api bhāva abhāvaḥ  anyaḥ  abhāvāt  tad evam pradīpa upāyasya pratipattuḥ pratīti kramamuktvā parīkṣakāṇām upapatti kramam āha yadi abhaviṣyat iti yadi kaścid āśaṅketa dṛśya tām abhāvaḥ pradīpena bhāvaḥ api bhaviṣyati iti tatra eṣa parīkṣakāṇām tarka upatiṣṭhate yadi abhaviṣayat iti tad evam laukika parīkṣaka saṃmatam dṛṣṭāntam upapādya dārṣṭa antike yojayati eve pramāṇena api indriya ādinā sati pramīyamāṇe iti pūrvavat  vyākhyeyam upasaṃharati tad evam iti sarvam ca etad upariṣṭāt upapādayiṣyate nanu yadi sadasatī pramāṇa viṣayau kasmāt  sadbhedā iva asat bhedā api sūtra kṛtā na ucyanta iti ata āha tatra teṣu sat asat bhedeṣu madhye svātantryeṇa asat bhedā na prakāśanta iti na ucyante niṣedhya niṣedha adhikāraṇa adhīna nirūpaṇa tvāt asat bhedānām bhāva bheda tantram pramāśanam iti bhāva bheda kathanena eva abhāva bhedā api gamyanta iti na uktā iti arthaḥ atha vā kathitā eva yeṣām tattva jñānam niḥśreyasa upayogi yam tu na tathā na teṣām prapañcaḥ anupayukta bhāva prapañca iva vaktavya iti āha caturvarga anantarbhāvāt  vā bhāva prapañcavat  abhāva prapañca iti niḥśreyasa anupayogini bhāva prapañce yathā caturvarga anantarbhāvaḥ evam abhāva prapañce api iti atha niḥśreyasa upayoga abhāvaḥ kutaḥ avagantavya iti ata āha bhāva upadeśāt eva abhāva upadiṣṭaḥ  bhavati iti dvividham pramāṇam bhāvaḥ abhāvaḥ ca yathā kāraṇa abhāvena kārya abhāva jñānam yatas  dvitīya sūtra samutyānam prameyeṣu ca apavarga eva mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ eve prayojana ādiṣu api iti tatra tatra ūhanīyam iti upasaṃharati atas ca iti tad evam tātparyam vyākhyāya avayava artham vyākhyātum bhāṣyam paṭhati sat ca khalu ṣoḍaśadhā vyūḍham upadekṣyata iti atra prathame kalpe caśabdaḥ  avadhāraṇe khalu śabdaḥ spaṣṭa arthe tad eva ṣoḍaśadhā vyūḍham upadekhyate na asat  tasya sat adhīna prakāśa tvāt iti dvitīye tu kalpe pāramārthike caḥ samucce khaluḥ avadhāraṇe sati ṣoḍaśa adhā eva upadekṣyamāṇe asat api upadekṣyata iti arthaḥ prakṛti artham vyācaṣṭe vyūha iti sūtrasya sa prapañca tātparyam vyākhyāya avayava artham vyāci khya asunā bhāṣya kāreṇa tāsām khalu āsām sa dvidhānām iti bhāṣyeṇa sūtram avatārya paṭhitam tad asya vārtika kṛt  tātparyam āha ta ete sadbhedā iti sūtram ta ete pramāṇa ādayaḥ sadbhedā niḥśreyasa upayoginaḥ  na gaṅgā vālukā ādayaḥ tasmāt  sat su pramāṇa ādayaḥ ṣoḍaśa eva udiyeṣṭā lakṣitāḥ parīkṣitāḥ ca na gaṅgā vālukā ādayaḥ santaḥ  api niḥśreyasa anupayogāt iti bhāvaḥ dvandva svarūpam āha sarva pada iti dvandva parigrahe tātparyam anvaya vyatirekābhyām ādarśayati sarva eva iti bahu vrīhi karma dhārayayoḥ asaṃbhāvāt ṣaṣṭhī samāsa parigrahe nigraha sthānasya antya padārthasya prādhānye vivakṣita artha hāna prasaṅga iti arthaḥ nirdeśe yayā vacanam vigraha eti asta bhāṣyasya tātparyam āha yathāvacanam iti anyonya nirapekṣāṇām pratyekam pramā hetu bhāvaḥ pramāṇānām iti hi bahuvacana prayojanam prameyeṣu tu yadi api prameya tā vāstavī pratyekam asti tathā api apavarga hetu bhāvena prameya tā samudāye samāpyate na tu pratyekam ātma ādīnām anya matasya api atattva jñāne saṃsārān anivṛtteḥ iti yad eva hi nirdeśa vacana bhedasya prayojanam tad eva ca uddeśe api tayoḥ eka vākya tvāt iti bhāvaḥ pramāṇa ādīnām iti vibhakti artha vyākhyāna param bhāṣyam paṭhitvā pṛcchati kaḥ punar iti uttaram kārakāṇām iti tad vibhajate yatra iti kāraka arthaḥ pradhāna kriyā yad uddeśena sarva kāraka pravṛttiḥ kāraka grahaṇena ca tad na antarīyaka tayā pradhāna kriyā api ānīta iti vivaraṇe sā api darśitā yadi api sva svāmi bhāva ādau  api saṃbandhe antargataḥ kriyā kāraka saṃbandhaḥ  asti saṃbandha mātrasya kriyā garbha tvāt  tad na antarīyaka tvāt ca kārakasya tathā api asau na vivakṣyate saṃbandha mātram eva tu vivakṣyata iti arthaḥ tatra codayati tattvasya iti ṣaṣṭhī ca anarthikā avyatireke tad anupapatteḥ iti api draṣṭavyam tatra aniyam avādi eka deśī pariharati na ubhayathā api iti bhāvasya bhavitra dhīna nirūpaṇa tvāt  bhāva nirūpaṇam eva bhavitṛ nirūpaṇam ākṣipati abhede api iti iṣu sthityā yathā tad bhāva pratiṣedha iṣobhāvaḥ  dharmaḥ  gatiḥ tasya pratiṣadhaḥ sthitiḥ tiṣṭhategrati nivṛtti artha tvāt evam atra api na pramāṇaprameya ādi mātram acyate tattva grahaṇena api tu artha antaram teṣu eva yad  yad  samāropitam rūpam anyathātvam iti yāvat  tad  pratiṣidhyate gatimat iti bhāva pradhānaḥ  nirdeśaḥ yathā dvekayoḥ dvivacana eka vacane iti dvitva eka tvayoḥ iti saṃkhyā iva vikṣāyām tu dvi ekeṣu iti syāt  tena gati mad tvam artha antaram iṣoḥ nabhavati iti asmin  arthe iṣoḥ sthitiḥ iti prayujyata iti arthaḥ tad etad  eka deśi matam artha antaratva niyama vādī dūṣayati tad na iti pramāṇa dibhyaḥ  anartha antarasya tattvasya ca iṣoḥ anartha antarasya gati abhāvasya ca asiddheḥ yathā ca bhāva atiriktaḥ  abhāvaḥ tathā kṣaṇa bhaṅga adhikāre nivedayiṣyate pramāṇa ādi atiriktam ca tattvam anantaram eva darśayiṣyati iti tattvasya jñānam ityādi bhāṣyam vyāpaṣṭe tattvam jñāyamānam iti ubhayam pṛcchati kim punar iti tattva praśnasya uttram tattvam iti nimitta tvam śaktiḥ pramāṇa ādīnām sā ca dvayī svrūpa lakṣaṇā sahakāri sākalya lakṣaṇā ca atīndriyasya sāmarthyasya naiyānikaiḥ anabhyupeta tvāt śakteḥ ca bhāva tvena bhavitṛ nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇa tvāt  bhavituḥ api nirūpaṇam bhavati iti uktam abhimatam niḥśreyasam grahītum niḥśreyasa dvaividhyam āha niḥśreyasam purar iti takri jña dṛṣṭam niḥśreyasam grahītum dṛṣṭam ati prasaṅga āpādanena dūṣayati eve ca kṛtvā iti sūtra kāra abhimatam niḥśreyasam āha param tu iti etad uktam bhavati yadi api niḥśreyasa padam abhimata mātra vāci pramāṇa ādi tattva jñānasya ca dṛṣṭam api niḥśreyasam saṃbhavati tasya eva tatas  sākṣāt utpatteḥ tathā api ātma ādi vācaka prameya pada samabhivyāhārāt adṛṣṭam eva niḥśreyasam abhipreta sūtrakārasya tatra ca pramāṇam ādi tattva jñānasya api pārarmyeṇa hetu bhāvaḥ  asti eva iti codayati dṛṣṭam iti dṛṣṭe darśanam eva pramāṇam adṛṣṭam tu niḥśreya sam aprāmāṇikam darśana abhāvāt iti arthaḥ pariharati na na asti arthasya tathā abhāvāt artha ātma ādiḥ tasya āgama anumāna sahakāriṇā kāraṇa abhāvena kārya abhāva anumānam eva atra arthe pramāṇam iti bhāvaḥ ye tu vaiyātyāt  manyeran padārtha tattva jñāna mātram eva para niḥśreyasa hetuḥ iti yathā āhuḥ ekaḥ  bhāvaḥ tattvataḥ  yena dṛṣṭāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ tattvataḥ tena dṛṣṭāḥ iti tān pratyāha yadi punar iti na hi bhāvānām tattvam anyat atas  pratyakṣa viṣayīkṛtāt  rūpāt iti bhāvaḥ mokṣamāṇā iti sani mucaḥ  akarmakasya guṇa u vā iti guṇa abhyāsa lopau na kevalam vastu vṛttiḥ sūtrakārasya api saṃmata m edityata āha pṛthak upadeśāt ca prameyasya pramāṇa ādibhyaḥ yadi ca yad kiñcid prameya tattva jñānāt niḥśreyasasya parasya prāptiḥ kimartham ātmāt asūtreṇa dvādaśā eva prameyāṇi na adhikāni na nyūnāni ca iti avadhāryate sūtrakārerṇa tasmāt  tad eva sākṣāt upayoti niḥśreyase na padārtha mātram iti āha prameya avadhāraṇa arthāyām cotrara sūtra prikriyā āyām akuśalaḥ sūtra kāraḥ syāt  kutas  prameyasya vihata tvāt ādyena sūtreṇa iti tasmāt  yadi upapattiḥ yadi ca sūtrakārabhimata subhayathā api prameya tattva parijñānam parasya niḥśreyasasya hetuḥ tad anena ātma ādeḥ iti bhāṣyam vyākhyātam atha kim tattva jñānasya ātma ādi viṣayasya adṛṣṭa eva kaḥ  api sāmarthya atiśayaḥ  yatas  para niḥśreyasa utpādaḥ mā evam kim tarhi dṛṣṭayā eva dvāra iti āha bhāṣya kāraḥ tad ca etad iti niḥśreyasa hetu bhāva abhidhānasya anu paścāt  udyate anūdyate tattva jñāna utpāde hi sākṣāt  tad viṣaya mithyā jñāna ādi nivṛtti krameṇa apavarga utpāda iti dvitīya sūtreṇa ānadyate tad etad  bhāṣyam tad ca etad ityādi adhigacchati iti antam anūdya vyācaṣṭe heyam iti mithyājñānam ātma ādiṣu prameyeṣu avidyā tad mūlam tṛṣṇā upalakṣaṇam ca etad  dveṣaḥ  api draṣṭavyaḥ tad mūlau ca dharma adharmau tad etad heyam hānam tattva jñānam hīyate hi anena etad  sarvam tasya pramāṇasya upāyaḥ śāstram adhigantavyaḥ  mokṣaḥ evaṃmavayavān vibhajya tātparyam āha etāni iti etāni catvāri artha padāni puruṣa artha sthānāni na kevalam heya adhigantavya bhedena dvādaśa vidra prameyam darśayataḥ tad viṣaya tattva jñānāya ca sa upakaraṇa nyāya abhidhāna pramāṇa vyutpādakam śāstram praṇayataḥ sūtrakārasya saṃmatam api tu sarveṣām eva adhyātma vidām ācāryāṇām iti bhāṣyatāt paryam iti arthaḥ tatra saṃśaya ādīnām pṛthak vacanam anarthakam ityādi codya bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭesaṃśaya ādi agrahaṇam iti satyam iti parihāra bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭai na vidyā iti codyam vivṛṇoti saṃśaya ādaya iti parihāram vivṛṇoti na vidyā iti prasthānam vyāpāraḥ teṣām pṛthak vacanam ityādi bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭa tasyāḥ saṃśaya ādi iti na ca vācayam astu vidyā trayam eva kṛtamānvīkṣikyā vidyayā iti tasyāḥ  eva samasta vidyā avadātīkaraṇa hetutvāt yathā vakṣyati pradīpaḥ sarva vidyānām iti sa ca ayam kiṃsvid iti vastu vimarśa mātram anavadhāraṇa jñānam saṃśaya iti bhāṣyam tad  vyācaṣṭe tatra saṃśaya ādiṣu saṃśayaḥ tāvat iti jñānam avadhāraṇam pratyaya iti paryāyā iti manvānaḥ ca ādayati anavadhāraṇa ātmaka iti na jñāna mātra paryāyaḥ  avadhāraṇa śabdaḥ api tu tidvaśeṣa viścaya vacanaḥ kiṃsvid iti dolāyamānasya ubhaya koṭi spṛśaḥ pratyayasya arthe anavadhāraṇa ātmakasya api pratyātmam mānasena pratyakṣeṇa avadhāryamāṇa tvāt iti pariharati na vyāghāta iti tad  tasmāt  abhayam iti tatra nānapalabdhe ityādi bhāṣyam avatārayitum pṛcchati sa katham nyāyasya iti yadi nyāyasya aṅga saṃśayaḥ  bhavet  saḥ  api vyutpādyeta iti bhāvaḥ uttaram yasmāt iti etad ākṣipati upalabdha iti pañca rūpaḥ catū rūpaḥ  vā hetuḥ nyāyaḥ pratijña ādi ava yava samūhaḥ  vā nyāyaḥ nīyate prāpyate vivakṣita artha siddhiḥ anena iti tasya āśrayaḥ  viṣaya upalabdha ucyamānaḥ  nirṇota eva vaktavyaḥ sandigdhe hi tasmin hetuḥ sandigdha āśraya tayā asiddhaḥ syāt  yathā iha naganiku je mayūraḥ kekāyitā pātāt iti tadā apāta sandehe atas  na nirṇītaḥ ced na upalabdhaḥ tatas ca upalabdhaḥ ca anirṇotaḥ ca iti vyāhatam iti arthaḥ pariharati na asti vyāghāta iti samāmanyataḥ parvata mātram upalabdham nirṇotam tad viśeṣaḥ tu vahnimattva ādiḥ anirṇīta iti punar codayati evam api iti upalabdhaḥ  nirṇota iti hi sāmānādhikaraṇyāt samāna viṣaya tvam darśayati tathā ca vyāghātaḥ sāmānya viśeṣa bhedena tu vyāghātam pariharan sāmānādhikaraṇyam na samarthayasa iti bhāvaḥ pariharati na yathā tathā iti vyāpadeśāt iti sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ sāmāna adhika araṇyāt ya eva sāmānyaḥ  nirṇotaḥ sa eva viśeṣataḥ  anirṇotaḥ  api saṃbhavati iti na vyāghāta iti arthaḥ evam artha nyāya pravṛtti artham asandigdhe nyāya pravṛtteḥ anupapatteḥ na hi kariṇi dṛṣṭe cītkāreṇa tam anumīme pekṣāvanta iti prayojana svarūpa pratipādana pūrvakam prayojana pada prayojana pradaśana artham bhāṣyam anubhāṣe atha prayojanam vyākhyātum pṛcchati kim punar iti uttaṃram yena iti sphuṭataram avaitat  iti arthaḥ punar  pṛcchati kena iti eka deśi matena uttaram āha dharma iti tatra kāma iti icchā mātram vā ucyate kāminī viṣayaḥ  vā rāgaḥ pūrvasmina kalpe kāma iti eva astu kṛtam dharma ādi bhaḥ sarveṣām eva kāmyamāna tvāt  uttarasmin  avyāptiḥ saraka mṛgayā ādīnām kāmyānām asaṃgrahāt  dharma mokṣayoḥ api nāstikān pratyapravartaka tvam tasmāt ayuktam editi manvāna āha vayam tu paśyāma iti sukhasya āptyā duḥkhasya hānyā viṣayeṇa viṣayiṇam pratyayam upalakṣam ati asatyoḥ akāraṇavāt  satyoḥ vā anarthakat pavāt  pravṛtteḥ iti tathā api sukha duḥkha āptita hānyoḥ eva kartuḥ pravṛtti prasaṅgaḥ  na tad sādhane na hi anyat vijānāti icchati ca karoti ca anyat iti ghaṭate atiprasaṅgāt  na ca phalam puruṣa pravṛtti gocaraḥ tad sādhanam tu tad gocaraḥ tad sādhanatva vijñānāt tad sādhana eva pravartate tad na ati pasaṅga  iti ced  hanta tarhi tad sādhanatva jñānam eva pravartayati na phala jñānam jñāna icchā pravṛttīnām kārya kāraṇa bhūtānām sāmāna adhika araṇyena saṃpratipattaṃriti abhiprāyeṇa āha sukha duḥkha sādhana bhāvat sarve arthāḥ cetanam prayojayanti iti tuśabdaḥ phalāt  vyavacchinatti atra api viṣayeṇa viṣayiṇam pratyayam upalakṣayati etad uktu bhavati toyam upalabhya tad jātīyasya apekṣi sādhanām dṛṣṭa carīm anusmarati atha tad jātīya tā liṅgena dṛśyamānasya apekṣi sāṇana bhāvam anumimīte anumāya ca pipāsuḥ pravartate tena upāya jñānasya sākṣāt  puruṣa pravṛtti hetuvam phalasya tu īpsitam asya udyeśataya iti sarvam sundaram tad āśrayaḥ ca nyāyaḥ pravartate iti bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe tad idam prayojanam nyāyasya iti ākṣipati ka iti samādhatte upakāraka tvam iti yathā rāja āśritaḥ paṇḍita iti upakāraka tvam eva darśayati tad mūla tvāt iti vidhiḥ pravṛttiḥ na jātu niṣprayojanā kāka danta ādau parīkṣām ārabhante prekṣāvanta iti arthaḥ ākṣipati kā punar iyam iti nyāya āśraya tvam prayojanasya pratijñāya parīkṣā śrayatva samarthanam asaṅgatam iti bhāvaḥ uttaram nyāyaḥ tasmāt na asaṃgatam iti arthaḥ nanu evam api nīyate prāpyate vivakṣita artha siddhiḥ anena iti vyupattyā pratyakṣa ādi pratyekam nyāyaḥ na ca etad  pratyekam prayojanam āśrayate ajihāsita anupāditsitānām api avijñāsitānām arthānām pratyakṣa ādi gocaratva darśanāt itti ākṣipati kaḥ punar ayam nyāyaḥ samādhatte pramāṇaiḥ iti pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa mūlāḥ pratijña ādayaḥ pañca avayavāḥ pramāṇāni taiḥ arthasya liṅgasya parīkṣaṇa parīkṣā parīkṣitu tu liṅga panca avayava upapannam anumeya pratyaya phalam bhāvayati eva na tu atumeya artha parīkṣā tasya sandigdha tve api sva rūpeṇa parīkṣā an āspada tvāt iti nanu avayavaiḥ ced artha parīkṣaṇa na tarhi pramāṇaiḥ kārya kāraṇayoḥ abheda abhāvāt ityata āha kim uktam bhavati iti na sākṣat pratijñādayaḥ avayavā artha parīkṣāyām upayujyante api tu sva kāraṇa tad pramāṇa sūcanena tasmāt  pramāṇānām avāntara vyāpāraḥ pratijñādaya iti upapannam pramāṇaiḥ artha parīkṣaṇam tad idam uktam pramāṇa vyāpārāt iti iti tasmāt  na eka ekam pramāṇam iti samasta pramāṇa upakaraṇa tvāt eva ca asya parama tvam iti āha saḥ  ayam iti pañca avayava upapanna tayā ca pratyakṣa āgām āśrita tvam na tad virodha iti pradarśana artham bhāṣyam anubhāṣya tātparyām vyācaṣṭe prayakṣa āgama iti katham punar anena bhāṣyeṇa tad ucyata iti ata āha yad iha anumānena iti yad  punar anumānam ityādi bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭa catra punar iti yatra hi virodhaḥ tatra pramāṇa mūlānām avayavānām pratijñā ādīnām itaretara pratisandhānam eka vākyatā na asti pramāṇa virodhena cogya tā virahiṇām tad padārthānām pārama arthika anvaya abhāvāt iti tīrtham darśanam tasya pratirūpakaḥ adarśanam iva darśayati iti yāvat  sa khalu tādṛśaḥ pañca avayava prayogaḥ  lābha pūjā khyāti kāmaiḥ paṇḍitavya janairūpa varṇyamānaḥ pratyavāyāya prāgava tu apavargāya iti arthaḥ tad evam samudāyataḥ  bhaṣyam vyākhyāyava yava vibhāgāya paṭhati yad  punar anumānam iti pratyakṣa viruddha udāharaṇam āha anuṣṇaḥ agiḥ avayavī kṛtaka tvāt  ghaṭavat iti atra codayati kaḥ punar iti ida mātra ākūtam rūpa traya saṃpannam etad  kṛtaka tvam na vā na ced  tatas  eve tarhi tad anumāna ābhāsam iti kṛtam pratyakṣa virodhena atha anvaya vyatireka pakṣa dharma tatā saṃpannam api bādhita viṣaya tayā etatat apramāṇam tad ayuktam rūpa traya saṃpattyām khalu etad  sva asādhyena avinābhūtam bhavati na ca bādhāvinā abhāvayoḥ saha saṃbhavaḥ bādhāyāma pakṣa dharmaḥ  bhavet  anaikāntikaḥ ca hetaḥ vijñāsita dharmaṇaḥ  dharmiṇaḥ pacyamāna tvena pakṣa tvam na punar  pratyakṣa avadhṛta sādhya viruddha dharmasya tasya ajijñāsita tvena apakṣa tayā tad dharmasya apakṣa dharma tvāt na ca aikāntikaḥ sādhya dharmiṇī eva pratyakṣa upasthāpita sādhya dharmavati darśanena vyabhicārāt  na ca sa pakṣa āsa pakṣau  eva anvaya vyatireka agamyā vinābhāva darśana viṣayau na pakṣa iti sāmpratam yadi hi pakṣam vihāya bahis eva sa pakṣa āsapa kṣayoḥ avinā abhāvaḥ  gamyeta tadā bahis vyāpti mātra balena pakṣa dharmaḥ  api hetuḥ na pakṣe sādhyam sādhayet  asiddhā hi tatra asya sva sādhyena vyāptiḥ tad etad paṇḍakam udvāhya mugdhāyāḥ putra prārthanam iva tasmāt antar bahis vā sarva upasaṃhāreṇa avinā abhāvaḥ  avagantavyaḥ evam ca siddhaḥ pakṣe api vyabhicāraḥ sādhana dharmasya iti anaikāntika tvam tathā ca rūpa traya sampannaḥ  hetuḥ bādhita viṣayaḥ ca iti asaṃbhavaḥ tasmāt  suṣṭhūkm kaḥ punar asya anumānasya rūpa traya samnnasya virodhaḥ na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ  rūpa traya saṃpannam viruddham ca iti arthaḥ atra samādhim āha anumāna aviṣaye prayogaḥ vakṣyati hi anumāna adhikāre yathā anaupadhikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ  hetu sādhyayoḥ anumāna aṅgam na tu kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādiḥ avyāpaka tvāt atiprasaṅgat ca iti sa ca evam pravartate yaḥ  yaḥ kṛtakaḥ sa sarvaḥ  anuṣṇaḥ  yathā ghaṭadiḥ iti na ca vahneḥ iva dhūma saṃbandhe ārdra indhana saṃyogaḥ  guru anta vāsinoḥ sāhacarye iva svādhyāya adhyayanam upādhiḥ kṛtaka tvān uṣṇa tvayoḥ saṃbandhe upalabhyate saḥ  ayam śaṅkitaḥ samāropitaḥ  vā prayatnena punar punar anviṣyamāṇaḥ  anupalabhyamānaḥ tatra tatra ghaṭa ādau  upādhiḥ na asti iti pratyakṣeṇa yadi abhaviṣyat  ghaṭa ādivat eva vyajñāsyatra vijñāna abhāvāt na asti eva iti tarka sahāyena niśvīyate saḥ  ayam rūpeṇa iva rasasya śvastanena iva savituḥ ūdayena adyanasya tad udayasya samudra vṛddha ceva candra udayasya samāna kālasya kṛtaka tvasya anuṣṇa tvena svābhāvika autsārgikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sāmānyena yaḥ  yaḥ kṛkaḥ sa sarvaḥ  anuṣṇa iti avadhāritaḥ na tu nirvibhajya tejaḥ  avayavini na hi sarva upasaṃhāravatī vyāptiḥ eka deśa viṣayā bhavitum arhati eka deśa viṣaya tve yatra eva na darśitā tena eva anaikāntika tvam āśaṅkyeta tathā ca tatra tatra eka deśe pratyekam vyāpti pradarśanam aśakyam ānanyāt  tasmāt  sarva upasaṃhāreṇa eva tad upadarśanam tad iha kṛtaka tvam autsargika sāmānya viṣaya vyāpti smaraṇa sadhrīcīnam pakṣa dharma tā vaśāt viśeṣe tejaḥ vayavini sādhayitum anuṣṇatā unmukham yad na sādhayet  tad  kim pratyakṣeṇa apahṛta viṣaya tvāt āhosvit anaikāntika tvāt  na tāvat ana ekān ki tvam prāk eva sāmānyataḥ anaupādhika saṃbandhasya avadhāraṇāt  uṣṇe tejaḥ vayavini kṛtaka tvasya darśanāt  anaikāntikam apakṣa dharmaḥ  vā kṛtaka tvam iti ced  na anumānena sāmānyatas  avadhṛta vyāptinā tasya ana auṣṇya asādhanāt pratyakṣeṇa tejaḥ  avayavina auṣṇya graheṇa tatra kṛtaka tvasya hetoḥ vṛttau  utpannam api vyāpti vijñānam bādhyate tatas ca ana ekānki tvāt pravṛttiḥ anumānasya iti ced  na anumāna pravṛtti viṣaye sādhya dharmiṇi hetoḥ vyabhicāra an udbhāvanāt  anyathā tad gata sādhya dharma sandehe tatra upalabhyamānaḥ sādhana dharmaḥ sandigdha byatiḥ eki vādana ekāntikaḥ syāt  sandigdha sādhya dharme dṛṣṭānta iva sādhana dharmaḥ tathā ca anumāna mātram ucchidyeta pratyakṣeṇa sādhya dharma viparya darśanāt tejaḥ vayavinaḥ anuṣṇa tvena asādhaya tvam tathā ca anaikāntika tvam tad idam uktam yasmina viṣaye tejasaḥ  anuṣṇa tve etad  prayuktam sa pratyakṣeṇa apahṛta iti evam ca anumāne dūṣite kṛtam apakṣa dharmatva vyabhicārābhyām tad upajīvibhyām iti bhāvaḥ yad  punar  dignāgena pratyakṣa viruddham anumānam udāhṛtam tad upanyasyati apare punar iti aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt  ghaṭa ādivat iti bruvāṇaḥ śabda svarūpam eva apalapati na hi śravaṇa indriyāt anyat asti śabda grahaṇa kāraṇam na hi śravaṇa indriyāt anyat aḥ tita śabda grahaṇa kāraṇam na ca agṛhyamāṇaḥ śabdaḥ sat vyavahāra gocaraḥ tasmāt evaṃvādinaḥ  abhiprāya vyāptam asat tvam śabdasya tathā ca pratyakṣa virodha iti bhāvaḥ dūṣayi taiḥ tu iti sa viśeṣaṇe hi vidhi niṣedhau viśeṣaṇam upasaṃkrāmata iti utsargaḥ kvacid  punar viśiṣṭa vidhānam api bhavati ananya gati tvāt tad yathā lohita uṣṇīṣā ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti sati vibhave na jīrṇa malavat vāsāḥ stātakaḥ syāt  iti tadvat iha api aśrāvaṇaḥ śabda iti śruti vākyayoḥ sāmarthyāt  śrāvaṇatva viśeṣaṇa upasaṃkāntaḥ  niṣedhaḥ  na viśeṣyeṇa śabdena saha saṃbadhyate na api śrāvaṇatva niṣadhāda arthaḥ śabda niṣedhaḥ  vādī abhiprāya vyāptaḥ vacana artha avirodhinaḥ  arthasya artha gamya tvāt na tad virodhinaḥ śrāvaṇatva niṣedhasya ca adhikāraṇa śabda iti na śabda abhāve tad niṣedhaḥ  avakalpate na ca abhāvaḥ tuccha iti tṛtīya upapādayiṣyate na ca śrāvaṇa tvam pratyakṣa gocaraḥ tad hi śabda śrotrayoḥ saṃbandha kṛt taddhita samāseṣu saṃbandha abhidhānam tu atalbhyām iti kātyāyanīya vacanāt  na ca pratyakṣa apratyakṣa vṛtti saṃbandhaḥ pratyakṣaḥ tasmāt  śrāvaṇa tvam apratyakṣam iti na atra pratyakṣa virodhaḥ tad idam uktam indriya vṛttī nāmanīndriya tvāt iti vṛttiḥ sva arthe saṃbandha iti arthaḥ āgama viruddham udāharati śuci iti manu ādibhiḥ nara asthi sparśa pratiṣedhāt sparśe ca prāya śvitta upadeśāt aśuci tvam nara śiraḥ kapāla ādīnām iti kāpālika ākṣipati katham iti na asmākam vedaḥ tad mūlā vā smṛtayaḥ pramāṇam iti abhiprāyaḥ uttaram śuci naraśiraḥ kapālam iti bruvatā śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇa anapekṣeṇa anumāna mātra sahāyena atra vastuni vayā śuci rūpaḥ  arthaḥ  vaktavyaḥ kim uktam bhavati śuci iti yadi ucyeta spraṣṭuḥ pratyavāya abhāvaḥ siddhāntī pṛcchati sa kasya iti vācyam yadi ātmana iti brūyāt  kāpālikaḥ avigītā hi vyavahāra paramparā asmākam kāpālikānām nara śiraḥ kapālaka sparśa tad avasthita anna pāna upayoga lakṣaṇā dākṣiṇātyānām ivāhnena evuka ādi lakṣaṇā kriyā śreyaskarī tasmāt asmākam apratyavāya karayā śuci nara śiraḥ kapālam iti arthaḥ tatra sa upahāsam uttaram āha tad āgama anuṣṭhāna tātparya avasthānāt kāpālikasya evam etad  śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇa lakṣaṇa āgama vihitam artham ācaratām tad nisiddham ca pariharatām dākṣiṇātyānām āhnena evuka ādi anuṣṭhānam anādi adya yāvat anuvartamānam avigītam āmnāya mūla tām anumāpayati ātmānaḥ śreyaḥ hetu bhāvena na khalu āgama anapekṣaḥ sahasreṇa api anumānaiḥ imam artham avagantum arhati kāpalikānām tu āgama vihitam akurvatām kurvatām ca tad niṣiddham artham prayatnena anādiḥ api vyavahāraḥ śākya mallaka ādīnām iva na veda anumāna mūlam iti bhāvaḥ atha trayī vidān nara śiraḥ kapālam apratyavāya hetuḥ iti brūyāt  tadā trayyā vakṣyamāṇena nyāyena prāmāṇya upagamāt āgama virodhaḥ tadīya sparśasya trayyām niṣedhena pratyavāya hetu va niścayāt  api ca āgama anapekṣaḥ  anumānena śaucam nara śiraḥ kapālaṃvyavasthāpayan praṣṭavyaḥ  jāyate śuci nara śiraḥ kapālam iti kaḥ  arthaḥ nanu ca eva vākyāt  pratīyate sa eva arthaḥ tad  kim pṛcchacata iti ata āha viśeṣa vidhānam ca śeṣa pratiṣedha param loke dṛṣṭam yathā dakṣiṇena cakṣuṣā paśyati iti ukte na vāmena iti gamyate tad iha yadi śuci nara śiraḥ kapālam kim anyat aśuci iti vaktavyam na hi nara uccāra ādīnām aśuci tve pramāṇam anyat astyāgamāt  āgama pramāṇyam ca na manyasa iti bhāvaḥ atha trayī vidveṣāt  anumāna pakṣa āpātinā tvayā sarvam eva nara viṭkapāla ādi śauca pakṣe nikṣipyata iti āha atha sarvam eva śuci pariharati dṛṣṭāntaḥ  na asti kṛtaḥ sarvasya pakṣīkṛta tvāt  codayati atha anumāna viruddhra kasmāt anumānam na bhavati iti na khalu pramāṇa tvena pratyakṣa āgamābhyām anumānasya kaścid  viśeṣaḥ  yena tau bādhakau  anumānasya na anumānam iti bhāvaḥ pariharati ekasmin  anumāna dvaya samāveśa abhāvāt ayam abhisandhiḥ yad  tāvat anumānam pūrva pravṛttam tena bādhita viṣayam tabdala bhāvi paścattanam anumāna na sva kāryāya paryāptam yathā uktam aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt  ghaṭa ādivat iyasya anumānasya anumāna virodha iti labdha svarūpam hi vastu kvacid  kiścid niṣidhye na tu jñāna ākāra alīke bahis iti tṛtīye nivradayiṣyate tad iha śrāvaṇa tvam śabdasya niṣedha tā pūrvam śravaṇam indriyam atīndriya tad grāhrātvam ca vastunī anumātavye śabda upalambha lakṣaṇena kāryeṇa tathā ca etena eva anumānena apahṛta viṣayam aśrāvaṇatva anumānam caramam anvaya vyatireka saṃpannam api na sva ucitam kāryā janayati eve tanu bhuvana ādīnām na karteśvaraḥ  aśarīri tvāt mukta satmavat prayojana abhāvāt iti ādi āpi īśvara dharmi grāhi mūlāna mānena apahṛta viṣaya tayā nyāya ābhāsam veditavyam tasmāt  paraspara anapekṣa samāna kāla pravṛtti samartha anumāna dvaya samāveśa abhāva abhiprāyam etad uktam na hi anayoḥ anyatara d bādhyam bādhaka vā saṃbhavati kim tu mithas  sat pratipakṣa tayā na pramām kurutaḥ kasmāt  punar na samāveśaḥ  anumānayoḥ asamāveśe vā kutas  sat pratipakṣata ityata āha na hi anvaya vyatireka sampanne iti iha anvaya vyatireka grahaṇena samāna balayoḥ anvaya vyatireka pakṣa dharmatva asat pratipakṣa tvāni upalakṣitāni etaiḥ sampannayoḥ yadi samāveśa ekasmin viṣaye bhavet  tatas  ekatarasya bādhya tvam bādhaka tvam vā gamyeta api na tu etad asti asaprapipa kṣatā sampatteḥ abhāvāt iti upasaṃharati tasmāt na anumāna virudvam anumānam tulya balam api tu sat pratipakṣam iti arthaḥ pratyakṣam api anumeya viruddha sādhanāt anumānasya pratipakṣa iti sat pratipakṣa tayā anvaya vyatireka ādi sampannasya anumānasya na pratyakṣeṇa tad viruddha artha upasaṃhāriṇā samāveśa iti na bādhya bādhaka bhāva iyabhiprāyeṇa codayati pratyakṣa virodhi api iti pariharati na na iti tulya balau hi mithas  pratipakṣau bhavataḥ na tu durbala uttama balau na hi bhavati tarakṣuḥ prapikṣaḥ  hariṇa śāvakasya kim tu samara kaṇḍū nighna viṣāṇa koṭi samullikhita gaṇḍa śailasya vipina māhiṣasya tasmāt  pūrva bhāvi pratyakṣam ananyathā siddham sat asat pratipakṣam anumānam samāna viṣaya samāveśāt  bādhata iti yuktam iti arthaḥ codayati atha upamāna viruddham anumānam kasmāt na bhavati gaḥ sadṛśaḥ  gavaya iti āraṇyakasya vākyam śrutvā yadā nāgarakaḥ  vanam gataḥ  gaḥ sadṛśam piṇḍam upalabhe tadā asya vākya artha anubhava āhita saṃskāra prabodha janita smṛti apekṣa gaḥ sādṛśya jñānam upamānam puraḥ avasthitasya piṇḍasya gavaya śabda vācyatva jñāne pramāṇam tatra yadi kaścid  pramāṇayet  na eṣa piṇḍaḥ  gavaya śabda vācyaḥ  gopiṇḍa sādṛśyāt  gopiṇḍa antaravat iti tad ida mana mānam upamānena bādhita viṣayam astu iti arthaḥ saṃpratipattiḥ uttaram na upamāna viruddham na bhavati iti anuṣajyate asti ced  kasmāt na uktam iti ata āha pūrva pramāṇa virodha anuvidhānāt na uktam iti śeṣaḥ tad  darśayati upamāna virodha iti sva phala dvārā śabdam pramāṇam darśayati upamāna virodha iti sva phala dvārā śābdam pramāṇam darśayati āgama iti sva phala dvārā eva pratyakṣam pramāṇa darśayati sārūpya jñānam iti upasaṃharati pratyakṣa āgamayoḥ virodhāt virodha abhidhānāt  uktam tad  upamāna viruddham anumānam iti bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ākṣipati tatra vāda jalpau  iti prayojana svarūpa upayoga abhidhāna anantaram dṛṣṭānta pade vyākhyātavye tad ullaṅghanena vāda jalpayoḥ kaḥ  avasara iti arthaḥ avasaram āha tena anena iti prayojana vyākhyāna aṅgam eva idam na vāda jalpa vyākhyā aṅgam iti asti avasara iti bhāvaḥ tatra śabda artham vyācaṣṭe tasmin nyāya ābhāse iti vāda jalpa kathayoḥ hi na dvayoḥ vādi prativādinoḥ sādhane samīcīne saṃbhavataḥ vastuni viruddha dharma dvaya samāveśām āvāt tasmāt  dvayoḥ ekasya nyāyaḥ ekasya tu nyāya ābhāsa iti vāda jalpābhyām vivicyate nyāya ābhāsa iti tu sannidhānāt uktam sannihita artha tvāt sarva nāmna iti vitaṇḍā tu parīkṣyatam sa prayojanā niṣprayojanā vā iti tuśabdaḥ prasiddha prayojanābhyām vāda jalpābhyām vyavacchinatti pratipakṣa sthāpana ahīnā hi vitaṇḍā ucyate tatra sthāpanā hīna tvāt pratipakṣa hīna iti pratīyate na khalu sthāpana abhāve sthāpya saṃbhavaḥ tathā vitaṇḍa cate vyāhanyate anayā pratipakṣa sādhanam iti vyutpattyā para pakṣa upaghātena pāriśeṣyāt  sva pakṣa siddhiḥ asyāḥ prayojanam pratīyate tad evam sandigdha prayojanā satī vitaṇḍā parīkṣyate prayojanavatī na vā iti tatra yadi niṣprayojanā tatas  na sarvā vidyāḥ sarvāṇi karmāṇi tad mukhena ca sarve prāṇinaḥ prayojanena vyāptāḥ vitaṇḍāyāḥ  eva karma rūpāyāḥ  vidyā rūpāyāḥ  vā niṣprayojanātvāt atha prayojanavatī tatas  upapannā prayojana vyāptiḥ kim tāvat  prāptam tatra kecid  bruvate niṣprayojanā vitaṇḍa iti sthāpanā hīna tayā tāvat  sthāpayaḥ pakṣaḥ  na asti avayava vyutpattyā api para sādhanāvidhātaḥ pratīyate na ca tāvat mātreṇa sva pakṣa siddhiḥ asti na hi parvata nitamba vartiti dhūme asiddhatva ādinā dūṣite vahneḥ tatra abhāvaḥ  niścīyate tad idam uktam dūṣaṇa mātra tvāt iti tam imam niṣprayojana vitaṇḍā vādinam pratyāhatat ca na evam iti para sādhana dūṣaṇena asya pāriśeṣyāt  sva pakṣaḥ sidhyatu mā vā saitsīt sa tu sva pakṣa set dhaca eva prayojanena pratipakṣa sādhanam āhanti
