iti bhāvaḥ tad aneva sa yadi prayojanam anuyukta ityādi bhāṣyam vyākhyātam atha na pratipadyata ityādi bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭa atha pakṣam api iti atha api ityādi bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe atha para pakṣa iti nāstikaḥ  hi sat asat ubhaya anubhaya rūpa tayā na vicāram sahanta iti prameyāṇi sarvathā dūṣayati tad ayam para pakṣa pratiṣedha mātra prayuktaḥ pravartate na tu asya asti pakṣaḥ  na ca sthāpanā tayoḥ api prameya pakṣa pāti tayā dūṣya tvāt iti arthaḥ etad api ityādi bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭa tādṛś eva etad eda dvibhajate etasmin  api pakṣe caturvarga ced  pratīpadyate saḥ  asya pakṣaḥ pratipattiḥ abhyupagamaḥ yadi api sthāpya eva pakṣaḥ tathā api tad na antarīyaka tayā abhyupagama mātreṇa caturvargaḥ  api pakṣa uktaḥ kaḥ caturvarga iti ata āha caturvarga iti eṣa sādhana vādī jñāpayati aham vaitaṇḍikaḥ  jāne anena pañca avayavena sādhāna avākyena idam sādhyam jñāpyata iti caturvargaḥ tad pratītyā khalu asya vaitaṇḍikasya para pakṣa niṣedhaḥ prayojanam sidhyati tathā ca na viṣprayojanaḥ  ayam vaitaṇḍika iti arthaḥ dvitīyam kalpam dūṣayati atha na pratipadyata iti caturvarganā āntarīyaka tvāt dūṣaṇam api na pratipadyate iti unmattavat upakṣaṇīya iti arthaḥ aparam api nāstika vaitaṇḍikam prati doṣam āha pratipakṣa iti asiddha viruddha ādi doṣaḥ  vākyasya vaitaṇḍika prayuktasya arthaḥ tam yadi pratipadyate saḥ  asya pakṣaḥ atha asiddha viruddha ādīnām sadbhāva abhyupagame prameya madhya pātinām prameya mātra vicāra asahatva abhyupagamaḥ  vighaṭata iti sva vākya abhihitam eva addhi viruddha ādi na pratipadyate pūrvavat doṣaḥ na ayam laukikaḥ  na parīkṣaka iti tasmāt  vitaṇḍā api prayojanavati iti na avyāpakam prayojanam iti siddham saḥ  ayam prasakta anuprasakti vādaḥ prayojana vyākhyāna aṅgam iti āha uktam prayojanam iti dṛṣṭānta pada vyākhyāna param bhāṣyam anubhāṣate pratyakṣa viṣaya iti ākṣipati kim uktam bhavati iti na tāvat  yaḥ  yaḥ pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ sa sarvaḥ  dṛṣṭāntaḥ adṛṣṭāntasya api pratyakṣa viṣaya tvāt  na api yaḥ  dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa sarvaḥ pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ āgama ādi viṣayasya api dṛṣṭānta tvāt  tasmāt ayuktam etad iti ākṣepa iti tad samādhāna bhāṣyam yatra iti tadvat ā caṣṭe laukika parīkṣakāṇām darśana vighāta hetuḥ iti etad ca kvacid laukika parīkṣakāṇām kvacid  parīkṣakāṇām iti mantavyam anyathā yad aprasiddham laukikānām kevalam paṇḍita rūpa vedanīyam paramāṇu ādi tasya adṛṣṭānta tā syāt  atra ca yaḥ  dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa evam ta tu ya eve sa dṛṣṭānta iti draṣṭavyam evaṃbhūta vyākhyānasya prayojanam darśayati evam ca iti tad  vibhajate darśana avidhāta iti na kevalam prameya virodhaḥ sūtra virodhaḥ cetyata āha tatas ca udāharaṇa sūtram vyāhanyate yad  teṣu teṣu śāstra pradeśeṣu atīndriya udāharaṇa sūtram siddhānte pūrva pakṣe vā yathā mantra āyurveda prāmāṇyavat  aṇu śyāma tā anitya tvavat iti evamādi tad  vyāhanyate na tu udāharaṇa lakṣaṇa sūtram tad hi pratyakṣa viṣaya dṛṣṭānta tve api upapadyata eva tasmāt  bhāṣye pratyakṣa vacanam dṛṣṭānta viṣaya pramāṇa dāḍhrayam lakṣayati pratyakṣa mūla tvāt  vā pratyakṣaḥ  dṛṣṭāntaḥ anyathā anavasthā prasaṅgāt iti saḥ  ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ prameye antar bhavan  evam artham pṛthak ukta iti āha saḥ  ayam iti nyāyasya pañca avayava ātmakasya vacana samūhasya dṛṣṭāntaḥ  mūlam atas tasya pṛthak upadeśaḥ atas ca asya pṛthak upadeśaḥ  yad  sati tasmin  iti anumāna nimitta tvam āha pūrva pratyakṣa iti dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi dṛḍhatara pramāṇa avadhāritam iti arthaḥ śābda mūla tām drṛṣṭāntasya darśayati pūrva jñātam ca artham iti saṃbandha grahaṇa viṣayaḥ  arthaḥ  dṛṣṭāntaḥ saṃbandha grahaṇam ca śābdasya api jñānasya nimittam prathama śrāviṇaḥ śabdāt artha jñāna abhāvāt tasmāt asti śābde api dṛṣṭāntasya upayoga iti aparam api pṛthak upādāna prayojanam āha nāstikasya iti aprapañcane hetum āha tad uktam bhāṣya iti siddhān pada vivaraṇa bhaṣyam vyācaṣṭe abhyupagama iti tad vibhajate abhyupagama idim itthambhūtam ca iti tad vibhajate idam iti iti idam iti hi dharmi viṣayam siddhāntam darśayati dharmaḥ  sarva tantra siddhānta viṣayaḥ ittham iti prati tantra adhikāraṇa abhyupagama siddhānta viṣayam darśayati vyavasthāyām upalakṣaṇa tayā pratitantra siddhānta mātram udāharati idam sāṃkhyeṣu eva iti upalakṣaṇa tām udāharaṇasya ajānānaḥ codayati sarva tantra iti pariharati yaḥ  ayam iti abhyupagama vyavasthitiḥ anabhyupagamāt  vyavacchinatti na tu puruṣa viśeṣe vyavasthāpayati iti bhāvaḥ asya api prameya antar gratasya api sataḥ pṛthak upādāna prayojanam āha tasya prameya iti tatra sarva tantra siddhānta siddhaḥ tāvat  vipratipannānām api vādinām dharmaḥ  tasya sarva tantra siddhānta siddhasya viśeṣeṣu prati tantra siddhāntāḥ pravartanta tathā hi yadi ghaṭaḥ  nāma na sarva tantra siddhānta siddhaḥ kim āśrayā avayavī vā paramāṇu samūhaḥ  vā jñāna ākāraḥ  vā pradhāna pariṇāmaḥ  vā brahma pariṇāmaḥ  vā tad vivartaḥ vā iti prati tantra siddhāntāḥ pravartante katham ca prati tantra siddhānta āśrayaḥ  vāda jalpa vitaṇḍāḥ pravartante kim āśrayaḥ ca nyāyaḥ syāt  tathā yadi adhikāraṇa siddhāntaḥ  na bhavet  katham sādhya sāmānya vyāptam sādhana sāmānyam iti sāṇana viśeṣat sādhya viśeṣaḥ  gamyeta tasmāt asti prameyasya api siddhāntasya pṛthak upādana prayojanam abhyupagama siddhāntam ca upariṣṭāt  vicārayiṣyati vāttika kṛt  iti tad prayojanam iha asmābhinogktam iti krama prāptān ava yavān āha atha avayavāḥ nanu yathā tantavaḥ paṭasya sama vāci kāraṇam kim tathā eva ete pratijñādayaḥ vākyasya naḥ khalu rāgana guṇā varṇāḥ samavāyikāraṇa tām pratipadyanta iti āha vākya eka deśā iti avayavā iva avayavāḥ na punar  samavāyi kāraṇam yathā hi avayavāḥ samudāyina ekasmin  avayavini kārye dhārayitavye ca evam ekasmin vivakṣita artha pratipādane pratijñādayaḥ avayavā vākyasya samudāyasya samudāyina iti nanu varṇānām āśutara vināśinām kramavatām eka kālatva abhāve samudāya abhāvāt  kutas tad samudāya u vākyam kutas ca eka deśa tā ityāśayavān ākṣipati kim punar vākyam uttaram pūrva pada smṛti apekṣaḥ  antya pada pratyayaḥ smṛti anugraheṇa pratisandhīyamānaḥ  viśeṣa pratipatti hetuḥ vākyam viśiṣyata iti viśeṣaḥ padārtha ekaḥ kriyā vā kārakam vā prātipadikā arthaḥ  vā padārtha antara viśiṣṭaḥ  vākya arthaḥ yathā somena yajeta gaḥ dohanena paśu kāmasya yasya pitā pitāmahaḥ  vā somam na pibet  sa vrātya iti tasya viśeṣasya ekasya pratipatti hetuḥ tad evam samūha nibandhanam padānām eka kārya tvam sūcayati kaḥ  viśeṣa pratipatti hetuḥ iti ata uktam antya pada pratyayaḥ antyam viśeṣyam viroṣaṇa pūrvaka tvāt  tasya padam na ca tad aviditam sattā mātreṇa cakṣuḥ ādivat  viśeṣyam pratipādayati iti ata uktam pratyaya iti pratīyamānam viśeṣya vāci padam viśeṣyam bodhayati pratītiḥ ca na anubhavaḥ api tu smṛti na hi kramavat varṇa samudāyaḥ padam śravaṇa indriya anubhava gocaraḥ saṃbhavati saṃbhavanti tu pratyekam varṇāḥ na ca ete pratyekam padam na ca pūrva varṇa smṛti nicaya sāhitaḥ  antya varṇa anubhavaḥ śrotra ja iti yuktam smṛtīnām sva kārya saṃskāra virodhinīnām asahabhāvāt vinaśya davinaśyat avasthayoḥ tu upāntyā antya varṇa smṛti anubhavayoḥ syāt  na ca etāvatā artha pratyayaḥ pūrva varṇa smṛtīnām nirobhāvāt  na ca pūrva varṇa anubhavanita saṃskāra sahakāriṇaḥ śravaṇāt eva labdhajanmanaḥ pratyayasya ekasya adhyasta tad smṛti anubhava rūpa vaicitryasya sat asat varṇa avagāhinaḥ  viṣaya bhāvam āpannā varṇā arthadhiyam ādadhati iti sāmpratam saṃbandha saṃvedana āhita saṃskāra ubdodha samaya janmanā sva janitena saṃskāreṇa saṃbandha smṛti utpatti samaye vināśāt  padārtha avabodhakatva anupapatteḥ tasmāt  smṛtiḥ eva pratyayaḥ ata eva adhyayana samaye guru mukhāt  gṛhītaḥ  veda rāśiḥ vedāṅga upāṅga jñāna saṃskṛtena smaryamāṇa  eva tasya artham bodhayati evam ca yadā padārtha pratyāyana eva pada anubhavaḥ  na kāraṇam tadā vākya artha jñāne nānā padārtha smaraṇā kāṅkṣā yogya tā sannidhāna avadhāraṇa ādi vyavahite kā eva kathā iti yadi tarhi viśeṣya padam eva smaryamāṇam viśiṣṭam artham avagamayati kṛtam pada antaraiḥ tatas  eva vākya artha pratipatteḥ iti ata uktam pūrva pada smṛti apekṣaḥ pūrvam viśeṣaṇam tad pūrvaka tvāt  viśeṣya pratīteḥ tasya padava smaryamāṇa pūrva pada apekṣaḥ yadi api smaraṇāni na saha saṃbhavanti tathā api eka smṛti samārūḍhāni vā padāni nirantara smṛti saṃtāna samārūsani vā paraspara apekṣāṇi tathā ca smaryamāṇam viśeṣya padam viśeṣaṇa pada apekṣam viśiṣṭam artham avagamayati iti syāt etad  pada mālā ced  smaryamāṇā vākya artha vodhanī kṛtam tarhi padārtha vodhanena kṛtam ca pada tad artha saṃbandha bodhanena ityata uktam smṛti anugraheṇa iti pratyekam padebhyaḥ  yāḥ padārtha smṛtayaḥ tad anugraheṇa etad uktam bhavati yadi api vākya artha vodhanāya pada mālā pravṛttā tathā api padārtha smṛtiḥ ava antara vyāpāra bhūtā apekṣate kāṣṭhāni iva pāka pravṛttāni jvalanam avāntara vyāpāram na ca padāni agṛhīta saṅketāti padārthān smārayanti iti upapannā padārtha smṛti saṃbandha saṃvedanayoḥ apekṣā iti yadi hi padārtha smṛti apekṣā pada mālā vākya artha vodha narī hanta daśa dāḍimāni ṣaṣ apūpā bhavanti iti evamādīnām api vākya artha bodhaka tvam syāt iti ata āha pratisandhīyamānaḥ pratipadam sandhānam ghaṭanam pratisandhānam tad ca sva artha dvāreṇa ākāṅkṣā yogya tā satti adhīnam na ca daśa dāḍima ādi vākya ādiṣu tad asti iti na tatas  vākya artha avabodha iti arthaḥ tad evam eka smṛti samāroheṇa ema artha avacchedena ca padānām samūhaḥ  vākyam tasya bhāgā eka deśā iti yāvatī ityādi bhāṣyam avatārayati te kiyantaḥ bhāṣya vyākhyānena uttaram yāvabhdiḥ iti pṛcchati kā iti na hi samāpteḥ niṣpatteḥ anyā siddhiḥ asti iti abhiprāyaḥ uttaram padārthasya iti dharmiṇaḥ siṣā dhāyiṣita dharma viśiṣṭa tvam vāstavam iti arthaḥ samāpti pṛcchati kā iti uttaram viśeṣa iti vāstavaḥ  dharmaḥ siddhiḥ tad gocaraḥ tu viniścayaḥ puruṣa dharmaḥ  niṣpattiḥ iti viśeṣa iti arthaḥ kiyadbhiḥ kim abhidhānaiḥ ca vibhāgaiḥ siddhiḥ parisamāpyata iti āśaṅkya bhāṣya kṛta uktam tasya pañca iti tad  vyācaṣṭe samākhyā iti bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ākṣipati tatra āgama iti na hi agamavat  pratijñā vacanam niścāyakam hetu vacana ādi vaiyarthyāt niṣpādita kriye karmaṇi sādhanasya sādhana nyāya atipātāt iti samādhatte āgama adhigatasya iti ātma ādi prameya pratipādana uddeśena hi śāstram etad  pravṛttam tad na antarīyaka tayā nyāyam vyutpādayat  tam eva vyutpādayet  ya ātma ādeḥ prameyasya sākṣāt  niścāyakaḥ tad pratipādaka āgama pramāṇi aniścāyakaḥ  vā tasya ca nyāya viśeṣasya ādya u avayavaḥ pratijñā āgama artha viṣayā sākṣāt  tad viṣaya āgama pramāṇi apratipādakasya ca paramparayā tasmāt  āgamaḥ pratijñā āgama upacārasya ca prayojanam idam yad artha saṃvādena āgamena anugṛhyate nyāyaḥ sa prayojanaḥ ca bhavati āgama artha jñānasya niḥśreyasa hetu bhāvena nirūḍha tvāt  tasmāt  yadi api na nyāya mātra vartinī pratijñā āgamaḥ tathā api prakṛta nyāya abhiprāyeṇa etad  draṣṭavyam tathā ca āgama artha saṃbandhena pratijñāyāḥ kalpita viṣaya tvam api parākṛtam veditavyam yad āhuḥ eke sarvaḥ  ayam anumāna anumeya vyavahāraḥ  buddhi ārūḍhena eva dharma dharmi bhāvena na bahis sat asat tvam apekṣate iti tathā anumānasya nyāya anugrahāka tvam hetu vacanasya anumānatva upacāreṇa bhāṣya kāreṇa uktam hetuḥ anumānam iti tad  khalu anumāna pratipādakam vacanam viṣaya tayā anumānena anugrahītavyam na ca liṅga darśana mātram anumeya pratipatti hetuḥ api tu saṃbandha smṛti sahakāri na ca hetu vacana mātrāt sahakārita  agamyate tasmāt na liṅga vacanam anumāna pratipādakam iti katham anumānatva upacāra iti ata āha evam liṅga darśana mātre dṛśyamāne liṅga rūpe saṃbandha smaraṇa rahite hetu upacārāt  anumānatva upacārat hetuḥ anumānam iti uktam bhavaṣya kṛtā tad eva vibhajateyat tu dvitīyam liṅga daśanam saṃbandha grahaṇa samaye liṅga darśanam prathamam tad apekṣayā sādhya dharmiṇi liṅga darśanam dvitīyam tad saṃbandha smṛti vyakti hetu bhāvāt smaryate anayā iti smṛtiḥ saṃskāraḥ tasya vyaktiḥ kārya abhimukhīkaraṇam tatra hetu bhāvāt  kvacid  pāṭhaḥ saṃbandha smṛti hetu vyakti hetu bhāvāt iti sa tu sugama eva atas  hetuḥ iti ucyate etad uktam bhavati yad  tad  dvitīyam liṅga darśanam śuddham api āpātatas saṃbandha smṛti hetu bhāvāt  saṃbandha smṛti sahakārī ā iva tathā ca anumānam evam ca tad pratipādakasya vacasa upapannaḥ  anumānatva upacāra iti siddham evam ca vāstavena liṅgena saṃbandhāt  tad vacanasya buddhi vikā alpita liṅga viṣaya tvam parāḥ tam veditavyam evam anyeṣu api avayaveṣu vakṣyamāṇeṣu etad eva prayojanam yojanīyam iti udāharaṇam pratyakṣam iti bhāṣyam tad vyācaṣṭa smṛti viṣayasya iti yatra pratyakṣa viṣaye pūrvam vyāptiḥ gṛhītā tasya smṛtiḥ iti smṛti viṣayasya pratyakṣataḥ punar ūpa darśanāt avipratipattyā punar  smaraṇāt  tad smārakam vacanam udāharaṇam pratyakṣam mūla bhūta pratyakṣa pramāṇa samuttha tvāt ita kaḥ punarūpa māna artha iti pratyakṣam iva pratyakṣam iti atra ivakāre tatra upama arthaḥ ka iti arthaḥ etad eva vibhajate yasmāt iti upamānam upanaya iti bhāṣyam tad vyācaṣṭe yathā tathā iti upamāna eka deśa iti upanayaḥ  hi tathā ca etad iti pravartamāna udāharaṇa stham yathāśabda artham apekṣata iti yathā tathā iti pravartata iti kim punarūpa mānam yasya ayam eka deśa iti ata āha upamānam khalu tathā gauḥ tathā gavaya iti upadeśa upayoge upayogaḥ tad artha viṣayaḥ  anubhavaḥ tasmin sati paśu ād vanam gataḥ  nāgarakaḥ pratyekṣeṇa adṛṣṭa pūrvam piṇḍam paśyati smarati ca upadeśa artham piṇḍasya ca puras vartinaḥ smaryamāṇena gavā sādṛśyam pratyakṣeṇa eva paśyati tad evaṃbhūtam sārūpya jñānam gavaya śabda vācyaḥ  ayam piṇḍa iti pratīti hetu rūpa mānam tad etasya upamānasya upadeśa artha smaraṇa gavaya piṇḍa gaḥ sārūpya apratyakṣa rūpasya eka deśe sarūpye yaḥ  yathā tathā bhāvaḥ sa upanaye api asti iti etāvatā upamānatva upacāra upanaya iti arthaḥ saḥ  ayam sarva pramāṇa viniveśena paramaḥ  nyāyaḥ stūyate nigamana vyākhyāna bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ākṣipati kaḥ punar iti na khalu avayavānām pramāṇānām vā vākye samavāyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati iti bhāvaḥ uttaram eka vākya iti adhyāropaḥ  buddhacā pratisandhānam sāmarthyam pṛcchati kim punat iti uttaram itaretara iti sāmarthyam hi padānām dharmaḥ iha tu vibhajyamānānām avayavānām nad mūlānām ca pramāṇānām sa ākāṅkṣa tvam eva dharmaḥ samārthyam tad atra samasta rūpa sampanna liṅga pratipādanam ekam prayojanam vibhajya mānasākāṅkṣa tvam ca asti iti siddham eka vākya tvam avayavānām iti nigamana padam vyutpādayati nigamyanta iti saḥ  ayam iti bhāṣyam anubhāṣya pṛcchati kaḥ punar  parama śabdasya artha  iti uttaram vipratipapanna puruṣa pratipādaka tvam paśca avayava vākyasya parama tvam iti etad eva vyatireka mukhena pratipādayati ekaikaśa iti yadi api loke pratyakṣa ādīnām ekaikaśas  api vipratipanna puruṣa pratipādaka tvam tatra tatra upalabhyate tathā api yad etad  veda prāmāṇyam ātma ādi pratipādanam ca niḥśreyasa upayoti na tad  pañca avaya vākya udatat śāstra upadiṣṭa upakaraṇāt  vinā sidhyati iti anena abhiprāyeṇa draṣṭavyam avayavānām pṛthak abhidhānam ākṣeptum vikalpayati kim punar avayavā iti vikalpa prayojanam pṛcchati kim ca atas  uttaram yadi pramāṇa antaram iti samādhatte na pramāṇa antaram iti prayojana antaram āha ta eta iti yata eva vāda ādi pravṛtti hetavaḥ  ata eva tattva vyavasthāyāḥ ca āśrayā bhavanti iti pṛcchati ka iti na hi kuṇḍam iva vadarāṇi tattva vyavasthā avayavān āśrayati iti arthaḥ uttaram viśeṣa pratipādaka tvam dhama viśiṣṭa udharmaḥ  viśeṣaḥ viśiṣyata iti vyutpattyā tad pratipādaka tvam avayavānām tattva vyavasthā āśraya tvam iti arthaḥ krama prāpta tarka pada vyākhyāna artham bhāṣyam anubhāṣate tarkaḥ  na pramāṇa saṃgṛhītaḥ pramāṇapadena hi catvāri pramāṇāni saṃgṛhīta atina na ca eteṣu anyatamaḥ tarka iti arthaḥ astu tarhi pramāṇa pada saṃgṛhītebhyaḥ pramāṇebhyaḥ pramāṇa antaram asaṃgṛhītam pramāṇapadena prameya padena iva asaṃgṛhītāḥ saṃśaya ādayaḥ prameyā iti ata āha na pramāṇa antaram bhāṣyam anubhāṣya hetum āha aparicchedaka tvāt  aniścāyaka tvāt  tad eva vyatireka mukhena darśayati pramāṇam iti syāt etad  aparicchedaka tvam asiddham tarka jñānasya saṃśaya ādivat  guṇa tvena ātma liṅga tvāt anyathā tu akiñcit karavāt upādāna vaiyarthyam iti ata āha pramāṇa viṣaya vibhāgāt  tu iti na hi vayam guṇa tvena utpattimat tvena vā rūpeṇa aniścāyaka tvam tarkasya ācakṣmahe kim tu pramāṇa viṣaya vibhāga hetu tayā na ca evam asya akiñcitkara tvam iti arthaḥ pṛcchati kaḥ punar iti uttaram yukta ayuktā iti idam yuktam idam ayuktam iti itikāreṇa yuktā yukta viṣayam tarka jñānam parāmṛśati tad anena tarkasya svarūpam darśitam tasya vyāpāram āha yad  tatra yuktam bhavati saṃbhavati tad anujānāti na tu avadhārayati tarkaḥ etad uktam bhavati pramāṇam tattva avadhāraṇāya pravṛttam karaṇa tayā itikartavyatām apekṣate tarkaḥ ca pramāṇa viṣaya yukta ayukta vicāra ātmā pramāṇam yukte tattve pravartamānam anujānan pramāṇam anugṛhṇarati tad anugṛhītam pramāṇam tattva nirṇayāya paryāptam na ca pramāṇa viṣaye ced  tarkaḥ pravartate kṛtam asya pramāṇa anujñayā nanu ayam eva niścāyakaḥ kasmāt na bhavati iti sāmpratam tasya prasaṅga tayā pāratantryeṇa sva yamasādhana tvāt  asti hi prasaṅgaḥ  na prasaṅgaḥ  hetuḥ tathā hi pratyakṣam eva tāvat  bhū tale pravartamānam tad viśeṣaṇa tayā ghaṭa abhāve api pravartamānam yadi atra abhaviṣyat  ghaṭaḥ  bhū talam iva adrakṣyata tena saha tulya darśana yogya tvāt na ca dṛśyate tasmāt na asti iti tarkeṇa anujñāyamānam ghaṭa ābhāvi śiṣṭe bhū tale pravartate kevalam eva idam bhū talam na iha ghaṭa iti evam svarga kāmaḥ  yajeta iti śabdaḥ  api pravartamānaḥ parama āptasya bhagavatā r iśvarasya niyogaḥ  na asvarga phalāyām yāga bhāvanāyām avakalpata iti samāna padena upattaḥ  api duḥkha tayā dhātvarthaḥ sādhya iti na yuktam bhinna pada upattaḥ api puruṣa viśeṣaṇam api svarga eva bhāvanā phalam yukta iti tarkeṇa anujñāyamānaḥ pravartate na ca yadi abhaviṣyat  ghaṭa iti vā yadi abhaviṣyat  dhātvarthaḥ sāghya iti vā kriyā atipattiḥ asti yad āśraya aniṣṭa prasaṅgena ayukta tvam itarathā tu yukta tvam tad  tarkeṇa niśvīyate tasmāt na pramāṇam niśvayāya tu pravṛttam pramāṇam tad viṣaya vivecanena anugṛhṇan itikartavyā tvena upayujyate yartha uktam mīmāṃsā saṃjñakaḥ tarkaḥ sarva veda samudbhāvaḥ saḥ  atas  vedaḥ  rūma aprāpta kāṣṭha ādi lavaṇa ātmavat  pūjita vicāra vacanaḥ  hi mīmāṃsā śabdaḥ ayukta pratiṣedhena yukta abhyanujñānam tarkaḥ pramāṇa itikartavyatā tvena ca pramāṇāt  vedāt bheda uktaḥ saḥ  atas  veda iti aṅga aḍiganoḥ abheda vivakṣayā itikartavya tā tvam ca asya sākṣa d darśitam dharme pramīyamāṇe hi vedena karaṇa ātmanā itikartavya tā bhāgam mīmāṃsā pūrayiṣyati iti sarvam avadātam tasya udāharaṇam bhāṣye karma iti karma kāraṇakam apūrvam dharma adharmau  iti yāvat  kārye kāraṇatva upacārāt etad upapādanāya pṛcchati katham punat iti nikāya viśiṣṭābhiḥ apūrvābhiḥ śarīra indriya buddhi vedanābhiḥ abhisaṃbandhaḥ  janma tasya katham karma nimitta tā iti arthaḥ atra pramāṇam anumānam āha bhadavat tvāt  vicitra tvāt iti arthaḥ pṛcchati kaḥ punar iti bhedam āha sugatiḥ iti pramāṇam uktvā tasya iti kartavya tā bhūtam tarkam avatārayati saḥ  ayam bheda iti yadi ekam nimittam syāt  vaicitryam na bhavet  na hi abhinnāt  kārya vaicitryam upapadyate tasya ākasmikatva prasaṅgāt ata uktam anekam iti nanu anekam yāga ādi brahmahatyā ādi kriyā rūpam kāraṇam astam kṛtam apūrvaiḥ iti ata uktam avasthitam yāga ādikā tu kriyā āśutara vināśinī na cira bhāvine svargāya kalpata iti arthaḥ avasthitam ced  yāga ādya ahitam apūrvam dharmaḥ  asti iti sadā eva sukhinā bhavitavyam evam adharmaḥ  asti iti sadā eva duḥkhī syāt iti sukha duḥkhayoḥ kādācid ka tvam vyāhanyeta na hi avasthitāt  kāraṇāt anavasthitam kāryam iti ata uktam anityam na hi avasthānam nityatām brūmaḥ kim tu tāvat anena sthātavyam na yāvat antya sukha duḥkha saṃvijñānam janayati atha naśyati iti nanu bhinnāni santu pūrvāṇi tathā api sarvāṇi sarva ātma samavetāti yathā avayavī sva avayaveṣu tathā ca sarva sādha araṇyānna ukta vaicitrya utpāda iti ata uktam eka dravyam eka dravyam ced aḥ tu tarhi sarva sādhāraṇe pṛthivī ādau yatra kvacid  tathā api vaivitryānupapattiḥ iti ata uktam pratyātma niyatam atha pṛthivī ādi eva kāraṇa janma vaicitrye kasmāt na bhavati iti āśayavān pṛcchati kim kāraṇam iti kasmāt  kāraṇāt iti arthaḥ uttaram pṛthivī āpadīnām iti mā bhūt  pṛthivī ādi pṛthivī ādi gatam kiñcid  bhaviṣyati iti ata āha pṛthivī ādi gatasya iti bhāṣya ukta prameya tve tarkasya hetum āha upalabdhi viṣaya tvāt iti tarka anantaram nirṇaya uddiṣṭaḥ tarka hetuka tvāt  tasya svarūpam āha nirṇayaḥ tattva jñānam iti yadi evam indriya āpāta janma pratyakṣa jñānam api tattva jñānam iti nirṇayaḥ syāt iti ata āha pramāṇanām iti anena pañca avayava vākyam upalakṣayati tatra sa tarkāṇām pramāṇānām samāvāyāt  paramārthataḥ tu tarka pūrvakaḥ tattva viniścayaḥ  nirṇaya iti pratyakṣa ādīnām api tarka sahāyānām nirṇaya phala tvam iti syāt etad  dhūma ādi gocareṇa nirṇayena vahni ādau  anumīyamāne pramāṇa bheva nirṇayaḥ  na phalam iti āśayavān pṛcchati kadā punat iti vidita abhiprāyasya uttaram yadā iti saṃkalayya tarka nirṇaya vyutpādanasya prayojanam āha tau  etau  iti parīkṣakaḥ  atra lokaḥ  loka śabdena ucyate tad itarasya tarka asaṃbhavāt buddhvā iti parīkṣya nirṇayam kṛtvā iti arthaḥ śeṣam nigada vyākhyātam nirṇaya anantaram vāda vyākhyāna artham bhāṣyam vādaḥ khalu iti tad anubhāṣya upapattim āhavāda iti nānā pravaktāraḥ  yasmin sa tathā ekasya api śāstra kartuḥ pūrva pakṣa uttara pakṣa sādhana dūṣaṇa pratipādakaḥ  vacana samūhaḥ  vādaḥ syāt iti nānā pravaktṛka iti uktam siddhānta bhedānavidhānena hi dvau  api sva siddhānta anurūpam sādhanam dūṣaṇam ca āhatuḥ iti arthaḥ pratyadhikaraṇa ityādi bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ācaṣṭe pratyadhikaraṇam asya sādhanam adhikriyata iti adhikaraṇam sādhyam tad adhikṛtya sādhana pravṛtteḥ pratyadhikāraṇa sādhanam yasmin vāde sa tathā uktaḥ asya eva artham niṣkarṣṭum pṛcchati kim uktam bhavati niṣkarṣati ubhābhyām vādi prativādibhyām sva sva sādhye sādhanam vaktavyam tathā ca nānā pravaktṛka tvena tulya tve api vādasya vitaṇḍāyāḥ pratyadhikaraṇa sādhana tvena bhadeḥ siddhaḥ  bhavati vitaṇḍāyāḥ pratipakṣa sthāpanā hīna tayā pratyadhikāraṇa sādhanatva abhāvāt tathā api jalpāda bhedaḥ  vādasya asti hi jalpasya pratyadhikaraṇa sādhanava tvam ca nānā pravaktṛka tvam ca iti ata āha anyatarasmin  adhikaraṇe nirṇaya iti vāde hi tāvat  brūte na yāvat anyatarasmin pakṣe nirṇayaḥ  jātaḥ tattva bubhutsorvādinoḥ vāde adhikārāt  jalpe tu puruṣa śakti parīkṣā lakṣaṇe apratibhādinā api parājya upapatteḥ na avaśyam tattva nirṇayaḥ tasmāt anyatara nirṇaya avasāna tvena jalpāt  bhedaḥ  vādasya iti siddham yathā ca etad  tathā upariṣṭād upapādayiṣyate iti āha tad ca iti tasya svarūpam pṛcchati saḥ  ayam iti uttaram vākya iti codayati nanu ca iti vākya samūhaḥ ca jñānam ca iti vipratiṣiddham etad iti arthaḥ pariharati na iti sādhana upālambha grahaṇasya śabda viṣaya tvāt avidodha iti arthaḥ yugapad eva jalpa vitaṇḍe vyācaṣṭe tad viśeṣau  iti viśiṣyete bhidyate iti viśeṣau tasmāt  vādāt  viśeṣau bhinnau bhāṣyam anubhāṣya pṛcchati kaḥ punar viśeṣaḥ yad yogāt  viśiṣṭe vādāt  jalpa vitaṇḍe iti arthaḥ uttaram aṅga ādhikyam aṅga hāniḥ ca yathā saṃkhyam tad eva darśayati chala iti tad  kim idānī saṃśaya ādibhiḥ iva atyanta vairūpyam vādena jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ na iti āha etāvatā viśeṣeṇa kathā mārga bheda iti etāvān eva viśeṣaḥ  na sarvathā kathā tvena saṃśaya ādi vyāvṛttena sāmānya viśeṣeṇa trayāṇām api abhedāt iti arthaḥ aparam api bheda hetum āha viṣaya bhedāt ca iti tad  vibhajate śiṣya ādi iti śiṣyamāṇaḥ  atyanta viparyastaḥ durjñāna avalepa durvidagdha  iti yāvat  na tu evaṃbhūtaḥ śiṣya ādiḥ viparyastaḥ  api anavalipta tvāt iti bhāvaḥ krama prāptānām hetvābhāsānām svarūpam āha anyatama iti pañcasu caturṣu vā liṅga rūpeṣu anyatamam liṅgam dharmam ekam dvayam trayam vā anuvidadhānā ahetavaḥ  hetuvat ābhāsa anta iti hetvābhāsā uktāḥ nigraha sthānebhya iti bhāṣyam avatārayitum āha te ca nigraha sthānam iti avatārayati nigraha sthāna iti avatārya dūṣayitum eka deśi matena vyācaṣṭe yasmāt  kila eta iti kila śabdaḥ  ayam arucau tad etad eka deśi vyākhyānam dūṣayati na ubhayathā api asaṃbandhāt kim ye ye nigraha sthānebhyaḥ pṛthak upadiśyante te sarve vāde codyante atha ye ye vāde codyante te sarve pṛthugupadiśyante iti ubhayathā api anaikāntika tvāt  na avinā bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandha iti arthaḥ tad etad  vibhajate na vāde codanīya tvam iti kasmāt  ubhayathā api avinā abhāva abhāva iti ata āha yadi tāvat iti tasmāt  na ayam avinābhūtaḥ  hetuḥ vāde codanīya tvam vā pṛthak upadeśaḥ  vā bhāṣya kāreṇa ukta iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti vāde codanīya tvāt iti upalakṣaṇam pṛthak upadeśāt iti ca draṣṭavyam tad evam eka deśi matam dūṣayitvā sva matena bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe etad eva tu nyāyyām iti nigraha sthānebhyaḥ  hetvābhāsānām pṛthak upadeśe prayojanam yad  bhāṣya akṣarebhyaḥ sākṣāt  pratīyate sāmānya upadeśena viśeṣa upadiṣṭe viśeṣa upadeśaḥ prayojana ādhikyam sūcayati yathā brāhmaṇān bhojaya kaṭha ca iti kaṭha bhojane viśeṣaḥ  gamyate tadvat iha api nigraha sthāna upadeśena eva hetvābhāseṣu labdheṣu teṣām viśeṣeṇa abhidhānam prayojana ādhikyam sūcayati etāvān eva sūtra kṛtaḥ  vyāpāraḥ  yad  sūtraṇam nāma tatra nigraha sthāna viśeṣāṇām hetvābhāsānām svarūpam vādasya ca tattva nirṇaya avasāna tvam ālocya vāde codanīyā bhaviṣyanti nigraha sthāna tvena hetvābhāsā na apratibhādaya iti prayojanam varṇayāñcakāra bhāṣya kāraḥ syāt etad  bhavantu vāde codanīyā hetvābhāsāḥ mā ca bhuvan  apratibhā ādayaḥ kim evam api iti āha vidyā prasthāna prameda jñāpana artha tvāt vāda jalpa vitaṇḍā vidyāḥ paramparayā niḥśreyasa upayogāt  tāsām prasthānam vyāpāraḥ tasya bhedaḥ tad jñāpana artha tvāt ata eva jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ tu iti āha codayati atha kasmāt iti yadi vāde hetvābhāsāḥ prayujyeran tatas  nigraha sthāna tvena codyeran na tu teṣām asti prayogaḥ  apramāṇa tvāt  pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambha tvāt ca vādasya tasmāt  nigraha sthāna mātra tvam hetvābhāsānām tathā ca na pṛthak upadeśaḥ nigraha sthāna upadeśena eva labdha tvāt iti arthaḥ pariharati pramāṇa sāmānyāt iti na khalu hetu ābhāsan tabt uddhyā prayu jāte vādi prativādinau api tu hetu buddhyā tathā ca asti teṣām vāde prayoga iti vāde nigraha sthāna tvena heva ābhāsāḥ ca ādyantām na apratibhā ādīni iti arthavān pṛthak upadeśaḥ tad etad  vikalpya ākṣipati vāde kānicid iti samādhatte na lakṣaṇa paratantra tvāt artha tathā bhāvasya iti brūmaḥ lakṣyata iti lakṣaṇam samāna asamāna jātīya vyāvṛttam rūpam vādasya ca nigraha sthānānām ca tad adhīnaḥ  hi teṣām tathā abhāvaḥ  vyavasthā kānicid eva nigraha sthānāni vāde na tu sarvāṇi iti sāmānyatas  abhidhāya tad eva lakṣaṇa paratantra tvam abhimate viśeṣe yojayati vādasya iti uktam ākṣipati pramāṇa pratirūpaka tvāt iti niścitau hi vādam kurūtaḥ niścayaḥ ca pramāṇa phalam iti kutaḥ apramāṇasya avakāśa iti arthaḥ uttaram bhrānteḥ iti na niścayaḥ sarvaḥ pramāṇa mūlaḥ  apramāṇa mūlasya api tasya darśanāt  anyathā viparyāsāt apravṛtti prasaṅgāt  vādinoḥ ca abhra anta tve vastunaḥ  viruddha dharma dvaya samāliṅgita tvam ekadā syāt iti bhāvaḥ pṛcchati kaḥ punar  śiṣya iti upāsya upāsakayoḥ parasparam na dhvaṃsanam saṃbhavati iti bhāvaḥ uttaram vivakṣita artha apratipādaka tvam eva na khalīkāra iti hetvābhāsānām ca pṛthak karaṇam na vāde tanmātra avadhāraṇa artham api tu yasmin  anuddhāvite api nigraha sthāne tattva pratipatti vyāghātaḥ  bhavati tasya sarvasya saṃgraha artham evam ca nyūna adhika apasiddhāntā api saṃgṛjītā bhavanti tatra pṛcchati nyūna adhika iti uttaram pramāṇa iti jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ tu iti bhāṣyam anubhāṣya upapādayati jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ tu iti sa ahaṅkāraḥ  vijigīṣuḥ apratibhā ādibhiḥ api nigraha sthānaiḥ tiraskṛtaḥ  galita ahaṅkāraḥ tattva bubhut sutām nītaḥ paścāt  vādena vyutpādyata iti arthaḥ chala ja ati nigraha sthānānām pṛthak upadeśa prayojana param bhāṣyam anubhāṣate chala iti upalakṣaṇa artham iti bhāṣya avayavam vyācaṣṭe parijñāna artham eva kevalam pirajñānasya phalam uktam sva vākye parivarjanam aprayogaḥ para vākye ca udbhāvanam iti codayati chala ja ati nigraha sthānāni iti atra hi jāteḥ sva vākye parivarjanamuktvā punar  svayam prayogaḥ  na yuktaḥ kasmāt  vyāghātāt  etad  vibhajate svākya iti pariharati na vyāghātaḥ kutas  praśna apākaraṇa artha tvāt tad  vibhajate svayam ca sukaraḥ prayoga iti anena bhāṣyeṇa kim uktam bhavati pareṇa prativādinā jātau prayuktāyām vādī prāśnikān sabhyān bravīti jātiḥ anena prativādinā prayuktā iti te prāśnikā enam paryanuyu jīran he vādin katham kena prakāreṇa jātiḥ catuviṃśatyām jātiṣu katamā jātiḥ iti saḥ  ayam prāśnikānām praśnaḥ tad apākaraṇa artham svayam sukaraḥ prayoga iti arthaḥ prakṛtam upasaṃharati tasmāt eta iti sūtrakāreṇa śāstrasya ātyantika duḥkha uparama rūpa niḥśreyasa adhigamaḥ prayojanam uktam bhāṣya kāraḥ tu na asti eva tad  prekṣāvatām prayojanam catrānvīkṣikī na nimittam bhavati iti āha sā iyamānvīkṣikī iti tad etad  bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe sā iyam ānvīkṣikī nyāya vidyati yadi api itarā vidyāḥ pramāṇikam eva artham abhiniviśante tathā api etad vidyā pratipādyam eva pramāṇa ādi upajīvya sve sve vyutpādye tattve pravartantra na tu pramāṇa ādi api vyutpādayanti yathā pratyakṣa ādi upajīvya pravartamānam anumānam na pratyakṣa ādi viṣayam api tadānīm eva gocarayati tad anena vidyā upakaraṇa grahaṇena vyāpāra ānvīkṣikyā darśitaḥ saṃprati vidyānām yāni karmāṇi pratipādyāni sāma agrihotra kṛṣi ādīni tatra āpi ānvīkṣikī upāya iti āha upāyaḥ sarva karmaṇām vidyā vyutpādyānām na tu hālika mṛgayva ādi karmaṇām api na hi vidyā padebhyaḥ  yāvat mātrā gatiḥ tāvat mātreṇa prekṣavatām paritoṣaḥ mā bhūt  ādityaḥ  vai yūpaḥ ityādibhya āditya ādīnā yūpāditā tasmāt  saṃśaya parīkṣā pramāṇa viniveśa dvāreṇa tad artha tattvam avadhāryā tatra trayī viniveśanīyā evam daṇḍanīti vārtayoḥ anugantavyam tasmāt ān vīkṣikī pariśodhita pramāṇa pramāśitam sāma ādi itarā vidyāḥ kurvanti viṣayam iti śeṣaḥ api ca dravya guṇa karmaṇām abhimatān abhimata upāya tā prajñāpanena yathāyatha sarvā vidyāḥ prekṣāvataḥ pravartayanti nirvayanti vā tatra kim aviśeṣeṇa sādhya sādhana itikartavyatāsu pravartayantu āhosvit  sādhana itikartavya tā mātre tatra yadi sādhya aṃśaḥ  api pravartana agocaraḥ tadā śyena ādi sādhyāyā hiṃsāyāḥ  vihita tvena na anarthava tvam atha sādhya aṃśam rāgataḥ prāptam anūdya sādhanā itikartavyate eva vidharayete tatas  śyena ādi sādhyāyā hiṃsāyāḥ  avihita tvena na hiṃsyāt  sarvā bhūtāni iti pratiṣadhāt anartha tvam tad iha sādhya aṃśe apravartanam ānvīkṣikī gamyam evam anuṣṭhāna gatāḥ prayojakatva aprayojaka tvādaya ānvīkṣikī gamyāḥ evam vārtā ādiṣu api iti tad evam ānvīkṣikīm āśrayante sarva vidyā iti āha āśrayaḥ sarva dharmāṇām sarvāsām vidyānām puruṣa pravartanā dharmāḥ teṣām āśrayaḥ vārtikakāraḥ tu dharma dvāreṇa vidyānām eva śraya iti vyācaṣṭe sarva vidyā upakāraka tvāt āśrayaḥ sarvāsām vidyānām iyam upakaroti vidyayā pravartanāyām kartavyāyām iyam sahakāritayā upakaroti iti arthaḥ syāt etad  vyutpādyāḥ ced  pramāṇa ādayaḥ sarva vidyā upayoginaḥ tarhrātyantikī dukhaḥ nivṛttiḥ ānvīkṣikyāḥ phalam niḥśreyasa padāt avagamyate vyutpādya svabhāva ālocanayā hi tad  gamyate sa ca vidyā antara sādhāraṇa iti vidyā antara adhigamyena niḥśreyasena saṅkara prasaṅga iti ata āha tad idam tattva jñānam niḥśreyasa adhigamaḥ ca yathāvidyam veditavyam vidyā antarāṇi tāvat  yad  tattva jñānam kurvanti tad svabhāva ālocanayā hi tad vidyā sādhye eva niḥśreyasa bhade upayujyante na anyatra iha tu pramāṇa ādi yadi api sādhāraṇam tathā api asādhāraṇa ātmā ādi rūpa pramaya samabhivyāhṛtam sat abhimata eva niḥśreyaseḥvatiṣṭhata iti viśuddhena arjanena homa sādhanasya dravyasya prāptiḥ svāgatam ādi grahaṇena krama paryanta aṅga grāma sākalyam gṛhyate śva mārjāra ādibhiḥ anupaghātaḥ anupahata tvam ādi grahaṇāt  viśuddha abhisandhiḥ iti śeṣam ati rohitam vāda ādīnām nigraha sthāna antānām upadeśaḥ para abhibhava upāya tayā madamāna ādi hetu tvena niḥśreyasa paripanthi iti manvānaḥ codayati mada māna ādi iti pariharati na sūtra artha aparijñānāt  na ayam sūtra arthaḥ sarveṣām tattva jñānam sākṣāt niḥśreyasa upayogī iti kim tu ātma ādi tattva jñānam tad itarat  tu pāramparyeṇa tatra jalpa ādīnā para ahaṅkāra praśamanam avāntara vyāpāra iti na niḥśreyasa paripanthitā kim tu ānukūlyam iti arthaḥ mada māna ādi nimitta tvam ca hetuḥ asiddha iti āha yad ca idam iti upasaṃhārati tasmāt na nimittam vāda ādi parijñānam rāga ādīnām iti iti sūtra samāptau tad evam prathama sūtreṇa śāstrasya abhidheya prayojana saṃbandhān darśayatā padārthāḥ pramāṇa ādaya uddhiṣṭāḥ teṣām ca lakṣaṇamuktvā tad parīkṣā vartayiṣyate aparīkṣya tattva jñāna nirṇaya ayogāt na ca anirṇota prayojana saṃbandhānām pramāṇa ādīnām lakṣaṇa parīkṣayoḥ avasaraḥ na ca prayojana saṃbandha nirṇayaḥ parīkṣām vinā iti tad parīkṣā artham dvitīyam sūtram tatra prayojana abhidhānasya dvaividhyāt  saṃśayaḥ dvividham hi prayojana abhidhānam grantha kṛtām dṛṣṭam samīcīnam asamīcīnam ca yathā vātika ādi prayojana abhidhānam āyurveda ādi prayojana abhidhānam ca tasmāt abhidhāna sāmānyāt  ubhayathā darśanāt ca saṃśayaḥ tatra utsūtreṇa prayojana abhisaṃbandha pratipādana param pūrva pakṣa bhāṣyam tad  khalu vai niḥśreyasam ityādi tad  vibhajate na tattva parijñānāt apavargaḥ kutas  ubhayathā doṣāt tad atyanta vimokṣa lakṣaṇaḥ  apavargaḥ  niḥśreyasam tad ced  tattva jñāna anantaram sampradāya ucchedaḥ  vāta putrīyatā ca śāstrasya syātām tasmāt na tattva jñāna anantaram niḥśreyasam tathā sati pramāṇa ādi tattva jñānāt niḥśreyasam iti mithyā na ca anyat niḥśreyasam iti abhimānaḥ pūrva pakṣa vādina iti atra idam siddhānta sūtram upatiṣṭhate duḥkha janma iti tasya tātparyam abhidhāya avatārayati na prayojana anabhisaṃbandhaḥ kutas  niḥśreyasasya para apara bhedāt  catastraḥ  hi pratipattayaḥ prameye ātma ādau prathamā tāvat āgamāt  yām ācakṣate śravaṇam iti dvitīyā tu śrutasya parīkṣya nyāyana vyavasthāpanam yām āhuḥ mananam iti sā ca anvīkṣikyām āyatate ānvīkṣikī ca saṃśaya ādi tattva jñāpanam pramāṇa tattva jñāpanāya upādatte pramāṇa tattva jñāpanam ca heya upādeya bheda vyavasthita prameya tattva parijñāpanāya tatra api ādi anta varjita daśa varga jñāpanam ādi antayoḥ eva ātma apavargayaḥ rū upādeyayoḥ tattva jñānasya upakaroti na ca ayam ānvīkṣikī vidyā avaghṛta prameya tattvaḥ  api parituṣyati pūrvavat eva ātma ādi gata viparyaya vāsanā anuvṛtteḥ naḥ khalu diś mūḍhaḥ sahasreṇa api anumāṇaiḥ viparyaya saṃskāram apanayati tattva asākṣātkāraḥ tu viparyaya saṃskārā nivartayati tad janitā ca vāsanā viparyaya vāsanām iti loka siddham tasmāt ātma ādi sākṣāt kāravatīm caturthau pratītim aśeṣa tad gocara vāsanā viparyāsa śamanīm arthayamānena ādara naiḥ antara ryābhyām dhyāna cintā ādi śabda vācyā tṛtīyā pratītiḥ sākṣātkāraphalā dīrgha kālam upāsanīyā atha pariniṣpanna dhyāna upāyaḥ sākṣātkāravatīm pratipadya caturthau pratītim nirmukta sakala kleśa jālaḥ apravartamānaḥ  dharma adharma sādhaneṣu nirūddha anāgata dharma adharma prabandha utpādaḥ  bhūta indriya vijayī prajñā jyotiḥ jaḥ van  eva mukta iti ucyate na ca evam avasthaḥ vīta rāgaḥ  api sahasā eva deha ādibhiḥ viyujyate prāk upāttasya dharma adhama pracayasya abhuktasya bhujyamānasya ca aprakṣīṇa tvāt  na ca prāya śvittena iva ātma jñānena adatta phalāni eva karmāṇi kṣīyanta iti yuktam na abhuktam kṣīyate karma iti smṛteḥ atyanta sukha duḥkha saṃvijñāna virodhasya karmaṇām avadhāraṇāt autsargikasya kvacid  prayaśvitta ādau viśeṣa vacanena apavādāt  kṣīyante ca asya karmāṇi muṇḍaka iti śruteḥ yoga ṛddhi vaśāt  yugapad utpāditān ekavidha deha upabhogena api upapatteḥ tāvat eva asya ciram yāvat na vimākṣye atha supatsye chān dogya iti ca abhukta upabhajyamāna phala karma prakṣaya avaghitva darśanam yogārddhi vaśāt ca aniyata vipāka kālāni api dīrgha kāla phalāni api karmāṇi piṇḍīkṛtya bhūta indriya davijayitayā yugapad eva bhuṅkte acintyaḥ  hi samādhi prabhāva iti uktam na ca acintya tvāt  vinā eva upabhogena karma āśayān prakṣayiṣyati iti yuktam dṛṣṭa anusāreṇa kathañcid upapattau atyanta adṛṣṭa kalpanāyā ayogāt  tasmāt utpanna tattva sākṣātkārasya doṣa abhāvāt pravṛtti uparame yaḥ  anāgata apūrva anutpādaḥ tad aparam niḥśreyasam tad ca tattva sākṣātkāra anantaram bhavati tādṛśaḥ ca muniḥ tattva jñānavān śāstrasya praṇeta iti na vāta putrīyam śāstram iti param tu riḥ śreyasam yoga ṛddhi prabhava sampadā yugapad upabhogena upātta karma āśayasya kṣayāt  sarva duḥkha uparama iti upapannam niḥśreyasa dvaividhyam iti bhāvaḥ tad etad  darśayati yad tāvat iti tattva sākṣātkāraḥ tattva jñānam saṃharṣaḥ sukham āyāsaḥ  duḥkham tatra anāgatābhyām tāvat  pravṛtti abhāvāt anutpādāt evam ucyate vidyamāna kāraṇe api sukha duḥkhe aśaktaḥ  adviṣaḥ ca bhu janaḥ na sukha duḥkha tayā manute na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ  na tatra tṛpyati tad ca tasya sukham na ca tad  dveṣṭi tad ca tasya duḥkham iti syāt etad  bhavatu etad aparam niḥśreyasam prakṛte tu kim āyātam iti ata āha ayam śāstra arthaḥ artha śabdaḥ  nimitte aparam niḥśreyasam śāstrasya nimittam atha apara niḥśreyasa utpāda samaya eva para niḥśreyasa utpādaḥ  api kasmāt na bhavati iti āha param tu niḥśreyasam tattva jñānāt krameṇa bhavati naḥ khalu utpanna tattva sākṣātkāraḥ samucchinna vāsanā viparyāsa jñānaḥ tad kārya doṣa tad kārya pravṛttīnam nivṛttyai prayatate kāraṇa nivṛttya eva āyatna labhya tvāt kārya nivṛtteḥ na hi kapha udbhāva jvara praśamanāya kapha nivṛttau satyām yatna antaram ātiṣṭhate tatas  eva tad siddheḥ param tu niḥśreyasam na tāvat  bhavati yāvat upabhogāt upātta karma āśaya pracayaḥ  na kṣīyate tasmāt  tattva sākṣātkāra ādhāna prayatnāt paraḥ tad upabhoga prayatna āstheyaḥ tathā ca na tulya kāla utpādaḥ para aparayoḥ niḥśreyasayoḥ tad idam uktam krameṇa iti tad evam artha gati pariśodhya sūtram avatārayati krima iti yadi api aparasmin  api niḥśreyase mithyājñāna doṣa pravṛttīnām api samuccheda kramaḥ  asti tathā api janma duḥkha uccheda kramaḥ  na asti pūrva upāttasya karma āśaya pracayasya tādavasthyāt  tasmāt  janma duḥkha uccheda krama samabhivyāhṛtaḥ  mithyājñāna ādi uccheda kramaḥ parasya eva niḥśreyasasya śāstra prayojanasya tad pratipādanam arthaḥ prayojanam yasya tad  tathā uktam idam ca ava antara prayojanam pradhāna prayojanam agre vakṣyati atra kecid  yoga vibhāgam icchanti kāraṇa ucchedāt  kārya ucchedaḥ  abhimataḥ na ca asau duḥkha ādīnām mithyājñāna antānām apradarśite kārya kāraṇa bhāve sidhyati tasmāt  duḥkha janma pravṛtti doṣa mithyā jñānānām iti akaḥ  yogaḥ atra kila samāsāt eteṣām itaretara yogaḥ avagamyate sa ca yogyatayā kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ kāryeṇa kāraṇam yuktam kāraṇena ca kāryam iti atas  siddhe kārya kāraṇa bhāve uttara uttara apāye tad anantara abhāvāt apavarga iti anena yogena kāraṇa uccheda krameṇa kārya uccheda krama pratipādanena apavargaḥ pratipādyate atra ca uttara tvam pāṭhā apekṣayā kāraṇasya tad anantara tvam ca kāryasya avyavahita ādi pāṭhā apekṣayā mithyājñāne kāraṇe tad kāryāḥ doṣāḥ eve śeṣeṣu api yojyam tam imam sūtra vibhāgam amṛṣyamāṇaḥ  vārttika kṛt  āha idam sūtram eka vacanena bhedam vyāvartayati na hi samuccheda krama pratipādanena apavarga paratayā eka vākya tve saṃbhavati vākya bhedaḥ  nyāyyaḥ eva nivṛttyā anya nivṛttya eva kārya kāraṇa bhāva ākṣipta iti na asau sūtre darśanīyaḥ na hi artha ākṣiptam sūtra kārā darśayanti tad idam sūtra grahaṇa prayojanam tathā hi su alpa akṣaram asat digdham sāravat  viśvatomukham astobhamanavadyam ca sūtram sūtra vidaḥ  viduḥ viṣṇudharmottare iti astobham anadhikam artha labhya pradarśane tu adhikam bhavet iti tad  sūcanāt  sūtram syāt  tathā hi ahuḥ laghūni sūcita arthāni su alpa akṣara padāni ca sarvatas  sāra bhūtāni sūtrāṇi āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ iti itaretara yogena api kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sūcanīya eva sa varam eka nivṛttyā anya nivṛttya eva sūcyatām eka vākyatā anurodhāya iti parama tāt paryamasya āha etad saṃbandhena eva śāstrasya niḥśreyasa adhigama lakṣaṇena prayojanena yaḥ saṃbandhaḥ pūrvam ākṣiptaḥ tad samādhānena arthena arthavat etad  sūtram saṃbandha padena viṣaya vācinā viṣacisam ādhānam lakṣayati tad evam sūtra tātparyam vyākhyāya avayava vyākhyānam avatārayati padārthasu iti yadi api sāma bheda ādau hala śakaṭa dau ca mithyājñānam aneka prakāram saṃbhavati tathā api na tad  saṃsāra hetuḥ api tu ātma ādi dvādaśavidha prameya viśeṣa viṣayam iti sūtra stham mithyājñānam viśeṣṭum āha tatra iti tad etena ātma ādi apavarga paryanta ityādi bhāṣyam avatāritam tad etad ākṣipati kaḥ  vṛtti artha iti na khalu yathā kuṇḍe vadaram paṭe vā śauklyam evam prameye mithyājñānam pravartate tasya jñātṛ samaveta tvāt iti arthaḥ uttaram viṣaya arthaḥ yāvat uktam bhavati pramaya viṣayam mithyājñānam iti tāvat uktam bhavati prameye vartata iti viṣaya tvam ca agre nivedayiṣyate aneka prakāram iti uktam tad āha tatra ayam bhedaḥ tatra ātmani tāvat  pradhāne prameye na asti iti katham punar etad mithyājñānam iti ata āha ātmā tāvat iti atra śaṅgate tasya anupapattiḥ kutas  sat asatoḥ sārūpya abhāvāt iti ced  sarvatra hi rajata udaka ādi vibhrameṣu śukti rajatayoḥ vā marūmarīci salilayoḥ vā sārūpyam eva nimittam pratīmaḥ na hi jātu rūpam rasa ādiṣu hastinam vā maśaka ādiṣu āropayanti asadṛśe api śvete pīta bhramaḥ madhure ca tikta bhramaḥ pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ tiktaḥ  guḍa iti ca dṛśyata iti ced  na tatra api sārūpya saṃbhavāt tathā hi bahi nirgacchat ati accha nayana raśmi saṃpṛkta pitta gatam pītimānam āśraya rahitam śaṅkham ca doṣa ācchādita siti mānam anubhavan pīta gaṇasya ca tad asaṃbandham ananubhavan  tad asaṃbandha agraheṇa pīta cīra vilva ādi sāmāna adhikaraṇyena sārūpyāt  śaṅkha pīta iti viparyasyati evam tvac indriya upanītam guḍa dravyam ananubhūyamāna mādhuryam anubhavan rasana agra vartinaḥ ca pittasya asvabhāva jāta tiktasya tikta tvam anubhavan tad āśrayam ca pittam ananubhavan  asaṃbandha āgraha sārūpyāt  tikta nimba sāmānādhikaraṇyena tiktaḥ  guḍa iti vapiḥ yasyati ati śīghra tayā ca eṣa kramaḥ  na lakṣyate na ca brūmaḥ  yatra sārūpyam tatra bhrama iti yena atiprasaktiḥ codyeta api tu yatra bhramaḥ tatra avaśyam kathañcid  sārūpyam iti evam dvi candra diś moha alāta cakra ādiṣu api kiñcid  kathañcid  sārūpyam ūhanīyam na ca sa dasatoḥ atyanta vilakṣaṇayoḥ sārūpyam asti tad  katham ātmani na astita āropa iti ākṣepaḥ samādhatte na pramāṇa gamya tā upapatte ākṣepam vibhajate na hi sadasatī iti samādhānam vibhajata tad ca na evam iti yadi sat asatoḥ samāna tvam na asti tarhi bhedaḥ tathā ca kasya kutra āropa iti ata āha kriyā guṇa iti saḥ  ayam asat dharmān kriyā guṇa rahitatva ādīn satya ātmani samāropya asat tayā viparyasyati na asti ātmā iti natu ātmānam sarvatas  abhyarhitatamam paśyan tatra asau snihyati snehāt ca tad upakārāya ghaṭate evam tad paripanthinam dveṣṭi dveṣāt ca tad apakārāya dyaṭate tatas ca karma āśayam ācinoti tatas  janma tatas ca duḥkham iti evam ātmanaḥ tādṛśasya mā bhūt  tattva ajñānam astu nāstitāsamāropa eva tāvat  yatas  na pravartate yathā āhuḥ sukhī bhaveyam duḥkhī vā mā bhūvam iti tṛṣyataḥ yā eva aham itidhīḥ sā eva sahajam sattva darśanam pra vā atra ucyate yadi api rāga ādi nivṛtti hetuḥ nairātmya darśanam tathā api na asti karma na asti karma phalam iti dṛṣṭeḥ paramam nidānam evam pretyabhāva abhāva jñānasya ca tathā ca duḥkha hetoḥ heya vargasya abhāvāt na tad dhānāyānena ghaṭitavyam na ca avaṅghaṭamānaḥ  heyam hātum arhati saḥ  ayam vṛścika bhiyā palāyamānaḥ āśīviṣa mukheni patitaḥ secam āstika tvāya ātma astita upāsanīyā abhyarhita tā ca ātmanaḥ  atyanta duḥkha nivṛttau  upapadyate ayam eva ca asya upakāraḥ  yad ā ātyantika duḥkha śamanam sūkhādhāne tu asya tad anuṣaṅgi duḥkha ādhānāt apakāra prasaṅgāt  na hi jātu kaścid cetanaḥ sukham āpsyāmi iti madhu viṣa sampṛktam annam upabhuṅkte tasmāt nairātmya dṛṣṭiḥ prayatnena ucchettavyā prekṣāvata iti siddham aparam api saṃsāra hetu mithyā darśanam āha evam anātmani iti pṛcchati ki punar iti uttaram ahaṅkāra iti viśeṣam āha icchā ādi iti punar  pṛcchati katham punar iti uttaram śarīra iti upasaṃharati evam iti sāmānya dharmaḥ  ahaṅkāra āspada tvam viśeṣa dharma icchā ādi ādhāra tā tām khalu ayam śarīra ādiṣu āropya eta eva aham iti śarīra ādiṣu ātma bhāvam āropayati evam siddham kṛtvā viparyayam sarvam uktam saṃprati sandihānaḥ  viparyaya svarūpam pṛcchati kaḥ punar ayam viparyayaḥ parīkṣakāṇām vipratipatteḥ saṃśayaḥ kecid  su ākāra bāhyatva viṣayam jñānam viparyaya iti ācakṣate anye asāt viṣayam jñānam anye tu anirvacanīyam eva jñānam apare tu agrahaṇam evava anyathā ākhyāti tu vṛddhāḥ uttaram atasmiḥ tad iti pratyayaḥ idam atra ākūtam na tāvat  su ākāram rajata ādi bāhya tayā ālambante vibhramāḥ tathā hi jñāna ākāra tvam rajata ādeḥ anubhavāt  vyavasthāpyet  anumānāt  vā anubhavaḥ  api rajata pratyayaḥ vā svād bādhaka patyayaḥ vā na tāvat  rajata pratyayaḥ sa hi idam anahaṅkāra ākāra āspadam rajatam ādarśayati na ca antaram aham iti hi tadā syāt  pratipattuḥ pratyayāt avyatirekāt  bhrāntam hi jñānam su ākāram eva bāhya tā ālambate tathā ca anahaṅkāra āspadam asya viṣayaḥ  jñāna ākāraḥ  api jñāna ākāra tā punar asya bādhaka jñāna pravedanīyā iti ced  hanta cakṣuṣī nimīlya vaitālika pakṣa pātam parityajya ālocayatu āyuṣmān ki puras varti dravya ākāra tā mātram pratiṣedhati rajatasya āhosvit  jñāna ākāra tām api asya āt arśayati bādhaka pratyayaḥ tatra jñāna ākāra topadarśana vyāpāram bādhaka pratyayasya brūvāṇaḥ ślāghanīya prajñaḥ  devānāṃpriyaḥ puras vartitva niṣedhāt arthāt  jñāna ākāra tā siddhiḥ iti ced  tad niṣedhaḥ  vaṇij vīthī ādau  upalabdhasya rajatasya vyāvasthāpane hetuḥ āntara tvam tu asya anupalabdha caram kutastyam na ca anumānam atra prabhavati iti caturthenivedayiṣyate santu tarhi bādhaka pratyaya anurodhāt  asat prakāśana śīlā eva mithyā pratyayāḥ tathā hi bādhakam vijñānam na idam rajatam iti rajata jñāna gocarasya asattvam gṛhṇāti na ca asataḥ  viṣaya bhāvaḥ  na upapadyate na hi viṣaya tvam nāma kāraṇa tvam yena asati na syāt  kim tu sva kāraṇa dhīnaḥ sāmarthya atiśayaḥ sa tādṛśaḥ  jñānasya yena santam iva asantam api gocarayati na ca viṣaya sāmarthyam atra upayujyate jñānasya sāmarthyāt eva tad bhāva siddheḥ ata eva asat prakāśana sāmarthyam eva mithyājñānānām avidyā tvam anirvacanīyam kecid āsthiṣata atra idam ālocanīyam kim etad  mithyājñānam asat  sat ātmanā gṛhṇāti iti asat viṣayam upeyate āhosvit  sat eva sat antarātmanā gahṇāti sataḥ ca sat antarātma tvena asattvāt asat viṣayam ucyate na tāvat  pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ rajata ātmanā ced  asat ālambeta na satī śuktikām katham punar asau rajātarthaḥ  śuktau pravartate na punā rajata abhāve kaskāt ca idam iti puras varti dravyam aṅgulyā nirdiśya tasya rajata tvam niṣedhati na idam rajatam iti yadi tatra na prasañjitam rajata tvam pūrva vijñānena atha śuktiḥ eva rajata ātmanā asatī iti tad ākāratayā tām ālambamānam mithyājñānam asat ālambanam ucyate tatra anujñayā vartāmahe na khalu anyathā khyāti vādinaḥ  api sat antaram sat antarātmanā sat abhyupagacchanti tathā sati anyathā iti eva na syāt  yathā āhuḥ anyathā khyāti vādinaḥ tasmāt  yad anyathā santam anyathā pratipadyate tad nirālambanam jñānam abhāva ālambana ca tad  ślaḥ  vā nirālambana vāde iti na ca rajata ātmanā puras vartinaḥ  dravyasya anirvacanīya tā mithyājñāna samaye sattvena bādhaka samaye ca asattvena nirvacanīya tvāt  na ca evaṃbhūtasya asataḥ prathā na upapadyate tasya sat asadbhyām upākhyeya tvāt yaḥ punar  advaita vādinā prapajcaḥ  vaināśikānām vā sāmānya ādiḥ na u bahis  ki tu alīkam tad viṣayam ca jñānam mithyājñānam iti api na saṃbhavati tasya sarva upākhyā rahitasya kenacid  sārūpya abhāvāt tad kāraṇaka tvāt ca bhrānteḥ kāraṇa abhāve kārya abhāvasya sulabha tvāt  tasmāt  prapañcaḥ ca sāmānya ādi ca vastu satī nāmam īcīna vijñāna gocarau tabda adhakam ca upariṣṭāt apākariṣyate tasmāt na anivacanīya khyātiḥ api syāt etata anyat anyathā prakāśata iti saṃvid viruddham na tāvat  sadbhāva mātreṇa ālambana tvam tanmātrasya sarva pratyaya sādhāraṇyena sarve arthāḥ sa var pratyaya viṣayā iti savarsarvajña tā āpattiḥ na ca kāraṇa tvena ālambana tvam rūpa ādi vijñānānām rūpa ādivat cakṣuḥ ādi api kāraṇam iti cakṣuḥ ādi ālambanatva prasaṅgāt  atīta anāgata viṣaya tvam ca vijñānasya na syāt  atīta anāgatayoḥ asattvena akāraṇa tvāt  tasmāt  pratibhāsamānam ālambanam tathā ca rajata pratibhāsaḥ śuktikā ālambanam iti durghaṭam api ca cakṣuḥ ādīnām samīcīna jñāna upajanana sāmarthyam iti katham ebhyaḥ  mithyājñānam bhavitum arhati na hi śyāmāka bījam parikarma sahasreṇa api kalama aṅkurāya kalpate doṣa sahāyā loca nādayaḥ  mithyā pratyayam ādadhata iti ced  na doṣā hi kāraṇānām sāmarthya nighnanti na punar  kārya antara upajanana sāmarthyam ādadhati na khalu bhṛṣṭam kuṭaja bījam nyagrodha dhānāyai kalpate kim tu na karoti kuṭaja dhānām api ca sva gocare vyabhicāre vijñānānām sarva tra anāśvāsa prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt  sarvam eva vijñānam samīcīnam āstheyam tathā hi rajatam idam iti dve jñāne smṛti anubhava rūpe tatra idam iti puras varti dravya mātra grahaṇam doṣa vaśāt  tad gatasya śuktikātva sāmānya viśeṣasya agrahaṇāt  tāvat mātram ca gṛhītam sadṛśa tayā saṃskāra udbodha krameṇa rajate smṛti janayati sā ca gṛhīta grahaṇa svabhāvā api doṣa vaśāt  gṛhīta tā aṃśa pramoṣeṇa grahaṇa mātram avatiṣṭhate tathā ca rajata smṛteḥ puras varti mātra grahaṇasya va mithas  sva rūpataḥ ca viṣayataḥ ca bheda agrahaṇāt  sannihita rajata viṣaya vijñāna sārūpyeṇa idam rajatam iti bhinne api grahaṇa smaraṇe abheda vyavahāram sāmānādhikaraṇya vyapadeśam ca pravartayataḥ kvacid  punar grahaṇe eva mithas  agṛhīta prabhede yathā pītaḥ śaṅkha iti atra hi viniryat nayana raśmi vartinaḥ pitta dravyasya kāyasya iva ati svacchasya pītattvam ca gṛhyate pittam tu gṛhyate śaṅkhaḥ  api doṣa vaśāt  guṇa rahitaḥ sva rūpa mātreṇa gṛhyate tad anayoḥ guṇa guṇinoḥ asaṃsarga āgrahāt  sārūpyāt  pīta cira bilva phala pratyaya aviśeṣeṇa abheda vyavahāraḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya vyapadeśaḥ ca bheda āgraha prasañjita abheda vyavahāra bādhānāt ca na idam rajatam iti viveka pratyayasya bādhakattvam api upapadyate tad upapattau ca bhrānta tvam api loka prasiddham siddhra bhavati tasmāt  yathārthāḥ sarve api bhramāḥ pratyaya tvāt  paṭa pratyaya tvayavat iti prāptam evam prāpte abhidhīyate asti tāvat  rajata arthinaḥ  rajatam iti jñāne sati puras varti dravya pravṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya vyapadeśaḥ ca iti sarva janīnam tad  kim grahaṇa smaraṇayoḥ tad gocarayoḥ ca bheda agrahād bhavatu āhosvit abheda grahāt na tāvat cetanaḥ  ajñānāt  pravartate api tu jñānāt  purovarti vastu grahaṇa rajata jñānāt agṛhīta bhedam svarūpataḥ  viṣayataḥ  vā rajata arthinam puras varti dravye pravartayati iti ced  hanta bhoḥ kim etāvatā purovarti vastu gocaram jñānam rajata gocaram bhavati āhosvit  tanmātra gocaram eva yadi rajata gocaram puras varti rajata tayā agṛhṇāt  katham na anyathā ākhyātiḥ atha tanmātra gocaram kaḥ  bheda agrahasya upayogaḥ na hi vṛkṣa mātra darśanam niścayena śiṃśapā arthinam pravartayati na hi tatra śiṃśapā jñānam asti asti tu iha rajata vijñānam agṛhīta bhedam idam iti jñānena iti ced  nanu rajata vijñānam puras vartini dravye na vartate purovarti jñānam ca na rajata iti tatra puras varti dravya mātra arthaḥ  puras vartini pravarteta na rajata arthaḥ  evam rajata arthaḥ  yatra kvacana pravarteta na niyamena puras vartina dravye na hi tatra tena rajata tvam avagatami iti atha idam rajatam iti dve jñāne bheda agrahādidam rajatam iti eka jñāna sadṛśe tena tad ucitam vyavahāram pravartayataḥ yadi evam tad rajatam iyam śuktiḥ iti bheda avabhāsi vijñāna vyavahāram api kasmāt na pravartayataḥ yathā eva hi bheda agrahāda bhinna vijñāna sādṛśyam evam abheda āgrahād bhinna vijñāna sādṛśyam api saḥ  ayam ubhayatas  bheda abheda graha sārūpyāt  pravṛtti nivṛttibhyām yugapad ākṛṣyamāṇaḥ pratipattā kaṣṭām daśām āveśitaḥ prajñā śālibhiḥ ati vyākhyayā syāt etad  viparyaya jñāna utpāde api śukti rajatayoḥ bheda agrahe asya vyāpāra āstheyaḥ anyathā gṛhīta bhedānām api viparyaya utpāda prasaṅgāt  tathā ca śakyam tatra api vaktum yathā bheda grahāt  viparyaya jñāna utpāda evam abheda āgrahāt  kasmāt na samīcīna jñāna utpāda iti tatra yaḥ tava parihāraḥ saḥ  asmākam vyavahāra vyapadeśayoḥ bhaviṣyati iti yathā āhuḥ akhyāti vādinaḥ yeṣām api viparīta khyātiḥ teṣām api ajñāna vāsana nibandhanaḥ  bhrama iti mā evam jñāna hetūnām ajñāta rūpa kārya saṃbandhānā cukṣuḥ ādīnām darśanāt  cetana vyavahārāṇām tu abuddhi pūrvakāṇām pratīteḥ buddhi pūrvaka tve tu viveka agraha upayujyate na vyavahāra vyapadeśayoḥ iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ yadi aviveka grahaḥ  api tad paripanthī vidyata iti kutaḥ anyatara nibandhanaḥ  vyavahāraḥ tasmāt  samāropa eva bheda agraha iti tad  siddham etad vivāda adhyāsitam rajatāt iva jñānam purovarti vastu viṣayam rajata arthinaḥ tatra niyamena pravartaka tvāt  yad  yad arthina niyamena yatra pravarpayati tad vijñānam tad viṣayam yathā ubhaya siddham samīcīna rajata vijñānam tathā ca etad  tasmāt  yathā yad ca uktam anavabhāsam āmā śuktiḥ anālambanam iti tatra kim śuktikātvasya rajatam iti jñānam pratyanālambana tvam sādhyate āhosvit  dravya mātrasya sita bhāsvarasya puras vartinaḥ tatra pūrvasmin kalpe siddha sādhanam uttarasmin  anavabhāsanam asiddham idam iti puras vartinaḥ  dravyasya aṅgulyā nirdeśāt  dṛṣṭam ca duṣṭānām api kāraṇānām autsargika kārya pratibandhena kārya antara utpādaka tvam tad  yathā vetra bījānām dāva agni dagdhānām kadalī prakāṇḍa janaka tvam bhasmaka duṣṭasya ca audaryasya tejasaḥ  bahutara anna pāna pācaka tvam na idam rajatam iti ca pratyakṣa bādhaka pratyayāt apahṛta viṣayam pratyaya tvena vibhramāṇām yathārthatva anumānam na udetum arhati yathā ca pramāṇa ābhāsa vyabhicāre api pramāṇe āśvāsaḥ tathā pramāṇataḥ  artha pratipattau iti atra upapāditam diś mātram atra darśitam prapañcaḥ tu tattva samīkṣāyām asmābhiḥ kṛta iti uparamyate tad evam ātmani mithyājñānam vyākhyāya śarīra ādiṣu ekādaśasu mithyājñānam bhāṣya eva darśitam tad tu spaṣṭa tvāt  asmābhiḥ na vyutpāditam iti āśa yavān āha śeṣam iti tatra śarīra ādiṣu manaḥ paryanteṣu yathāyogam mithyājñānam duḥkhe sukham ityādinā apratihātavyam iti antena bhāṣyeṇa uktam pravṛtti ādiṣu śṛṅga grāhikayā uktam pravṛttau ityādinā rocayet  iti antena bhāṣyeṇa evam mithyājñānasya svarūpam darśayitvā mithyājñāna doṣa pravṛttita janma duḥkhānām kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ  doṣa ādīnām svarūpam ca uktam etasmāt  ityādinā tāpa iti antena bhāṣyeṇa saṃprati mithyājñāna ādi ucchedāt apavarga iti vakṣyati tad ca ayuktam sati api tad ucchede saṃsāra tādavasthyāt  na hyānya ucchede anyasya ucchedaḥ tathā ca na apavarga iti vakṣyamāṇam artham upapādayitum aktam bhāṣya kṛtā ta hame mithyājñāna ādaya ityādi tad  vārttikakāraḥ  vyācaṣṭa ta hame duḥkha ādaya iti bhāṣya kāra ukta kramāt  viparīta krama abhidhānam vārttika kṛtaḥ evam sūtra kāra ukta kramāt  viparīta krama abhidhānam bhāṣya kṛtaḥ tad  duḥkha ādīnām mithyājñāna pūrvaka tvena mithyājñānasya duḥkha ādi pūrvaka tvena anādi tvam darśayitum pṛcchati kaḥ punar iti yadi eta eva saṃsāraḥ tarhi sūtra kāraḥ prameya sūtre kasmāt  duḥkha ādibhyaḥ pṛthak  pretyabhāvam saṃsāra apara nāmānam upādatte tasmāt ebhyaḥ  anya eva saṃsāra iti bhāvaḥ uttaram duḥkha ādīnām iti na eṣām svarūpam api tu kārya kāraṇa bhāva iti arthaḥ krama vyatikramatātparyam āha sa ca anādiḥ iti atra hetum āha pūrva apara iti duḥkha janma pravṛtti doṣāḥ viṣaya tvena tāvat mithyā jñānasya kāraṇam evam asati janmani mithyājñānasya anutpattara viṣayaḥ  api janma mithyājñānasya kāraṇam evam vinā pravṛttim janma abhāvāt  janma dvādeṇa pravṛtteḥ api mithyājñāna kāraṇa tvam pravṛtti dvāreṇa ca doṣāṇām tathā mithyājñānāt  deṣāḥ doṣebhyaḥ pravṛttiḥ pravṛtteḥ janma janmanaḥ  duḥkham yadi api pravṛttiḥ eva sākṣā duḥkha hetuḥ tathā api anāyatanasya tasya anutpatteḥ antarā janma karoti atha sā eva duḥkham iti anādi tvāt ca na anyonya āśrayam cakrakam vā bīja aṅkura santānayoḥ iva iti saṃpratibīja apāya iva tad jānyā aṅkura pravāha nivṛttiḥ mithyājñāna apāye tad janya doṣa pravṛtti janma duḥkha mithyā jñāna ādi pravāha nivṛttiḥ kāraṇa nivṛttau kārya nivṛtteḥ iti kathana param bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ākṣipati yadā tu tattva jñānāt iti apāyaḥ api tattva jñānāt mithyājñānasya svarūpataḥ  vā viṣayataḥ  vā phalataḥ vā syāt  na tāvat  svarūpataḥ tasya aśutara vināśinaḥ saṃskārāt  vā jñāna antarāt  vā apāyasya tattva jñāna sādhāraṇyena tasya api bādhyatva prasaṅgāt  na api viṣayataḥ na hi śuktikā jñānam rajata jñānasya rajata viṣaya tām apahartum utsahate jātam hi tad  rajatam viṣayīkṛtya yathā āhuḥ gṛhītvā artham gatāḥ caurāḥ kastānāt chettum arhati iti na api phalam apaharati upadarśitaḥ  hi tena arthaḥ pravartitaḥ ca tatra puyaṣaḥ tad idam uktam katham apāya iti uttaram samāna viṣaya iti yasmin  eva hi puras vartini dravye pūrveṇa rajata tvam āsañjitam tatra eva uttaram tad viruddham śuktikā tvam dharmam upanayati tathā ca pūrvasya vijñānasya mithyātvam ādarśayat tad janitām pravṛttim vighaṭayat  phalam asya apaharati iti bhāvaḥ na tu samāna viṣaya tā mātreṇa virodhaḥ mā bhūt ekasmin  ātmani nityatva vibhutva jñānayoḥ virodha iti ata āha yasmāt iti tatva mithyātva kathanena mithas  viruddha dharma prasa janam sūcayati nityatva vibhutva jñānayoḥ tu samāna viṣayayoḥ api aviruddha dharma upasthāpaka tayā tattva jñāna tvāt iti arthaḥ kasmāt  virodha iti ata āha vastuna iti paraspara abhāva dharmiṇoḥ ekatra samavāye na idam svābhāvikam nānā tvam kvacid api iti advaita prasaṅga  iti bhāvaḥ upasaṃharati tasmāt iti atra deśayati katham punar iti prathamam utpannam mithyājñānam anupajāta virodhi tena apahṛta viṣayam paśr vāttanam tattva jñānam udetum eva na utsahate prāk eva tu mithyājñānam bādhitum iti bhāvaḥ uttaram mithyājñānasya iti tatra hi prathamam upajātena anupajāta virodhinā jñānena uttaram bādhyate yatra pūrva apekṣam uttaram upajāyate tad  khalu pūrva virodhe na jāyeta ajātam sat  katham pūrvam bādheta yathā pratyakṣa ādi viruddham anumānam iha tu dve api jñānedoṣa upahata anupahata indriya artha sannikarṣa janmanī parasparānapekṣe tatra pūrvam anupajāta virodhi tvāt  ki bādhatām anāgatasya aprāpta tvena bādhitum aśakyatvāt  sva kāraṇa balāt āsādyamāna janmanaḥ ca utpatti virodhasya ca aśakyā tvāt  tad evam utpannam uttaram upajāta virodhitayā pūrva bādha ātmakam sannān upakṛdya pūrvam utpattum arhati iti bādhate tad tu na pūrveṇa na api anyena kenacid iti bhāvati artha sahāyam artha asahāyam ca mithyājñānam tad anena bādhyatva abādhya tve mithyājñāna tattva jñānayoru upalakṣyete tad idam anyaiḥ api uktam pūrvāt  para balīyaḥ tvam tatra nāma pratīyatām anyonya nirapekṣāṇām yatra janma dhiyām bhavet  iti tathā ca anupajāta virodhi tvam atra bādhya tve hetuḥ upajāta virodhi tvam ca bādhakatva iti yad upalakṣaṇa artham sa sahāyatva abhidhānam tad jijñāsuḥ pṛcchati kasmāt  uttaram tayā tvena iti anena abādhya tvam tattva jñānasya uktam iti na kevalam abādhya tvam dṛḍha mūla tvam api tattva jñānasya iti āha pramāṇa antara anugrahāt ca antara śabdaḥ  viśeṣa vacanaḥ ātma ādi tattva jñānam hi phalam pramāṇa viśeṣaiḥ āgama anumāna pratyakṣaiḥ anugṛhyate tasmāt  dṛḍha mūla tvāt  tad api tattva jñānam mithyājñānam nivartayati iti arthaḥ etad eva vibhajate āgama iti etad eva sphorayati yadā hi iti āgama mayena hi jñānena prameyam gṛhītvā śāstrīyeṇa ca nyāya vijñānena anumāna apara nāmnā vyavasthāpya bhāvayataḥ  yad ā ātma manaḥ sannikarṣāt  yoga ja dharma sahāyāt utpadyate tattva viṣayaḥ sākṣātkāraḥ pratyakṣa phalam tatra trayāṇām api pramāṇānām pratisandhānam asti iti dṛḍha mūla tvāt  tena mithyājñānam bādhyate viṣayam bhāvayati iti vyācaṣṭa samāhita iti samāhita tvena cetasaḥ  dhāraṇām darśayati ananya manā iti pratyāhāram cetasaḥ tattva viṣaya buddhi dhārā vipacyamāna tvam dhyānasya tattva jñānasya sphuṭa ābhatva ārambha avasthā dhyāna janita bhāvanā saṃskāraḥ  dhyāna bhāvanā tasyāḥ  vivekaḥ  mithya jñāna vāsanāyāḥ pūrvam hi mithyājñāna vāsanā tattva jñāna vāsanāyāḥ  balavatī āsīt  atha abhyāsa vaśāt  tulya balā bhavat atha iyam eva balīyasī tattva jñāna vāsanā saṃbhinnā mithyājñāna vāsanayā saha anuvartate saṃprati tu tattva jñāna vāsanayā atyanta balīyasya sa mūla kāṣam kaṣita tvāt  mithyājñāna vāsanāyā bhavati viviktā tattva jñāna vāsanā tasyām iti arthaḥ nanu anena krameṇa nivartatām mithyājñānam nivṛttam tam tattva sākṣātkāra samaye api kasmāt  punar  sva vāsanā vaśāt na jāyate na khalu mithyājñāna vāsanā anādi kāla pravṛttā ādimatā tattva jñānena tad saṃskāreṇa vā śakyā nivartayitum iti ata āha nivṛtte ca iti tāvat eva puṃsām buddhayaḥ  asthirā bhrāmyanti sva ucitam ca saṃskāra jātam ātanvate na yāvat  bhūtam artham sākṣātkurvanti atha sākṣātkṛtya tatra sthira padā bhavanti kṣiṇvanti ca sa vāsanān mithyā pratyayān bhūta arthaṃpakṣa pātaḥ  hi buddheḥ svabhāvaḥ yad āhuḥ bāhyā api nirūpa plava bhūta artha svabhāvasya viparyayaiḥ na bādhaḥ  yatnavat tve api buddheḥ tad pakṣa pātatas pra vā iti tasmāt  mithyājñānasya na punar u utpāda iti uktam eva artham smṛti dāḍhrayāya pṛcchati kaḥ punar iti uktam smārayitum uttaram saha iti bhavatu mithyājñānasya nivṛttiḥ sa vāsanasya tatas  api kim iti ata āha mithyājñāna iti atra pṛcchati ye tāvat iti uttaram teṣām api iti vairāgya svarūpam pṛcchati ki punar iti rāga abhāvaḥ  hi vairāgyam na ca tasmāt eva rāga ādīnām abhāva iti bhāvaḥ uttaram bhoga anabhiṣvaṅga lakṣaṇam iti uktam viṣaya doṣa paribhāvanā paripākāt  khalu viṣaya parityāga icchā bhavati tayā virodhi guṇena viṣaya tṛṣṇā ca tad paripanthini vidveṣaḥ ca tad adhikaraṇa aśrva īrṣyādayaḥ  nivartante asaktiḥ viṣaya parityāga icchā vaśitayā ca svayam upanateṣu viṣayeṣu mādhyasthya darśanam doṣa abhāve kim bhavati iti ata āha doṣa abhāva iti pṛcchati kā punar iyam iti yadi hi janmanaḥ pravṛttiḥ kāraṇam syāt  tatas  janma nivṛttyai tad nivṛttiḥ arthyeta na punar asau kṣaṇikā sataḥ  āmuṣmikāya janmane kalpate atas  kimartham nivartyata iti bhāvaḥ vidita abhiprāya uttaram āha dharma adharmaḥ  kasmāt  punar ūpa cāra iti ata āha janma sādhana tvāt  etad vibhajate na asmin  iti upacāre prayojanam darśayitvā nimittam āha dharma adharmayoḥ tu iti vartamāna anāgatayoḥ aviśeṣeṇa doṣa apāyāt nivṛttiḥ ūkta iti bhrāntyā deśayati yau tāvat anāgatau  iti pariharati na anāgatayoḥ iti anāgata abhiprāyam etad iti arthaḥ yadi evam vartamānayoḥ kutas  prakṣaya iti ata āha vartamānayoḥ iti astu pravṛtteḥ abhāvaḥ tatas  kim iti ata āha pravṛtti abhāva iti uktam vivekam iha api yojayati atra api iti vartamāna nivṛtti hetu pṛcchati atha iti uttaram saṃskāra iti śrutiḥ tāvat eva asya ciram yāvat na vimokṣye atha saṃpatsye chān dogya iti kim janma abhāve sidhyati iti ata āha janma abhāva iti atra eva vṛddha saṃmatim āha etad ca tad āhuḥ iti tad etad ca iti yojanā prāṇanasya kāla bheda avaccheda āyuḥ syāt etad  mahāpralaye api mithyājñāna ādinā duḥkhāntena asti viyoga iti atra api mukti prasaṅga iti ata āha saḥ  ayam mithyājñāna ādinā iti sarvata iti tṛtīya arthe tasiḥ sarveṇa iti na ca pralaya avasthāyām sarveṇa viyogaḥ karma avidyā vāsanayoḥ ana vināśāt muktau tu tayoḥ api vināśaḥ karma vāsanā ca sarva kāryāṇām utpādikā avasthāpikā ca tad nivṛttau śarīra ādivat  tattva jñāna saṃskārasya api pralaya iti aśeṣa viśeṣa guṇa vimuktaḥ  mukta iti ucyata iti saddhim stād etad  tattva jñānāt mithyā jñāna apāya iti uktam kim punar tattva jñānam iti ata uktam bhāṣya kṛtā tattva jñānu tu iti tad anubhāṣya sarveṣām jñānānām bhāṣya uktānām anugatam ekam svarūpataḥ tu iti codayati kasmāt iti naḥ khlvayam prekṣāvatām samācāraḥ  yad  duḥkha bhiyā sukha parityāga iti api tu sukham duḥkhāt  vivicya upādadate duḥkham ca varjayanti na hi mṛgāḥ santi iti śālayaḥ  na upyante bhikṣukāḥ santi iti sthālyaḥ  na adhiśrīyanta iti uttaram viveka hānasya iti yadi api sukha duḥkhe bhinne tathā api anityatva kṛtaka tvavat  paraspara anuṣakte iti na khalu sukhasya kevalasya upādānam duḥkhasya vā kevalasya parivarjanam śakyam iti arthaḥ kaḥ punar ayam anuṣaṅgaḥ  yatas  viveka hānam aśakyam iti ata āha anuṣaṅgaḥ  adhinābhāvaḥ tad svarūpam āha yatra ekam sukham vā duḥkham vā tatra itarat  duḥkham vā sukham vā tad anena anityatva kṛtaka tvayoḥ iva sukha duḥkhayoḥ avinā abhāvaḥ  darśitaḥ na ca avinā abhāvaḥ  vinā saṃbandhāt iti tad siddhaye saṃbandha vikalpān āha samāna nimitta tā vā anuṣaṅgaḥ  avinābhāvaḥ vā śabdaḥ ca vakṣyamāṇa saṃbandha antara apekṣayā na tu pūrva apekṣayā atra ca śarīra ādi apekṣayā samāna nimitta tā na tu dharma adharma apekṣayā na tu pūrva apekṣayā atra ca śarīra ādi apekṣayā samāna nimitta tā na tu dharma adharma apekṣayā tayoḥ asādhāraṇyāt iti mantavyam tayoḥ avinā abhā  siddhi artham saṃbandha antaram āha samāna ādhāra tā vā aparam saṃbandha antaram āha samāna ādhāra tā vā aparam saṃbandha antaram āha samāna upalabhyatā vā manaḥ gocara tvam ubhayoḥ tatas ca siddhaḥ  anavinā abhāva apara nāmā anuṣaṅga iti yatra ekam tatra itarat iti vā yatra yasmin nimitte sati iti vā yatra ādhāra iti vā yatra upalabdhi sādhane sati iti vyākhyeyam itiḥ sūtra samāptim sūcayati tad evam pramāṇa ādi padārtha tattva jñānasya niḥśreyasa saṃbandha uktaḥ parīkṣitaḥ ca tatra etad  syāt  sva padebhyaḥ pramāṇa ādayaḥ padārthāḥ tattvataḥ  jñātā yathāyatham mithyājñāna ādi nivṛtti krameṇa apavarge upayokṣyante kṛtam uparitanena prabandhena iti ata uktam bhāṣya kṛtā trivadhā ca asya iti na nāmadheya mātrāt pramāṇa ādīnām tattva jñānam bhavati api tu lakṣaṇa parīkṣaṇābhyām iti asti prabandhasya uttarasya upayoga iti bhāṣya arthaḥ tad etad bhāṣyam anubhāṣya pṛcchati pravṛtteḥ iti yadi puruṣa kalpanā mātrāt  traividhyam atha ānantyam eva kasmāt na bhavati sarvatra tasya sulabha tvāt iti bhāvaḥ uttaram arthasya tathā abhāvāt arthasya prayojanasya sākṣāt  śāstra kāryasya tattva jñāna lakṣaṇasya tathā eva trividhayā eva śāstra pravṛttyā bhāvāt  tathā hi lakṣaṇam nāma vyatireki hetu vacanam tad hi samāna asamāna jātīyebhyaḥ  vyavacchidya lakṣyam vyavasthāpayati na ca asya dharmi darśanam antareṇa pakṣa dharma tā sidhyati iti tad upadarśanāya nāmadheya mātreṇa dharmiṇām uddeśaḥ yadi api ca pratilakṣaṇam uddiṣṭā eva dharmiṇaḥ tathā api śāstra abhisaṃbandha parāt api vākyāt  samadhigamyanta iti uddeśaḥ  api uktaḥ na ca aparīkṣitaḥ  hetuḥ vyatirekī catū rūpaḥ  bhavati iti parīkṣā api avaśyam kartavyā tasmāt  tattva jñānasya arthasya tathā abhāvāt traividhyam iti tad etad  vibhajate nāmī padārthā iti kim tu iti arthaḥ tattva jñānam tathābhūtam yena arthena hetunā śāstrasya pravṛttiḥ tredhā bhavati uddeśa svarūpa pratipādana param bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ākṣipati nāmadheyena iti pariharati mātra grahaṇa sāmarthyāt iti yadi api pramāṇaṇa ādi śabdā api kāraka śabdā eva tathā api uddeśa samaye tad arthānām sat api kāraka tvam avivakṣitam api tu prātipadikā artha mātram ghrāṇa ādi sūtre tu lakṣaṇa pare kāraka tvam vivakṣitam anyathā lakṣaṇatva ayogāt iti adoṣaḥ atra ca yadi api sūtrakāreṇa saṃśaya pramāṇa prameyeṣu parīkṣā sākṣāt  kṛtā na prayojana ādiṣu tathā api tad karaṇāt eva prayojana ādi parīkṣā api sūcitā sūtrakāreṇa iti trividhā iti uktam ata eva bhāṣya kāraḥ sarvatra parīkṣām anvavartayat iti syāt etad  vibhāga param etad  sūtram iti vakṣyati na ca vibhāgaḥ  nyūna adhika saṃkhyā vyavaccheda artham ekam kiñcid upasaṃgrāhakam antareṇa na ca pramāṇa tvāt anyat atra upasaṃgrāhakam na cedam alakṣitam upasaṃgṛhṇāti na ca etad  sūtram asya lakṣaṇam vibhāga paratvāt iti śaṅkā nirākaraṇa param bhāṣyam tatra uddiṣṭasya iti tasya arthaḥ yadi api vibhāga param etad  sūtram tathā api pramāṇa pada samabhivyāhṛtam sat  sāmarthyāt  pramāṇa tvam api lakṣayati iti tathā hi pramīyate anena iti asya vākyasya arthe pramāṇa pada prayogaḥ pramā ca smṛteḥ anyaḥ artha avyabhicārī svatantraḥ paricchedaḥ tasmāt  vibhāga parāt api sūtrāt  pratīyamānam pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇam apekṣitam saṃgṛhītam iti pramāṇatva upagṛhītānām pratyakṣa ādīnām pramāṇānām yuktaḥ  vibhāgaḥ tathā ca vibhāga paratvena sākṣāt  sāmānya lakṣaṇānabhidhānāt  vibhaktasya lakṣaṇam ucyata iti uktam tad ca iha viśeṣa lakṣaṇam indriya artha sannikarṣa ityādi tad etad  bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe uddiṣṭasya iti lakṣaṇa alakṣaṇa mātra vivakṣayā lakṣitasya alakṣitasya iti uktam tad ca chale sāmānyatas  pramāṇeṣu prameyeṣu ca viśeṣata iti gamayitavyam atra bhāṣyam atha uddiṣṭasya vibhāga vacanam iti tasya artha  ucyate anena iti vacanam sūtram vibhāgasya atha iti trividha pravṛtti vyutpādana anantaram viviktānām pratipādanam vibhāga vacanam na ca vivekaḥ svarūpa upayujyata iti ata āha atha uddiṣṭa vibhāga dvāreṇa iti na atra vibhāga mātram vivakṣitam api tu tad dvāreṇa nyuna adhika saṃkhyā vyavacchedaḥ tattva jñāna aṅgam iti arthaḥ avyākhyāne hetum āha sūtra iti codayati uddiṣṭasya vibhāga ānarthakyam vyāghātāt  trividhā ca asya śāstrasya pravṛttiḥ iti asya ānarthakyam anartham artha viparyayam kāyati kīrtayati iti anarthakaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam kasmāt  vyāghātāt  vyāghātam eva sphorayati trividhā ca asya śāstryasya iti pariharati na uddiṣṭa iti parasparam vibhaktā nāmadheya mātreṇa uddiśyanta iti uddeśa intarbhāvaḥ tena ayam arthaḥ  bhavati sāmānyena uddiṣṭasya vibhāga vacanam viśeṣeṇa uddeśa iti vibhāga prayojanam pṛcchati kim punar iti uttaram niyamaḥ tad vibhajate yadi iti punar codayati lakṣaṇata iti pramāṇa lakṣaṇa karaṇa pravṛttaḥ  yad  catvāri eva lakṣayati tad avagamyate na nyūnāni adhikāni vā pramāṇani iti arthaḥ pariharati lakṣaṇasya iti ākṣepam vibhajte syāt eṣa iti parihāram vibhajate na lakṣaṇasya iti anya param api vākyam tad eva artha labhyam svīkaroti na ca pratyakṣa ādīnām samāna asamāna jātīyasya vyavacchede pañcamī ādi abhāva upayujyate lakṣaṇa karaṇa pravṛttasya kvacid akaraṇam na tad abhāve pramāṇam sataḥ  api anupayogena akaraṇa āpatteḥ tad etad āha anya asaṃbhavasya iti vibhāga uddeśasya punar ananya para tvāt anya ābhāvi niścayaḥ  bhavati iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti akṣasya akṣasya iti bhāṣyam anubhāṣya tātparyam āha ayam ca sūtra vivakṣāyām iti akṣam akṣam prati vartata iti vigṛhya avyayībhāve kṛte sarva indriya avarodhaḥ  bhavati nanu yadiḥ  idṛśaḥ  vigrahaḥ kasmāt  punar bhāṣya kāreṇa akṣasya akṣasya iti vigṛhyata iti ata āha anyathā tu vastu nirdeśa iti artha mātram anena pratipādyate na punar  samāsa iti arthaḥ atha kasmāt  samāsa eva tena vigraheṇa na pratipādyata iti ata āha samāse hi akṣasya iti ṣaṣṭhī na śrūyeta iti yadi sūtra gatasya pratyakṣa padasya avyayībhāvaḥ samāsaḥ anyatra punar asya kaḥ samāsa iti pṛcchati kaḥ punar iti uttaram prādisamāsa iti tathā hi prāpta āpanna alaṃpūrva gati samāseṣu paravat liṅga tā pratiṣedhāt abhidhaya liṅga upādānāt  pratyakṣaḥ  arthaḥ pratyakṣa abuddhiḥ pratyakṣam jñānam iti abhidheya liṅga tā siddhā bhavati kvacid  pāṭhaḥ samāse hi pratyakṣasya iti ṣaṣṭhī na śrūyeta iti sūtra vivakṣayā avyayībhāva iti uktam tatra śaṅkate kasmāt  punar  sūtra vivakṣayā iti ucyate yāvatā sarvatra eva kasmāt avyayībhāvaḥ  na bhavati iti tatra idam upatiṣṭhate samāse hi avyayībhāva samāse hi sarvatra pratyakṣasya iti ṣaṣṭhī na śrūyeta iti vyutpatti nimitta mātram ca idam pratyakṣa śabdasya na tu pravṛtti nimittam tasmāt  na indriya gataiḥ guṇa sāmānya ādibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ pravṛtti hetuḥ tu artha sākṣāt kāri jñāna janaka tvam tad nimittaḥ khalu ayam pratyakṣa śabdaḥ tatra tatra laukika parīkṣakaiḥ prayujyate yathā mayūra śabdaḥ  mayūratva sāmānya nibandhanaḥ kāsucid eva patatri vyaktiṣu vartamānaḥ mahyām rauti iti anvākhyāyate tad idam pratyakṣam uddhiṣṭam api sat  pramāṇa tad ābhāsa saṃkīrṇam iti tad vivekāya lakṣaṇam upayujyate yadi tu uddeśa padam tad vivecayet kṛtam tarhi lakṣaṇa praṇayanena vigraha vākya gatā ca vṛttiḥ bhāṣya kṛtā vyākhyātā vṛttiḥ tu sannikarṣaḥ  jñānam vā vṛttiḥ iti hi vyāpāraḥ sa tu vyāpāra ucyate yaḥ kārakaiḥ phale janayitavye cāram abhāvī dharma bhedaḥ phala utpāda anukūlaḥ  apekṣyate yathā paṭe janayitavye tantubhiḥ carama bhāvinaḥ saṃyoga bhedāḥ svarge vā janayitavye yāgena apūrvam ātma dharmaḥ tathā iha api indriya ādinā pramāṇena pramāyām phale pravṛttena tad utpādana anukūlaḥ sannikarṣaḥ  jñānam vā caramabhāvī dharma bhedaḥ  apekṣyata iti bhavati vyāpāraḥ sa eva vṛttiḥ iti ākhyāyate vyavasthām darśayati yadā sannikarṣaḥ  vyāpāra indriya ādeḥ pramāṇasya tadā jñānam ālocanam vā sa vikalpakam vā sākṣātkāravat vijñānam pramitiḥ phalam ubhayasya api indriya vyāpārāt sannikarṣa aparabhidhāna anutpatteḥ na ca antarālikena nirvikalpakena indriya vyāpāra viccheda iti pratyakṣa vyākhyāna avasare nivedayiṣyate yadā jñānam ālocanam vā vikalpaḥ  vā vyāpāra indriya ādīnām tadā hāna upādāna upekṣā buddhayaḥ phalam tatra upādeyam idam salilam iti buddhiḥ anāgata upādāna viśiṣṭam salilam ālambamānā na sākṣātkāravatī salila mātra sākṣāt kāraḥ tu syāt  na ca tanmātram asya phalam api tu upādeya tā sā ca parokṣā anāgata tvāt  tasmāt upādīyate anena iti upādānam upādānam ca asau buddhiḥ ca iti upādāna buddhiḥ tatra toya ālocanam atha toya vikaltaḥ atha tad jātīyasya dṛṣṭa cara pipāsā upaśamana hetu bhāvasya smṛti bīja saṃskāra udbodhaḥ atha tasya smaraṇam atha liṅga parāmarśaḥ tad jātīyam ca idam iti tad idam liṅga parāmarśa vijñānam sākṣātkāravat  liṅge vinaśyat avastha vya āpti smaraṇa sahakāri dṛśyamānasya salilasya pipāsā upaśamana hetu tayā anumāna mukhena upādāna buddhiḥ ūcyate anumāya khalu ayam tathā abhāvam tad upāditsarn ihamānaḥ tad upādatte na ca vyāpti smṛti vicchinnam ālocanam vā vikalpaḥ  vā na liṅga parāmarśa jñāna hetuḥ iti vācyam tad udbodhita saṃskāra dvāreṇa vyāpsmiraṇe ca parāmarśe ca tasya tadānīm asataḥ  api kāraṇa tvāt  na khalu kṛṣi karma śasya adhigati samaye samasti na ca yāga ādikam svarga ādi utpāda samaye na ca trivṛt kaṣāya pānam vireka samaye āntarālika kārya paramparayā tu tad sādhāna tvam sarvatra samānam syāt etad  kā punar iyam pipāsā upaśamana śaktiḥ toyasya yā anumāna gocaraḥ na tāvat  mīmāṃsakavat ati indriyā śaktiḥ yusmābhiḥ abhyupeyate kim tu kāraṇānām svarūpam vā sahakāri sākalyam vā tatra svarūpam hetūnām pratyakṣam eva sahakāriṇā pratyakṣa apratyakṣāṇām sākalyam kārya samutpāda ekavya janīyam na tu tad  toya rūpa darśana mātrāt śakya anumānam tad  kim aparam avaśiṣyate yad anumānasya gocara iti atra ucyate na vayam atīndriyam sāmarthyam ātiṣṭhāmahe na api sahakāri sākalya anumānam ācakṣmahe kim tu svarūpasya kārya saṃbadhitām na ca iyam svarūpam eva ihasthasya iva nārikela dvīpāt āgatasya api vahni darśana mātrāt  grāhakatva avagama prasaṅgāt  tasmāt  kārya upahitam sva rūpam anumeyam idam eva ca asya kārya upadhānam yad  kārya utpādāt  pūrvam avaśyaṃbhāva ānantarya niyamaḥ na ca tad jātīyasya dṛṣṭa carasya tathā abhāva darśane api dṛśyamānasya toyasya tad  dṛṣṭam bhavati yena tatra smaryeta na khalu ujjayinyām upalabdhasya saudhasya pāṭaliputre smaranti abhra antāḥ upādānena hānam vyākhyātam na ca upekṣā anupādāna tayā hāna pakṣe nikṣiptā ahāna taya upādāna pakṣa niḥśrepa prasaṅgāt upādāna prayatna aprasava hetu tayā na upādānam iti ced  kim iyam hāna prayatnam api prasūte yatas  hānam syāt  tasmāt  yā na ubhaya prayatna prasava hetuḥ sa upekṣā buddhiḥ tṛtīyā loka prasiddhā iti siddham pratyakṣa pada vyutpattim darśayitvā anumāna ādi padeṣu avi vyutpatti gati diśati evam anumāna ādiṣu api iti tatra idam anumānada vyutpatti bhāṣyam mitena liṅgena liṅginaḥ  arthasya paścāt mānam anumānam iti mitiḥ mānam tathā ca liṅga darśana udbodhita saṃskāra jā smṛtiḥ vyavacchinnā tasyāḥ  miteḥ anya tvena loka siddha tvāt  mitena iti ajñāna sandeha viparyāsā liṅga viṣayā vyudastā bhavanti tathā api mitena arthasya jñānam śābde api asti iti ata uktam liṅgena iti apakṣa dharmataḥ  nivartayati liṅgina iti tathā api dharmiṇaḥ pratyakṣa gocara tvāt kṛtam anumānena ityata uktam arthasya iti arthyate sādhyata iti arthaḥ na ca dharmaḥ  svarūpeṇa arthyate kim tu jijñāsita dharma viśiṣṭa iti arthaḥ paścāt iti anu śabdasya vyākhyā tad etad bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ākṣipati mitena iti kasmāt ayuktam iti ata āha phala abhāvāt iti etad  vibhajate etasmin  iti anumāna jñānasya phala avasthāyām eva arthaḥ  mita iti meyam na avaśiṣyate yatra etad  siddham sat  pramāṇam bhavet iti arthaḥ tatra phala viśeṣaṇa pakṣam āsthāya yata iti adhyāhṛtya sāmadhatte na eṣa doṣa iti anadhyāhāreṇa api adoṣa  iti samādhāna antaram āha bhavatu vā iti pūrva uktam doṣam smārayat ti nanu ca iti pariharati na doṣa iti atha kasmāt  hāna ādi viṣayam pramāṇam ucyate na sva gocaram pratītyata āha sarva ca pramāṇam iti yadi api vahni jñānasya anumānasya sataḥ  heyatva ādikam viṣayaḥ tatra eva vyāpārāt  anyathā pramāṇa phalayoḥ vibhinna viṣaya tvena vipratipattyā pramāṇa phala bhāva ayogāt na hi panasa viṣayeṇa paraśunā khadire dvaidhībhāvaḥ  bhavati tathā api phala antara anapekṣam utpattau  eva vijñāne yad  prakāśate sa tasya viṣayaḥ tatra tu na tad  pramāṇam phala antara ajanaka tvāt api tu phalam eva iti arthaḥ viṣaya antaram prati tu pramāṇam iti āha viṣaya antaram iti codayati yadi iti bhāva sādhanaḥ ced  pramāṇa śabdaḥ phalam asya arthaḥ  na tu phalam sva viṣaye karaṇam tad vyāpārasya tad janakena eva kṛta tvāt  na ca sva viṣayāt anyat  viṣaya antaram asya saṃbhavati atiprasaṅgāt iti bhāvaḥ pariharati uktam phalam iti yadi api yatra phalam saḥ  asi autpattikaḥ viṣayaḥ tathā api yatra anena pramāṇena satā hāna ādi buddhayaḥ janayitavyāḥ saḥ  api vyāpāreṇa viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ phalatva eva hetum āha jñāta iti parokṣa artha avagāhitayā heya ādi buddhayaḥ pratyakṣa phalam na bhavanti bhavanti tu anumānasya iti niyama vādinām matam apanyasya dūṣayati kecid  tu iti aniyamam rocyamāna āha ubhayam tu iti anumāna śabdavat  phalena nirvacanīya tvam upamāna śabdasya iti manvāna ākṣipati sāmīpya iti samādhatte na asti vyāghāta iti na iyam upamāna śabdasya phalena nirūktiḥ api tu pramāṇena nirūktiḥ iti na vaya āghāta iti arthaḥ śabda viṣayā pratipattiḥ śābdam pramāṇam yad  khalu caitra gām badhāna iti vākyam idam iti anusandhāna ātmakam smārtam vijñānam upajāyate tad  padārtha smaraṇa sahakāri viśiṣṭa artha viṣayam vijñānam prasūte tad śābdra pramāṇam pramāṇam uktvā phalam asya āha phalam tad eva yadā hi etad  pramāṇam tadā vākya artha vijñānam phalam yadā anumānavat  vākya artha vijñānam pramāṇam tadā hāna upādāna ādi buddhayaḥ phalam iti arthaḥ atra pratyakṣa ādīnām krama uddeśa prayojanam prati eka deśimatam upanyasyati kecid  tu iti pratyakṣa parā hi pramāṇa antara janyāḥ pramitaya iti pratyakṣasya prādhānyam yadi api kiñcid anumānam anumāna ādi pūrvakam api tathā api prāyeṇa pratyakṣa pūrvakam upamānam tu pratyakṣa pūrvakam api śabda pūrvakam eva iti asya anumānāt apakarṣaḥ smaraṇa sahakāritā ca anumāna sādṛśyam upamānasya asti iti anumāna anantaram uddeśaḥ alpa jñāna adhīnam ca bahu jñānam iti alpa viṣaya pratyakṣa ādi uddeśebhyaḥ paraḥ  bahu viṣaya śabda uddeśa iti tad etad eka deśi matam eka deśī antara matena dūṣayati tad ca ayuktam iti apara iti ākliṣṭaḥ  hi prathamam mahā viṣayam eva duravadhāraṇa tvāt nirūpayati alpa viṣayam tu kliṣṭaḥ  api śaknoti nirūpayitum atas  mahā viṣaya tvam prāthamya eva hetuḥ na caramatva iti arthaḥ anantara matam dūṣayati etad ca iti etāvatā krama mātram bhavet  na tu tad viśeṣa niyama iti arthaḥ saṃprati vimarśa pūrvakam sva abhibhata krama niyama hetum avadhārayan  eva pūrva eka deśimatam apākaroti tasmāt anya iti vimarśa nimittam vipratipattim āha pratyakṣam pūrvam prādhānyāt  iti ekaḥ mahā viṣaya tvāt ca ādau śabda upadeśa iti aparaḥ tatra mahāviṣaya tvam anaikāntikam sanna āgamasya eva pūrva upadeśam gamayati iti āha ubhayam iti pṛcchati katham iti uttaram pratyakṣaiṇa api iti mahā viṣayatva lakṣaṇa sādhāraṇa dharma darśana nimittam saṃdeham āha tatra iti sva abhimatena hetunām krama viśeṣa niyamam avadhārayati pratyakṣasya iti iti yadi api pramiteḥ pratyakṣa paratvena pratyakṣasya prādhānyam tathā api śāstre vyutpādya tvena anumānasya api tad asti iti sādhāraṇa tayā na hetuḥ iti bhāvaḥ syāt etad  vyavasthita viṣayam pratyakṣam na anumāna viṣaye pravartate na ca anumānam agṛhīta saṃbandham udeti na ca saṃbandha grahaḥ saṃbandhi graham antareṇa na ca anumāna viṣaye sāmānya rūpe saṃbandhini pratyarkṣa pravartate anumāna antareṇa tu grahaṇe anavasthā tasmāt  kāraṇa bhāvāt na anumānam asti etena śabda upamāne api parāḥ te tayoḥ api saṃbandha saṃvedana adhīna janma tvāt  tasmāt  na apratyakṣam pramāṇam iti vibhāga vacanam anupapannam iti śaṅkām apanetum vimarśa pūrvakam vicārayati sma bhārūyakāraḥ kim punar  pramāṇāni iti tad etad bhāṣyam anubhāṣya avyākhyāne kāraṇam āha kim punar etāni iti sā ca iyam pramitiḥ pratyakṣa para iti bhāṣyam tad anubhāṣya hetum āha sā iyam iti ākāṅkṣā bhāva pratipādanāya pratīti svarūpam kramam ca āha yathā ayam iti āhita utpāditaḥ pratyayaḥ niścayaḥ  yasya saṃsarga upadhānam varhi prati sa tathā sandigdhena hi niścayāya pravartitavyam eva niścitaḥ tu viniścayāya pramāṇa antare pravartamānaḥ tad abhyarhita taram manyate dhūma aṅga tvena iti aṅga tvam vyāpaka tvam vyāpyam punar vyāpti kriyāyām karma tvena pradhānam tad anena dhūma vyāpakatva upadhānena dhūmāt  gamyamānaḥ  bahniḥ parokṣa iti darśitam anupahita prakāśa satu pratyakṣeṇa avyavahita vahni svarūpa prakāśaḥ sa hi sākṣātkāra iti tāvat ayam pramātā sa ākāṅkṣaḥ  yāvat upadhāna vyavahitam svarūpam upalabhate upadhāna anapekṣaḥ tu pratyakṣeṇa avyavahitam sākṣāt  varhina viṣayīkṛtya nirākāṅkṣaḥ  bhavati dhūma aṅga tvena dhūma viśeṣaṇa tvena iti kecid  tad tu prakṛta anupayogi tayā ayuktam iti upasaṃharati atas  pradhānam iti saḥ  ayam guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ  bheda āśrayaḥ  vyavasthāyām na asti vyavasthitānām pratyekam eka tvāt  tasmāt  vyavasthāyām guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ  na cintya iti itiḥ sūtra samāptau iti nyāya tri sūtrītātparyaṭīkā pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa viśeṣa lakṣaṇānām artha ākṣipta sāmānya lakṣaṇa vibhāga uddeśa hetutvena tad anantara abhidhānam iti āha atha vibhaktānām iti tatra teṣu madhye prāthamyāt  pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam ityādi sūtram asya tātparyam āha sūtra arthaḥ sūtra prayojanam samāna asamāna jātīya viśeṣaka tvam samāna jātīyam anumāna ādi asamāna jātīyam pratyakṣa ābhāsa prameya ādi tebhyaḥ  viśeṣaka
