tvam viśeṣaḥ tad asya sūtrasya prayojanam yaḥ khalu kutaścid  vyāmohāt  samāna asamāna jātīya vyāvṛttam tad rūpam na śakroti grahītum saḥ  anena lakṣaṇena bodhyate evaṃlakṣaṇakam pratyakṣam iti tasmāt  sāmānnayataḥ siddha vivikta pratyakṣa mātra anuvādena lakṣaṇa vidhāna param idam sūtram itas tu avagata lakṣaṇaḥ tena eva vivicya pratyakṣa tattvam gṛhṇāti iti samāna asamāna jātīya vyavacchedaḥ sūtra artha ukta iti atra ca yaha iti adhyāhṛtya yad tadonitya abhisaṃbandhāt tad  pratyakṣam iti pramāṇa vāci pratyakṣapadra yojanīyam evam ca jñāna pramāṇi apakṣe api yad  tad viśeṣya jñānam pratyakṣa phalam liṅga parām arśaḥ  vā tad api indriya artha sannikarṣa utu annatva ādi upeta tvena bhavati pramāṇa viśeṣaṇam iti na avyāpaka tvam lakṣaṇasya iti sūtra padārtham pṛcchati atha iti uttaram indriya iti sannikarṣa grahaṇa labhyam prakāra bhedam parisaṃcaṣṭe sannikarṣaḥ punar iti punar śabdena saṃyoga samavāya pada upādānāt vyavacchinatti saṃyoga pada upādāne hi na samavāyaḥ  labhyate samavāya pada upādāne vā na saṃyogaḥ sannikarṣa pada upādāne tu abhimata lābhaḥ artha grahaṇena arthyamāṇa tayā jñeya svarūpya ugya tā darśitā na ca asau  aṇu ākāśa ādīnām asti iti sati api saṃyoga ādau na asau  artha sannikarṣa iti tad vyudāsaḥ utpanna grahaṇena ca sannikarṣasya utpādaka tvam sūcitam tatas  sati api artha svarūpa yogya tve saṃyukta saṃyoga ādeḥ anutpādakasya sannikarṣasya vyudāsaḥ anyathā kuḍya ādi saṃyuktena indriyeṇa kuḍya ādi vyavahitasya tad saṃyuktasya ghaṭa ādeḥ tad samavetasya ca rūpa ādeḥ api grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ na ca etāvatā trividha eva sannikarṣaḥ saṃyogaḥ saṃyukta samavāyaḥ samavāyaḥ ca iti sāṃpratam svatantra vyāghātāt anubhava vyāghātāt ca ye hi dravya guṇa karma āśrayam sāmānya atiriktam sādṛśsayam artha anataram rocayante teṣām katham rūpa ādi bhedānām anyonyasya sādṛśyam pratyakṣam bhavet  na hi tad indriyeṇa saṃyuktam na api indriya saṃyukta samavetam tasmāt  caturthaḥ saṃyukta samaveta samavāyaḥ  abhyupagantavyaḥ itarathā svatantra vyāghātaḥ anubhava vyāghātaḥ ca anubhūyante hi rūpa gandhatva ādayaḥ sāmānya viśeṣā anugatāḥ tāsu tāsu vyaktiṣu paraspara vyāvṛttimatīṣu ete na anubhūyeran asati sannikarṣa antare yadi tu vaiyātyāt āhuḥ na anubhūyanta eva iti tadā prativaktavyam kutasti aḥ ayam anantāsu rūpa gandha ādi vyaktiṣu rūpam iti vā gandha iti vā vyapadeśa bhedaḥ cākṣuṣatva ādi upādhi nibandhana iti ced  na ananu saṃhita upādheru upa hita pratyaya ayogāt na khalu ananu saṃhita daṇḍa śrcaitram daṇḍī iti vyapadiśati na ca indriyāṇi atīndriyāṇi indriya darśana viṣaya bhāvam anubhavanti tasmāt asti indriyeṇa rūpatva ādi sāmānya anubhavaḥ  yad nibandhanāḥ kāsucid eva kecid eva vyaktiṣu vyapadeśa ibhedā iti siddham sannikarṣa antaram viśeṣaṇa bhāvena ca saṃyukta viśeṣaṇam samaveta viśeṣaṇa ca saṃgṛhītam yasya indriyeṇa yādṛśaḥ sannikarṣaḥ tādṛśam tatra darśayati tatra cakṣuḥ iti śabdassya ākāśa guṇa tvam karṇa śaṣkulī avacchinnasya nabhaḥ bhāgasya śrotra tvam ādyasya eva śabdasya saṃyoga vibhāga yoni ja tvam santānena śrotre samutpādaḥ samavāya ityādi dvitīye nipuṇataram upapādayiṣyate avayava  ayavinau guṇa guṇinau kriyā kriyāvantau jāti jātimantau ca mithas  saṃbaddhau  anubhūtete na anyathā tantuṣu paṭa iti ca śuklaḥ paṭa iti ca paṭaḥ spandate iti ca paṭaḥ dravyam iti ca buddhi vyapadeśau syātām śuklaḥ paṭa ityādi sāmānādhikaraṇya jñānam na tu saṃbandhi jñānam iti ced  kim punar idam sāmānādhikaraṇyam tādātmyam iti ced  na dvitīya buddhi vyapadeśayoḥ paunaruktyāt  apauna rūkti am ca abhimanyante pratipattāraḥ yad anyatarat upalabhyāni ad bubhutsante na ca ekam vastu dvi ātmakam iti yuktam bheda adhiṣṭhānasya tad na āntarīyakasya dvi tvasya eka ātmani virodhena asaṃbhavāt tasmāt  bhinne eva vastunī saṃbaddhe sāmānādhikaraṇyena bhāsete asaṃbandhe gauḥ aśva itivat  tad anupapatteḥ saṃbandhe api kuṇḍe dadhītivat vaiyadhi karaṇya prasaṅga iti ced  na śabda vṛtti bhedena saṃbandha abhede api sāmānādhikaraṇya vaiyadhikaraṇya vyavasthāpanāt  na hi jātu dadhi śabdaḥ kuṇḍe vartate kuṇḍa śabdaḥ  vā dadhni vartante tu surabhim adhara śukla ādi śabdāḥ sva abhidheyam nimittīkṛtya paṭa ādiṣu evam paṭa ādi śabdā api jātyādi nimittīkṛtya dravye pravartante iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam tena sāmānādhikaraṇye api pravṛtti nimittānām na aikātmyam parasparam na api dravyeṇa kim tu taiḥ tainvitam ekam dravyam pratīyate śabdānām tu tatra ekasmin dravye pravṛtteḥ tad vācyānām aikātmya bhramaḥ ayuta siddhyā tu kuṇḍe dadhītivat  na sphuṭa taraḥ  viveka prakāśaḥ tad evam asti saṃbaddha anubhavaḥ na ca asau saṃbaddha anubhavam vinā iti saṃbandhaḥ  anubhūyate sa ca ayuta siddhi ādi saṃpattyā samavāyaḥ na ca asya anyaḥ samavāyaḥ avasthānāt  na ca indriyeṇa asya saṃyogaḥ adravya tvāt  na ca asaṃbaddhasya grahaṇam indriyāṇām prāpya kāritva samarthanāt tasmāt  viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ pariśiṣyate nanu ayam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ  anyatra saṃbandha antara pūvrakaḥ  dṛṣṭaḥ tad  kim atra saṃbandha antaram kalpyatām tathā ca anavasthā iti uktam na ca indriyā saṃva baddhasya grahaṇam tasmāt  vinā saṃbandha antaram viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva eṣitavya iti siddham evam abhāve api yad indriya saṃyuktam vā yad vā indriya samavetu yathā bhū tale ghaṭaḥ  na asti iti vā na asti akāre anudātta svara iti vā tasya saṃyuktasya vā viśeṣaṇa bhāvena samavetasya viśeṣaṇa bhāvena ca indriya pratyāsattyā grahaṇam na ca bhū tala ādi rūpam eva ghaṭa abhāvaḥ  na artha antaram iti sāṃpratam sati api ghaṭa ādau bhū talasya bhāvāt  na ca kaivalyam tasya dharmaḥ  ghaṭa bhāva virodhī ghaṭa abhāvāt anyaḥ na ca dṛśye ghaṭa ādau bhū tala upalambhaḥ kaivalyam abhāva vyavahāra hetuḥ iti yuktam evam hi ghaṭa saṃsṛṣṭa bhū tala grahaḥ  api kaivalyam iti ghaṭa abhāva vyavahāram pravartayet  na hi adṛśyaḥ  ghaṭaḥ tadānīm dṛśyamānaḥ dṛśye anupalabhyamāna iti tu viśeṣaṇe kim aparāddham upalabhya abhāvena yena tad apākaraṇāya upalambha abhāvaḥ  abhyupeyate tasmāt  sa divāsat api tattvam abhyupeyam tad ca pratyakṣam akṣa vyāpāre sati tad pratyayāt na ca pratiyogi smaraṇa vyavahita indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ  na alam abhāva dhiyam upajanayitum iti sāṃpratam iti agra darśayiṣyāmaḥ sa vikalpakassa pratyakṣatva siddhau yathā śabda smaraṇa pūrva gṛhīta piṇḍa anusandha ānādayaḥ  na indriya vyāpāram vyavadadhati iti na ca śabda smaraṇa ādīnām anuyogi tā bhū tala vikalpam pratyaṅga tvāt  sva aṅgam avyavadhāyakam iti nyāyāt  ghaṭasya tu pratiyogitā iti sāṃpratam kasya punar  pratiyogī ghaṭaḥ tad abhāvasya iti ced  bhavatu ghaṭa abhāva anubhavasya tu ghaṭa smaraṇam hetuḥ iti na pratiyogi kim tu anuyogi eva nanu sva rūpa mātram dṛṣṭam veśma ādi artham smaran  eva bahis nitaśrcaitraḥ yadā pṛcchyate kenacid  vayasya tava gṛhe tadā kim āsīt  maitra iti sa caitraḥ pratiyogi smaraṇa virahāt  pūrvam apratipanna maitrābhāvaḥ  api tad praśna janita maitra smṛtiḥ kṣaṇam dhyātva tad abhāvam avagamya āha mitra tatra na āsīt maitra iti tadīyam asati indriya artha sannikarṣe abhāva buddhiḥ bhavantī pratyakṣa ādi atiriktam abhāva ākhyam pramāṇa vyavasthāpayati iti na etad  saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa lakṣaṇena manaḥ sannikarṣeṇa smartavyasya smaraṇa abhāvam maitrasya gṛhītvā tena liṅgena tad abhāvasya tadānīm anumānāt tathā hi tad geham tadā maitra abhāvavat  jñāna arhasya maitrasya ajñāne gehasya jñāyamāna tvāt  yad  yasya jñāna arhasya ajñāne jñāyate tad  tad abhā vavat  yathā ghaṭa bhāvavat  bhū talam tathā ca geham tasmāt  tathā na ca yad  kadācid ānumānikam tena inidraya gamyena na bhavitavyam pramāṇa saṃplava vyavasthāpanāt  tad  sat him viśeṣaṇa bhāvāt abhāvasya indriya prameya tā iti saṃyoga samavāya pada parihāreṇa sannikarṣa pada upādānasya prayojanam āha saḥ  ayam sannikarṣa śabda iti tad anena prabandhena indriyasya arthena sannikarṣāt  yad utpadyate jñānam tad  pratyakṣam iti bhāṣyam vyākhyātam saṃprati na tarhi iti codya bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe yadi indriya artha iti pratyakṣa jñāna kāraṇa abhidhāna pravṛtteḥ tad eka deśam vadannakuśalaḥ sūtra kāraḥ syāt iti arthaḥ kāraṇa antarāṇi darśayati tad yathā iti viṣaya saṃyoti cakṣuḥ ālokaḥ ca tad stham rūpam ātmīyena hi rūpeṇa āloka cakṣuṣī dravyam darśayata iti sthitiḥ mahat tvam vā aneka dravyavat tvam vā aneka dravyā avayavāḥ tadvat tvam avayavinaḥ  mahata eva na dvi aṇukasya tasmāt anyonya nirapekṣa tvam mahattva aneka dravyavat tvayoḥ iti vikalpa eva nyāyya iti sati api evaṃlakṣaṇaka tve cukṣuḥ avayavinaḥ taijasasya na cākṣuṣa tvam iti ata uktam upalabdhi kalaḥ saṃskāra iti dharma adharma nimitta ubhdava samākhyātaḥ saṃskāraḥ upalabdhiphalaḥ na ca asau cakṣuṣi tasya adṛṣṭa vaśena anudbhūta rūpa sparśa tvāt iti arthaḥ pariharati na vaktavyāni iti pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa karaṇa pravṛttaḥ  hi sūtra kāraḥ tad eva brūyāt  yad asya asādhāraṇam kāraṇam na tu sat api sādhāraṇam asya kāraṇam na hi tad  tasya lakṣaṇam ati vyāpteḥ iti arthaḥ tad anena na idam ityādi bhāṣyam vyākhyātam asādhāraṇam kāraṇam ced  pratyakṣa lakṣaṇāya upādeyam hanta anyat api asya asādhāraṇam asti kāraṇam iti tad api upādeyam iti codayati indriya manaḥ saṃyogaḥ tarhi iti tad anena manasaḥ tarhi iti asya bhāṣyasya artha uktaḥ  veditavyaḥ pariharati na anena eva indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa eva tasya indriya manaḥ sannikarṣasya ukta tvāt  tad ukti sādhyam yad  tad  tena eva kṛtam tad sādhyam tu indriya manaḥ sannikarṣaḥ  na śaknoti sādhayitum na ca sukha ādi jñāne mānase asti indriya manaḥ sannikarṣaḥ indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ tu sarva vyāpakaḥ vakṣyati hi manasa indriya tvam sukha ādeḥ ca artha tvam siddham eva iti saṃprati vyāpaka tvam abhyupetya parīhāra antaram āha indriya artha iti yadi api indriya manaḥ sannikarṣe api indriyam asti pratyakṣa jñānasya viśeṣakam indriyeṇa vyapadeśāt indriya jñānam iti tathā api manasā vyapadeśa amāvāt manasaḥ tatra aviśeṣaka tvam indriya artha sannikarṣe tu ubhayam api viśeṣakam ubhābhyām pratyakṣa jñānasya vyapadeśāt iti ayamasya indriya manaḥ sannikarṣāt viśeṣa iti codayati yadā tu iti tuśabdaḥ pūrva pakṣam vyāvartayati yu jānasya hi yoginaḥ  yad ātma manaḥ sa yogāt ātmani buddhayaḥ  bhavanti tāḥ khalva ātmanā vyapadiśyante ātma buddhaya iti manasā ca vyapadiśyante manaḥ buddhaya iti tasmāt ubhābhyām vyapadeśāt  ubhayoḥ viśeṣaka tvam iti indriya artha sannikarṣavat ātma manaḥ sannikarṣaḥ  vaktavya iti arthaḥ pariharati yad ca iti ca u avadhāraṇe yad eva asādhāraṇam tad  vyapadeśa bhāj bhavati kāraṇa tvena jñānam vyapadiśyate iti arthaḥ etad uktam bhavati yathā cukṣuṣā indriya tvena jñānam vyapadiśyate cākṣuṣam iti tathā manasā api indriya tvena vyapadiśyate jñānam mānasam iti evam yathā rūpeṇa arthena vyapadiśyate jñānam rūpa jñānam iti tathā ātmanā api arthena vyapadiśyate ātma jñānam iti tatra ca asādhāraṇa tvam eva tayoḥ yatra tu indriya antaram eva asādhāraṇam liṅga ādi vā tatra ca ātmā na arthaḥ  api tu pramātā eva yathā rūpa ādi jñāne anumāna ādi jñāne vā na tatra jñānam mānasam iti vā ātma jñānam iti vā vyapadeśaḥ sa kasya hetāḥ tayoḥ sādhāraṇyāt  ātma manaḥ sannikarṣaḥ tu indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa saṃgṛhītaḥ  na tu indriya artha sannikarṣasya eṣa saṃgrāha kaḥ  avyāpaka tvāt iti eka deśinaḥ parīhāram upanyasyati indriya manaḥ saṃyogasya vā agrahaṇam bhede abhedāt  yadā hi nāgara yoṣitaḥ kutūhalāt  praṇihita manasaḥ  vikasita niḥspanda nayana utpalāḥ saudha māla āgavākṣakaiḥ avanipatim sa bala vāhana mati cira parāvṛttam gopureṇa niviśamānam ālokayanti tadā khlvāsām ekena eva indriya manaḥ saṃyogena kramavat aneka indriya artha sannikarṣa sahakāriṇā bhinnāni kramavanti hāstika āśvīya ādi pratyakṣa jñānāni jāyante tad idam āha yasmāt  iti codayati yadi iti yadā hi mandam gacchati gavi dūratas  saṃyukta samavāyena indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa śuklaḥ  gauḥ ityajñāsīt  atha pratyāsīdan gacchati iti api vijānāti tena eva saṃyukta samavāyena sannikarṣeṇa tena pratyakṣa jñānasya śukla iti ca gacchati iti ca bhede api indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ  na bhidyate tasmāt indriya artha sannikarṣe tulya tvāt indriya manaḥ saṃyogaḥ  api tatra vaktavya iti arthaḥ pariharati na vaktavyaḥ kutas  ukta uttara tvāt iti tad vibhajate uktā iti nanu bhavatu uktam uttaram bhede abheda āditi asya ākṣepaḥ samādhātavyaḥ iti ata āha anabhyupagamāt ca eka deśi matam etad asmābhiḥ na abhyupeyate tasmāt na samādheyam iti arthaḥ tad  kim idānīm bhidyamānasya pratyakṣa jñānasya na ayam bhidyata iti samāna tvāt na ukta iti bhāṣyam anupapannam eva na iti āha indriya manaḥ saṃyogasya ca agrahaṇam samāna tvāt  pṛcchati kena iti uttaram  ātma mana iti punar  pṛcchati kim punar  samāna tvam uttaram vyapadeśa abhāva iti uktam tena bhāṣyasya ayam arthaḥ pratyakṣa jñānasya rūpa jñānasya rūpa jñānam iti vā cakṣuḥ vijñānam iti vā vyapadeśena bhidyamānasya ātma manaḥ saṃyoga iva ayam indriya manaḥ saṃyogaḥ  na bhidyate evam hi sa bhidyate yadi sva saṃbandhi vācakena vyapadeśena sva m anyatas  vyāvartyate na viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭam jñānam api anyatas  vyāvartayet  na tu asti indriya manaḥ sannikarṣa ādhārābhyām indriya m anobhyām pratyekam asya vyapadeśaḥ  yathā indriya artha sannikarṣa ādhārābhyām indriya arthābhyām vyapadeśaḥ  rūpa jñānam iti cakṣuḥ jñānam iti vā tasmāt  vyapadeśa abhāva ātma manaḥ sannikarṣeṇa sāmyam indriya manaḥ sannikarṣasya tasmāt  samāna tvāt  na ukta iti prākara antaram samāna tve darśayati atīndriya ādhāra tā vā iti lakṣaṇam hi prasiddham bhavati yathā dhūmaḥ  vahneḥ na ca atīndriya dvaya ādhāra sannikarṣaḥ tathā prasiddhaḥ  yathā indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ  arthasya saṃbandhina eka snaya prasiddha tvāt  indriya manasoḥ tu dvayoḥ atīndriya tvāt  ātmā tu yadi api yu jānasya śarīra ādi atiriktaḥ pratyakṣaḥ tathā api asmad ādīnām na tathā iti atīndriya uktaḥ tad anena ati indriya ādhāra tvam sva rūpeṇa uktvā tad evam viṣaya avṛttitva manaḥ vṛtti tvābhyām atīndriya ādhāra tvam sāmānyam āha viṣaya āvṛtti tvam vā iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti samāna tvāt iti bhāṣya uktaḥ  hetuḥ caritārtha tvāt iti sva uktaḥ ākṣipati indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iti ayuktam iti sa antara grahaṇāt iti hetum vibhajate viprakṛṣṭa iti nanu na arthaḥ  viprakṛṣṭaḥ cakṣuṣaḥ tatra prāpteḥ iti ata āha na tu cakṣuṣa iti kasmāt ityata āha bhūta viśeṣasya iti bāhyaḥ  bhūta viśeṣa ālokaḥ tasya prasāda indriya avyavadhāyaka tvam kuḍya ādibhyaḥ  viśeṣaḥ yaḥ khalu kāca abhra paṭala ādiṣu su accheṣu samasti syāt etad  asti kṛṣṇasāra lakṣaṇaḥ  bhū viśeṣaḥ prasanna andhasya api atas tasya api rūpa upalabdhiḥ syāt itpata āha tad tṛṣṇā pūrvaka iti rūpa upabhoga tṛṣṇā hi tad sādhanam kṛṣṇasāram api viṣayīkaroti etad uktam bhavati bhūta viśeṣaḥ karma apekṣaḥ  rūpam caṣṭa iti cakṣuḥ iti ucyate karma kṣāyāt  tu prasanna andhasya na rūpam caṣṭa iti na cakṣuḥ astu golakam eva cakṣuḥ kim etāvatā api iti āha na ca iti vicchinnam hi golakam arthāt anubhūyata iti arthaḥ tad evam vastunaḥ sa antarasya grahaṇam aprāpya kāri tve hetuḥ uktam kecid  tu sa antaram iti grahaṇa viśeṣaṇam hentu bruvate tad matam upanyasyati apare tu iti sādhya viparyayāt asya vyatirekam darśayati na hi prāpya kāriṣu iti pakṣa dharma tām āha dṛṣṭam tu iti yad ca uktam aprāpya kāri tve sādhanam pṛthutara grahaṇāt iti tad vibhajate pṛthutarā iti dvi āśrayaḥ  hi saṃyogaḥ  alpam eva saṃyoginam anurudhyate na mahāntam na jātu ratha ādi saṃyogā nabhaḥ  vyaśnuvate mā bhūt  sarvatra ratha ādīnām tad saṃyoga ādīnām ca upalabdhiḥ tena yāvanmātra rāṣṭra vanādeḥ golakena vyāptam tāvat mātrasya grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ hetu antaram āha diś iti asya api vyatireka mukhena gamaka tvam darśayati yadi prāpya kārī iti aparam api hetum āha sannikṛṣṭa iti yadi api gati kṣaṇānām pratyekam spāśrayasya deśa antara vibhāga saṃyoga upajananam prati kṣipra tayā na viśeṣaḥ sva āśraya pratyāsattau ca aviśeṣaḥ tathā āpyā cāpa ādāna vibhāgāt ā ca prāpanīya deśa prāpteḥ antarāla vartī yāvān gati kṣaṇa pracayaḥ pūrva aparībhūtaḥ  gatiḥ iha vivakṣitaḥ tasya sa antara tvam manda tvam vilambaḥ nairantaryam tu pāṭavam kṣipra tā tām imām gatim abhindat  nairantaryeṇa kurvat api sannikṛṣṭam āśu prāpnoti na viprakṛṣṭena tulya kālam kim tu viprakṛṣṭam cireṇa iti yathā uktam diś rāgena sa antara grahaṇam na syāt  prāptau jñāne adhikasya ca bahis varti tvāt indriyasya upapannam sa antara grahaṇam iti ced  ata uktam adhiṣṭhānāt  bahis nākṣam kim tu adhiṣṭhāna deśa eva indriyam kutas  tad cikitsā ādi yogataḥ sati api ca bahis bhāve na śaktiḥ viṣaya īkṣaṇe yadi ca syāt  tadā paśyet api unmīlya nimīlanāt  yadi ca syāt  unmīlya nimīlita nayanaḥ  api rūpam paśyet  unmīlanāt asti bahis indriyam iti tatra vārttikakāraḥ sa antara grahaṇāt iti hetum vikalpya dūṣayati yad  tāvat iti sa antara tā khalva prāpti sāhacaryāt  aprāptim lakṣayati hetu arthasya pratijñā arthena akṣipra tvāt  amedena tad uktam na pratijñā arthāt  bhidyata iti hetu pratijñāpada vācya tvena bhedam upacarya ākṣepya ākṣepaka bhāvaḥ  draṣṭavyaḥ tasya vyavadhāyaka tvāt iti rūpavataḥ  aprasāda svabhāvasya kuḍya ādeḥ iti arthaḥ yad  tu prasāda svabhāvam tejaḥ tad na gṛhyate kim tu tasya rūpa mātram visphārita akṣaṇa dṛśyate tad āśrayam ca dravyam sādhayiṣyate na ca guṇa u dravyasya antaram mā bhūd gandha ādibhiḥ antaram dravyasya mā na bhūtām ca nirantare dravye sva guṇābhyām antarita tvāt na ca āpāta janma ālocanam vā vikalpaḥ  vā dravya anumānam pratīkṣate yena rūpa jñāna anumitam dravyam indriyarthayoḥ dravyayoḥ antaram syāt  api ca rūpa mātram agṛhyamāṇe dravye svatantram gandha ādivat  gṛhyamāṇam katham antarā sva āśrayam anumāpayet  ākāśa ādīnām āśraya aṇam agrahaṇāt  tasmāt  viṣakta avayava tejaḥ dravya apratyakṣatva samāropa mātreṇa dūṣaṇam vakṣyamāṇam tu anyathā siddhatva dūṣaṇam pāramārthikam draṣṭavyam atha abhāvaḥ  antara śabda vācya iti na asmākam mūrta dravya abhāvāt anyat  ākāśam asti iti bhāvaḥ dūṣayati sa svatantra śrcakṣuḥ viṣayaḥ  na bhavati indriyam ca artham ca antarā abhāvaḥ  grāhyaḥ tena saha arthasya grahaṇam sa antara grahaṇam na ca indriya arthayoḥ madhyate kasyacid  saṃyuktasya vā samavetasya vā grahaṇam asti yad tantraḥ  ayam abhāvaḥ  gṛhyeta iti bhāvaḥ syāt etad  mā bhūdāntarālikam saṃyuktam vā samavetam vā viśeṣyam gṛhyamāṇam eva tu rūpa ādi viśeṣyam iti tad tantraḥ  ayam abhāvaḥ tad viśeṣaṇa tvena rirūpayiṣyate tatas rca sa antara grahaṇam upapatsyata iti ata āha tena saha upalabdhau  iti pratīyate hi tvac ādibhiḥ api indriyaiḥ prāpya kāribhiḥ auṣṇya abhava viśeṣaṇa śiṣiḥ ataram pāthaḥ na ca indriyāṇām atra aprāpya kāri tā tasmāt anaikāntikam anvaya abhyupagamena etad uktam anvaya abhāve tu viruddham iti bhāvaḥ na ca taijasam rūpam antaram yena sa antara grahaṇam syāt iti āha na ca anyā gatiḥ ati yathā ca etad  tathā upapāditam adhastāt ye tu sa antara iti grahaṇam iti hetum āhuḥ tān prati dūṣaṇam āha yaiḥ api iti anyathā siddha tve hetum āha śarīra iti śarīra avacchinnāḥ khalvātmānaḥ śarīra āyatanāḥ śarīram eva ātmānam abhimanyānā arthān anubhavanti tatra ya eva śarīra asaṃbaddha iti anubhūyate tam eva sa antara iti manyate indriya saṃbandhaḥ  bhavatu mā vā bhūt  śarīra saṃbandhena tasya sparśa ādau na sa antaratva abhimāna iti arthaḥ hetu antaram dūṣayati yad api iti saṃbandha mātreṇa iti mātra grahaṇam saṃbandha catuṣṭaya vyāpti artham tad  yathā indriyeṇa arthasya saṃbandhaḥ indriya avayavaiḥ arthasya artha avayavaiḥ indrayasya indriya avayavaiḥ artha avayavānām na ca etad  niryatā vinā pṛthvagra tām bhavati iti pṛthu agra tā sūcitā yathā varti deśe piṇḍitam api tejaḥ prasarpat  prāsāda udaram vyāpnoti tad  kasya hetoḥ pṛthu agra tvāt iti svabhāvataḥ prasarat api na sva parimāṇa anuvidhāyinam pratyayam ādhatte kim tu viṣaya bheda anuvidhāyinam viṣaya nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇā hi pratyayā na indriya nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇāḥ tad idam uktam viṣaya bheda anuvidhāyī pratyaya iti aparam api hetum dūṣayati yad  punar iti deham artham ca antara avasthitasya pṛthivī ādeḥ saṃyukta saṃyoga alpīyaḥ tvam bhūyas tvam ca apekṣamāṇasya iti khagānām ca upari upari saṃcaratām dūra antika bhāvaḥ bahu latamāloka avayava bhāgānām saṃyukta saṃyoga alpatva bhūyaḥ tvābhyām avagantavyaḥ sa ca tādṛś āloka avayavī pratyakṣaḥ  anyathā na rūpa mātreṇa tad anumānam śakyam iti uktam na ca khagānām upari upari saṃcaratām dūrantika pratyayaḥ syāt  na ca patati patatriṇī iha prāptaḥ  na iha iti bhavet  tasmāt anyathā siddhiḥ eva saha antareṇa grahaṇāt itivat atra api dūṣaṇam iti draṣṭavyam aparam api hetum dūṣayati yad  punar iti yugapad grahaṇam asiddham tad abhimānaḥ tu anyathā asiddhaḥ acintyaḥ  hi tejasaḥ  lādhava atiśayena vega atiśayaḥ  yad udaya giri śikharam ārohati eva mārtaṇḍa maṇḍale bhavana udareṣu āloke  iti abhimānaḥ  laukikānām tādṛśam cākṣuṣam api teja iti krameṇa api gacchat  yugapad tatra tatra lakṣyate na ca ekasmāt eva karmaṇaḥ  yugapad  durāntika saṃyogā bhavanti iti yuktam tad hi sva kārye janayitavye sva āśraya pratyāsattim apekṣate anyathā madhura āsthasya devadattasya karma pāṭaliputreṇa devadattam yojayet  vega ākhya saṃskāra jam api karmana sahasā śaram antarāla deśena ca lakṣyeṇa ca yojayati tasmāt  mithyā eva yaugapadya abhimāna iti codayati katham punar iti asti hi śākhā candramasoḥ grahaṇe yaugapadya abhimānaḥ na ca ayam asati bādhake mithyā iti vaktum śakyaḥ saḥ  ayam abādhitaḥ  bodhaḥ  avabodhayati aprāpya kāritām cakṣuṣa iti arthaḥ pariharati idam iti indriyam yadi agatvā anāgatam artham gṛhṇīyāt  kim asya kuḍya kaṭādi āvaraṇam apakuryāt  yena tadā āvṛtam na gṛhṇīyāt  gatau tu sparśavatā prasāda rahitena sā eva asya pratibaddhā iti na prāpnoti viṣayam aprāptam ca na gṛhṇāti prāyogaḥ tu cakṣuḥ śrotre prāpya sva viṣaye kāryam kurutaḥ janaka tve sati tad aprāpta avajanaka tvāt  yad janakam sat  yad aprāptau yad na janayati tad  tad prāptau  eva tad janayati yathā kumbhajanakaḥ kumbhakāraḥ  mṛdaḥ  aprāptau  akurvan kumbham tad prāptau  eva karoti tathā ca etad  tasmāt  tathā iti yukti antaram āha dūra antika anuvidhānam iti dūre na upalabhyate antike ca upalabhyate aprāpteḥ aviśeṣeṇa dūre api upalambhaḥ syāt  anupalambhe vā antike api na syāt  prāptau tu dūram gacchat  prakṣīṇam sat  prāptam artham na gṛhṇāti ataijasam taijasam api abhibhūtam na gṛhṇāti yathā ulkā prakāśam madhyandine anabhibhūtam tu mārtaṇḍa maṇḍalam gṛhṇāti eva iti codayati viṣayībhāvāt iti yogyaḥ  hi tādṛśa indriya kṣaṇaḥ sva kāraṇāt upajātaḥ pariṇataḥ  vā arthakṣaṇaḥ rca yayoḥ aprāptayoḥ eva grahaṇa grāhya bhāvaḥ vyavahita viprakṛṣṭau ca na tau tādṛśau tad  kim apratīyamāna prāpti kalpanayā iti arthaḥ pariharati tad ca na evam iti niṣatsyete hi kṣaṇa bhaṅga pariṇāmau bhāvānām tena sthema bhājām bhāvānām sva rūpa yogya tā vā mahattva ādiḥ viṣayībhāvaḥ sahakāri sākalyam vā jñāna upajananam prati pariśiṣyate tatra sva rūpa yogya tā mātram ced āsthīyeta tadā yad eva avyavahitam sannihitam sat  ajanayat  vijñānam viprakṛṣṭam api vyavahitam api tad eva iti tathā eva tena jñānam janayitavyam asti hi tasya tadā api svarūpa yogyatā iti sahakāri sākalyam tu prāptiḥ eva tasmāt  na saṃbandham antareṇa viṣayībhāva iti sūktam sandigdhaḥ pṛcchati atha prāpya kāritva iti ayam abhisandhiḥ kulāla ādau prāpya kāriṇi dṛṣṭam yathā viprakṛṣṭaḥ  vyavahitaśrca na karoti iti tasmāt  aprāpya kāriṇi ca ācaskānta ādau dṛṣṭam yathā viprakṛṣṭaḥ  vyavahitaśrca lauham maṇiḥ ākarṣati tasmāt  tatra pramāṇam vaktavyam iti uttaram indriya tvam eva pramāṇam tad eva pañca avayava upapannam āha prāpya kārī iti yadi tu kaśrcid  dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vikala tvam ubhdāvayet  tvac ādīnām aprāpya kāri tvāt iti tu pratyāha atha punar na kiñcid iti pṛcchati atha iti yogya tayā eva hi kāraṇāni sva kāryam kurvanti prāptiḥ tu sva rūpyogya tā prayuktām vyāptim upajīvati na tu asyāḥ svābhāvikam vyāpaka tvam iti bhāvaḥ uttaram saḥ  api iti sahakāri sākalyam tāvat  na prāpteḥ atiricyata iti uktam kevalam sva rūpa yogya tā vaktavyā sa ca vyastānām api asti iti yatra tatra vyavasthitebhyaḥ  api kārya utpāda prasaṅkaḥ ayaskānta maṇeḥ api cakṣuṣa iva vṛtti bheda eṣitavyaḥ anyathā vyavadhāna vipra karṣayoḥ api lauha ākarṣaṇa prasaṅgāt  na ca vyavadhāna vipra karṣa abhāva sahitaḥ  lauham ākarṣati vyavadhāna viprakarṣayoḥ tu tad abhāva abhāvaḥ  na ākarṣati saṃpratam prāpteḥ eva tatra tatra kārya utpādam prati upayogasya vidita svāt  yogyatā mātrasya ca upādheḥ apākṛta tvāt  yathā ca dravya atiriktaḥ tad dharmaḥ prāptiḥ tathā agrenivedayiṣyate tasmāt  sarvam avadātam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti yad api kṛṣṇasāra anugraha upaghātābhyām darśana adarśanāt iti tatra ucyate tad adhiṣṭhānam indriyam iti adhiṣṭhāna anugraha upaghātābhyām tasya anugraha upadhātau yathā kūṣmāṇḍa latā secana  chedanābhyām tad phalasya anugraha upaghātau ata eva bahis nisṛtā api acchinna mūlā dṛṣṭiḥ kāryāya samarthā na chinna mūla iti siddham pṛcchati atha jñāna iti pratyakṣa samākhyāta lakṣaṇa anuvādena lakṣaṇe vidhīyamāne jñāyata eva etad jñānam eva iti loke sākṣātkāri jñāna hetoḥ pratyakṣa tvāt iti bhāvaḥ uttaram sukha ādi vyudāsa artham tad eva hi lakṣaṇa vāyam ucyate yasya lakṣya anapekṣaḥ  ati vyāpti avyāpti vyudāsaḥ  lakṣaṇa padebhya eva pratīyate lakṣya anurodhena tu lakṣaṇa vyavasthāpane anyonya āśraya tvam agatiḥ vā iti bhāvaḥ sukha ādīnām vijñāna abhinna hetu ja tvena vijñāna tvāt aśakyam vyāvartanam iti ced  na abhinna hetu jatva asiddhaḥ na khalu yā eva candana sparśa jñānasya utpattau sāmagrī sā eva sukhasya api iti asti hi śīta ārtasya api candana indriya saṃyogāt  śīta sparśa jñānam iti tadvat eva asya sukham api bhavet  avāntara sāmagrī bhede api indriya artha manaskāra ja tvāt jñāna jātīya tvam iti ced  na kiñcid kāraṇa abhede api kārya bhedasya anākasmikatva upapatteḥ tad artha tvāt ca kāraṇa bheda anusaraṇa prayāsasya na ca upādāna abhedāt abheda iti yuktam bhinnānām api jñānānām eka samanantara pratyaya upādāna tvasya bhavabhdiḥ abhyupagata tvāt  api ca upādāna abhedaśrca kutaśrcid  kāraṇa bhedāt  kārya bhedaḥ ca iti kaḥ  virodhaḥ ata eva asmākam abhede api upādānasya piṭharasya auṣṇya apara ākhyasya ca vahina saṃyogasya pūrvarūpa ādi pradhvaṃsānām kāraṇānām bhedāt  bhinna jātīyā jāyante gandha rūpa rasa sparśā iti siddhāntaḥ tasmāt artha pravaṇebhyaḥ  jñānebhyaḥ tad apravaṇa tayā bhinna jātīyāḥ sukhādayaḥ  yathā sva muna kūla vedanīyatva ādibhiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ anyonyam api bhedavantaḥ tīvra saṃvega tayā pramitsā anapekṣa mānasa pratyakṣa pravedanīyā iti ramaṇīyam syāt etad  asati api indriya artha sannikarṣe jñāna mātrāt eva sukha duḥkhayoḥ svapna antike darśanāt  yatra api indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ tatra api jñānam asti iti tad eva sukha duḥkhayoḥ kāraṇam klupta sāmarthyāt  indriya artha sannikarṣasya tu jñāna mātra upayogāt anyathā siddhau bhāva abhāvau  iti tad ayuktam svapna antike sukha duḥkha utpādasya asiddheḥ tad jñānasya artha jñānasya iva mithyātvāt  yathā hi tatra kāminī smṛti viṣaryāsa eva mupalabdha cara tad janma sukha smaraṇa viparyāsaḥ sukha duḥkha buddhi utpāda eva ca atra dharma adharma upayogaḥ  na tu su sa duḥkha utpāde na ca asati indriya artha sannikarṣe jñānam anyat manoratha ādi vā tādṛśam sukha bhedam vidhatte yādṛśaḥ  viṣaya upabhoga janmā sati indriya artha sannikarṣe jñāna mātram eva tasya hetuḥ jñāna hetuḥ tu sukha bhedasya anutpādāt iti api uktam eva viṣaya sākṣātkāraḥ tad utpāda hetuḥ na viṣaya jñāna mātram iti ced  hantar iśvarasya api asti tatrabhavataḥ  yoga ṛddhi saṃpannānām ca mahā dhiyām samasta vastu sākṣa ātmāra iti teṣām api sukha duḥkha utpāda pracayaḥ prasajyet  asatyām pratipakṣa dhāraṇāyām tasmāt indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ  api sukha duḥkha utpāda hetuḥ eṣitavyaḥ sa ca sati api artha sākṣātkāre na asti siddhānām iti na teṣām sukha duḥkha utpādaḥ api ca carama bhāvi kāraṇam gṛhītvā pūrva bhāvināmakaraṇatva āpādane tantu ādīnām api paṭa ādīn pratyakāraṇatva prasaṅgaḥ saṃyoga bhedāt eva tādṛśa paṭāt patteḥ tantu ādīnām ca saṃyoga bheda eva upayogāt tad sahitasya tu tad kāraṇa tvam sannikarṣasya api ālocana sahitasya iti samānam yathā āhuḥ padārtha vidaḥ stragādi abhiprata viṣayasānnidhye satīṣṭa upalabdhi indriya artha sannikarṣa dharma ādi apekṣāt ātma manasoḥ saṃyogāt  yad anugraha abhiṣvaṅga nayana ādi prasāda janakam atpadyate tad sukham iti tasmāt  suṣṭhu uktam sukha ādi nivṛtti artham jñāna grahaṇam iti iha dvayī pratyakṣa jātiḥ avikalpikā sa vikalpikā ca iti tatra ubhayī api indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam jñānam avyabhicāri iti lakṣaṇena saṃgṛhītā api sva śabdena upāttā tatra vipratipatteḥ tatra avikalpikāyāḥ padam avyapadeśyam iti sa vikalpikāyāḥ rca vyavasāya ātmakam iti tatra vyapadeśaḥ  viśeṣaṇam upalakṣaṇam vā nāma jāti ādi tad  karma vyapadeśyam viśeṣyam iti yāvat  tad yathā ḍitthaḥ  ayam gaurayam śuklaḥ  ayam kamaṇḍalumānayam gacchati ayam iti sarvam hi sa vikalpakam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvena vastuṣu pravartate avidyamānam vyapadeśyam yasmiḥ tad avyapadeśyam jāti ādi svarūpa avagāhi na tu jāti ādīnām mithas  viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva avagāhi iti yāvat  tatra nāma rahitam avikalpakam na asti iti ye vipratipadyante tad matam apacikīrṣu rūpanyasyati bhāṣya kāraḥ yāvadartham vai nāmadheya śabdāḥ sarve arthāḥ sarvathā sarvadā sarvatra nāmadhayā anvitāḥ na asti saḥ  arthaḥ  yaḥ kadācid  kvacid  kathañcid  nāmadheyena viyujyate tad anena nāmadheya tādātmyam arthānām pratijānīte atra hetum āha taiḥ artha saṃpratyaya iti arthā hi pratīyamānām nāmadheyairūpetāḥ tad sāmāna adhi karaṇyena avagamyante gauḥ iti arthaḥ  aśva iti artha iti na ca upāyatayā sāmānādhikaraṇyam ghaṭate na hi cakṣuḥ ādi sāmānādhikaraṇyam rūpa ādi anubhavati na api jñāyamāna upāya upeya sāmānā adhikaraṇmanubhavati na hi bhavati dhūmaḥ  ayam vahinar iti kim tu dhūmaḥ  ayam dhūma tvāt  vahi namān iti api ca aśabda upāye anumeya ādau na śabda saṃbhedena adhigamaḥ  bhavet  asti tu tasmāt  taiḥ nāmadheyaiḥ saha samāna adhikaraṇasya arthasya pratyayaḥ yata iti tasmāt  nāmadheya ātmānaḥ arthāḥ kim ca gavā ādiṣu ṣaḍja ādiṣu ca śabda apakarṣe artha pratyaya apakarṣāt tad utkarṣe tu artha pratyaya utkarṣāt pratyayasya ca pratyetavya utkarṣa adhīna utkarṣa tvāt nāmadheya utkarṣeṇa arthasya utkarṣaḥ arthasya tādatmyam gamayati tad idam samaḥ prayojanam saṃpratyaya iti samadhikaḥ pratyaya iti arthaḥ asti artha saṃpratyayaḥ  nāmadheya sāmānādhikaraṇyena na tu etāvatā nāmadheya ātma tā sidhyati asti hi puras varti dravya sāmānādhikaraṇyena rajata pratyayaḥ na ca etāvatā śuktī rajata ātmikā bhavati iti ata āha artha saṃpratyayāt ca vyavahāraḥ tataśrcavi saṃvādāt  pramāṇam sat nāmadheya tādatmyam sādhayati arthānām iti arthaḥ tad evam sāmānyatas  arthānām nāmadheya tādātmyam vyutpādya prakṛte yojanayati tatra idam indriya artha sannikarṣāt utpannam viṣaya jñānam rūpam iti vā rasa iti vā evam rūpa ādi artha sāmānādhikaraṇyena bhavati bhavatu kim etāvatā api ityata āha rūpa rasa śabdāḥ rca viṣaya nāmadheyam kim etāvatā api ityata āha tena vyapadiśyate jñānam uktam api vyapadeśam savya ākhyānam āha rūpam iti jānīte rasa iti jānīte iti tathā ca arthānām nāmadheya ātmaka tvāt tad gocaram ālocanam api nāmadheya gocaram iti arthavat  nāmadheyena vyapadiśyamānam śābdam prasajyata iti na śabda pramāṇaka tayā śābdam api tu śabde jātam śābdam śabda śrcātra viṣaya tvena janakaḥ  artha tādātmyāt tathā ca na avikalpakam śabda rahitam asti iti tātparya arthaḥ tathā ca āhuḥ na saḥ  asti pratyayaḥ loke yaḥ śabda anugamāt ṛte anuviddham iva jñānam sarvam śabdena gamyate bālaka mūka ādīnām api jñānam śabda anuvyādhavat eva anādi śabda bhāvanā vaśāt yad avocat  ādyaḥ karaṇa vinyāsaḥ prāṇasya ūrdhvam samīraṇam sthānānām abhighātaśrca na vinā śabda bhāvanām iti tad asya nirākaraṇam lakṣaṇa gatena ālocana jñāna avarodha arthena avyapadeśya padena sūcitam iti parīkṣā parvaṇi vacana arham api subhāṣita ruci tayā tad vilambam asahamānaḥ  bhāṣya kāraḥ  lakṣaṇa avasara eva āha ata eva āha avyapadeśyam iti iti tena sūcite api arthe avyapadeśya padam cojayati yad idam anuma yukte śabda artha saṃbandhe artha jñānam na tad  nāmadheya śabdena vyapadiśyate ayam abhisandhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyena śabda ātmaka tvam rūpa ādīnām abhidhīyānam śabdabrahma ātmaka tvam vocyeta śreyamāṇa gauḥ ityādi pada bheda ātmaka tvam vā na tāvat ādya kalpaḥ na salvasmad ādi samasta darśana patha ativṛttena śabdabrahmaṇā rūpa ādīnām asti sāmānādhikaraṇya pratītiḥ laukikānām śrūyamāṇa śabda sāmānādhikaraṇyena tu tādātmya prasādhane anupayukta śabda saṃbandhasya bāla mūka ādeḥ rūpa ādi jñāneṣu na asti śrūyamāṇa śabda gandhaḥ  api prāk eva tu tad sāmānādhikaraṇyam na ca teṣām api prāc bhavīya śabda bhāvanā anugamena tad sāmāna ādhikaraṇyam iti sāṃpratam na khalu rūpa ādi ātmanaḥ śabdasya rūpa ādi vaiśadya ena avaiśadyam saṃbhavati yugapad  vaiśadyā vaiśadya rūpa viruddha dharma yogena bheda prasaṅgāt  veśadye tu vyutpannavat avyutpannaḥ  api śabdaiḥ vyavaharet  na tu saṃbandha grahaṇa pekṣeta na ca tādātmyāt anyat  vācaka tvam śabdānām yatra saṃbandha graha apekṣā bhavet  na ca tādātmye api kalpita bhedānām vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ tathā sati na sāmānādhikaraṇyam syāt  na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ  bheda kalpanā ca sāmānādhikaraṇya prathā ca iti tasmāt avyutpannānām asti śabda rahitam rūpa ādiṣu nirvikalpakam pratyakṣam iti na kevalam abyutpannānām vyutpannānām api asti iti āha gṛhīte api ca śabda artha saṃbandhe iti ārddhekta eva sāmānādhikaraṇya nirāsāya saṃbandha grahaṇa svarūpam āha astha arthasya sāsnādi mat rūpasya ayam gakara ādya ukāraḥ  nāmadheyam iti iti karaṇaḥ  jñāna parāmarśa pradhānaḥ tathā ca yaḥ  ḍitthaḥ  nānā deśa kāla avasthā saṃsṛṣṭaḥ piṇḍa bhedaḥ saḥ  ayam iti sannihita deśa kāla iti arthaḥ na tvayam piṇḍaḥ  ḍittha śabda iti pratyayaḥ autsargikam hi śabdānām artha paratvam kvacid  punar iti ādibhiḥ śabdaiḥ tad apa udyate yatra api saṃbandha pratipādanam abhedena ayam ḍittha iti tatra api śabdaḥ  vācyatva paraḥ  na svarūpa paraḥ yathā gauḥ vāhīka iti lakṣyamāṇa guṇa yoga paraḥ na ca tanmātreṇa vāhīkasya gaḥ tvam bhavati tasmāt  bhinnayoḥ eva śabda arthayoḥ saṃbandha grahāt  tad mūla tvāt ca śabda vyavahārasya na śabda puraḥsaram api jñānam śabda sāmānādhikaraṇyam ātmanaḥ  arthasya avagamayati yad tu śabdān upāye api jñāne śabdaḥ pūrvam bhavati tad gṛhīta saṅketasya prathamam indriya artha sannikarṣāt ālocanena śabda saṃsarga rahitena ālocite artha mātretasya artha bhedasya śabda bhedena saṃbandhāt  śabda viṣayaḥ saṃskāraḥ prabodhyate prabuddhaḥ śabda smṛtim janayati tena vyutpannasya nirvikalpakāt  parāñcaḥ pratyayāḥ śabdān upāyā api śabda puraḥsarā jāyante yathā āhuḥ yad  saṃjñā smaraṇam tatra na tad api anya hetukam piṇḍa eva hi dṛṣṭaḥ san saṃjñām smārayitum kṣamaḥ tasmāt  vyutpannasya api nāmadheya smaraṇāya pūrvam eṣitavyaḥ  vinā eva nāmadheyam artha pratyayaḥ tad idam uktam gṛhīte api śabda artha saṃbandhe asya arthasya ayam śabdaḥ  nāmadheyam iti yadā tu saḥ  arthaḥ  gṛhyate nāmadheya rahitaḥ  nāmadheya smaraṇāt  pūrvam avikalpena tadā pūrvasmāt  avyutpanna avasthāyām artha jñānāt  na viśiṣyate iti yatas  na viśiṣyate tasmāt  tad artha jñānam tādṛś eva bhavati nanu para pratipādana ādi lakṣaṇa vyavahārāya sva rūpeṇa jñāne vyapadeṣṭavye yad artha vyapadeśena vyapadiśyate tad avagacchāmaḥ  artha vyapadeśa ākāram iti katham ca artha ākāram bhavati yadi artha vyapadeśayoḥ nā bhedaḥ tasmāt  punar api tādātmyam prasaktam ityata āha tasya tu iti artha ākāram eva tu jñānam artha vyapadeśena vyapadiśyate anyathā aśakya tvāt iti arthaḥ pratīyamānam pareṇa upasaṃharati tasmāt iti tad evam artha jñāna kāle sa na samākhyā śabdaḥ  vyāpriyate pratīyamāna tayā vyavahāra kāle tu para pratyāyana kāle tu vyāpriyate kāraṇa tayā tad anena gopāla avi pāla ādīnām saṃjñā niveśanam tāsu tāsu vyaktiṣu vyavahāra utkarṣa hetuḥ na artha utkarṣa hetuḥ iti api sūcitam bhavati tasmāt  avikalpaka pratyakṣa avarodha arthena avyapadeśya padena asya eva avikalpakasya śabda anuvyādha rahita tā sūcitā iti āśayavān upasaṃharati tatmāt iti tad etad  bhāṣyam vārttikakāraḥ tātparyataḥ vyācaṣṭe tad ca indriya artha iti viṣaya bheda anuvidhāyi jñānam iti śabda ātma tām apāroti cākṣuṣam hi rūpa jñānam rūpa eva niyatam na śabde pravartate evam śrautram api śabda eva niyatam na rūpa ādau pravartate yadi punar idam śabda ātmakam rūpa ādi bhavet  śrotra jam jñānam śabda grāhī iti rūpa ādau  api pravarteta apravartamānam vā vidhurayati rūpa ādīnām śabda ātma tām api ca śrūyamāṇa śabda ātma tve rūpa ādīnām teṣām api śravaṇa grāhya tvam iti andhaḥ api rūpu gṛhṇīyāt  asti hi tasya śrotram ca śabda jñānam ca evam badhiraḥ  api śabdam gṛhṇīyāt  asti hi tasya locanam ca rūpa jñānam ca aśabdaḥ  abhāva iti ca vivakṣita viparīta āpattiḥ śabda abhāvasya arthasya śabda tvāt  aśabda tve vā sa eva asya arthaḥ śabdāt  bhinnaḥ prasajyate evam abhāvaḥ  api artha iti śabdaḥ syāt  tathā ca na abhāvaḥ śabdasya sattvāt  tathā ca artha anuvidhāyi vijñānam na bhavet  asti ca tasmāt  na śabda ātmānaḥ  arthā iti tad utpatti kāla iti prāthamyena śabda anuvyādham vyāvartayati eka deśi vyākhyānam āha apare tu iti indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa hi liṅgena yad indriya gāti jñānam tad api pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa upetam iti pratyakṣam prasajyata iti tad nivāraṇāya avyapadeśya padam apadeśaḥ  hetu vacanam tad eva tad ābhāsebhyaḥ  viśiṣṭam vyapadeśaḥ tasya kāryam hetu pratyāyana dvārā anumeya jñānam vyapadeśyam na vyapadeśyam avyapadeśyam aliṅga ubhdavam iti anumānam vyāvartitam iti arthaḥ tad eka deśi matam dūṣayati tad ca na evam iti nanu indriya gati jñānam api indriya artha sannikarṣāt liṅgāt utpannam ityata āha na hi anumeyasya iti na etad indraya artha sannikārṣāt upajāyate kim tu tad jñānāt  ata eva atīte api dhūma ādau liṅge tad smaraṇa mātrāt eva anumeya jñāna bhavati na ca sannikarṣa padasya mukhya tve saṃbhavati jñāna lakṣaṇā yuktetti bhāvaḥ upasaṃharati ata iti imam ca vārttika grantham abudhyamānā indriya gati jñāna nivṛtti artham indriya viṣayeṣu iti padam sūtre adhyāharanti iti krama prāptasya avyabhicāripadasya tātparyam brūvāṇaḥ  bhāṣyasya api tātparyam āha grīṣme marīcaya iti iti yadi api sāmānya lakṣaṇena eva vyabhicāriṇaḥ  nirastāḥ pratyayāḥ tad apekṣam ca viśeṣa lakṣaṇam anyathā anumāna ādi padeṣu api abhicā ādi padam upādeyam syāt  tathā api siddhe satya ārambhaḥ  niyama arthaḥ dvayī hi pramāṇānām gatiḥ kiñcid  sattā mātreṇa pramāsādhanam yathā pratyakṣam na hi cakṣuḥ ādīnām grahaṇam upayujyate api tu sattā eva anumāna ādīna tu sva jñānena pramāsā dhanāni na khalva gṛhītam liṅgam vā śabdaḥ  vā āgama sahitam sādṛśyam vā yathā viṣayam ādadhāti pramām tatra anumānasya pramopa jananāt  prāk eva artha avi abhicāra grahaṇam apekṣate na anyathā tatas  pramā sidhyati iti śabda ādau tu yadi api pramopa jananam prati na artha avi abhicāra graha apekṣā tathā api śakyam ati rohita artha mantra madhya patitasya drāk iti eva pratīyamāna arthasya api sṛṇī eva jarbharī turpharī tū iti evamādeḥ mantrasya āpta praṇetṛka tayā sāmānyatas  artha avyabhicāri tvam grahītum autsargikam hi śabdānām artha paratvam ata eva nigama nirukta vyākaraṇa sahāyāḥ tatas  artham avadhārayanti evam yathā mudga stambaḥ tathā mudgaparṇī iti āpta vākya śravaṇāt eva mudga stamba sādṛśya jñānasya anupajanita phalasya api śakyam tad artha avyabhicāri tvam niśrcetum pratyakṣasya tu pramāṇasya atyanta parokṣa svarūpa ulambha eva tāvat  pramopa jananāt  prāk  durlabhaḥ prāgeta tu tasya artha avi abhicāri tvam yadi api ca saṃvedana prāmāṇya pakṣe api tad saṃvedanam manasā sulabham tathā api na tanmātram pramāṇam api tu asādhāraṇa indriya artha sannikarṣa sahāyam iti tad sahāyasya tasya parokṣa tvam eva tena pratyakṣasya pramāṇasya phala avyabhicāreṇa eva avyabhicāra jñānam na svarūpataḥ iti etad  pramāṇa antarebhyaḥ  vyāvṛttam asādhāraṇam pratyakṣasya rūpam ādarśayitum avyabhicāri pada upādānam atha vā pratyakṣa avyabhicāra eva anumāna ādya vyabhicāre kāraṇam na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ  avyabhicarita pratyakṣa gṛhīta pakṣa dharma tākam tarka sahāya pratyakṣa gṛhīta  inābhāvam ca anumānam vyabhicārati iti yad tu bādhita viṣayam sat pratipakṣitam ca anumānam tad api yadi api prathamam vyāpti grahaṇa doṣeṇa na khaṇḍitam tathā api khaṇḍana uttara kālam saḥ  api pratīyate tathā ca vyāpti grāhi pratyakṣam tatra api vyabhicāri iti evam āgamaḥ  api sākṣāt  kvacid  pāramparyeṇa pratyakṣa pūrvakaḥ tad vyabhicāreṇa eva vyabhicarati āgama vyabhicāreṇa eva upamāna vyabhicāraḥ  vyākhyātaḥ tad evam pratyakṣa avyabhicāre pramāṇānām avyabhicāraḥ  asti iti pratyakṣasya eva viśeṣaṇam avyabhicāri padam cakāra na itareṣām pramāṇānām na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ tad mūlam pratyakṣam avyabhicāri tāni ca vyabhicārīṇi iti saḥ  ayam viśeṣaḥ pramāṇa antarebhyaḥ pratyakṣasya yathā āha mīmāṃsā vārttikakāraḥ pratyakṣa avyabhicāreṇa sva lakṣaṇa balena ca prasiddha avyabhicāritvā at na anumānam parīkṣyate iti tasmāt  suṣṭhūkam grīṣme marīcaya iti bhāṣyam tad pratiṣedha artham idam ucyate avyabhicāri iti pṛcchati kim idam iti uttaram yad atasmin  iti etad ca upapāditam dvitīya sūtre punar  dūṣayati tad ca na evam iti pṛcchati kasmāt  uttaram arthasya iti tad eva sphorayati yad tad iti atra ca na nirvikalmakam bhrāntam kim tu sa vikalpakam iti āha tān  tu marīcīn iti indriyeṇa ālocya marīcīn uccāvacam uccalataḥ  nirvikalpakena gṛhītvā paśrcāt  tatra upaghāta doṣāt  viparyeti sa vikalpa kaḥ  asya pratyayaḥ bhrāntaḥ  jāyate iti tasmāt  vijñānasya vyabhicāraḥ  na arthasya iti yathā āhuḥ nirukta kārāḥ na eṣa sthāṇoḥ aparādhaḥ  yad enam andhe na paśyati puruṣa aparādhaḥ sa bhavati iti avyabhicāri padena eva saṃśaya jñānam api vyudastam naḥ khalu saṃśaya jñānam vikalpyamāna vastu gocaram tad rūpam vastu prāpayati aprāpayat ca upadarśitam katham saṃvādam asaṃvādakam ca katham avyabhicāri tasmāt avyabhicāri padena eva saṃśaya jñāne niraste sa vikalpaka pratyakṣa avadodha artham upādīyamānam vyavasāya ātmaka padam saṃśaya jñāna pratyakṣa tāpa akaraṇam anvācinoti tad yathā edhāna āhaṛtum araṇyam gaccha śākam api āneṣyasi iti śāka ānayanam anvācīyate na ca tad eva asya preṣituḥ vi dhitsitam tathā iha api vyavasāya ātmaka padam sākṣāt sa vikalpakasya vācakam tathā hi vyavasāyaḥ  viniśrcayaḥ  vikalpa iti anarthāntaram sa eva ātmā rūpam yasya tad  sa vikalpakam pratyakṣam tad etad ati sphaṭa tvāt  śiṣyaiḥ gamyata eva iti bhāṣya vārtti kakārābhyām avyākhyātam api asmābhiḥ trilocana gurunnīta mārga anugamana unmukhaiḥ yathānyāyam yathāvastu vyākhyātam idam īdṛśam syāt etad  na vyavasāya ātmakam pratayakṣam bhavitum arhati abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya pratibhāsam hi tad  na ca indriya arthābhyām labdha janma vijñānam artha avabhāsam śakyam abhilāpena yojanayitum na hi arthe śabdāḥ santi artha ātmanaḥ  vā tathā satya vyutpannasya api vyutpannavat  vyavahāraḥ syāt iti uktam na ca abhilāpaḥ  artha asaṃsparśaḥ  saṃvedana dharmaḥ artheṣu tad niyojanāt  tasmāt arthāt upajāyamānam jñānam artham eva ādarśayet na abhilāpam na hi rūpāt  jāyamānam pratyakṣam rasa sahitam etad ādarśayati tasmāt abhilāpa saṃsarga anapekṣam abhilāpa saṃsargiṇam ādarśayat  vikalpa vijñānam vikalpa vāsanā utthāpitam aniyata artha grāhi māna sam ātmīyam utprekṣā lakṣaṇam vyāpāram tiraskṛtya anubhava prabhava tayā anubhava vyāpāram darśanu puraskṛtya pravartamānam anubhava tayā abhimanyante pratipattāraḥ tad  siddham etad  yad artha sāmarthya labdha janma na tad  śabda kalpanā anugatam yathā nirvikalpakam artha sāmarthya labdha janma āraḥ rca vivāda adhyāsitā vikalpā iti prasaṅga sādhana viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ śabda kalpanā anugata tvasya hi pratiṣedhyasya viruddham tad ananugata tvam tena artha sāmarthya ja tvam vyāptam tasya upalabdhiḥ tad ananugata tvam utthāpayantī tad anugata tvam virūṇadhi iti atha eṣām pratyayānām pratyakṣam abhi lāpa anugata tvam aśakya apahnavam hanta bhoḥ na artha sāmarthya ja tvam iti prasaṅga viparyayaḥ tathā hi yad abhilāpa kalpanā anugatam na tad artha sāmarthya jam yathā īśvara pradhāna ādi vikalpa vijñānam tathā ca ete vivāda adhyāsitā vikalpā iti vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ niṣedhyam artha sāmarthya ja tvam tad abhilāpa kalpanā ananugata tvena vyāptam tad viruddham ca sat anugata tvam iti na ca sandigdha vyatirekitā artha sāmarthyena hi tad utpadyamānam artha rūpam anukuryāt  na śabda rūpam na hi arthe śabdāḥ santi tad ātmānaḥ  vā iti uktam asaṃbaddha rūpa anukāre tu vijñānasya sarva rūpa anukāreṇa sarva sarva jñāta āpattiḥ ati saṅketa vaśāt  śabdānām artha saṃbandhena artha upalabdhau tad smaraṇāt  tad saṃsṛṣṭa vedanam iti ced  yatra tarhi te kṛta saṅketāḥ tad eva smārayet etān tatra eva ca te kṛta saṅketā yad anugatam sāmānyam na ca tad dṛṣṭam kim tu sva lakṣaṇam darśana gocaraḥ tad eva hi parama artha sat vijñānasya kāraṇam na tu sāmānyam sarva sāma arthyayahitam hi tad  alīka tvāt  tasmāt  yad  dṣṭam na tena śabdānām saṃbandhaḥ yena ca saṃbandhaḥ  na tad dṛṣṭam api ca dṛṣṭasya śabda vācya tve darśanāt iva vahina ruṣṇa iti vākyāt api pratīyeta tathā ca śabdāt api tasmin pratīte śīta apanopana prasaṅgaḥ sāmānya viṣayauliṅga śabdau vastu bhūta sāmānyavat ca sva lakṣaṇam tādṛśam ca tad darśanasya kāraṇam iti nirvikalpakena prathama akṣa tad nipāta janmanā jātimat vastu vedanāt  tatra upalabdha cara saṃbandhasya śabdasya smaraṇam tathā ca tad śabda abhidheya jāti viśiṣṭa dravya avagāhi indriya artha sannikarṣa janmā vikalpa pratyayaḥ gauḥ ayam iti evam ākāraḥ  jāyata iti ced  yathā āhuḥ nirvikalpaka bodhena dvi ātmakasya api vastunaḥ grahaṇam ślaḥ  vā pratyakṣa tathā tatas  param punarvastu dharmaiḥ jāti ādibhiḥ yayā buddhyā avasīyate sā api pratyakṣa tvena saṃmatā ślaḥ  vā pratyakṣa iti tad na piṇḍa vivekena jāti ādeḥ avikalpakena agrahaṇāt  na hi jāti jāti bhantau vā kriyā kriyāvantau va guṇa guṇinau vā tad samavāyaḥ  vā vivekena cakāsati na ca vivekena apratibhāsamānaḥ śakyā mithas  yojayitum kṣīra udakavat atad vedinā tasmāt ekam avibhāgam sva lakṣaṇam anādi vikalpa vāsanā samāropita jāti ādi bhedam tathā vikalpyata iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ api ca parama artha sat vastu dvaya vedane api kutaḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ na hi aṅgulyau  eka vijñāna viṣayau mithas  viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvam āpadyete viśeṣaṇa khalu upakārakam upakāryam ca viśeṣyam na anyathā tayoḥ tabhdāvaḥ na ca eka vijñāna samārūḍhayoḥ jñāpyajñāpaka bhāvaḥ  vā kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ  vā saṃbhavī samāna kālayoḥ tayā ūrūbhayoḥ api paurvāparya niyamāt  api ca vastu niveśe jāti ādīnām upādhīnām ekasya vastunaḥ sattvam ca dravya tvam ca pārthiva tvam ca vṛkṣa tvam ca śiṃśapā tvam ca upādhaya iti dūrāt eka upādhi viśiṣṭasya grahe sarva upādhi viśiṣṭa graha prasaṅgaḥ tathā hi ādhāra ādheya bhāva upakāra garbhaḥ  bhavati patana dharmaṇaḥ  hi badarasya uttarasya kuṇḍamadharam pratayā sannam apatana dharmakam badaram vidadhat ādhāraḥ tadvat iha api dravyeṇa jāti ādīnām upādhīnām upakartavyam na ca śakti antarairūpa karoti śakti antarapakāre api śakti antaraukalpanāyām anavasthā pātāt  tasmāt  svabhāva eva sva kāraṇa adhīna janmā dravyasya sa tādṛśaḥ  yena bahūnām upādhīnām upakaroti iti vācyam tathā ca sattva upakāra samarthem tasmin dravye gṛhyamāṇe dravyatva ādi upakāra samarthaḥ  api sa eva asya svabhāva iti tad svabhāva avacchinnāḥ sattva vikalpakena parama artha sat dravya avagāhinā sarva eva dravyatva pārthivatva vṛkṣatva śiśapā tvādayaḥ  viṣayīkṛtā iti vikalpa antarāṇām ānarthakyam yad āha yasya api nānā upādheḥ dhī grāhika arthasya bhedinaḥ nānā upādhi upakāra aṅga śakya bhinna ātmanaḥ  grahe sarva ātmanā upakāryasya kaḥ  bhedaḥ syāt aniśrcitaḥ eka upakārake grāhye na upakārāḥ tatas  apare dṛṣṭe tasman  adṛṣṭā ye tad grahe sakala grahaḥ iti asmākam tu anādi vikalpa vāsanā upādānā vikalpā yad ca gṛhṇanti yad ca adhyavasyanita tayā ūrūbhayoḥ api anya nivṛtti rūpa tayā avastu tvāt  matāgapi na parama artha sad vastu gāhante pāramparyeṇa tu vastu pratibandhāt  tatra pravartayantaḥ prāpayantaḥ ca na visaṃvādayanti lokam atas  vastu sabhdāva aviniveśāt  vikalpānām na pauna rūkti am asti api ca āla ucite vastuni indriyeṇa tad anantara utpannam śabda smaraṇa vyavahita vyāpāram indriyam arthaḥ rca na sa vikalpikām api dhiyam upajanayitum arhataḥ yathā āha artha upayoge api punar  smārtam śabda anuyojanam akṣadhīrya di apekṣeta saḥ  arthaḥ  vyavahitaḥ  bhavet  na ca yad eva ālocanam ajījanat indriyam tad eva smaraṇa sahakāri vikalpa pratyayam ādhatte na ca smṛtiḥ vyavadhāyikā sva aṅgam avyavadhāyakam iti nyāyāt  yatas  yaḥ prāc ajana kaḥ  buddhe rūpa yoga aviśeṣataḥ sa paśrcāt api iti naḥ khalu atītam bhavati gocaraḥ  akṣasya na ca agocare sahasreṇa api upāyaiḥ etad pravartitum arhati na ca smṛtiḥ atīta viṣayān anubhūta pūrvam vartamānam gocarayitum arhati tad gocara tve ca andhānām api rūpa sākṣātkāra prasaṅgaḥ yathā āha tena syāt akṣa apāye api netra dhīḥ iti tad evam nāma jāti guṇa karma kalpanāḥ pratyakṣa tvena parāḥ tāḥ dravya kalpanā api daṇḍī iti viśeṣaṇam viśeṣyam ca saṃbandham laukikīm sthitim gṛhītvā saṅkalayya etad  tathā pratyeti na anyathā na ca etāvantam vyāpāra kalāpam vicāraka nivartanīyam indriya jñānam sahate tasya sannihita viṣaya balena utpatteḥ avicāraka tvāt  jāti guṇa kriyāvatām ca etad na saṃbhavati eva rūpa viveka saṃbandhayoḥ apratibhāsanena ghaṭanā yogāt kṣīrodakavat atad vedinā iti uktam tasmāt  na tad vikalpam pratyakṣam iti atra ucyate yad  tāvat uktam artha sāmarthya jatvā abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya pratibhā sattvayoḥ virodha iti tatra brūmaḥ syāt  virodhaḥ  yadi sva lakṣaṇam eva arthaḥ na tu etad asti upapādayiṣyati hi parama artha santam jāti ādi mantam artham sthema bhājam abhilāpa saṃsarga yogyam tena tad janitam jñānam artha sāmarthya jam ca abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya pratibhāsam ca iti na virodhaḥ tathā ca prasaṅga sādhanasya sandigdha vyatirekitā na ca dravya ādi abhinnam jātyādi bhinnam kalpayantaḥ  vikalpā na artha sāmarthya janmāna iti sāṃpratat dravyāt api hi bhedaḥ sādhayiṣyate teṣām yathā ca bhede api teṣām tad vācakānām sāmānādhikaraṇyam tathā upapāditam adhastāt na ca bhinnena śabdena ḍitthaḥ  ayam iti abheda kalpanādarthasya vikalpānām anartha ja tvam iti yuktam uktam etad  avyapadeśya pada vyākhyāna avasare yathā na śabda abhedena arthayoḥ eka indriya jñāna saṃsargi tā kim tu prathamam ālā ucitaḥ  arthaḥ sāmānya viśeṣavān saṅketa grahaṇsamaya vartinīm ātmanaḥ  avasthām smārayan tad kāla bhāvinam śabdam api smārayati avarjanīya tayā na tu indriya ja vikalpa utpādam pratyasti upayogaḥ kaścid  śabda smaraṇasya anyathā bālamūka ādīnām na indriya jaḥ syāt vikalpaḥ śabda smaraṇa abhāvāt saṅketa samaya varti avasthā smaraṇam tu upayujyate vastunaḥ tadānīntanedāni intana avasthā bhedavata ekasya indriya jena vikalpena akalanāt  śabdaḥ tu saṃpāta āyātaḥ na niveśayati ātmānam indriya je vikalpe yathā āha devadatta ādi śabdana hṛdaya sthena yaḥ smṛtaḥ cakṣuṣā api sa eva ayam piṇḍaḥ saṃprati dṛśyate anena hi piṇḍasya pūrva apara avasthā vartinīm eka tām indi yaja vikalpa gocara tvena darśayati na tu śabda niveśanam api tathā saṃjñā hi smaryamāṇā api pratyakṣa tvam na bādhate saṃjñinaḥ kutas  sā taṭa avasthā na rūpa ācchādana kṣamā na artha indriya vyāpāram vyavadhatte iti arthaḥ na ca prāc avasthā smaraṇa sāpekṣa tayā na indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ kāraṇam vikalpasya iti sāṃpratam yatas  na kiñcid ekam ekasmāt  sāmagryāḥ sarvaṃsaṃbhavaḥ pra vā iti bhavantaḥ  api āhuḥ anyathā āloka manaskāra sāpekṣam artha indriyam nirvikalpakam api na janayet  yad tu prathamam na ajījanat tad  smaraṇa sahakāri virahāt  na hi na ajījanat kuśūla stham bījam aṅkuram iti na samavahita kṣiti ādi sahakāri grāmam api asya ājanakam bhavati na ca janakatvā janakatva lakṣaṇaḥ  viruddha dharma saṃsargaḥ  bheda hetuḥ iti upapādayiṣyate kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅge syāt etad  atīta avasthā na indriya gocaraḥ tasya vartamāna arthe niyamāt  na ca vartamānaḥ  arthaḥ smaraṇa gocaraḥ smaraṇasya anubhava janita saṃskāra udbodha janmanaḥ pūrva anubhava gocaram prati niyamāt  tasmāt  bhinna viṣaya tayā na indriya sahakāritā smaraṇasya na hi rūpa viṣayāḥ sahasram api nayana pradīpa ādayaḥ śabda viṣayasya śravasaḥ sahakāritām āpadyanta iti tad  kim bhavatām yatra gandha jñāna anantaram cākṣuṣam rūpa jñānam jāyate tatra gandha jñānam na samanantara pratyayaḥ tatra api hi cakṣū rūpa viṣayam na gandha viṣayasya jñānasya sahakāri bhavitum arhati bhinna viṣaya tvāt eva atha anvaya vyatireka nibandhanaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ  na samāna viṣaya tvam anuvidhīyate iti ucyetra tad asmākam api samānam nanu atīta avasthā viśiṣṭa tvam asya na indriya sannikṛṣṭam iti katham pratyakṣam tad  kim yad indriya saṃbaddham tad  pratyakṣam tathā satya ākāśa paramāṇu ādayaḥ  api tad saṃyuktā iti te api pratyakṣāḥ prasajyeran tasmāt  yad eva indriya jasya jñānasya gocaraḥ tad  pratyakṣam na tu indriya saṃbaddham nanu asaṃbaddham indriyam katham tatra jñānam janayati tad ca jñānam katham pratyakṣam pratyakṣam ced  katham indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iti lakṣaṇam pratyakṣam vyāpnoti asya eva pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇena āvyānāt  mā bhūt arthasya pūrva kāla varti tā indriya gocaraḥ tathā api smaraṇa sahakāriṇā saṃskāra sahakāriṇa indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa upajanitam tad indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam na bhavati tathā ca na avyāpakam asya lakṣaṇam nanu pūrva apara avasthā parāmarśi jñānam katham ekam  viṣaya bhedāt  pārokṣyā pārokṣya lakṣaṇa viruddha dharma saṃsargāt ca tathā hi tad iti pārokṣyam idam iti ca sākṣātkāraḥ na ca viruddha dharma saṃsarge api ekatvam trailākyasya ekatva prasaṅgāt  viṣaya bhedaśrca pūrva deśa kāla apara deśa kāla saṃbandhayoḥ ekasya virodhāt  yathā hi ekasmin padmarāga maṇau gṛhyamāṇe tad abhāvaḥ  vyavacchidyate yadi punar nam vyavacchidyeta tadā bhāvaḥ na paricchidyeta tasya svābhāva vyavaccheda rūpa tvāt tad abhāva avinābhāvinaśrca puṣparāga ādaya iti te api sarve vayava  chinna bhavanti yadi punar na vyavacchit yaran sa eva puṣparāgāt yatma iti tad avinā bhāvī padmarāga abhāvaḥ padmarāgaḥ rca syāt iti durghaṭam āpadyeta evam tasya eva pūrva deśa kāla saṃbandhe gṛhyamāṇe tad abhāva vyavaccheda krameṇa apara deśa kāla saṃbandhaḥ  vyavacchinnaḥ pūrva deśa kāla saṃbandha abhāva avyabhicārī tathā ca na pada deśa kāla saṃbandha svabhāvaḥ tathā api yadi asau tad deśa kāla saṃbandhāt anya svabhāvaḥ  bhavet  tathā sati sa eva bhavet  na bhavet ca iti durghaṭam āpadyeta tasmāt  pūrva deśa kāla saṃbandhāt anyaḥ  apara deśa kāla saṃbandha iti siddhaḥ  viṣaya bheda iti atra ucyate yadi parokṣya apārokṣya dharma bhedāt  pūrva apara avasthā parāmarśi jñānam bhidyeta hanta bhoḥ tad iti api vikalpaḥ  bhidyeta saḥ  api hi parokṣaḥ ca aparokṣaḥ rca vikalpaḥ ca avikalpaḥ rca arthe parokṣaḥ  vikalpaḥ rca sva ātmani tu avikalpaḥ  aparokṣaḥ rca tasmāt  viṣaya bhodāt  virodha iti ced  na tu iha api tad ekam jñānam tasya eva ekasya vastunaḥ pūrva deśa kāla saṃbandhe parokṣam aparokṣam vā para deśa kāla saṃbandha iti kaḥ  virodhaḥ yaḥ  api kāla deśa saṃbandha bhedena viṣaya bheda uktaḥ saḥ  api ayuktaḥ yatas  yuktam yad  padmarāga svarūpa grahe tad abhāvaḥ  vyavacchidyata iti svābhāva vyavaccheda ātmaka tvena bhāvānām tad avyavacchede svarūpa agrahaṇa prasaṅgāt  kasmāt  punar  puṣparāgāt ayaḥ  vyavacchidyante padmarāga abhāvauvinā abhāvāt iti ced  atha etad abhāva avinā bhāva jñānam kutastyam tayoḥ kadācid api tādā tmi ena anupalambhāt iti ced  yatra tarhi tādātmyam upalabhyate na tatra tad abhāva avinābhāvaḥ tathā ca pūrva apara deśa kāla saṃbaddhaḥ tādātmyena anubhūyamāna indriya jena vikalpena padmarāgaḥ  na bhinnaḥ bhavitum arhati tasmāt  parva apara deśa kālau tad saṃndhau vā kāmam bhidyeyātām paraspara abhāva avina abhāvāt tayoḥ ekadā api tādātmyena apratibhāsanāt na tu tad āliḍri gata svabhāvaḥ padmarāga maṇi tasya tābhyām anya tvāt  na ca anyasya bhedaḥ  anyasya bhedam āpādayati atiprasaṅgāt  na ca indriya artha sannikarṣa abhāve api pūrva apara avasthā parāmarśa ātmanaḥ  vikalpasya bhāvāt anindriya jaya tvam iti sāṃpratam tathā satya vikalpakam api kāma āturasya kāminīm bhāvayataḥ tad viṣayam indriya artha sannikarṣam vinā api dṛṣṭam iti nīla ādi anubhāva ātmānaḥ  api avikalpakā anindriya jāḥ prasajyeran yadi tu nīla ādi anubhavānām kāminī anubhavāt  kathañcid  viśeṣam brūyāta tadā asmākam api anindriya jebhyaḥ  vikalpebhya utprekṣā vyāpārebhyaḥ  asti indriya jānām darśana vyāpārāṇām bhedaḥ na ca vikalpa gataḥ  darśana vyāpāraḥ  anubhūyamānaḥ sati saṃbhave nirvikalpa ka upa ādhiḥ iti yuktam sarvā eva hi indriya jā buddhayaḥ  vikalpikā avikalpikā vā dhārāvāhinyaḥ amahamikayā paraspara anapekṣā ekam artham avagāhamānā udayante vyayante ca na tu amūṣām anyonyam anugamya anugantṛtām īkṣāmahe tasmāt  indriya artha sannikarṣa labdha janmānaḥ  vikalpā darśana vyāpārā na anya iti yuktam utpaśyamaḥ na ca śabda pratyakṣayoḥ vastu gocara tve sati api pratyaya abhedaḥ kāraṇa bhedena pārokṣya apārokṣya bheda upapatteḥ na ca vahina saṃyoga janmā śīta apanodaḥ  vahina jñānāt  bhavitum arhati na ca eka upādhinā sattvena viśiṣṭe tasmin gṛhīte upādhi antara viśiṣṭa tad graha prasaṅgaḥ svabhāvaḥ  hi dravyasya upādhibhiḥ viśiṣyate na tu upādhayaḥ va taiḥ viśiṣṭa tvam vā tasya svabhāvaḥ na ca yad  svabhāva saṃbandhi sa svabhāvaḥ tathā satya saṃbandhi tvam eva na hi tad eva tena saṃbadhyate api ca rūpa jñānam viṣaya grahaṇa dharma nānā paramāṇu viṣayam na paramāṇu svabhāvaḥ tad svabhāva tve vā teṣām sarvān pratyaviśeṣāt  sarvaiḥ eva te paramāṇavaḥ  viditāḥ syuḥ na ca asaṃbaddhā eva sva jñānena rūpa paramāṇavaḥ  viṣayāḥ tasya iti vācyam asaṃbaddhasya viṣaya tve ati prasaṅgāt  svabhāva eva artha jñāna bhedayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ  yad arthaḥ  viṣayaḥ  jñānam ca viṣayi iti ced  hanta upādhi upādhimatoḥ api svabhāva eva saṃbandhaḥ  astu tathā api vijñāna arthavat na svarūpa abhedaḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga pariṇāma nirākaraṇe tu svabhāva atiriktam saṃbandham upapādayiṣyāmaḥ tasmāt  na eka upādhi anvita grahaṇe sakala upādhi anvita pratyaya prasaṅgaḥ yad ca eka vijñāna gocarayoḥ na viśeṣya viśeṣaṇa bhāva iti tatra brūmaḥ bhinna jñāna gocara tve api na asau saṃbhīti na hi viśeṣaṇa jñānam viśeṣya aviṣayam viśeṣyam avacchettum arhati evam viśeṣya jñānam api viśeṣaṇā viṣayam kena sva viṣayam avacchindyāt  tayoḥ paraspara vārtā anabhijña tvāt tābhyām vāsanā tatas  mānasa pratyayaḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva ākara utpadyate na tu asti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ  vāstava iti ced  astu tāvat  vāstavā  āstava cintā kariṣyate hi iyam upariṣṭāt  yaḥ tu bhavatām asya mānasa tve prayāsaḥ sa varam indriya jatva eva bhavatu tathā sati darśana vyāpāra tvam asya sākṣāt  samarthitam bhavati itarathā hi nirvikalpa kopa dhānam kalpyeta nanu avicārakam indriya jñānam katham viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya ādi sakalam saṃkalayet  hanta bhoḥ kim mānasam api jñānam saṃkalayitum arhati saṃkalayati manasaḥ tad kāraṇasya sarva viṣaya tvāt iti ced  yadi pūrvakam vijñānam manaḥ katham tasya sarva viṣaya tā asmākam tu manaḥ sarva viṣayam api acetana tayā na vicārakam tasmāt ātmā eva sakala jñāna tad janita vāsanā ādhāraḥ smartā ca pratisandhātā ca yathā āha ātmani eva sthitam jñānam sa hi boddha atra gamyate smaraṇe ca asya sāmarthyam sandhāna ādau ca vidyate ślaḥ  vā pratyakṣa sa salu indriya artha sannikarṣāt ālocya jātimantam saṃmugdham artham udbuddha saṃskāra samupajāta pūrva piṇḍa anusmṛti sahāyaḥ prāk eva cakṣuṣā vikalpayati gauḥ ayam iti yathā āha karaṇam ca indriyam buddheḥ kartā ca ātma sa cetanaḥ sa ca smṛti samartha tvāt  sarva arthān kalpayiṣyati tena eka vijñāna vedya tve yadi api jñāpya jñāpaka bhāva rūpa upakārya upakāraka bhāvaḥ  na asti tathā api tad artha ālocana anugata smaraṇayoḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva avagāhi vijñānam pratyutpādaka tvam eva upakāraka tvam asti arthau hi rūpa rūpi bhāvena sthitau  api na āpāta janmanā jñānena tathā gṛhītau api tu sva rūpa mātreṇa na hi yāvat asti tāvat  grahītavyam tena tad eka deśa grahe api na apramāṇa tā sa vikalpakam tu ukta sāmagrī janma jāti ādi rūpa tayā dravyam ca rūpitayā kalpayat  paścāt jāyamānam api indriya artha sannikarṣa prabhava tayā pratyakṣam bhavati eva akramasya api ca kramavat sahakāri bheda samavadhāna vaśāt  krameṇa kārya karaṇam upapādayiṣyate tad  siddham etad  vivāda adhyāsitā vikalpāḥ sva gocare pratyakṣā avyabhicāri tve sati indriya artha sannikarṣa ja tvāt yaḥ  ya evaṃbhūtaḥ sa sarpaḥ pratyakṣaḥ  yathā ālocanam tathā ca etad  tasmāt  tathā iti tasmāt  sa vikalpaka pratyakṣa avarodha artham vyavasāya ātmaka padam iti siddham tad asya sa vikalpaka pratyakṣa avarodha arthasya anvācīyamānaḥ  vyavacchedaḥ tad vyavacchedya pratipādana artham bhāṣyam anubhāṣyān vācīyamānam eva vyavasāya ātmaka padasya artham āha dūrāt cakṣuṣā iti na ca etad mantavyam iti bhāṣyam vyācikhyāsuśrcodayati na saṃśayasya iti nanu sati indriya artha sannikarṣe puras vartini dravye dhūma iti vā reṇuḥ iti vā jñānam utpadyamānam katham anindriya jam iti ata āha na hi iti kasmāt mānasa iti ata āha saṃśītiḥ iti saṃpūrva u hi śīḍ bhāva pratyaya antaḥ  viśeṣa apekṣe vimarśe vartate sa ca eka adhikaraṇau smaryamāṇau mithas  viruddhau dharmau  āropayan anyatarat na avadhārayati tathā ca adhikaraṇa mātra samarpaṇam indriya javya apāraḥ manasā tu smaraṇa sahakāriṇā eva puruṣaḥ saṃśete ata eva visphārita akṣāḥ saudāminī saṃpātāt  sakṛt ālocya kañcid  samāna dharmavantam dharmiṇam samandhakāre sandigdhe tasmāt mānasa eva eṣa saṃśayaḥ  na tu indriya ja iti arthaḥ tad etad pariharan na ca etad ityādi bhāṣyam vca ācaṣṭe tad ca na evam kasmāt  saṃśayasya iti ubhayam tu iti tu śabdaḥ  manaḥ mātra nimitta tvam vyavacchinatti tad anena cakṣuṣā hi ityādi bhāṣyam vyākhyātam paśyan samāna dharmāṇam dharmiṇam na avadhārayati viśeṣataḥ sandigdhe tasmin  iti arthaḥ indriyeṇa upalabdham sannikṛṣṭam sannikarṣa pūrvaka tvāt uparladheḥ manasā upalabhate jānīte cakṣuḥ sahāyena iti arthaḥ atra bhāṣyam yad ca tad indrayāna vadhāraṇa pūrvakam manasā anavadhāraṇam tad viśeṣa pekṣam vimarśa mātram saṃśayaḥ na parvam iti anavadhāraṇa śabdaḥ  ayam saṃśaya jñāna vācakaḥ sva kāraṇa indriya artha sannikarṣe prayukta upacāreṇa uparata indriya vyāpārasya hi saṃśaya jñāna darśanāt sati api indriya vyāpāre saṃśayaḥ  na indriya ja iti codakaḥ  abhimanyate tad anayoḥ saṃśaya jñānayoḥ madhye yad  tad indriya avadhāraṇa pūrvakam indriya artha sannikarṣa pūrvakam manasā anavadharaṇam saṃśaya jñānam iti arthaḥ na pūrvam yad uparata indriya vyāpārasya saṃśaya jñānam dṛṣṭānta tayā hṛdi sthitam śaṅkituḥ iti arthaḥ tad etad  bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe tatra yad indriya artha iti indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ ca asau  anavadhāraṇam ca iti karmadhā arayaḥ tad pūrvakam manasā anavadhāraṇam saṃśaya jñānam iti arthaḥ nanu smaraṇa vyavahita vyāpāram asya kāraṇam na indriyam iti ata āha tasya hi iti upapāditam etad adhastāt  yathā smaraṇam na indriya vyāpāram vyavadhatta iti pūrvam tu iti dṛṣṭanta tayā pūrva tvam syāt etad  mana eva indriya anapekṣam bāhye pravartate iti abhyupeyam anyathā ghaṭam aham jānāmi iti jñānam nirnimittam syāt  na tāvat indriya jam āntare jñāne cakṣuḥ ādīnām apravṛtteḥ na api anumāna ādiṣu antarbhavati liṅga ādi abhāvāt  tasmāt mānasa bheva idam yadi ca ghaṭa ādau bāhye na manaḥ pravartena katham ghaṭam iti bhavet  jānāmi iti eva syāt  na ca artha nirupaṇam antareṇa jñāna rūpa nirūpaṇam tasmāt  bāhya abhyantara viṣayam manaḥ tathā ca sarva eva saṃśayaḥ  mānasa iti āśaṅkya āha bhāṣya kāraḥ sarvatra ca pratyakṣa viṣaye iti yadi api ayam īdṛśaḥ  anuvyavasāyaḥ  mānasaḥ tathā api andha badhira ādīnām abhāvāt tad pūrvam vyavasāya utpattau cakṣuḥ ādi apekṣaṇīyam anyathā andha badhira ādi abhāva prasaṅgaḥ tathā ca saṃśaya jñāna utpāde api indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ  apekṣaṇīya iti bhāvaḥ tad idam tasya hi ityādinā vārttikena vyākhyātam avyāpaka tvena lakṣaṇa ākṣepa param bhāṣyam ātma ādiṣu ityāti tad  vyācaṣṭe indriya artha iti codayati katham punar iti pariharati indriya iti mā bhūt indriya sūtre pāṭhaḥ tad hi bāhya indriya lakṣaṇam āntaram ca mana iti ata āha pṛthak  ca iti na ca sukha ādau pramāṇa antaram asti tasmāt  pāriśeṣyāt  sat him pratyakṣa tvam iti āha pratyakṣa aśrca iti nanu na ete prameyāḥ sva saṃvedana siddha tvāt tad  kim atra prameya arthena pramāṇena iti ata āha na ca teṣām iti nanu uktam sva saṃvedana tayā na pramākarma bhāva eṣām ityata āha na ca anyā gatiḥ iti saṃvedana tvena hi teṣām sva saṃvedana tā na ca ete saṃvedanam iti uktam adhastāt iti bhāvaḥ ākṣepanupasaṃharati tasmāt iti bhāṣye ca ātma ādiṣu sukha ādiṣu iti nitya anitya abhiprāyam varga dvayam ātma sukha duḥkha tvāt ayaḥ  nityāḥ anityāḥ ca sukha duḥkha ādaya iti tad idam uktam dignāgena na sukha ādi prameyam vā manaḥ  vāstu indriya antaram na ca tad  saṃbhavati ghrāṇa ādi sūtreṇa vibhāga pareṇa niṣedhāt iti bhāvaḥ samādhi bhāṣyam indriyasya vai sataḥ iti tad vyāci khyā suḥ gūḍha abhiprāyaḥ pṛcchati kaḥ ca evam iti ākṣeptuḥ uttaram indriya artha iti samādhātā āha na eṣa doṣa iti ākṣeptuḥ anuśaya bījam udghāṭya dūṣayati yad tu sūtre iti na idam vibhāga param ghrāṇa ādi sūtram api tu lakṣaṇa param tatra ca indriyam api manaḥ  na lakṣitam vaidharmyāt iti arthaḥ vaidharmyam āha vaidharmyam iti tatra pramāṇayati sarva viṣayam tu iti vaidharmya antaram dūṣayati bhautika iti kāryasya hi viśeṣau bhautikatva abhautika tve bhūta kāryam bhautikam yad  bhūta kāryam na bhavati tad abhautikam bhūta kāryatva pratiṣedha śrca tad anya kārya tvam gamayati viśeṣa niṣedhasya viśeṣa antara abhyanujñāna hetu tvāt itarathā tu akāryam eva ucyeta na tu abhautikam iti tasmāt akāryasya manasaḥ  abhautika tvam kārya dharmaḥ  viruddham iti arthaḥ api ca vaidharmyāt  manaḥvat  śrotram api na vaktavyam iti āha śrotre ca iti śaṅkate sva artha iti bhūtāni hi ghrāṇa ādīni śrotra antāni manaḥ tu na bhūtam iti vaidharmyam iti arthaḥ nirākaroti tad ca na iti darśayiṣyati hi vārttikakāraḥ  yathā sva arthikaḥ  na kaśrcit api pratyaya iti arthaḥ ākṣepa hetum anubhāṣate yad  purar iti dūṣayati na na asti iti tad adena sati ca indriya artha sannikarṣe ityādi bhāṣyam vyākhyātam yad ca aparam vaidharmyam ghrāṇa ādibhyaḥ  manasa uktam bhāṣya kāreṇa tad api siṃha avalokanena dūṣayati sa guṇānām iti ghrāṇa ādīni yathā sva sva guṇena gandha ādinā bāhyam gandha ādi bodhayanti na evam sva guṇena śabdena śrotram bāhyam śabdam bodhayati tad manaḥvat  śrotram api ghrāṇa ādi sūtre na paṭhitavyam iti arthaḥ bhāṣya ukteṣu madhya abhimatam vaidhamyam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti bhūtatva abhūtatva lakṣaṇam vaidharmyam na bhautikatva abhautikatva grahaṇena śakyam vaktum iti avadhāraṇa abhiprāyaḥ nanu yugapad jñāna anutpatteḥ jñāna kāraṇam manoḥ asti iti avagamyate na punar asya indriya tvam api tabhdāvān avagame ca na indriya artha sannikarṣa jam sukha ādi jñānam śakyam vaktum iti ata āha tantra antara iti tantryate vyutpādyate anena tattvam iti tantram śāstram tad anena manasaśrca ityādi bhāṣyam vyākhyātam etad  dūṣitam dignāgena aniṣedhāt upāttam ced anya indriya rutam vṛthā iti tad dūṣayitum upanyasyati na śeṣa iti tad dūṣayati na tantra yuktī iti sarvasya tantra antare loke ca siddha tvāt avaktavya tāyām sva matam iti na asti vacana liṅgam hi mata ajñānam na ca ananumate niṣedha mātram śakyam vaktum abhāvasya bhāva nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇa tvāt iti bhāvaḥ siddham artham upasaṃharati tasmāt iti prakṛtamusaṃharati tad iti tad evam lakṣaṇa padāni vyākhyāya vimṛśati samastam iti abhimatam āha samastam iti āha bhāṣya kāraḥ hetum āha yasmāt iti indriya artha sannikarṣa utu annam jñānam avyabhicāri iti hi pratayakṣa lakṣaṇam anavayavena samāna asamāna jātīyebhyaḥ  vyāvṛttam śakyam eva lakṣayitum na khalu ayam asau  aśva iti jñānam indriya jam śabda jam saṃbhavati tad hi dravya gocaram vā ucyeta vācyatva gocaram vā vācyatva viśiṣṭa dravya gocaram vā tatra dravyam aindriyakam eva na śābdam iti aśakyam hi jñānam vyavacchettum anabhimatam ca vācyatva gocaram tu jñānam śābdam eva anyathā hi aśruta śabdaḥ  api āraṇyakaḥ  aśvam eva indriya sannikarṣāt aśva śabda vācya iti gṛhṇīyāt  vācyatva viśiṣṭa dravya jñānam api śābdam eva vahni viśiṣṭa dhūma jñānam iva anumānikam anyathā tad api aindriyakam iti na tad nirākaraṇāya yatna antaram āstheyam atha na vācya tvam nāma mīmāṃsakānām iva kiñcid ati indriyam api tu saṅketa mātram etad asmāt idam pratyetavyam iti tathā api śabda eva atha ayam api aindriyaka eva tatra guru padiṣṭā gāthā paṭhitavyā śabda ja tvena śābdam ced  pratyakṣam ca akṣa janmataḥ spaṣṭa grahaṇa rūpa tvāt  yuktam aindriyakam hi tatas  iti tasmāt  na ubhaya ja jñāna nivāraṇāya avi apadeśya padam vyavasāya ātmaka padena tu sa vikalpake jñāne avaruddhe nirvikalpakasya apratyakṣatā mā prasāṃkṣīt iti tad avarodha arthena avyapadeśya padena nirvikalpake api śabda saṃbheda nirākaraṇam anvācitam iti śābda iti uktam evam avyapadeśya padena nirvikalpake avaruddhe sa vikalpakasya indriya jasyā pratyakṣa tvam mā prasāṃkṣīt iti tad avarodha arthena vyavasāya ātmaka padena saṃśaya jñāna pratyakṣatva nirākaraṇam anvācitam iti saṃśaya iti uktam anvayam darśayitvā vyatirekam āha yadi iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti heyāḥ triśat koṭīḥ gaṇayati tatra iti dvipada parigraheṇa daśa indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padam dhravam kṛtvā jñāna ādi eka eka pada saṃbandhena carastraḥ koṭayaḥ jñānam ca ghavam kṛtvā avyapadeśya ādi eka eka pada saṃbandhena tistraḥ evam avyapadeśya padam dhruvam kṛtvā avyabhicārya ādi eka eka pada saṃbandhena dve koṭī avyabhicāri vyavasāya tmaka saṃbandhe daśamī iti tripada parigraheṇa api daśa eva indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam jñānam iti dhruvam kṛtvā avyapadeśya ādi eka eka pada saṃbandhe tistraḥ koṭayaḥ jñānam avyapadeśyam iti dhruvam kṛtvā avyabhicārya ādi pada saṃbandhena dve koṭī avyabhicārya vyapadeśya padayoḥ tu vyavasāya ātmaka pada saṃbandhe koṭiḥ ekā indriya artha sannikarṣa avyapadeśya pada dhrauvye avyabhicārya ādi eka eka pada saṃbandhe koṭi dvayam avyabhicāri vyavasāya ātmaka padayoḥ tu dhruvayoḥ indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padena jñāna padena ca pratyekam saṃbandhe koṭi dvayam iti tripada parigraheṇa daśa koṭayaḥ catuṣpada parigraheṇa pañca indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam jñānam avyapadeśyam iti dhruvam kṛtvā avyabhicārya ādi ekaika saṃbandhe dve koṭī avyapadeśya padam tyakatvā para koṭiḥ jñāna padam tyaktvā ca aparā indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padam tyaktvā tu pañcamī pṛcchati kasmāt  pañca pada parigraheṇa ekatri śattama koṭi parigraheṇa itarāḥ koṭayaḥ  vyavacchidyante na hi atra tad vyavaccheda vācakaḥ kaśrcit asti śabda iti arthaḥ uttaram viśeṣa iti viśeṣa pratividhāna prastāve śeṣa niṣedha upanyāsaḥ  dṛṣṭānta lābhāya eka deśa abhyupagama ekatriśat koṭiṣu ekatriṃśattamī koṭiḥ eka deśa iti arthaḥ śeṣa vidhānam vā iti vā śabda iva arthaḥ tad evam pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam samarthya vāsubandhavam tāvat  pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam dūṣayitum upanyasyati apare punar iti lakṣaṇam vyācaṣṭe tatas  arthāt iti yad tadoḥ nitya saṃbandhāt  yasya arthasya yad vijñānam vyapadiśyate yadi tatas  eva tabhdavati na artha antarāt  vyapadeśa asaṃbandhinaḥ tad  pratyakṣam ata eva vyapadeśa asaṃbandhinaḥ  artha antarāt śukti rūpāt  rajatena vyapadiśyāmānam śukti jñānam na pratyakṣam vyapadeśaka an utpatteḥ vyapadeśakasya rajatasya tatra asaṃbhavāt  etasya pratyakṣa ābhāsasya vyāvṛttiḥ suprasiddhā iti tām upekṣya anumāna vyāvṛttim āha etena iti kutas  na hi tatas  eva vyapadeśakāt eva vahneḥ tad  vijñānam anumānam bhavati kim tu yatra vahniḥ asti tatra tatas ca yatra tu dṛṣṭa mātra eva vahneru upa ramāt uparataḥ  dhūmaḥ tatra anyatas rca tabhdavati smaryamāṇād dhūmāt asati vyapadeśake vahnau tatas  arthāt  iti atra hi artha viśeṣaṇam tatas  iti tad saṃgataśrca eva kāraḥ  ayoga vyavacchede vartate yathā caitra dhanardhara eva iti tena yatra eva tad ayogaḥ tad apratyakṣam iti arthaḥ tad etad lakṣaṇam dūṣayati atra artha grahaṇam anarthakam na hi jñāna vyapadeśa ātmanā vā indriyeṇa vā saṃbhavati śaṅkate avadhāraṇa artha iti ayoga vyavacchedena etad avadhāraṇam viśeṣaṇa ca tatas  iti viśeṣaṇa saṃgataḥ ca iva kāraḥ  ayogam vyavacchinatti asati ca artha pade kasya idam viśeṣaṇam iti viśeṣaṇa saṃgataḥ  na eva kāraḥ  ayogam vyavacchindāt iti bhāvaḥ nirākaroti tad na iti tatas  iti sarva nāmnaḥ sannihīta viśeṣya apekṣa tvāt anyathā abhidhāna aparyavasānāt  yasya tad  vyapadiṣyata iti vyapadeśa saṃbandhī viśeṣyaḥ prāpyata eva iti sidhyati eva viśeṣaṇa tvam abhyupetya tvad avadhāraṇa mātre api adoṣa  iti manyamānena abbhakṣa inyudāhṛtam anya vyavacchede apihi tad eva anyat vyavacchidyeta yad virodhi na punar anya mātram yathā āhuḥ niyamaḥ tad virodhāt ca kalpate na avirodhinaḥ iti syat etad  tatas  iti ucyamāne yatas tatas  syāt  tathā ca anumāna ādi api liṅga jñāna ādeḥ tata upajāyate iti pratyakṣam prasajyeta iti tad nivṛtti artham arthāt iti vaktavyam na hi tad  arthāt  jāyate api tu pratyakṣam eva iti ata āha etaneni yasya tad  vyapadiśyate iti apekṣya tatas śabda sāmarthyena anumāna ādi vyudāsaḥ  api pratyuktaḥ yad ca tatas śabdasya vyāvartya antaram uktam tad api dūṣayati yad punar etad iti yadi yasya vyāpadiśyate jñānam tad  pratyakṣam tatas  ghaṭa iti api jñānam pratyakṣam prasajyeta tad api hi ghaṭasya vyapadiśyate na tu tatas  ghaṭāt  bhavati tasya vicāra asahatayā parama artha sattva abhāvena saṃvṛti sataḥ vijñānam prati kāraṇa bhāva abhāvāt  tena tad nirākaraṇāya tatas  iti uktam tad etad na budhyāmahe katham apakṣiptam iti śaṅkate yadi iti rūpa ādi paramāṇava eva nirantara utpādāḥ parama artha santaḥ bhinnāḥ sva vijñānasya avikalpakasya janakāḥ teṣām tu nānā tvam svena rūpeṇa saṃvṛṇvatī nirvikalpaka pṛṣṭha bhāvinī ghaṭa iti vikalpikā buddhiḥ tān eva rūpa ādīn ekodaka āharaṇa ādi kriyā kāriṇaḥ  bhedina iva darśayantī saṃvṛtiḥ iti ucyate nirākaroti na hi rūpa ādibhya iti anuśaya bījam udghāṭayati atha api iti nirākaroti manomodaka iti bhavantu vyatiriktāḥ kim etāvatā api ityata āha sarvam ca iti yad saṃvṛti tvena bhavatām abhimatam yad ca avikalpakam tad sarvam sva viṣayāt  bhavati tasmāt  tatas grahaṇam saṃvṛti nivṛtti artham anarthakam mā bhūt  saṃvṛti nivṛtti artham mithyājñāna nivṛtti artham bhaviṣyati iti codayati nanu ca mithyājñānam atasmāt api bhavati yathā puras varti dravyam idam iti vyapadiśyate rajatam iti na na tu śuktiḥ iti tena yadi api sāmānya rūpeṇa tasya vyapadiśyate jñānam tatas rca tabhdavati tathā api yena viśeṣaṇa rūpeṇa tasya vayapadiśyate na tatas tabhdavati iti atasmāt api iti uktam tasmāt  tatas  eva yabhdavati tad  pratyakṣam na ca evam mithyājñānam tad hi tatas rcatatas rca bhavati iti arthaḥ pariharati na hi atasmāt  āropitāt rūpāt  tatra āsataḥ tad  mithya jñānam bhavati kim tu tatas  bhavati yasya sāmānya rūpasya vyapadiśyata idam iti tatas  eva samāropitam tu tajatam asya viṣayaḥ  dṛśyamāna ākāra tayā tad idam uktam atasmiḥ tad  bhavati iti evam ca lakṣya pada mātra avaśeṣāt lakṣaṇa abhāva iti āha tatas grahaṇam iti tathā ca ati vyāptiḥ iti āha tathā ca iti abhyupetyata dūṣaṇa antaram āha yadi api etad iti yatas  bhavati jñānam sa grāhyaḥ  arthaḥ kāraṇam grāhakam ca vijñānam kāryam tayoḥ ayuga pabhdāvāt vartamāna ābham jñānam atīte mithyā iti na pratyakṣam syāt  tad samāna kālayoḥ tu kārya kāraṇa bhāva abhāvāt tatas  arthāt iti na asti iti bhāvaḥ śaṅkate nāśa utpādau  iti kṣaṇika tvāt  bhāvānām kāraṇa saya nāśaḥ kāryasya utpāda iti ekaḥ kālaḥ tathā api kāraṇasya grāhyatā bhinna kālasya api sva sadṛśa jñāna janakam eva tasya tajānam grāhya tvam na anyat  yathā āha bhinna kālam katham grāhyam iti ced  grāhyatām viduḥ hetu tvam eva yukti jñāḥ jñāna ākāra arpaṇa kṣamam pra vā iti na ca etāvatā mithyātvam artha ahitasya nīla ākārasya vartamāna tvāt iti bhāvaḥ nirākaroti tad ca na iti pūrva apara kāla kalā vikala lakṣaṇā kṣaṇika tā na kvacid api vidyut jāla ādeḥ api āśu vināśinaḥ  dvitra ādi kṣaṇa avasthānāt iti arthaḥ pūrva uktaḥ ca anuyogaḥ tad avastha eva iti āha vinaṣṭa śrca iti anahaṅkāra āspadam asāta ādi rūpam vijñānāt  bhinnam nīla ādi anubhūyate na tu vijñāna ātmakam tathā ca yadi viccheda grahaḥ  mithyā tathā sati jñānam etasmin mithyā iti katham pratyakṣam samyak jñāna bhedasya tathā abhāvāt na ca arthā hita ākāra vedanam artha vedanam bhāktatva prasaṅgāt  na ca gauṇa mukhya lakṣaṇā girām gatayaḥ jñāna iṣu śakyā niyojayitum bhinna prasthāna tvāt  tasmāt  nirākāram jñānam ātmanaḥ  bhinnam gocarayati iti vācyam sa ced  kāraṇam vinaṣṭasya pratyakṣata iti tathā ca vartamāna abhama vartamānam gocarayati mithyātvam apratyakṣa tvam ca syāt iti bhāvaḥ yaugapadye api na asti udāharaṇam sarvasya kṣaṇikatva pakṣa nikṣepāt iti codayati tulyam iti ced  nirākaroti tad ca iti saṃprati dignāgasya lakṣaṇam upanyasyati apara iti dūṣayitum kalpanā svarūpam pṛcchati atha kā iyam iti lakṣaṇa vādina uttaram nāma iti yadṛcchā śabdeṣu hi nāmnā viśiṣṭaḥ  artha  ucyate ḍittha iti jāti śabdeṣu jātyā gauḥ ayam iti guṇa śabdeṣu guṇena śukla iti kriyā śabdeṣu kriyayā pācaka iti dravya śabdeṣu dravyeṇa daṇḍī viṣāṇi iti sā iyam kalpanā yatra jñāne na asti arthataḥ svarūpataḥ  vā tad kalpanayā apoḍham pratyakṣam tad idam āha yad  kila na nāmnā abhidhīyate arthataḥ svarūpataḥ rca na jāti ādibhiḥ vyapadiśyate avyabhicārāya viṣaya kāraṇa tvam āha viṣaya svarūpā anuvidhāyi iti pramāṇa tvam āha paricchedakam vyavasthāpakam jñāna tām asya darśayati ātma saṃvedya sva saṃvedanāt eva tasya kalpanā rahita tvam api yathā āha pratyakṣam kalpanā apoḍham pratyakṣena eva sidhyati iti tad  pratyakṣam iti tadet lakṣya lakṣaṇa pada tad samudāya vyāpāra nirūpaṇena dūṣayati ta idam iti atha na iti vikalpa yonayaḥ hi śabdāḥ tad gocaram abhiniviśanate yad  vikalpā gṛhṇānti yad ca adhyavasyati tad ubhayam api anya vyāvṛtti rūpam avastu tasmāt na avikalpakam jñānam tad gocaram vā parama artha sad gocarayanti vikalpāḥ śabdāḥ ca iti ayam abhisandhiḥ api ca asya avācya tve bhavat abhyupagata prāmāṇya āgama virodha iti āha anitya ādi iti śaṅkate atha iti svam asādharaṇam rūpam vyāvṛttam iti yāvat  tatas  nirākaroti sarve arthā iti na hi yathā samyak jñānam adhikṛtya pratyakṣa ādi lakṣaṇam kṛtam kīrtinā tathā dignāgena yena adhikārāt  jñāne vyavatiṣṭheta kalpanā apoḍham iti bhāvaḥ nanu yadi svarūpataḥ  na abhidhīyeta an abhidhā iyam tarhi vastu prasajyeta tathā ca avāstavaḥ syāt  śābdaḥ  vyavahāra iti ata āha sarvasya ca iti sāmānya viśeṣa tadvabhdedāt  vastu trayam tatra tadvat vastu adhikṛtya uktam dvau  ākārau  iti sāmānyena eva ākāreṇa abhidhīyate sāmānya anvitam iti arthaḥ brāhmaṇa iti manuṣyatva jātimān iti arthaḥ viśeṣam ākāram abhipretya svarūpataḥ  na vyapadeśyam iti uktam na tu sarvathā iti bhāvaḥ prakṛte yojayati evam iti āśaṅkya pūrva uktam ati prasaṅgam samārayati yadi ca iti atha aścakarṇa ādivat avyutpannaḥ kalpanā apoḍha śabdaḥ pratyakṣa svarūpasya vācaka iti śaṅkate atha iti nirākaroti evam api iti bhavatu kalpanā apoḍha śabdaḥ avyutpannaḥ  mā vā bhūt  avācyam tu pratyakṣam eṣitavyam anyathā vikalpasya pratyakṣatva prasaṅgāt  tathā ca vyāghāta iti arthaḥ jaimini pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam dūṣayati sat saṃprayoga iti yathāśrutasya ativyāptiḥ saṃśabdena api prayogasya samīcīnatā pratipādyate sā ca mithyā pratyaye api tulyā vyatyaye api buddhyā boddhasya upasthāpanāt tad  iti bodhyam parāmṛśati asti ca mithyājñāne api bodhyena saṃbandha indriyāṇām bodhyam hi puras varti dravyam atha yathā bodhyam tādṛśaḥ  na asti saṃbandha indriyāṇām rajata tvasya prakārasya asannidhānāt hanta avyāpaka tvam lakṣaṇa doṣaḥ pratyabhijñāyām tad ta aprakārasya indriyeṇa asaṃbandhāt api ca prābhākare darśane anumāna ādi jñānam ātmani pratyakṣam na bhavet  na hi tad  sat saṃprayoga jam tasmāt etad api paribhāvanīyam sūribhiḥ iti vārṣagaṇyasya api lakṣaṇam ayuktam iti āha śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ iti pañcānām khalu indriyāṇām artha ākāreṇa pariṇatānām ālocana mātram vṛttiḥ iṣyate sā ca saṃśaya ādi vyāpaka tvāt alakṣaṇam iti tad  siddham indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iti etad eva lakṣaṇam iti pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam samāptam pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa anantaram anumāna lakṣaṇa param sūtram paṭhati atha tad pūrvakam trividham anumānam iti atra anumānam iti sidvavat  pramāṇa aviśeṣa rūpa lakṣya anuvāda eva na apratyakṣam pramāṇam iti aprāmāṇyam anumānasya sudūdam pratikṣipati dṛṣṭa prāmāṇya aprāmāṇya vijñāna vyakti sādharmyeṇa hi kāsāṃcid  vyaktīnām prāmāṇyam aprāmāṇyam vā vidadhīta dṛṣṭa sādharmyam ca anumānam eva iti katham tena eva tasya aprāmāṇyam api ca anumānam apramāṇam iti vākya prayogaḥ  ajñam vipratipannam sandigdham vā puruṣam pratyarthaṃvān na ca para puruṣa vartinaḥ  deha dharmā api sandeha ajñāna viparyāsā gauratva ādivat  pratyakṣam īkṣante na ca tad vavacanāt  prattīyante vacanasya api pratyakṣāt anyasyā prāmāṇya upagamāt  puruṣa viśeṣam anadhikṛtya tu vacanam anarthaṅkam prayu jānaḥ na ayam laukikaḥ  na parīkṣaka iti unmatta vadana vadheya vacanaḥ syāt  pariśiṣṭam tu parīkṣā parvaṇi nivedayiṣyate tasmāt akāmena api pramāṇam anumānam upetavyam iti lakṣyam pramāṇa bhedam anumānam anūdya tad pūrvakam iti lakṣaṇam vidhatte atha iti ānantarye uktam pratyakṣam anumānasya hetuḥ atha idānīm anumānam hetumat vyutpādyate iti arthaḥ lakṣaṇa sūtra tātparyam āha anumāna iti tad eva sphuṭayati anena iti samāna jātīyāni pramāṇa tayā pratyakṣa ādīni asamāna jātīyāni ca anumāna ābhāsa ādīni yathā kṣaṇikatva ādiṣu sādhyeṣu sattva ādīni syāt etad ativyāpakam etad  tad pūrvaka tvam tad iti hi pratyakṣam parāmṛśati ānantaryāt  tathā ca pratyakṣa pūrvaka tvam anumānasya iva āgama smṛti saṃśaya viparyāsānām api asti iti tāni api anumānam prasajyeran anumāna ādi pūrvakam ca anumānam na pratyakṣa pūrvakam iti na anumānam syāt  anumāna lakṣaṇena avyāta tvāt tasmāt avyāpti ati vyāptibhyāmalakṣaṇam etad iti ata āha tad pūrvakam iti tad pūrvakam iti āvṛtyā vigraha traya pradarśanam tatra prathame vigrahe tāni iti anantaram sūtram uvat laṅghya vibhāga sūtra gatāḥ pratyakṣa ādayaḥ saṃbandhanīyāḥ yogya tvāt  yathā āhuḥ yasya yena artha saṃbandhaḥ  dūra sthasya api tasya saḥ iti tad anena lakṣaṇasya avyāptiḥ parihṛtā tad idam āha yadā tāni iti nanvedam pratyakṣa pūrvakam iti bhāṣya virodha iti ata āha pāramparyeṇa iti pāramparyeṇa hi pratyakṣa pūrvaka tvam uktam bhāṣya kṛtā tasmāt na virodha iti ati vyāpti nirāsāya dvitīyam vigraham vivṛṇoti yadā
