darśanāt īśvaraḥ kāraṇam iti arthaḥ tad etad darśana dvayam apākaroti na puruṣa karma abhāvaḥ  phala aniṣyateḥ sū ida mātra ākūtam na tāvat mṛttikā iva nāma rūpa prapañca rūpeṇa brahma pariṇamate tad hi sarva ātmanā vā pariṇamate eka deśena vā tatra sarva ātmanā pariṇāme tattva vighātāt anitya tvam ekedeśena pariṇāme sāvayava tvāt tad eva anitya tvam atha tatvena anugatasya pariṇāmaḥ tad ca brahma na tarhi brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmaḥ na ca nirbhāgasya ekasya sva samvedana pratyakṣasya viparīta jñāna gocaratva sambhavaḥ sāmānyatas  grahe rūpa viśeṣa agrahe ca tad anya rūpa āropeṇa vibhramaḥ  dṛṣṭaḥ śuktikā ādau na tu jātu śukti rūpam vidvān rajatam iti viparyasyati na ca niraṃśe sva saṃvedana pratyakṣe brahmaṇi tad svarūpa āgrahaḥ sāmānya grahaḥ  vā bhavati tasmāt īśvaraḥ  jagat bhedena vivartataitya yuktam nimittam tu syāt īśvaraḥ  jagataḥ sa ced anapekṣa eva jagatkāraṇam iti ucyate tatra idam upatiṣṭhate napuruṣa karma abhāve phala aniṣpatteḥ iti asya vyatirekam āha vārtikakāraḥ īśvaraḥ ced kāraṇam bhavet iti eka rūrpam kāryam syāt iti āha īśvarasya iti karmaṇi īśvaraḥ  anīśvaraḥ syāt  tathā ca tad kāraṇāni na īśvareṇa prayujyanta eti anekāntaḥ  vakṣyamāṇaḥ  hetuḥ iti arthaḥ tad evam īśvara upādānattvam ca brahma vivarta tvam ca nirapekṣa īśvara nimitta tvam ca nirākṛt paya abhimatam pakṣam gṛhṇāti tad kārita tvāt ahetuḥ sū paramāṇu upādānasya jagataḥ puruṣa karma apekṣa īśvaraḥ  nimitta kāraṇam yad ca tena apekṣaṇīyam puruṣa karma tad api īśvara nimittakam eva na ca yad apekṣyate tasya animita tvam iti upadiṣṭāt pravedayiṣyāmaḥ tasmāt īśvara kārita tvāt puruṣakārasya tad sahāya īśvaraḥ  nimitta kāraṇam jagata iti asya pakṣasya nirākaraṇe puruṣa karma abhāve phala aniṣpatteḥ iti ahetuḥ nirapekṣa īśvara nimitta kattva nirākaraṇe hetuḥ eva iti arthaḥ bhāṣyam guṇa viśiṣṭam ātma antaram iti guṇān īśvarasya jñāna ādīn upapādayiṣyati vārttikakāraḥ ātma kalpa āditi atra ātma prakārāt ātmajātīyāt iti yāvat  saṃsāra vadbhya ātmabhyaḥ  viśeṣam āha adharma iti nanu asya karma anuṣṭhāna abhāvāt kutaḥ dharmaḥ tathā ca aṇima ādikam aiśvaryam kārya rūpam vinā eva karmaṇā iti akṛta abhyāgama prasaṅga iti ata āha saṃkalpa anuvidhāyī ca asya dharma iti pravarttayatu kim etāvatā ityata āha evam ca sva kṛta abhyāgamasya ālopena iti mā bhūt bāhya anuṣṭhānam saṃkalpa lakṣaṇa anuṣṭhāna janita dharma phalam asya aiśvaryam jagat nirmāṇa phalam iti na akṛta abhyāgama prasaṅga iti arthaḥ syāt etad  prayojanam vinā na prekṣāvatām pravṛttiḥ na ca prāpta sakala prāptavyasya asti prāpaṇīyam kim cit īśvarasya tasmāt  kṛtam asya jagat nirmāṇena iti ata āha āpta kalpaḥ ca iti mā abhūt asya bhagavataḥ sva arthaḥ para anugraha artham jagat nirmāṇe pravartsyati iti arthaḥ atra eva dṛṣṭāntam āha ayam yathā pituḥ apatyānām ayam pitā svāpatyānām yathā pitā iti arthaḥ dārṣṭa antike yojayati tathā pitṛ bhūta īśvara iti nanu ātma antarāṇi anittya jñāna yogīni dṛṣṭāni tad vailakṣaṇyāt īśvara ūna ātma jātīyaḥ  bhavitum arhati iti ata āha na ca ātma kalpāt iti yadi api ātma antarāṇi anitya jñāna yogīni ayam ca nitya jñāna ādi yuktaḥ tathā api ātmajātīya eva budvi ādi guṇa yogi tvāt anyathā toya ādi paramāṇūnām atoyatva ādi prasaṅgaḥ  nitya rūpa ādi yogāt karaka ādi gatānām rūpa ādīnām anityatva upalabdheḥ iti yadi ca ayam buddhi ādi guṇaiḥ na upākhyāyena pramāṇa abhāva anupapanna eva syāt iti āha buddhi ādibhiḥ ca iti syāt etad  yadi kāruṇyāt īśvaraḥ  jagat nirmāṇe pravarttate hanta bhoḥ sukhinam eva sṛjet na tu duḥkhinam na ca kṣetrajña gata dharma adhamra sahakāri tayā nirmāṇa vaicitryam vācyam dharmasya tad anadhiṣṭhitasya sva kārya akaraṇena kāruṇikena tad adhiṣṭānāyogāt tasmāt sukhi duḥkhya ādi bhedena jagat vaicitrya darśanāt na anukampā prayukta īśvaraḥ karoti iti ata āha sva kṛta abhyāgamālopena pravartamānasya iti ayam abhisandhiḥ kāruṇikaḥ  api ayam ātma antara atiśāyita mahimā api na vastūnām sāmarthyam anyathā kartum pārayati tasmāt adharmeṇa utpattimatā pi na īśvara prabhāvāt api nityena bhavitum yuktam na ca sva phala virodhinā phalam apradāya vinaṃṣṭum api śakyam atas  kṣetrajñānām niyatim alaṅghayatā īśvareṇa na adharmaḥ śakyaḥ  anadhiṣṭhātum tasmāt kāruṇikaḥ  api ayam vastu svabhāvam anuvidhīyamānaḥ  dharma adharma sahakārī jagat vaicitryam vidhatte tad idam uktam sva kṛta abhyāgamālopena pravarttamānasya iti puruṣaiḥ yad karma kṛtam tad phala abhyāgamālaḥ  pena pravarttamānasya iti arthaḥ vārtika īśvara prakriyā iti prakriyā prakaraṇam īśvara nimittatva vicāra iti arthaḥ atha vidyamānaḥ pratibandhān na pravarttayati iti sukhāya puruṣa arthena pradhāne pravartayitavye adharmaḥ puruṣa arthasya pratibandhakaḥ evam duḥkhāya puruṣa arthena pradhāne pravarttayitavye adharmaḥ puruṣa arthasya pratibandhakaḥ evam duḥkhāya puruṣa arthena pradhāne pravartayitavye dharma iti arthaḥ na ca ayam hetuḥ tasmāt nivarttata iti ayam eva acetanatva lakṣaṇaḥ  hetuḥ kṣīrān na nivarttata iti arthaḥ parispandaḥ kriyā sā mūrti anuvidhāyinī na amūrte sarvagata īśvare saṃbhavinī iti manvānaḥ śaṅkate kriyānāveśāt akāraṇam iti ced iti aparispandā api jñāna cikīrṣā prayatnā ākhyāta pada vācya tayā bhavanti kriyā īśvaraiti abhisaṃdhinā parihāraḥ na vikalpa anupapatteḥ yadā ca yugapad anekāni dravyāṇi saṃhanyate tadā asādhāraṇa kārya vyāvṛttebhyaḥ saṃyogebhyaḥ iti asādhāraṇam kāryam ekaikasya tantu dvaya saṃyogasya dvi tantukam tasmāt vyāvṛttebhyaḥ saṃyogebhyaḥ saha sādhāraṇasya eva kāryasya paṭa lakṣaṇasya utpādāt iti arthaḥ na kevalam utpanna kriyeṣu kriyā uparata audravya utpādaḥ kva cit anutpanna kriyeṣu api dravyeṣu avasthita saṃyogebhyaḥ pūrva dravya uparatau dravya antara utpāda iti āha eka avayava vibhāge tu iti tuśabdena pūrvasmāt utpanna uparata kriyā viśeṣaḥ  darśitaḥ kim akriyāvatām eva ārambhaḥ  na iti āha kāni cit punar iti anyatara karma jān nodanāt saṃyogāt nivṛtte karmaṇi itarasmin dravye karma nirvṛtti sama kālam eva dravyam ca utpadyata iti tad svābhāvyāt pravartta taitya duṣṭam iti cetanaḥ api ayam para anugraha svabhāvaḥ  api vastu svabhāvam anurudhyamānaḥ karma āśaya anurodhena jagat vaicitryam vidhatte na ca avaśyam duṣkṛte puṃsām pravṛttim vihanti iti arthaḥ adyatve api cetanānām vicitra svabhāva tvam dṛṣṭram sat asat madhyamānām janānām atha nityam aiśvaryam dharma vaiyarthyam na tad dharmāt bhavati iti tatas ca īśvarasya aiśvaryam sva kṛta karma phalam veditavyam iti ayuktam bhāṣya mirtim bhāvaḥ pariharati nityam iti brūmaḥ tasya hi jñāna kriyā śaktī nitye iti aiśvaryam nityam aṇima ādikam tu anityam tad abhiprāyam ca bhāṣya kārasya dharma phalatva abhidhānam pratyātma vṛtti dharma adharma sannicaya adhiṣṭhānam dhṛti ātma vṛtti saṃkalpa anuvidhāyina īśvarasya dharmasya prayojanam iti abhyupetya īśvara dharmam etad uktam bhāṣya kṛtā paramārthataḥ tu na īśvarasya dharma sadbhāve pramāṇam asti nityābhyām eva jñāna kriyā śaktibhyām sakala kārya utpāda siddheḥ iti āśa yavān āha na ca īśvare dharmaḥ  asti iti buddhimat tvāt tarhi atma antaram iti ātma antaram śarīryantaram abhipretam iti sa ca śarīra saṃbandhaḥ  varttamānaḥ keṣāṃ cit yathā saṃsāriṇām keṣāṃ cit atītaḥ  yathā muktānām śuka prahlāda ādīnām tad anena īśvareṇa buddhimatā satā avaśyam bhāvyam śarīriṇā iti deśya arthaḥ na ātma antaram śarīryantaram iti arthaḥ kutaḥ guṇa bhedāt  nityāḥ ced asya buddhi ādayaḥ kṛtam śarīra grahaṇena tad utpāda arthena iti bhāvaḥ nanu idam eva buddhimat kāraṇa adhiṣṭhitāḥ paramāṇavaḥ pravarttanta iti pakṣa dharma tā balāt tarka sahāyāt nitya buddhimat tvam asya siddhi ati iti arthaḥ pratyartha niyama asaṃbhavāt ityādinā tarkaḥ pramāṇa sahāyaḥ  darśitaḥ evam tāvat guṇa bhedena aśarīri tvam īśvarasya darśitam na ca etasya śarīra yogaḥ  vikalpam api sahataiti āha atha buddhimat tayā iti atīta anāgata varttamāna viṣayā pratyakṣa iti sākṣātkāravatī iti arthaḥ na punar akṣam āśritā nitya tvāt  upalakṣaṇam ca etad  na anumānikī ca iti na aindriyakī na aupamānikī iti api draṣṭavyam akliṣṭa iti kleśaḥ  avidyā tad adūṣitā iti arthaḥ mūrttimat dravya sambandhi tvāt iti saṃyogi tvāt iti arthaḥ tathā ca na rūpa ādibhiḥ vyā abhicāraḥ tathā ca na rūpa ādibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ etāvat abhipretam ācāryasya trayaḥ  hi khalu bhāvā jagati bhavanti prasiddha cetana kartṛkāḥ yathā prāsāda aṭṭāla gopura toraṇa ādayaḥ prasiddha tad viparyayāḥ yathā paramāṇu ākāśa ādayaḥ sandigdha cetana karttṛkā yathā tanu giri mahīdhara ādayaḥ tatra prameya tvāt vādi vipratipatteḥ vā sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvecetana karttṛ tve saṃśayaḥ na ca pratyakṣa anupalabdhi mātram atra bādhakam bhavitum arhati svabhāva viprakarṣiṇām satām api pratyakṣa anupalabdheḥ paramāṇu ādīnām tathā ca vivāda adhyāsitāḥ tanu taru mahīdhara ādaya upādāna abhijña kartṛkā utpattimatvāt  acetana upādāna tvāt vā yudutpatti mat cetanā upādānakam vā tad sarvam upādāna abhijña pūrvakam yathā prāsāda ādi tathā ca vivāda adhyāsitāḥ tanu taru mahīdhara ādayaḥ tasmāt tathā iti na ca eṣām utpattimat tvam asiddham sāvayava tvena vā mahat tve sati kriyāvat tvena vā vastra ādivat tad siddheḥ na ca etāvatā vaināśikānām karmaṇā cetanena mīmāṃsakānām kṣetrajñena cetanena cetana karttṛtva siddheḥ pṛthivī ādīnām siddha sādhanam caitanye api teṣām upādāna anabhijña tvāt tajjña tve vā sa eva asmākam īśvaraḥ īdṛśam astu siddha sādhanam kaḥ  he kleśam vinā na vāñchita siddhim icchet  na ca sādhya hīnaḥ  dṛṣṭāntaḥ paṭa ādīnām api upādāna abhijña kuvinda ādi karttṛka tvāt ata eva na viruddha tā hetoḥ evam hi sā bhavet  yadi upādāna abhijñarttṛkāḥ paṭāt ayaḥ  bhaveyuḥ na ca etad pareṣām api sammatam syāt etad  artha ākṣiptasya viśeṣasya śarīra ādimattva ādeḥ pramāṇa virodhāt viruddha tā yathā tṛṇa ādi vikāra kāri tvāt agni mat himam iti atra vahnimatva ākṣipta tṛṇa ādi vikāra upayukta vahni gata udbhūta uṣṇa sparśa viruddha śīta sparśasya pratayakṣeṇa upalambhāt bādhitaḥ  viruddhaḥ  hetuḥ tathā hi asya kṣiti ādi upādāna ādi viṣayam jñānam ātma manaḥ sannikarṣa śarīra ādi kāraṇakam na asati tasmin bhavati iti tad anena ākṣiptam tad ca atra pramāṇa bādhitam tad nivṛttau ca jñānam asya nirvatteta uṣṇatva udbhūti nivṛttau  iva dāha kaḥ  vahniḥ avaśyāya iti na avyāpaka nivṛttau  avyāpya nivṛttoḥ yogāt kāraṇam ced avyāpakam kāryasya hanta hatā tarhi vyāpya vyāpaka saṃkathā bhavet etad yadi kṣiti ādi upādāna jñānam api asya kāryam syāt nityam tu tad abhyupeyata iti na śarīra ādi nivṛttau  api nivarttitum arhati avyāpaka nivṛtteḥ avyāpyasya anivṛtteḥ iti anyathā na aśvavān maitra iti gomān api na syāt  na ca buddhi ādīnām anityānām bahulam upalabdheḥ nityā buddhiḥ asambhāvinī iti sāṃpratam na hi pratyakṣāḥ pāthasīyā himakaraka ādayaḥ tad gatā rūpādayaḥ  anityā iti tad ārambhakaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ tad gataiḥ vā rūpa ādibhiḥ tathā bhavitavyam sat akāraṇa tayā tu nityatā ubhayatra api tulyā na ca śarīra ādi sahabhāvena jñānasya tatra tatra upalambhāt śarīra ādīnām jñānam vyāpyam iti yuktam svābhāvika sambandha śālitā hi vyāpya tā sā ca upādhi virahe bhavati asti ca śarīra ādi sahabhāve jñānasya upādhiḥ kāryatvam kāryam jñānam sva kāraṇam śarīra ādinā ativarttate nityam tu tad ativarttamānam api sāhitya upalambham na viruṇaddhi tasmāt yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ utpattimatvāt  ghaṭavat iti prayukte kaścid sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ dharma vaicitryāt pratyavatiṣṭheta yadi ghaṭa sādharmyāt utpattimat tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ hanta tasmāt eva rūpa ādimatā tena bhāvyam na ced ayam ghaṭa sādharmyeṇa rūpa ādimān evam anityaḥ  api mābhūt iti evam ca pratyavatiṣṭhamāna utkarṣa sama jāti vādī parājīyate evam eva iva ādi utkarṣa sama jāti vādi tayā parājetavyaḥ sādharmya mātreṇa aprayojakena pratyavasthānāt  tasya ca sarva anumāneṣu sulabha tayā sarva anumāna uccheda āpādaka tvāt  syāt etad  utpattimat tvam upādāna ādi abhijña kartṛ pūrvakatva mātra vyāptam ghaṭa ādiṣu dṛṣṭam tāvat mātram eva pṛthivī ādīnām gamayet  nitya sarva viṣaya jñānavat kartṛ tvam tu kutastyam na hi tad dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi dṛṣṭam atha rūpa ādi upalabdheḥ kriyā tvena cakṣuḥ ādi anumān api katham na hi cchidādayaḥ kriyā indriya ādi sādhanāḥ tāsām kuṭhāra ādi sādhana tvāt  atha dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇī dṛṣṭam api indriya sādhana tvam pakṣa dharma tā balāt sidhyati rūpa ādi upalabdhi gatam hi kriyā tvam tad eva karaṇam gamayet  yad upalabdhi nirvartana samartham na ca kuṭhāra ādayaḥ samarthā iti pakṣa dharma tā balāt kuṭhāra ādi vilakṣaṇam adṛṣṭa caram api cakṣuḥ ādi upasthāpayati iti tad itaratra api samānam na hi ayaribheya aniyata diś deśa aindriya kānaindriya katrasa sthāvara ādi lakṣaṇa kārya utpāda yaugapadyam asat  i sarva viṣaya jñāne tad nityatva ivā sūddhum arhati naḥ khalu īdṛśam parameśvara vijñānam kārya śarīra ādi kāryam sambhavati śarīra ādi utpatteḥ prāc asya ācaitanyena tad prāk kāla kārya antara utpādāya īśvara antara kalpanā prasaṅgāt  evam tad prāc tad prāk iti aneka alaukika kalpanayā varam buddhi nitya tvam kalpitam etena śarīra indriya nityatva kalpanā api pratyuktā etena yad eke bruvate sanniveśa ādimat sarvam buddhimat hetu yadi api prasidhyet sanniveśa ādeḥ eka kāraṇa tā kutas  iti tad api parihṛtam teṣām prasidhyet sarvajña nirākriyā manorathaḥ  yadi piśita cakṣuṣaḥ paramāṇūn kṣetrajñān tad samavetān vā karma āśayān draṣṭum īśate na ca etad asti tasmāt atīndriya artha darśinaḥ asmad ādi bilakṣaṇā bahavaḥ kalpanīyāḥ tad varam eka eva tādṛśaḥ kalpanā lāghavāya iti na ca kādācid ka paripāka adṛṣṭavat kṣetrajña paramāṇu saṃyogāt eva tanu bhuvana ādi kārya upapatteḥ kṛtam cetana kartṛka tvena iti vācyam utpattimat tvasya upādāna ādi abhijña kartṛka tvena upādhi virahviṇaḥ svābhāvika pratibandha siddheḥ na ca avijñātānām indriya manasām jñāna utpāda sādhanānām anadhiṣṭhānasya ca vatsa vṛddhi nimittasya api ecatanasya kṣīrasya svātantryeṇa prakṛteḥ vane viṭapa ādīnām ca vinā prayatnam utpādasya darśanāt vyabhicāra iti sāṃpratam sarveṣām eva teṣām vivāda āspadībhūta tvena pakṣa nikṣepāt  na ca śaśaśṛṅga astitāvat anupalabdhi virodhāt apakṣa dharmata dharmiṇaḥ  darśana anarhvatayā bhagavataḥ tad virodha anupapatteḥ anyathā sarva anumāna uccheda prasaṅgāt  śṛṅgasya tu śaśāśiraḥ vartinaḥ  vatsa ādi gatasya iva darśana arhasya anupalabdhi nirākṛtasya sādhanān arha tvāt syāt etad  na utpatti mātram svabhāva pratibaddham buddhi mat hetu tvena kim tu tad viśeṣaḥ yad dṛṣṭeḥ akriyā darśinaḥ api kṛtabuddhiḥ utpadyate tasya ca dṛṣṭeḥ sā upajāyate yad  buddhimat bhāva anuvidhāyi bhāva abhāvam dṛṣṭam ghaṭa ādi ca tathā na tṛd pattimat mātram tanu bhuvana ādi api tasya sadbhāva asadbhāva anuvidhāna adarśanāt  tad etena viśeṣeṇa upādhinā prayuktām buddhimat hetukatva vyāptim upajīvat utpatti sāmānyam na tena svabhāva pratibaddham iti na tad gamayitum arhati iti anyathā dhūma prayuktām dhūmadhvaja vyāptim upajīvya pāṇḍutā ādeḥ kumuda kapotaka ādi gatāt api dhūmaketunā anumāna prasaṅgāt iti atra ucyate idam eva nipuṇataram bhavantaḥ  nirūpayantu kim buddhimat anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānam viśeṣa āhaḥ tad darśanam yadi pūrva pakṣaḥ sa buddhimat hetuka tvam tanu bhuvana ādīnām ātiṣṭhamānaiḥ abhyupeyata eva na hi kāraṇam kāryān anuvihita bhāva abhāvam anyaḥ vaktum arhati asvīkāt  atha darśanam natarhi akriyā darśinaḥ kṛta buddhi saṃbhavaḥ ya eva hi paṭaḥ anena buddhimat hetu envaya vyatireka anuvidhāyī dṛṣṭaḥ sa eva tad kāryaḥ  na tu vipaṇi vartī tad jātīyasya tad anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāna darśanāt adṛṣṭa anvaya vyatireka anuvinadhānam api tad jātīyam tathā iti ced  hanta utpattimat  ghaṭa ādi buddhimat anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi iti anyat api tad jātīyam tanu bhuvana ādi tathā bhavat daṇḍena na parāṇudyate ghaṭa jātīyam utpattimat  buddhimat pūrvam iti ced  nanu prāsāda ādi na tad hetukam bhavet  aghaṭa jātīya tvāt  atha yad jātīyam buddhimat anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi dṛṣṭam tad jātīyam eva adṛṣṭa anvaya vyatirekam api buddhimat hetukam tad ki midārnīm kārya jātīyam prāsāda ādi buddhimat hetukam na dṛṣṭam yena utpattimat tanu bhuvana ādi tathā na syāt  na khalu tad jātīya tve kaścid viśeṣa iti yad tu mṛd vikāra tvena valmīkasya ghaṭa ādivat kulāla kārya tvam na bhavati tad kumbhakārasya pratyakṣa anupalambha virodhāt adṛśya cetana pūrvaka tve tu tasya upeyata eva syāt etad  na utpatti mātram upādāna abhijña kartṛka tvena vyāptam api tu yad asmad ādi śakya jñāna upādāna ādi na ca tathā tanu bhuvana ādi utpattimat api tasmāt  vyāpti virahān na tad pūrvakam iti tad ayuktam utpattimattva tad upādāna ādi abhijña kartṛ kattvayoḥ prathamam anvaya vyatirekābhyām vyāptau siddhāyām tad upādāna ādi śakya jñānatva kalpanāyāḥ kārya jñāna viṣaye vyavasthāpanāt  vyāpti balena jñāna sāmānya siddha aupakṣa dharmatā balena tad nityatva siddhiḥ iti uktam tena upādheḥ anustriyamāṇasya anupalabdheḥ svabhāva pratibaddham utpattimat tvam buddhimat hetukattvena na casvabhāva pratibaddham utpattimatvam sva saṃbandhinam atītyā api vartsyati iti śakyam śaṅkitum tathā sati sva bhāva hāni prasaṅgaḥ syāt etad  na sarvajña pūrvakāḥ kṣiti ādayaḥ prameyatva satva ādibhyaḥ ghaṭa ādivat iti anumānāni santi pratipakṣa sādhanāni iti sat pratipakṣa tayā prakṛtam anumānābhāsam atra ucyate kim anena sarvajña pūrvaka tvam niṣidhyate uta jñātṛ mātra pūrvaka tvam sarva grahaṇam upalakṣaṇa artham yadi pūrvaḥpakṣaḥ tadā eka deśa darśi pūrvaka tvam sādhitam syāt  tathā cāpa siddhāntaḥ na ca śakyam api na hi asmad ādinā arvāk darśinā aśakyāḥ pṛthivī ādayaḥ kartum jñātṛ mātra pūrvaka tve tu niṣedhye ghaṭa ādibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ yad ca īśvaraḥ  na adhiṣṭhātā paramāṇu ādīnām aśarīri tvā ād mukta ātmavat  aiśvaram jñānam na sarva viṣayam anityam ca jñāna tvāt  asmad ādi jñānavat iti anumānam tad pakṣa dharmatā siddhi artham īśvara siddhim tad buddhimat tvam cāpekṣamāṇam tad sādhaka pramāṇa viruddham ātmānam eva tāvat na āsādayitum arhati prāk eva tad viroddhum na hi āgama anumāne jagat kartṛtva nitya sarva viṣaya buddhimattva vyatirekeṇa kevalam aśviram sādhayataḥ tathā ca tābhyām viruddham bhavat anumānam na utpatum arhati iti siddham buddhivat icchā prayatnau  api tasya nityau sa kartṛkatva sādhana antargatau veditavyau jñāna cikīrṣā prayatna samavāya lakṣaṇa tvāt kartṛ tvasya teṣām ca paraspara āvinā abhāvāt anyatara siddhau  itarayoḥ siddheḥ tad evam utpattimatvāt eva pakṣa dharma tā sahāyāt evambhūta īśvara siddhiḥ iti uktam bhavatu vā tasmāt upādāna ādi abhijña kartṛkatva mātra siddhiḥ pariśeṣa anumānāt tu vyatireka siddheḥ viśeṣa siddhiḥ tathā hi tanu bhuvana ādi abhijñaḥ karttā na anitya asarva viṣaya buddhimān tad kartuḥ tad upādāna ādi anabhijñatva prasaṅgāt na hi evaṃvidhaḥ tad upādāna ādi abhijñaḥ  dṛṣṭaḥ yathā asmad ādiḥ tad upādāna ādi abhijñaḥ ca ayam tasmāt tathā iti na ukhalu paramāṇu bhedān pratikṣetrajña samavāyinaḥ ca tasmāt tathā iti na ukhalu paramāṇu bhedān pratikṣetrajña samavāyinaḥ ca karma āśayān anyaḥ śaktaḥ  jñātum ṛte tādṛśāt īśvarāt iti prapañcitam adhastāt para puruṣa samavetau  api dharma adharmau  adhiṣṭātum śaknoti sambandhāt  na hi sākṣāt saṃyoga samavāyau  eva sambandhau saṃyukta saṃyogi samavāyasya api tad bhāvāt saṃyuktāḥ khalvī śveraṇa paramāṇu ādayaḥ taiḥ ca kṣetrajñāḥ tad samavetau dharma adharmau  iti saṃyukta samavāya uva vā kṣetrajñena īśvarasya saṃyogāt  aja saṃyogasya api upapādita tvāt  dharma adharmau paramāṇūn vā svadharma upagraham antareṇa api ca īśvaraḥ sva kārya abhimukhān kariṣyati viṣa vidyā vid iva viṣa śakalam kriyā ārambha abhimukham etena cetanā upādānattmapi vyākhyātam vārtika kṛtā tu upalakṣaṇa tayā cetata tvam hetuḥ uktaḥ utpattim atvādayaḥ  api hetava ūhanīyāḥ imam ca nyāyam āmnāya upodbalayati aetasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gāṃrgi dyāvāpṛthivī vidhṛte tiṣṭhataḥ adya āvāpṛthivī janayan deva ekaḥ atadaikṣata bahu syām prajāyeye atyādiḥ smṛtiḥ ca bhavati ajñaḥ jantuḥ anīśaḥ  ayam ātmanaḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ īśvara preritaḥ  gacchet svargam vā śvabhram eva vā akāraṇa tvena ca īśvara jñāna nityatām darśayati śrutiḥ aapāṇi pādaḥ  javanaḥ  grahītā paśyati acakṣuḥ sa śṛṇoti akarṇaḥ sa vetti viśvam na hi tasya vettā tam āhuḥ agryam puruṣam purāṇa miti ādikā etayā eva aśarīri tvam darśitam bhavati pariśiṣṭam tu vārttika kṛtā svayam eva prapañcitam iti uparamyate kaṇṭaka ādīnām saṃsthāna viśeṣavatām nimitta adarśanena animittattām manu ānasyena eva dṛṣṭāntena śarīra ādīnām api saṃsthāna bhedavatām animitta tām manvānaḥ pūrvapakṣayati animittata iti adṛśyamāna nimittānām śarīra kaṇṭakāka ādīnām pakṣa nikṣepāt  pakṣeṇa vyabhicāra anudbhāvanāt  udbhāvane vā sarva anumāna ucchada prasaṅgāt  sarvatra tasya sulabha tvāt  ubhaya siddhena nimitta tad paṭa ādi dṛṣṭāntena saṃsthāna bhedavat tvāt kaṇṭaka śarīra ādīnām api nimittavat tvam iti siddhāntaḥ siddhānti eka deśi matam udbhāvya dūṣayati apare tu iti svayam vārtikakāraḥ kaṇṭaka ādīnām animitta tām vikalpya dūṣayati kaṇṭaka ādīnām animittam janma iti pratipādya pratipādaka nyāyasya iti pratipādyaḥ puruṣaḥ karma pratipādakaḥ ca puruṣaḥ kartā kartṛ karmaṇī ca kārake kārakam ca kriyāyāḥ  nimittam iti pratipādya pratipādaka viṣayaḥ  nyāyaḥ sa ca ayam animittam śarīra ādīnām janma iti pratijānānena anena abhyupeyate anyathā temūkatā eva syāt iti tad idam uktam sarvam cāmimittam pratipādayasi ca iti vyāhatam na kevalam pratipādya pratipādaka nyāya abhyupagamāditaḥ  api iti āha vākya upādānāt ca iti pratipādana nimittam vākyam upādatse abhidhatseca animittam sarvam iti vyāghāta iti arthaḥ tathā api anyatara dharma asiddha iti anyatareṇa sādhya dharmeṇa animittatva ākhyena asiddhaḥ  animitta tvasya eva asiddheḥ nanu prativādinaḥ  vāc nyātreṇa na siddham asiddham bhavati atiprasaṅgāt ityata āha saṃsthāna viśeṣavat tvasya bhāvāt  paṭa ādi dṛṣantena kaṇṭaka ādīnām sa nimittaka tvasya prāmāṇika tvena vāc nyātrāt asiddheḥ iti kasmāt punar  pūrva pakṣaḥ svayam sūtrakāreṇa na nirākṛta iti ata āha bhāṣkāraḥ sa khalu ayam vādaḥ  akarma nim ititta iti anye tu manyante sarvam anityam utpatti vināśa dharmaka tvāt iti hetoḥ gaka tvam darśayitum pṛcchati kim anityam iti utaram yasya kadā cit bhāvaḥ hetu artham vivṛṇoti utpatti iti yad  utpatti dharma karma nutpannam na asti tad  utpannam ca asti vināśa dharmakam ca vinaṣṭam na asti avinaṣṭam ca asti tasmāt pūrva aparayoḥ kālayoḥ abhāvāt madhye ca bhāvāt siddham kadācid bhāva lakṣaṇam anitya tvam utpatti vināśa dharmaka tvāt iti arthaḥ sādhya dharmi rūpam pṛcchati kim punar iti uttaram bhautikam ca iti atra tāvat svayam vārtikakāra uttaram āha sarvam anityam iti sūtrasya dṛṣṭānta artha tvāt iti artha śabdaḥ  nimitta vacanaḥ dṛṣṭānta nimitta tvāt  sūtrasya pratijñā hetu upanyāsa parasya na dṛṣṭāntam vinā hetuḥ pratijñāta arthasya gamakaḥ  yata iti arthaḥ etad eva vibhajate sarvam anityam iti nirākaraṇa antaram āha utpatti vināśa dharmaka tvāt iti cāyam iti siddhānti eka deśi matam upanyasya dūṣayati na anitya tā nitya tvāt iti parama siddhāntam sūtra uktam āha ayam khalu iti atha uccate na vayam sarvam anityam sādhayāmaḥ  api tu yaspaya yasya anitya tā nāma asti dharmaḥ tad sarvam anityam iti tatas ca ākāśa ādīnām nitya tve api na asmad pakṣa kṣatiḥ iti tad etad siddha sādhanena dūṣayati anitya tā bhāvāt ca sarvam anityam iti na doṣa iti yasya san dharmī svam tad yogāt anityaḥ syāt sa eva kadācid na asti iti ata āha anitya tvam nāma dharmaḥ saḥ  asati dharmiṇi na bhavati iti syāt etad  utpatti vināśa dharmakatva avagatau  anitya tā yogāt  ghaṭa ādi bhavatu anityam tena eva dṛṣṭāntena sattvāt ākāśādayaḥ  api bhaviṣyanti anityā iti deśayati atha punar iti pariharati tasya api uttara pada siddhau tad padārthasya nitya tvasya siddheḥ iti ayam apara ekāntaḥ sarvam nityam kasmāt pañcabhūta nitya tvāt pañcabhūta ātmakam khalu etad  gaḥ ghaṭa ādi kāryam upalabhyate vyapadiśanti hi mṛd ghaṭaḥ  sṛt śarīram iti bhūtāni ca nityāni teṣām ucchedasya naiyāyikaiḥ anabhyupagamāt  tena bhūtānām gaḥ ghaṭa ādīnām nityatā iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ  bhautikāni bhinnāni na hi parama sūkṣmāḥ paramāṇavaḥ  gaḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ paramāṇuvat teṣām atīndriya tve sarva agraha prasaṅgāt iti uktam dvitīye adhyāye tasmāt grahaṇa agrahaṇa viruddha dharma adhyāta yogāt anve bhautikā bhūtebhyaḥ tathā ca teṣām utpatti vināśa kāraṇa upalabdheḥ na nitya tvam bhūnitya tve api iti siddhāntam āha na utpatti vināśa kāraṇa upalabdheḥ iti bhūta sārūpyeṇa tādātmyam manyamānaḥ punar api pūrva pakṣa vādī āha tad lakṣaṇa avarodhāt gaḥ ghaṭa ādīnām bhūta nitya tvena nityatva apratiṣedhaḥ bhūta sāmyam gaḥ ghaṭa ādīnām bhūta kārya tve api upapadyamānam na bhūta ātmaka tvam avagamaya ti iti āśa yavān āha na utpatti tad kāraṇa upalabdheḥ iti api ca yadi utpatti vināśau na bhāvānām vastu santau katha prekṣāvatām abhimata utva patti kāraṇe anabhimata vināśa kāraṇe ca tad arthinām pravṛttiḥ iti āha utpatti vināśa kāraṇa iti api ca avyāpakaḥ  hetuḥ iti āha śabda karma buddhi ādīnām ca avyāptiḥ avyāpakaḥ ca anaikānta uktaḥ pakṣaḥ  hi sarvam nityam iti tasmin satva asattvābhyām anekāntaḥ na ekaḥ sattva asattva lakṣaṇaḥ  antaḥ asya iti anekānta iti tad etad vārttikakāraḥ  vakṣyati artha dṛṣṭyā pakṣasya anta dvaye avasthānāt iti hetoḥ anta dvaye sattva asattva rūpe pakṣasya avasthānāt iti yojanā asati bādhake mithyātva kalpanāyām atiprasaṅga iti amum artham śaṅkā nirākaraṇābhyām āha svapna viṣaya ityādi bhāṣya uktam artham uktvā svayam vārtikakāra āha sarvasya ca iti yāvat yena pratipādyata iti pratipādanena kriyata iti arthaḥ śeṣam ati rohita artham tad evam sāṃkhyānām matam apāsya svāyambhuvānām matam apākartum upanyasyati apare sarvam nityam iti anthā varṇayanti trividhaḥ khalu ayam dharmiṇaḥ pariṇāmodharma lakṣaṇa avasthā rūpaḥ tad yathā suvarṇam dharmi tasya pariṇāmaḥ  vardhamāna rucaka ādiḥ dharmasya tu lakṣaṇa pariṇāmaḥ  anāgata ādi yadā khalu ayam suvarṇa kāraḥ  vardhamānakam bhaṅktvā rucakam racayati tadā vardhamānakaḥ  varttamāna lakṣaṇam hittvā atīta lakṣaṇam āpadyete rucakam tu anāgata lakṣaṇam hitvā varttamāna tām āpadyate vattamānatā āpanna eva tu rucakaḥ  nava purāṇa bhāvam āpadyamānaḥ  avasthā pariṇāmavān bhavati nava purāṇa avasthāḥ ca varttamāna lakṣaṇa āśrayā lakṣaṇa pariṇāmāḥ saḥ  ayam trividhaḥ pariṇāmaḥ  dharmiṇaḥ dharma lakṣaṇa avasthāḥ ca dharmiṇaḥ  bhinnāḥ ca abhinnāḥ ca tathā ca te dharmya bhedāt nityāḥ bhedāt ca utpatti vināśa viṣa tvam iti ubhayam upapannam nanu yadi upajana apāya dharmaka tvam dharmiṇām hanta utpatteḥ prāk teṣā masa tvāt vināśāt ca ūrddhama sa tvāt katham sarva nityatva siddhiḥ iti ata āha yad ca upajāyate tad prāk api upajanāt asti dharmi rūpeṇa iti śeṣaḥ tad nivṛttam api asti iti atra apipa dharmi rūpeṇa iti śeṣaḥ nirākaroti na vyavasthā anupapatteḥ sū upajana apāyayoḥ svarūpataḥ kālataḥ  viśeṣataḥ sambandhitaḥ  anāgatatva ādi vyavasthā anupapattiḥ iti arthaḥ etad uktam bhavati na tāvat bheda abhedaḥ  paraspara parīhāra vyavasthita dharmau  ekatra samāviśataḥ tasmāt upajana apāya vyavasthāyai bhedam dharma lakṣaṇa avasthānām dharmiṇa icchatā teṣām atitya tvam abhyupetavyam sāṃkhya vatsa kārya abhyupagamena tu nityatva vyavasthāpane vārttikakāra āha yad ca nivarttate tad nivṛttam api asti iti bruvāṇa iti sugamam ayam api anya ekāntaḥ  bauddhānām sarvam pṛthak  kasmāt  bhāva lakṣaṇa pṛthaktvāt  na rūpa ādi atiriktam dravyam nāma kim cit asti na api avayava atiriktaḥ kaścid asti avayavi iti sautra antikā vaibhāṣikāḥ ca prapati pedire tān nirākaroti na aneka lakṣaṇaiḥ eka bhāva niṣpatteḥ sū anekavidhaiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ sambaddhasya ekasya bhāvasya ghaṭa ādeḥ avayavinaḥ  niṣpatteḥ iti atha api iti api ca iti arthaḥ aṇu samūhe ca āgṛhyamāṇa  iti parama sūkṣma tvena atīndriya tvāt iti arthaḥ atha api etad anūktam iti api ca bhāva lakṣaṇa pṛthat kāt iti hetum utkā boddhena paścāt etad uktam kim tad uktam ityata āha na asti akaḥ  bhāvaḥ yasmāt samudāya iti etad anūktam dūṣayati eka anupapatteḥ na asti eva samūhaḥ anūktam vivṛṇoti na asti ekaḥ  bhāvaḥ yasmāt  samūhe bhāva śabda prayogaḥ asya dūṣaṇam vivṛṇoti ekasya anupapatteḥ iti etataprapañcayati eka samuccayaḥ  hi iti na asti ekaḥ  bhāva iti yasya bhāvasya ekatva pratiṣedhaḥ pratijñāyate samūhe bhāva śabda prayoga iti bruvatā sa eva abhyanujñāyate nanu samūhaḥ  abhyanujñāyate na tu ekaḥ  bhāva iti ata āha eka samuccayaḥ  hi samūha iti tad enana pratijñāyā hetoḥ vyāghāta uktaḥ saṃprati pratijñāyā hetunā vyāghāta iti āha samūhe bhāva śabda prayogāt iti ca iti vārttikam asya prayoga iti kumbha śabdaḥ  aneka viṣaya iti pāramārthika aneka viṣayaḥ kālpanikam tu kumbhasya eka tvam na vāryate tathā ca eka padam iti ekapadena vyabhicāraḥ tasya api pāramārthika aneka viṣaya tvāt iti arthaḥ syāt etad  ghaṭa ādi śabdebhyaḥ  rūpa ādīnām budhna ādīnām ca bahūnām avagamāt  katham ekārtha tā ityata āha ādhāra ādheya bhāva iti yadi nānā artha tā api bhavati ghaṭa ādi śabdānām tathā api pratyekam eka tvam tad arthānām aśakyā pahnavam iti na pūrva pakṣiṇaḥ  abhimata siddhiḥ iti upetya tu uccate aneka artha tvam api atra na sambhavati iti samūhe bhedasya ca anavasthāt iti yadi samūha mātram eva na tu ekam kim cit asti tathā sati ghaṭa lakṣaṇe samūhe bhedyamāne na alpataratama ādi bhedaḥ pratīyeta ghaṭa ādi kapāla śarkarā cūrṇa paramāṇūnām samūha tvena ananta avayavatva āt ayam mahān ayam alpaḥ  alpatara iti vibhāgaḥ  na syāt  tasmāt anena tāratamyam samarthayamānena kva cit  samūha nivṛttiḥ vācyāna ca asau  asamūham eka mantareṇa iti ekaḥ  abhyupeya taiti arthaḥ uktam artham avidvān śaṅkate atha manyasa iti rūpa ādīnām samudāya iti catvāri vādravyāṇi iti ca ava antara darśana bheda vivakṣayā draṣṭavyam ukta artha darśanena uttaram etasmin vai darśana iti atha anantam samudāyam pratipadyasa iti nirākṛtasya api punar āśaṅkā āgama virodham āpāyitum eka anupapattau na aneka upapattiḥ iti yad tad anekam uktam etad  tyājyam iti śeṣam bhāṣya vyākhyayā vyākhyātam samprati śūnyatā vādinam utthāpayati ayam apara ekāntaḥ sarvam abhāva iti pratijñā atra hetuḥ bhāveṣu itaretara abhāva siddheḥ iti sarvam idam pramāṇa prameya pramiti rūpam abhāvaḥ tuccham bhāveṣu itaretara abhāva siddheḥ iti vārttikakāraḥ  vyācaṣṭe asat pratyaya bhāva pratiṣedhābhyām bhāva śabda sāmānādhikaraṇyāt pramāṇa ādayaḥ khalu amī parasparān ātmaka tayā asat iti pratyayasya nañaḥ ca gocarā iti anubhūyante atas tad vācinām śabdānām tad sāmānādhikaraṇyam tatas  pramāṇāt ayaḥ  asantaḥ anutpanna pradhvasta paṭavat  api cāmī bhāvā nityā anityā vā nitya tve sarva sāmarthya rahitasya asattvam na hi nityam kva cit kārī aupayujyate krama akrama anupapatteḥ iti uktam anitya tve tu vināśa svabhāvāḥ ced  dvitīya ādi kṣaṇā eva prathama kṣaṇe api na syuḥ sattve vānāmī vināśa svabhāvāḥ atatsvabhāvat tve vā kṣaṇa antare api na vinaśyeyuḥ naḥ khalu nīlam sva kāraṇāt upajātam jātu kāraṇa sahasraiḥ api śakyam pītam karttum iti vināśa svabhāvaka tvam akāmena api anityānām eṣitatyam tasmāt bhāvānām śūnyatā eva pāramārthikī kalpanayā tu avastu satyā santā eva avabhāsanta iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ tathā ca sarve bhāvā iti sarve bhāva śabdā iti arthaḥ prayogaḥ ca sarvebhāva śabdā asat viṣayāḥ asat pratyaya pratiṣedhābhyām sāmānādhikaraṇyāt anutpanna pradhvasta paṭa śabdavat atra tāvat utsūtram bhāṣya uktam dūṣaṇa vārttikakāra āha pratijñāpadayoḥ pratijñā hetvoḥ ca vyāghāta iti abhinna vibhaktika tvam abhinna arthaka vibhaktika tvam na tu abhinna vibhaktika tvam eva bhinna vibhaktikānām api sāmānādhikaraṇyāt yathā caitraḥ paṭhati iti yathā ca na tvām tṛṇāya manya iti nāmati tad pratyayena bhavitum iti na hi atyanta āsan  irūpa ākhyam sarvam iti vā bhāva iti vā abhidhānaspaya gocaraḥ upapāditam hi dvitīya sūtra eva yathā asat vā anirvacanīyam vā na khyāti gocaraḥ  api tu sat eva sat antarātmanā tathā ca kutaḥ atyantāsataḥ kalpanā gocara tvam api iti śeṣam bhāṣya iti pratijñā hetoḥ vyāghātaḥ  bhāṣye prapañcita iti utsūtram utkā bhāṣya kāraḥ sautram dūṣaṇam vaktum āha sūtreṇa ca abhisambandhaḥ dūṣaṇasya na svabhāva siddheḥ bhāvānām sū sarvam abhāva iti na asti kasmāt svabhāva siddheḥ bhāvānām svabhāvaḥ  dharmaḥ  dravya ādīnām sadādiḥ atha vā svabhāvaḥ svarūpam bhāvānām yena amī bhāvāḥ svabhāvāt vyāvarttante yad vā asan  iti pratyayasya gavya śva ātmanā iti viśeṣaṇāt  agaurityasya gām parihṛtya aśva ādibhiḥ saṃbandhāt gaḥ bhāva siddheḥ evam aśva ādiṣu api iti svabhāva siddheḥ bhāvānām na abhāva iti arthaḥ na svabhāva siddheḥ iti sūtram anūdya vārttikāraḥ sva rūpa mātreṇa vyākhyāyam praśna pūrvakam tātparyam asya darśayati pūrva sūtrasya iti kaśca svabhāva aityādinā siddhaḥ  bhāva iti antena sūtrasya vyākhyāna trayam bhāṣya kārīyam vārttikakāraḥ  darśayati sāmānyaḥ  dharmaḥ samānaḥ  nityatva ādiḥ iti arthaḥ praśna pūrva kamasat pratyaya pratiṣedha sāmānādhikaraṇyam bhāvasya upapādayati katham tarhi iti asat śabdaḥ khalva bhāva viśeṣaṇam sadeva abhidhatte śukla guṇa viśiṣṭe paṭe varttate tathā ca asat pratyaya abhidhānayoḥ upapannam bhāva vācinā padevana sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti arthaḥ bhāvaḥ ca kaścid nityaḥ kaścid anityaḥ tatra nityasya artha kriyā kāri tvam upapāditam kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅga eva anityaḥ  api na vināśa svabhāvaḥ  bhāvaḥ kim tu sva kāraṇa ādayam sat svabhāvaḥ  jātaḥ kāraṇa antarāt tu vinaśyati yatu uktam nīlam śakyam na pītam karttum iti tatra brūmaḥ śakya eva nīlaḥ paṭaḥ pītaḥ karttum āma śyāmaḥ  ghaṭaḥ  vahni saṃyogāt raktaḥ atha nīlatvam na pīta tvam śakyam kartum nanu bhāvaḥ api na abhāvaḥ karttum śakya iti yathā eva kumbha adhikaraṇe śyāma rakta tve paryāyeṇa bhavataḥ evam kapāla adhikaraṇau kumbha bhāva abhāvauviti adoṣaḥ svabhāva siddheḥ iti yad uktam tadā ākṣipati śūnya vādī na svabhāva siddhiḥ āpekṣika tvāt  sū sarva evam hi bhāvā bhinna svabhāvā bhinna tvam ca teṣām anya apekṣam tathā hi nīlam bhinnam pīta ādi apekṣayā na tu svabhāvataḥ evam hrasvatva dīrghatva parattva aparatva pitā putratva ādayaḥ paraspara apekṣā draṣṭavyāḥ yad ca parāpakṣam tad na svābhāvikam yathā japā kusuma apekṣam sphaṭikasya rakta tvam iti ākṣepa arthaḥ samādhatte vyāhata tvāt ayuktam sū tad vyācaṣṭe yadi iti nanu yadi anena krameṇa ubhaya abhāvaḥ  bhavati bhavatu siddham eva naḥ samīhitam iti ata āha apekṣāyām anapekṣāyām ca iti parimāṇa bhedaḥ  hi dīrgha tvam hrasva tvam ca sa ca bhāvānām autpattikaḥ kevalam tasya atiśayān atiśayau paraspara grahaṇa adhīnau tathā hi ikṣu yaṣṭeḥ veṇu yaṣṭitaḥ  hrasva tvam pūrva saṃkhyā yogi hasta parimita tvam anatiśayaḥ veṇu yaṣṭeḥ dīrgha tvam atiśayaḥ para saṃkhyā yogi hasta parimita tvam tad ca idam pratiyogi nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇam na tu pratiyogi adhīna utpatti iti na vastu dharmaḥ  ayam para apara apekṣaḥ bhinna tvam ca bhedaḥ sa ca vastu viśeṣaṇam na utpattau vastu antaram apekṣate kim tu sva nirūpaṇe evam pitṛ tvam api vyavasthitā janaka śaktiḥ eva sā janya nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇā na tu tad adhīna utpattiḥ vipañcitam ca etad asmābhiḥ brahma tattva parīkṣāyām paratva aparatva ādayaḥ tu apekṣā buddhi nimitta tayā para apekṣā utpattikā api lokayātrām vahantaḥ  na śakyāḥ pratyākhyātum na ca etāvatā tad adhikaraṇam bhāvaḥ na nirapekṣa iti sarvam avadātam syāt etad  apekṣā mātram eva dīrgha tvāt ayaḥ  bhaviṣyanti kṛtam eṣām vastu svabhāvena iti ata āha svabhāva siddhau ca āsatyām iti apekṣā sāmarthyam apekṣā prayojana yogaḥ svayaṃvārtikakāraḥ  dūṣaṇāni āha sarvathā ca ayam vyāhata iti nigada vyākhyātam uttara sūtra avatāra param bhāṣyam atha ete saṃkhyā ekānta vādāḥ saṃkhyā ekāntaḥ  yeṣu vādeṣu te tathā uktāḥ atha śūnya tā vāda anantaram te parīkṣyanta eti arthaḥ tatra prathamam brahmā dvaitam utthāpayati sarvam ekam kutas  sat aviśeṣāt idam asya ākūtam na tāvat ayam nāma rūpa prapañcaḥ prakāśāt bhinnaḥ san prakāśitum arhati jaḍasya svayaṃprakāśa asaṃbhavāt na ca prakāśa yonagāt prakāśata iti yuktam na khalva antareṇa prakāśena asya kaścid yogaḥ saṃbhavati viṣaya viṣayi bhāvaḥ sambandha iti ced na tatra akiñcitkarasya viṣayitvā sambhavāt  na ca arthe jñānam phapa valam janayati iti sāṃpratam atīta anāgatayoḥ arthayoḥ tad asaṃbhavāt na ca na tayoḥ viṣaya bhāvaḥ tasmāt  jñānāt bhinnasya nāma rūpa prapañcasya na prakāśa sambhava iti jñānasya eva ayam vivartta iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ na ca prakāśa ātmanaḥ  ghaṭa ādaya eva udaya vyaya dharmiṇaḥ paraspara vyāvṛttāḥ santu iti sāṃpratam tad vyāvṛtti grahe pramāṇa abhāvāt  sā hi yadyatas  vaya āvartate tad ubhaya grahe gṛhyate na ca vijñānāni vilakṣaṇāni sva rūpa mātra avasthitāni paraspara vārttā anabhijñāni jñāna antaram api grahītum utsahante prāk eva svasmāt vyāvartayitum na ca niṣedhya niṣedha adhikaraṇa grahaṇa kāraṇa kaḥ  vyāvṛtti grahaḥ sva kāraṇena sama samaya utpādaḥ  bhavitum arhati tādṛśoḥ savya itara viṣāṇavat kārya kāraṇa bhāva abhāvāt na ca ekam vijñānam kṣaṇikam niṣedhya niṣedha adhikaraṇe gṛhītvā paścāt niṣedham gṛhṇāti iti yuktam kṣaṇikasya ākramasya kramavat vyāpāra ayogāt na ca ekam vijñānam niṣedhya niṣedha adhikaraṇe gṛhṇāti atha jñāna antaram niṣedhati iti yuktam caitra gṛhīte api tasmin yaitrasya niṣedha jñāna prasaṅgāt  na ca jñāna svarūpa graha eva asya niṣedha graha iti sāṃpratam evam hi sa bhavet yadi svarūpa tad anya vyāvavṛttyoḥ eka tvam bhavet  tatra vyāvṛtti svabhāvaḥ  vā bhāvaḥ bhāva svabhāva vā vyāvṛttiḥ tatra pūrvasmin kalpe vyāvṛtteḥ tuccha tvāt tad svabhāvā bhava abhedāḥ tucchāḥ syuḥ tatas ca vacaḥ bhaṅni antareṇa śūnya bāda prasaṅgaḥ uttarasmin  tu kalpe vidhi rūpaḥ  bhāva eva vyāvṛttiḥ iti vidhi rūpa tayā ca te vyāvarttanta iti na vyāvṛttā bhāvāḥ parasparam paramārthataḥ tad idam uktam sat aviśeṣāt iti anādya nirvacanīya avidyā nibandhanam tu bhāvānām bhedam na vyāsedhāmaḥ na ca jñātuḥ api jñānāt bheda grāhakam asti pramāṇa muktāt eva viśeṣāt  tasmāt na jñeyānām parasparataḥ ca jñānāt ca bhedaḥ na api jñātuḥ jñānāt asita bhedaḥ na api jñānānām anyonyasya tasmāt prakāśa eva svayam prakāśaḥ kūṭastha nitya ānada ghanaḥ  anādya vidyā upadarśita vividha vicitra nāma rūpa prapañcaḥ  brahma iti advaita siddhiḥ ata eva śrutayaḥ bhavanti aekam eva advitīyam brahma na iha nānā asti kiñca na mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti ya iha na anā iva paśyati iti evam ādikāḥ tad evam aikāntikam eka tvam upanyasya dvi tvam aikāntikam āha sarvam dvedhā kutas  nitya anityabhedāt  na hi nitya anityābhyām anyaḥ rāśiḥ asti yam āśritya padārthāḥ tritva ādike vyāvatiṣṭheran  iti mata antaram āha sarvam tredhā tad eva darśayati jñātā jñeyam jñānam iti jñaptiḥ api jñāyamāna tvāt  jñeyāt na atiricyata iti bhāvaḥ mata antaram āha sarvā caturdhā darśayati pramātā pramāṇam prameyam pramitiḥ iti yadi pramitiḥ nāma tattvam pramāṇa ādibhyaḥ  bhinnam na āśrīyate pramāyāḥ pradhāna kriyāyāḥ  abhāvāt katham pramātṛ ādayaḥ katham ca pradhākriyām antareṇa eka vākya tā syāt  kāraka vaiciśyam vā pramāyāḥ phalatva avasthāyāḥ  upari prameya vyapadeśam na vārayāmaḥ na ca etāvatā tattva antaram na bhavati iti evam yathā sambhavam anye api iti prakṛti puruṣau  iti vā pañca skandhā iti vā paśu pāśa tad uccheda īśvarā iti vā ityādayaḥ tatra parīkṣām saṃkhyā ekānta tā nirākaraṇa rūpa antān darśayati sūtreṇa saṃkhyā ekāntā siddhiḥ kāraṇa anupapatti upapattibhyām sū anavayavena sarvam ced ekam dvedhā tredhā caturdhā ca iti pratijña arthaḥ tad atiriktam sādhanam vācyam na hi sādhyam eva sādhanam bhavati tathā ca sādhanasya tad atirekān na sekhyā ekānta siddhiḥ na ca kim cit api sva saṃvedanam asti jñāna pradīpa ādīnām api para saṃvedya tvāt  yathā ca jñāna atiriktaḥ  api arthaḥ  viṣayaḥ tathā vijñāna vāda nirāsa avasare vakṣyate na ca vijñānāt arthasya bhedaḥ  aśakya grahaḥ tathā hi nīlam upalabha iti anuhaṅkāra āspadam aśveta ādi rūpam nīlam pratayā ātmam anubhava gocaraḥ evam nīla ādīnām api parasparam anyathā ghaṭam ānaya iti deśitaḥ  nayane nimīlya śayīta śayīthā iti deśite toyam āharet  kasya cit  kutaścid katham cit vivecaka abhāvāt na ca anirvacanīyānādya vidyā nibandhanaḥ  ayam bheda vyavahāra iti sāṃpratam anirvacanīya khyāteḥ pūrvam eva nirākṛta tvāt  tasmāt sarva jana saṃvedana siddhaḥ  ayam bheda pratyayaḥ na kāraṇa mukha nirīkṣaṇena yuktaḥ  nirākartum api tu spaṣṭa dṛṣṭāt kāryāt bheda pratyaya lakṣaṇāt tādṛśam tad kāraṇam kalpanīyam yādṛśena tad kāraṇena prapañca pratyayaḥ apratyūham utpadyeta tad ca pratyakṣam eva tathā hi tad nīlam paricchindat pīta ādibhyaḥ  asya bhedam paricchinatti saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa tā lakṣaṇāt indriya artha sannikarṣāt nīlam hi nīlam iti anubhavan pīta ādikam ca pīta ādikam iti anubhavan smaran vā śaknoti niṣedhya niṣedha adhikaraṇa tayā samākalayitum rūpa mātreṇa agṛhīta paraspa bhedam api na hi tad na bhedena prathataiti abhedena pratheta na yena anayoḥ nīla pītayoḥ gṛhīta svarūpayoḥ avadhya vadhimadbhāvaḥ  na syāt  tathā ca tau gṛhītvā pratyakṣeṇa śakyaḥ  anayoḥ bhedaḥ  grahītum iti asāṃpratam etad aanyonya saṃśrayāt bhedaḥ  na pramā antara sādhanaḥ tasmin  idam na ayam ayam iti bhedam vinā nadhīḥ etena pramātuḥ api pramāyā bhedaḥ  vyākhyātaḥ pramātāraḥ ca anekavidha sukha duḥkha upabhoga vyavasthānāt badhira andhakāṇa ādi kovida jālma saṃsāri mukta vibhāga upapatteḥ ca bhedavantaḥ  anumīyante ekasmin  aparyāyeṇa viruddha dharma saṃsarga asaṃbhavāt kalpanayā kathañcid saṃbhāvyamānaḥ  api ayam gomaya pāyasīyanyām āvahati tad evam pratyakṣa virodhāt anupapanna arthāḥ śrutaya aekam eva advitīya mityādyāḥ prathamām vṛttim ullaṅghya jadhasyām avalambante ayajamānaḥ prastara aādityaḥ  vai yūpa ityādivat iti yad āha bhagavān jaiminiḥ aguṇavādaḥ tu iti atad siddhiḥ iti ca iti tasmāt na advaitam iti sādhyāt sādhanasya bhedena ca saṃkhyā antara ekāntā api apahṛta arthā iti uktam nyā sū atra pūrva pakṣa vādī āha na kāraṇa avayava bhāvāt sū tad vyācaṣṭe kāraṇasya sādhya avayava bhāvāt ekasya dvaya ādīnām vā kaścid eka deśaḥ sādhanam tathā ca na saṃkhyā antaram na ca sādhana bhāva iti arthaḥ nirākaroti niravayava tvāt ahetuḥ sū avayava bhāvāt iti yadi sādhyasya kaścid avayavaḥ  bhavet na saṃkhyā ekāntaḥ syāt iti sarvam ekam iti etasmin pratijñā arthe na kim cit apavṛjyate vyāvarttate yatas tad sādhanam syāt iti arthaḥ atha kasmāt na sādhyam eva hetuḥ iti ata āha ātmani ca iti ca u hetau api ca ete saṃkhyā ekāntāḥ pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa virodhāt mithyāvādā iti āha te khalu ime saṃkhyā ekāntā iti khalu śabdaḥ samuccaye prakra koṭara pāṇi ādi viśeṣa kāritaḥ  yoḥ  atha bhedaḥ sthāṇu puruṣa ādiḥ tad pratyākhyānena iti arthaḥ atha viśeṣa kārita artha bheda abhyanujñānena vartante tathā api ekānta tvam jahati ekatva ādi saṃkhyāyāḥ  anaikāntika tvam iti arthaḥ atha sāmānya kārita iti saṃkhyā mātram aṅgīkriyate na punar asnayā aikāntika tvam iti arthaḥ tad asmākam abhimatam eva iti āha tathā api na kim cit bādhyata iti ye api āhuḥ sattā sāmānyam eva tattvam bhedāḥ tu kālpanikā iti tān pratyāha na ca bhedam antareṇa iti yad āhuḥ anirviśeṣam na sāmānyam bhavet śaśa viṣāṇava diti syāt etad  pretyabhāva parīkṣāyām ka eṣām avasaraḥ  yad ete ekānta vādāḥ parīkṣyanta iti ata āha te iti advaita ādiṣu ekānteṣu pretyabhāvaḥ  na tāttvikaḥ  bhavet api tu kālpanikaḥ na kevalam pretyabhāvaḥ  api tu ṣoḍaśā api padārthāḥ tasmāt eteṣām yad tattva jñānam tasya praviveka artham jñeya pravivekena jñāna praviveka iti tad artham ete parīkṣitā iti tad anena prabandhena pretyabhāvaḥ parīkṣitaḥ atha uddeśa krama anurodhāt phalam idānīm parīkṣyate tatra agni hotra ādīnām phalam anantara bhāvi kāla antara bhāvi vā iti saṃśayaḥ etad uktam bhavati karma anantaram duḥkham ca loka paṅktyādi ca upalabhyate praśaṃsanti hi laukikā dhārmikaḥ  ayam sādhutama iti tad kim etāvat eva asya phalam astu atha amuṣmikam svarga ādi iti kim prāptam svarga ādi phala tve karmaṇaḥ svarūpeṇa akāraṇa tvāt cira nivṛtte tasmin  tad utpatteḥ apūrva kalpanāyām ca pradhāna aṅga apūrvāṇi bhūyāṃsi kalpanīyāni na ca tāni utpanna mātrāṇi janayanti phalam iti tad sahakāryantarāṇi kalpanīyāni iti adṛṣṭa kalpanā gauravāt tad anantara dṛṣṭa phala ābādhanāt ca na asyāḥ abhuṣmikam phalam svarga ādi api tu anantara dṛśyamānam eva tatra api duḥkha phala tve upadeśa vyāghāta al loka paṅkti lābha khyāti ādikam eva phalam tad ca sukha hetu tayā katham cit svarga ādi padena ucyate dṛṣṭaḥ  hi sukha hetau svarga pada prayogaḥ  loke yathā candanam svargaḥ sūkṣmāṇi vāsāṃsi svarga iti prāptam evam prāpte brūmaḥ svarga padasya tāvat artha vādataḥ  ayat na duḥkhena saṃbhinnam na ca grastam anantaram abhilāṣā upanītam ca tad sukham svar pada āspadaḥ am iti sukham prati vācaka tvam avadhāritam na ca tad vācaka tvena eva candana ādau tad prayoga upapattau  aneka arthatva kalpanā apa yuktā yad āhuḥ anyāyaḥ ca aneka artha tvam iti tasmāt mukhyaḥ  ayam svarga śabda ukta bhede sukhe tathā ca svarga kāma  iti atra mukhya artha saṃbhave na upacarita artha tā yuktā na ca aneka adṛṣṭa kalpanā bhayān mukhya artha parityāgaḥ  nyāyyaḥ pramāṇa siddhe niyoga paryanuyoga anupapatteḥ yathā ahuḥ aśruti siddhi artham aśrutā upalabdhau yatnavatā bhavitavyam na tu śruta śaithilyam ādaraṇīya am iti tathā apramāṇavanti adṛṣṭāni kalpyāni su bahūni api na ca anantara dṛśyamānam loka paṅktyādi homa ādi anuṣṭhāna phalam api tu tad upalambha phalam adāmbhikānām pracchannam anutiṣṭhatām api loka paṅkya ādeḥ abhāvāt  tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam na sadyas  kāla antara upabhogya tvāt iti bhāṣyam tathā pravṛttyā saṃskāraḥ  dharma adharma lakṣaṇaḥ  janyata iti na eṣa puruṣa saṃskāraḥ snāna ādi janya iva boddhavyaḥ  api tu puruṣa dharma tā mātreṇa saṃskāra iti ucyate paramārthataḥ tu ayam dharmaḥ puruṣa āśrayaḥ  api karmaṇā phale janayitavye tasya avāntara vyāpāra iti vārtikam sadyas tāpa ādi phaletañ atidguṇa saṃvijñānaḥ  ayam bahuvrīhiḥ tāpādi iti tena loka paṅkti ādikam ucyate svargaḥ phalam śrūyate iti ayuktam svarga kāma  iti svargasya puruṣa viśeṣaṇa tvena śravaṇāt asādhya tvāt ata āha deśitayā ca kriyayā na anarthikayā śravitavyam āpta upadeśaḥ khalu ayam upadeśyasya karmaṇaḥ  abhimata upāya tām āha tatra karmaṇaḥ  abhimata apekṣāyām puruṣa viśeṣaṇasya api apekṣita tvāt sādhya tvam iti siddham evam hi loka paṅkti ādiḥ agni hotra ādi anuṣṭhān sādhyā bhavet  yadi tad kāmasya svarga kāmasya iva agnihotra ādi anuṣṭhānam deśyeta na ca etad asti iti āha na ca tāpa ādi kāma iti loka paṅkti ādi kāma iti arthaḥ śeṣam ati rohita artham idam idānīm cintyate kim etad phalam utpatteḥ prāya sat vā sadvā sat asat vā anabhayam vā iti atra samasta pakṣa ākṣepeṇa phala abhāvam abhidhitsuḥ pūrvapakṣayati tad idam phalam niṣpatteḥ prāk  na āsanna sanna sat asat sat asat kasmāt na bhavati iti ata āha sat asatoḥ vairdhmyāt  paraspara viruddha dharma tvāt  dharmaḥ svabhāvaḥ virodhāt iti arthaḥ atha anubhayam kasmāt na bhavati iti ata āha na api ubhaya viparītam iti siddhānti āha prāk utpatteḥ utpatti dharma kamasat iti addhā nanu na asat utapadyate na sanniruddhi ataiti ācakṣate sāṃkhyāḥ tad katham etad iti ata āha utpāda vyaya darśanāt  sū yathā nitya svarūpāyāḥ citi śakteḥ na utpādaḥ  na ca vyaya evam phalasya api nityasya tau na syātām iti arthaḥ na hi sat pakṣa iti satkārya pakṣa eti arthaḥ na kim cit jāyata iti na pratijñā vākyāt kiñcid tattva jñānam sambhavati kim cit ca saṃdeha ādi na vinaśyati iti ajñāna tiraḥ  bhāvaḥ saṃśaya viparyaya tirobhāvaḥ kāraṇasya hi pradhānasya lakṣaṇam mahān lakṣyate hi mahatā pradhānam iti evam tasya api ahaṅkāraḥ tasya puṣṭiḥ sthūla tā iti arthaḥ paścāt bhavati iti kevala kāraṇa avasthāyāḥ paścāt iti yad ca uktam upādāna niyamāt iti tatra yadi puruṣasya upādāna niyamaḥ paṭa arthī tantūn eva upādatte na vīraṇam kaṭārthī vīraṇam iti tatas tad upādānānām tatra tatra kārye sāmarthya parijñānāt  tad ca sāmarthya mānu mānikam tad idam ucyate sū buddhi siddham tu tad asat iti tad asat bhāvi kāryam anena eva kāraṇena janyate na anyena iti anumānāt  buddhi siddham eva iti arthaḥ atha asat kārya pakṣe tantava eva paṭasya upādānam na vīraṇa ādi iti ayam niyamaḥ  na syāt iti brūṣe tad ayuktam asattva aviśeṣe api sva kāraṇāt utpannam kim cit eva cit kāryam janayitum samartham na anyat iti ayam svabhāva viśeṣāt upapadyata iti api ca satkārya pakṣe pradhāna upādāna tvāt viśvasya tasya ca abheda apavat kāraṇa ātmaka tvāt ca kārya jātasya sarvam sarva ātmakam iti idam ihanā idam idam idānīm na idam idam evaṃnedam iti niyamaḥ  na syāt  kasya citkutaścit viveka hetoḥ abhāvāt  tasmāt asti rāsabhe api viṣāṇa miti tatra tasya asattvam bruvāṇaḥ sva siddhāntam bādhatā aiti āha asattvāt ca khara viṣāṇam na utpadyata iti bruvāṇa iti sattve ca asattve ca samāne yasya kāraṇam asti tad utpadyata iti guḍajihvikā paramārtha taḥ tu asattve kāraṇa sāmarthya niyamāt utpatti niyamaḥ kalpate sarva ātmanā sarvasya sattvave tu na niyama hetuḥ asti iti ukta prāpayam deśayati atha asat kārye kim pramāṇam na hi anumānam asmin  arthe pramāṇam bhavitum arhati āśraya asiddheḥ na api pratyakṣam tena api asataḥ svātantryeṇa anirūpaṇāt iti bhāvaḥ vidita abhiprāya uttaram āha na asattvave na sattvave anumānam asti yathā asmākam āśrayā siddhi doṣāt asattve kāryasya na anumānam evam bhāve api kāryasya sattve na anumānam āśraya asiddheḥ eva kva tarhi anumānam iti ata āha dharmiṇī vipratipatteḥ anumānam asti iti yojanā tathā satya āśrayaḥ  asi asiddhi ati iti arthaḥ punar  pṛcchati kva iti yadi dharmiṇī vipratipattiḥ kva tarhi vivādaḥ uttaram yad ubhaya iti dharmi adhikaraṇān satkārya vādinām eva vādān vibhajate tān prati iti tantu mātram paṭa iti tantubhyaḥ  abhinna iti arthaḥ kārya ātmanā iti kāryam kāraṇāt bhinna abhinnam iti arthaḥ asat kārya pakṣaḥ tu sva abhimataḥ sphuṭa tvāt avāntara pratibandya bhāvāt ca na upanyastaḥ upapādita iti dvitīya adhyāye prāk upalabdhi kālāt iti kāraṇa vyāpārāt  prāk iti arthaḥ saṃsthāna viśeṣa śūnyatā mātra vivakṣayā turya ādi dṛṣṭāntaḥ  na tu prāgabhāvaḥ  vivakṣitaḥ śakti viśeṣa avasthitā iti kāraṇa vyāpārāt  prāk iti śeṣaḥ atra siddha sādhanam vayam api bramahe sva vyāpārāt paṭa utpatti nimittāt prāk tantavaḥ śakti viśeṣa avacchinnā aiva iti pareṣām satkārya sādhanam upanyasyati vidyamāna aṃbhi vyakti arthāḥ tantavaḥ tad arthinā niyamena upādānāt  khanitra ādivat  yathā hi khanitram vidyamānam eva udakam mṛdapanayanena vyanakti iti tad etad  dūṣayati vidyamānasya abhivyaktiḥ asati iti abhivyaktivat kārye api prasaṅgaḥ yathā avyakteḥ asatyā eva utpādaḥ tathā kāryasya api asata patra utpāda iti arthaḥ khanitra ādivat iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya vikala iti āha yad api iti sā aprāptiḥ kutaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam iti prāptiḥ khalu saṃyogaḥ sa ca guṇaḥ guṇaḥ ca dravya vināśāt vinaśyet  virodhi guṇa antarāt vā tatra tāvat āvaraṇa dravyam āvriyamāṇam vā udakam na vinaṣṭam yena tayoḥ saṃyogaḥ  vinaśyet  tatas tad virodhi guṇa antara utpādaḥ  vaktavyaḥ sa eva ca saṃyoga virodhī guṇa u vibhāga iti ucyatā eti arthaḥ prāpteḥ abhāvaḥ  aprāptiḥ iti pakṣam dūṣayitvā paryudāsa pakṣam āśaṅkya dūṣayati atha prāpteḥ iti punar  śaṅkate atha bhinna deśa utpattim iti na ca vayam saṃyogam vibhāgam vā guṇam upemaḥ kim tu bhinna deśa utpanna eva dravye vibhāgaḥ  nirantara utpanna eva saṃyoga iti arthaḥ nirākaroti śrinnadeśa iti viśeṣaṇa upādānāt na bhinna deśa utpattiḥ vibhāgaḥ kasmāt  utpanne utpannam iti bhinna deśa tayā bhinnam iti viśeṣaṇam hi sva anuriktam pratyayam viśeṣye janayati na tu anya anuraktam na khalu nīlam viśeṣaṇam utpale rakta pratyayam janayatu abhrāntasya iti arthaḥ api ca kṣaṇa bhaṅgam bhāvānām vyāsedhadbhiḥ asmābhiḥ bhinna deśa utpatteḥ pratiṣedhāt na bhinna deśa utpattiḥ vimāgaḥ śaṅkate kṣaṇika tvāt vibhāgasya iti utpadya hi indriya sannikarṣāt vibhāgena sva viṣayam jñānam janayitavyam na ca etāvantam kālam asau  asti kṣaṇika tvena utpanna apavargi tvāt iti arthaḥ nirākaroti nasāmānya abhivyakti iti etad vibhajate pūrvam tāvat utpannaḥ vibhāgaḥ sāmānyam vyanakti iti sva kāraṇa samavāyaḥ sattā samavāyaḥ  vā utpattiḥ tad viśiṣṭa utpanna iti ucyate yeṣām sāmānya graha puras  saram viśeṣa jñānam tad mate na sāmānyam vyanakti tad uttara kālam ca sva pratyayam janayati iti uktam etad uktam bhavati na vayam bauddhā iva pūrva apara kāla mātra avasthiti lakṣaṇām kṣaṇikatām vibhāga ādīnām ācakṣmahe kim tvā aśutara vināśa lakṣaṇām sā ca dvitra ādi kṣaṇa sthāyinām cira sthāyibhyova ghaṭa ādibhyaḥ  vyāvṛtta ātmā śakyāvaktum iti deha ādi atiriktam ātmānam nityam para lokinam asantam manyamāna āha āśraya vyatirekāt vṛkṣa phala utpattivat iti ahetuḥ sū mūla seka phala utpādayoḥ eka vṛkṣa āśraya tvam karmaṇaḥ tu homa ādeḥ āśrayaḥ śarīram na ca āmuṣmikasya svarga ādeḥ śarīram āśrayaḥ tasmin  aṣṭe asya bhāvāt  tasmāt āśraya vyatirekāt svarga ādeḥ vṛkṣa phala utpattivat iti ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ svarga phala tve homasya ahetuḥ iti arthaḥ asti ātmā svagaupabhoga samarthaḥ śarīra ādi vyatiriktaḥ kartteti uṣapāditam iti āśa yavān āha prīteḥ ātma āśraya tvāt apratiṣedhaḥ sū astu svarga ādi ātma āśrayam tathā api avyāpakaḥ  hetuḥ putra ādi phalebhyaḥ  nivṛtteḥ iti deśayati na putra paśu strī paricchada hiraṇya anna ādi phala nirddeśāt sū pariharati tad sambandhāt phala niṣpatteḥ teṣu phalavat upacāraḥ sū svargaḥ  api tāvat svarga tayā na kāmyate kim tu bhogya tayā evam sati kā eva kathā putra ādiṣu te api bhogya tayā eva kāmyante na tu svarūpam bhogyam iti tad sādhyam sukham bhogyam tasmāt putra ādi sambadhāt tad utpatteḥ sukha utpatteḥ teṣu yathā phala śabda prayogaḥ tathā teṣu putra ādiṣu iti arthaḥ sūtra artha kathanena eva bhāṣya vārtikevī ākhyāte phala anantaram duḥkha parīkṣaṇam tatra iyam parīkṣā bhavatu duḥkham bādhanā lakṣaṇam anubhūyamānam yad punar idam sukham pratyātmam anukūla vedanīyam tad katham duḥkham anubhava virodhāt  śarīra indriya buddhayaḥ ca yadi duḥkha hetu tayā duḥkham kasmāt sukha hetu tayā sukham eva na bhavanti sā iyam ati bhīru tā sakala loka yātrā virodhinī yathā āhuḥ ana hi mṛgāḥ santi iti śālayaḥ  na upyante na hi bhikṣavaḥ santi iti sthālyaḥ  na adhiśrīyanta aiti tasmāt māṃsa arthī iva kaṇṭakān uddhṛttya māṃsam aśnanna anartham kaṇṭaka janyam āpnoti iti evam prekṣāvān duḥkham uddhṛttya indriya ādi sādhanam sukham bhokṣyate santi ca vividha duḥkha parivarjana hetavaḥ  dṛṣṭāḥ paridṛṣṭa sāmarthyā anvaya vyatirekābhyām iti abhiprāyavān pūrva pakṣī guḍajivhikayā saṃśayāna iva pṛcchati tad kim idam iti siddhāntina uttaram anya iti āha sūtrakāra iti tena eva abhiprāyeṇa pūrva pakṣī pṛcchati katham uttaram na vai sarva loka sākṣikam iti ayam tu duḥkha bhāvanā upadeśaḥ kimartham iti ata āha bhāṣya kāraḥ duḥkha hāna arthaḥ kiṃbhūtasya duḥkha hānam iti ata āha janma maraṇa prabandhasya anubhavaḥ prāptiḥ tad nimittāt  duḥkha upadeśa pariśīlanena nirviṇṇasya alaṃpratyayavataḥ ata eva duḥkham jihāsata iti yojanīyam sva abhiprāyeṇa pūrva pakṣī pṛcchati kayā yuktyā uttaram sarve kha palu sattva nikāyā iti utpattiḥ sukha duḥkha hetu bhūtā viṣaya saṃpattiḥ tasyāḥ saṃsthānāni bhuvanāni ā satya loka ādā ca avīceḥ iti etad uktam bhavati yadi duḥkha varjanena śakyate sukham upādātum tatas tādṛśam sukha mana kūla vedanīyam kaḥ prajñāvān prajahyāt  na ca tādṛśam asti sukham kva cit api sarvasya duḥkha avinābhāvinaḥ kevalasya upādātum aśakyatvāt na hi madhu viṣa saṃpṛktam annam viṣam apahṛtya śakyam madhu mātram upādātum iti tasmāt na idam sukhasya pratyākhyānam api tu sukha eva duḥkha bhāvanam upadiśyate atra hetuḥ upādīyate ṛṣiṇā vividha bādhanāya ud duḥkham eva janma utpattiḥ sū janmana utpattiḥ sā dukham eva bhāvayitavyā vividha bādhana ayogāt iti kasmāt punar duḥkham eva svarūpataḥ  na bhavati iti ata āha na sukhasya antarāla niṣpatteḥ sū na khalu ayam duḥkha uddeśaḥ  duḥkha kayanam sukhasya pratyākhyānam itas ca duḥkha saṃjñā bhāvanam na sukhasya pratyākhyānam duḥkha uddeśena iti āha yasmāt idam me sukha sādhanam iti vedayan prārthayate sukha sādhanam tad ca uktāt bahu prakārāt bādhanā hetuḥ iti duḥkha bhāvanayā upadeśanam iti kāmam kāmyam kāmayamānasya yadā kāmaḥ samṛdhyati saṃpannaḥ  bhavati atha anantaram enam puruṣam aparaḥ kāma icchā kṣipram bādhate svarga ādi prāptau  api sva rājya ādi kāmayate evam tad prāptau prājāpatya ādi iti asya icchā tad upāya prārthana ādinā duḥkhena prabādha tā aiti arthaḥ samantāt udanemi yathā bhavati tathā bhūmim labhati iti yojanā nanu ayam yadi api antarāle sukhāni anubhavati tathā api duḥkha saṃbhedam ākalayan anupadiṣṭaḥ  api svayam eva nivartsyati kṛtam asya duḥkha bhāvanā upadeśena ityata āha duḥkha vikalpe sukha abhimānāt ca sū śāstra niṣṭhānām vivekinām khalu vividha bādhana anuṣaṅgāt  anavayavena sukha mātram duḥkham eva iti viniścayaḥ  akṣi pātra kalpā hi te tad yathā iṣī kātūla samparkāt api akṣi pātra dūyate na gātra avayava antarāṇi tathā mṛdu citta tayā vivekinaḥ  dūyante avivekinaḥ tu praṇaya kalaha kupita kuraṅga śāba locana aṅganā lakta karasa ārdra poda pallava pātam api śirasi rahasi sukham abhimanyamānā dhana pulaka kañcu ka āñcita tanavaḥ sāndra ānanda aśru pluta nayanā nirvṛṇvanti iti tān pratyayam upadeśa ūr athavā aniti arthaḥ jāyasva mriyasva ca iti saṃdhāvatī iti punar jāyate punar mriyate janitvā mriyate mṛtvā jāyate tad idam saṃdhā vana vyāpāra pracaya iti arthaḥ codayati kasmāt  duḥkham janma iti na ucyata iti yadi duḥkha bhāvanā upadeśaḥ  janmani evam sati eva kāraḥ kimartha iti arthaḥ pariharati janma vinigraha arthīya iti vinigrahaḥ  vinivṛttiḥ sa eva arthaḥ pravartata iti janma vinigraha arthīyaḥ yathā ca matvarthīya iti etad uktam bhavati janma duḥkham eva iti bhāvayitavyam na atra m anāk api sukha buddhiḥ kartavyā aneka anartha paramparāyām apavarga pratyūha prasaṅgāt iti duḥkha uddeśa anantaram apavarga uddiṣṭaḥ  lakṣitaḥ ca iti śeṣaḥ sa pratyākhyāyate ṛṇa kleśa pravṛtti anubandhāt apavarga abhāvaḥ sū tad vyācaṣṭe bhāṣya kāraḥ ṛṇa anubandhāt iti asti hi ṛṇāni trīṇi apākṛtya manaḥ  mokṣe niveśayet  anapākṛtya mohena mokṣam icchan vrajati adhas  ṛṇa traya apākaraṇena eva vayaḥ samāpteḥ mokṣa niveśa kṣaṇaḥ  na asti iti apavarga abhāva iti arthaḥ kleśa anubandhāt na asti apavargaḥ na anucchinna nidānaḥ saṃsāraḥ śakya ucchettum iti arthaḥ pravṛtti anubandha āditi asya api iyam eva vyākhyā evam pūrva pakṣayitvā siddhāntam upakramate atra abhidhīyate yattau  at ṛṇa anubandhāt iti jāyamāna iti asya pradhāna artha tā anupapattyā guṇa śabda tvam sādhayitum dṛṣṭānta lābhāya ṛṇa śabdasya prathamam guṇa śabda tvam āha pradhāna śabdānupapatteḥ iti tad vyācaṣṭe ṛṇaiḥ iti na ayam pradhāna śabda iti ṛṇavān iva asvatantraḥ teṣu teṣu karmasu na adhikārī iti nindā tad abhāve tu svatantra iti praśaṃsā evam jāyamāna iti guṇa śabdaḥ  na mukhya  iti kasmāt  punar na mukhya  iti ata āha mātṛtaḥ  jāta mātrasya eva anadhikārāt kasmāt anadhikāra iti ata āha arthinaḥ śaktasya ca adhikārāt  kasmāt arthina iti ata āha karma vidhau  agni hotram juhuyāt svarga kāma  iti ādau kāma saṃyoga śruteḥ na ca bālakaḥ sukha duḥkha prāpti parihāra kāmaḥ  api vivekena svarga putra paśu anna ādi kāmayata iti śaktasya ca pravṛtti iti na hi aśakanīyam artham aśaktam prati veda āpta upadeśa rūpaḥ  vidhātum arhati na ca bālakaḥ śaktaḥ  avidvattva ādinā ata eva tiryak deva ṛṣi paṅgu śūdraṣa ārṣeyāṇām anadhikāraḥ sāmarthya abhāvāt na kevalam vaidikaḥ  ayam īdṛśaḥ  vyavahāraḥ  api tu laukikaḥ  pīti āha na bhidyate ca ayam laukikāt  tad vyācaṣṭe laukikaḥ tāvat iti upapannā anavadya vādī iti upapannam pramāṇena anavadyam punarukta doṇa anapekṣitam upadeṣṭavyam yad na bhavavati tad iti arthaḥ nyāya prāptam imam artham liṅga darśanam upodbalayati iti āha gārhasthya liṅgam ca mantra brāhmaṇam karma abhivadati iti gārhasthyasya liṅgam patnī yasmin karmaṇi tad tathā uktam apatnī avekṣitam ājyam bhavati apatnya udgāyanti akṣaume vasānau  agnim ādadhīyātā miti evamādi tad anena gārhasthyāt pūrva avasthā tā  at ṛṇa anubaddhā na bhavati iti uktam saṃprati uttara avasthā api na ṛṇā anubaddha iti āha yadā ca arthinaḥ  adhikāraḥ tadā arthi tvasya avipariṇāme jarā maryavāda upapattiḥ tena yudaktam ṛṇa apākaraṇena vayaḥ paryavasānāt nasti mokṣa avasaraḥ tad apākṛtam bhavati avipariṇāma padārtha vyākhyānam na nivartata iti turīyasya iti asya vyākhyānam caturthasya iti prāyeṇa pañca saptati varṣeṣu ativāhiteṣu artha tṛṣṇā tanūbhavati atyanta saṃyoge tu jarayā hava iti anarthakam mṛtyunā vā iti anena eva siddheḥ iti śeṣaḥ yadi ucyate aśakta topalakṣaṇam etad jarayā havā mṛtyunā vā iti tena kasya ānarthakyam ityata āha aśaktaḥ  vimucyataiti etad api na upapadyata iti syāt etad  yadi api gṛhasthasya yajña ādi vidhāna antarāṇi santi tathā api jāyamānaḥ tribhiḥ ṛṇaiḥ iti vākyam bālasya api yajña ādi vidhāsyati iti etām śaṅkām vimarśa pūrvam apākaroti atha api vihitam vā anūdyeta kāmāt vār athaḥ prakalpyeta iti na tāvat jāyamānaḥ  havai iti śakye vidhi vibhaktiḥ asti tena siddha anuvādaḥ svarasataḥ pratīyate yadi tu tasya arthasya siddhiḥ vākya antarāt vā pramāṇa antarāt vā katham api na kalpeta tatova avacanāni tu apūrva tvā diti nyāyān dvidhi tvam asya kalpyeta santi tu śataśas tad artha vidhāyakāni vākyāni vibhaktimanti iti kaḥ  jātu asya sva icchā mātreṇa vidhi tvam kalpayet  tasmāt vihita anuvacanam eva nyāyyam iti jāyamāna śabdaḥ  jaghanya vṛttiḥ iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ syāt etad  jāyamāna śabdaḥ  anupacārita arthaḥ svabhāvataḥ  mātuḥ udarāt vibhāgam āha sa katham cit anuvāda anurodhapena jaghanya vṛttiḥ kalpanīyaḥ tad varam mukhya artha anurodhena vidhānam eva kalpyatām evam sati śrutiḥ anurodhitā bhavati asti ca bālakasya api phala utpādana yogya tā tad ātmanaḥ phalam prati samavāyi kāraṇa tvāt tena yadi api jāta mātrasya phala sādhana anuṣṭhāna yogya tā na asti tathā api phala utpādam prati yogya tā asti phalena ca prayojanam na tad sādhanena iti ata āha phalasya sādhanāni hi prayatna viṣayaḥ  na phalam iti ayam abhisandhiḥ vidhiḥ hi sva vyāpāre kartṛ tayā puruṣam niyuṅkte prayatnaḥ ca asya vyāpāraḥ sambhavati viṣaye na śakyaḥ  nivarttayitum iti sva viṣayam apekṣate na ca asya sākṣāt phalam viṣayaḥ  bhavitum arhati uddeśyatā mātreṇa tu bhavet  na etāvatā prayatnaḥ  asya nirvṛṇoti yāvat ayam sākṣāt abhinirvartanīyam na prāpnoti tad upāyasya sākṣāt abhinivarttanīya iti phala uddeśa pravṛttasya puruṣa prayatnasya nirvṛṇoti yāvat upāyaḥ viṣayaḥ na ca bālakasya tad upāyam aviduṣaḥ tatra sāmarthyam asti asamarthaḥ ca akartā katham ātmānam prayatnena vyāpnuyāt  avyāpnuvan  ca katham adhikārī iti jāyamāna śabdaḥ  jaghanya vṛttiḥ eva nyāyya iti siddham vihitam ca jāyamānam iti ṛṇa vākyāt prāk vidhīyate ca ṛṇa vākya arddhvam iti arthaḥ yad uktam tatra hi pravrajyā vidhīyata iti tad amūṣyamāṇa  āha pratyakṣa vidhāna abhāvāt iti ced  śaṅkām nirākaroti na pratiṣedhasya api vidhāna abhāvāta śaṅkām vibhajate pratyakṣata iti paramāptaḥ  hi bhagavān īśvaraḥ  anukampayā bhūta upadeśāyapravṛttaḥ  yad gārhasthyam eva āśrayamam upadiśati tatas  avagacchāmaḥ  na santi āśrama antarāṇi bhūtebhyaḥ  hitāni iti arthaḥ ata eva āhuḥ aaika āśramyam tu ācāryāḥ pratyakṣa vidhānāt gārhasthi asya iti nirākaraṇam vibhajate na pratiṣedhasya iti smṛti itihāsa purāṇāni tāvat avivādam vidadhati cāturāśramyam upalabhyante yadi pratyakṣayā śrutyā pratiṣidhyante tatas tad virodhena audumbarī sarva veṣṭanavat  tatra apramāṇāni syuḥ na ca tad pratiṣedhaḥ śruteḥ sākṣāt avagamyate tasmāt smṛti ādi vihitam cāturāśramyam apratiṣiddham śrutyā na śakyam parityaktum iti arthaḥ na ca avidhānena tad pratiṣedha anumānam iti āha adhikārāt ca iti gārhasthya upadeśasya adhikārāt tasya eva vidhānam na āśrama antarasya na tu āśrama antara abhāvāt na hi vyākaraṇam śabdam vyutpādayat pramāṇa ādi abhāvam ākṣipati api ca mā bhūt pratyakṣa vidhānam śrutau sa sādhana apavarga abhidhānāni cāturāśramya abhidhānāni ca pratyakṣāṇi upalabhyante vacanāni tāni apūrva tvāt vidhānāni apavargasya sa sādhanasya cāturāśramyasya ca bhaviṣyanti iti āha ṛc brāhmaṇam ca apavarga abhidhāyi abhidhāyata iti mṛtyumiḥ param karmabhya iti karma parityāgam apavarga sādhanam sūcayati amṛta tvam iti ca apavargaḥ  darśitaḥ sūcitam karma tyāgama pavarga sādhanam śruti antareṇa viśadayati na karmaṇā na prajaya iti pareṇa nākam iti nākam iti avidyām upalakṣayati avidyātaḥ param iti arthaḥ nihitam guhāyām iti laukika pramāṇa agocara tvam darśayati tamasaḥ parastāt iti avidyā tamaḥ tasya parastāt  āditya varṇam iti nitya prakāśam iti arthaḥ tad anena īśvara praṇidhānasya apavarga upāyatavam uktam ṛca udāhūtya brāhmaṇam udāharati atha brāhmaṇāni iti yajña ityādinā gṛhastha āśramaḥ  darśitaḥ tapa eva iti vānaprastha āśramaḥ brahmacārī iti brahmacarya āśramaḥ eṣām abhyudaya lakṣaṇam phalam āha sarva eva eta iti caturtha āśramam āha brahma saṃstha iti tathā akratuḥ iti kratuḥ saṃkalpaḥ kāmayamāna uva ya āsīt  sa eva atha akāmayamānaḥ  bhavati akāmayamānaḥ kāmam pariharan tad parihāra siddhau saḥ  akāmayan  tasya vyākhyānam niṣkāma iti ātma kāma iti kaivalya upeta ātma kāmaḥ tad prāptyā āpta kāmaḥ  bhavati na tasya prāṇa iti śāśvataḥ  bhavati iti arthaḥ prakṛtam upasaṃharati tatra yad uktam iti aparām api cāturāśramya abhidhāyinīm śrumim āha ye catvāca iti itas ca phala arthina eṣa jarā maryavāda iti āha phala arthinaḥ ca iti pṛṣṭvā sūtam paṭate katham samāropaṇāt ātmani apratiṣedhaḥ sū ātmayagnīnām samāropaṇa adṛṇa anubandhana apavargasya apratiṣedhaḥ tad enana cchalena pratyakṣa vidhānam pravrajyāyāḥ  api darśitam eṣaṇa avyutthitasya viparyastu buddheḥ alamābhireṣaṇābhiḥ anartha hetubhiḥ iti kṛtabuddheḥ ata eva nivṛtte phala arthi tve samāroṣaṇam ātmani agnīnām vidhīyate iti evam brāhmaṇāni iti yadā eṣaṇā abhyaḥ  vyutthitasya pravrajyā vidhānam tadā tad abhidhāyīni brāhmaṇāni upapannāni iti arthaḥ pramṛte khalu yajamāne yajña pātrāṇi yajamānasya śarīre yathāvayasavam nidhāya antya iṣṭiḥ kriyate tatra jarā marye karmaṇi aviśeṣeṇa kalpyamāne sarvasya pātra caya antāni karmāṇi iti prasajyeta maraṇa paryantāni karmāṇi iti prasajyeta iti arthaḥ nanviṣyata eva pātra caya anta tvam karmaṇām ityata āha tatra eṣaṇā vyutthānam iti tasmāt na aviśeṣeṇa kartuḥ prayojakam phalam bhavati iti phala abhāva iti asya sūtrau  apayavasya aviśeṣeṇa phanasya kartṛ prayojanakatva abhāva iti arthaḥ tad anena eṣaṇā vyutthāna śruti virodhā darśitaḥ tad evam cāturāśramyasya śrutiḥ uktā saṃprati smṛtyādayaḥ  api cāturāśrayamyasya upadeśakāḥ santi iti āha cāturāśramya vidhānāt ca iti śaṅkate tad apramāṇam iti ced  jagat nirmātuḥ parama kāruṇikasya sarvajñasya atrabhavataḥ parameśvarasya āgamaḥ  bhavatu pramāṇam āpta ukta tvāt  manu vyāsa ādīnām tu āptatva aniścayāt kayam tad praṇītānām prāmāṇya niścaya iti arthaḥ uttaram pramāṇena iti syāt etad  bhavatu vedena abhyanujñānāt itihāsa purāṇa prāmāṇyam dharma śāstrāṇām tu manu ādi praṇītānām kutas  prāmāṇya niścaya iti ata āha aprāmāṇye ca iti sarva jana parigrahāt teṣām apiprāmāṇyam iti arthaḥ buddha ādi smṛtayaḥ tu veda ninditaiḥ mleccha ādibhiḥ parigṛhītā na tu āryaiḥ iti na tāḥ pramāṇam bhavitum arhanti iti arthaḥ draṣṭṛ pravaktṛ sāmānyāt ca aprāmāṇya anupapattiḥ ya eva vedasya draṣṭṛ āraḥ anuṣṭhātāraḥ ca tad arthasya ta eva itihāsa ādīnām pravaktāraḥ prācetasa kṛṣṇadvaiyāyanam anuprabhṛtayaḥ api ca vaidikāni karmāṇi smārtīm itikartavyatām apekṣante smārtani ca vaidikāni mantra ādīni iti sarvam etad apramāṇye dharma śāstrāṇām na upapadyate yadi api ca manu ādayaḥ  api dharma jñāna vairāgya aiśvarya śāli tayā anubhūya api upadiśanti iti saṃbhavati tathā api veda mūlaka tvam eva itihāsa purāṇa ādinām yuktam tathā hi avedaḥ  akhilaḥ  dharma mūlam smṛti śīle ca tad vidām yaḥ kaścid kasya cit dharmaḥ manunā parikīrtitaḥ sa sarvaḥ  abhihitaḥ  vede sarva jñānam ayaḥ  hi saḥ ityādibhiḥ sva vacana prapañcaiḥ ātmā baddhapā veda eva arpitaḥ taiḥ iti atha ayam itihāsa ādi gocara ūr athaḥ kasmāt pratyakṣa pratītena vedena na ucyata iti tad anabhidhānāt avagacchamaḥ  nūnam ayam anabhimataḥ  vedānām kartuḥ iti nirākṛtaḥ  api ayam punar nirākriyate dārḍhya artham viṣaya vyavasthānāt ca iti anena yad api uktam kpaleśa anubandhasya avicchedāt iti tad dūṣayati suṣuptasya svapna adarśane kleśa abhāvāt apavargaḥ sū tad vyācaṣṭe suṣuptasya khalu iti loka siddha tayā suṣupta avasthā udāhṛtā mahāpralaya avasthāyām api kleśa muktā eva ātmānaḥ kevalam asau na loka siddha iti na udāhṛtā etāvān  tu muktā avasthāyām viśeṣaḥ yad asyām kleśa vāsanā api na asti suṣupta avasthāyām pralaya avasthāyām ca kleśa vicchede api tad vāsanā asti iti yad api pravṛtti anubandhāt iti tatra āha na pravṛttiḥ pratisaṃdhānāya hi hīna kleśasya sū dehinaḥ tad vyācaṣṭe kṣīṇeṣu rāga dveṣa moheṣu sati api na pravṛttiḥ sva pratisaṃdhānāya upapāditam idam asmābhiḥ yathā doṣa tuṣa avanaddhāḥ karma tandulā janma aṅkurāya kalpante na kevalā iti arthaḥ śaṅkate karma vaiphalya iti vaiphalye śāstrasya karmaṇām phala sādhana tā pratipādakasya aprāmāṇya prasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ nirākaroti na karma vipāka iti vipāka phalam tasya pratisaṃvedanam bhogaḥ pūrva pakṣa bādi āha na kleśa saṃtateḥ svābhāvika tvāt sū siddhānti eka deśī brūte prāk u tvam sū dadhi ādeḥ utpatteḥ prāk  kṣīra ādiṣuyaḥ  bhāvaḥ tasya anitya tvavat iti yojanā aparaḥ tu eka deśī bhāvam eva dṛṣṭāntayati iti āha aṇu śyāma tā anitya tvavat vā sū yad etad śyāmam rūpam tad annasya iti āgamaḥ pārthivānām paramāṇūnām śyāma tām anādim āha anna padena mṛdaḥ  abhidhānāt iti bhāvaḥ atra prathamam eka deśinam dūṣayati sataḥ khalu iti dvitīyam eka deśinam dūṣayati anādiḥ aṇuśyāma tā iti hetvaśrāvāt na yuktam aṇu śyāma tā kāryā pṛthivī rūpa tvāt  lohita ādivat iti pratyuta anitya tā hetuḥ asti puruṣa yatna ja lohita apadi rūpa vailakṣaṇyena tvaspavaya aprayatna pūrvakatva mātreṇa anāditva abhidhānam iti na āgama virodhaḥ tad evam eka deśinau dūṣayitvā parama samādhim āha ayam tu samādhiḥ na saṃkalpa nimitta tvāt ca rāga ādīnām sū cakāram anukta samuccāya artham vyācaṣṭe karma nimitta tvāt i taretara nimitta tvāt ca samuccyaḥ  anuktasya iti śeṣaḥ tatra saṃkalpa nimitta tvāt iti vibhajate mithyā saṃkalpebhya iti yadi api anubhūta viṣaya prārthanā saṃkalpaḥ tathā apitasya pūrva bhāgaḥ  anubhavaḥ  grāhyaḥ prārthanāyā rāga tvāt  tena mithyā anubhavaḥ saṃkalpa iti arthaḥ nanu ekasmāt mithyājñānāt kutas  kārya vaicitryam iti ata āha rañjanīya kopanīya mohanīyebhyaḥ  iti bhavya geya ādiṣu pāṭhāt karttari kṛtyaḥ mohanīyaḥ saṃkalpaḥ  mithyājñāna saṃskāraḥ karma nimitta tvam rāga ādīnām vibhajate karma ca iti nikāyena jātiḥ upalakṣyate itaretara nimitta tvam rāga ādīnām āha itaretara iti syāt etad  bhavanti anityāḥ kleśāḥ tathā api yad eṣām nirvarttakam mithyājñānam tasya nivṛtti hotoḥ abhāvat sa eva kleśa anubandhāt apavarga abhāva iti ata āha sarvam iti āsaṃkalpānām iti api ca anādiḥ kleśa saṃtatiḥ iti uktam kutas  sarvaime ādhyātmikā bhāvā iti ātmānam adhikṛtya pravartamānāḥ śarīra indriyādayaḥ  bhavanti āpadhyātmikā iti atha yadi anādīnām api nivṛttiḥ hanta anutpatti dharmakāṇām api nivṛtti prasaṅga iti ata āha na ca evam sati anud patti dharmakam kim cit iti rāga ādīnām utpatti dharmakāṇām eva vyaya dharmakatva abhyupagamāt iti arthaḥ nanu mā bhūvat mithyā jñāna nimittā rāgādayaḥ  mithyājñāna anivṛttau ye punar amī karma nimittāḥ teṣām kutaḥ nivṛttiḥ na ca karma nivṛttau rāga ādi nivṛttiḥ rāga ādimataḥ karma nivṛtteḥ abhāvāt  tasmāt na mokṣa iti ata āha karma ca nikāya nirvartakam tattva jñāna kṛtān mithyājñāna rūpa saṃkalpa vighātān na rāga ādyutapatti nimittam bhavati sarva rāga ādīnām mityājñānam eva nimittam karmāṇi tu nikāya niyamena rāga ādīn pravartayanti iti karma nimitta tvam uktam iti bhāvaḥ nanu yathā rāga ādayaḥ sati api karmaṇi mithyājñāna nivṛttyā nivartante evam sati api karmaṇi mithyājñāna nivṛttyā phalam api mā bhūt ityata āha sukhaduḥ kha saṃvittiḥ phalam tu bhavati iti vārttikam yāvat jīva saṃyoge hi jarayā ha vā iti anarthakam iti mṛtyunā vā iti anena eva gata artha tvāt iti anuktvā bhāṣya uktā dvitīya yuktiḥ abhihitā vārtika kṛtā yasmāt svayam aśaktasya iti anena yajña sādhana tvāt iti yajña kartṛ tvāt iti arthaḥ etad eva sphaṭayati yasmāt yajamānaḥ  yajña aṅgam bhavati yathā āha bhagavān jaiminiḥ puruṣaḥ ca karma artha tvāt iti saṃkalpa ādi apekṣam karma rāga ādi kāraṇam iti yad jātīyasya janmanaḥ  yad karma kāraṇam tad janma ucitām eva mithyājñāna vāsanām abhivyanakti iti tad dvāreṇa rāga ādīnām kāraṇam bhavati codayati sukha ādīnām iti yathā mithyājñāna sahāyam karma rāga ādi hetuḥ evam tad sahāyam phala hetuḥ iti carama dehasya tatvajñānavataḥ sat api karma phala kāraṇam na syāt iti arthaḥ pariharati na niraprekṣa tvāt iti karma āśaya prapañcam ucchettum amūḍhaḥ  api asaktaḥ  api adviṣṭaḥ  api mūḍha iva sakta iva dviṣṭa iva tad phalam bhuṅkta iti rāga ādi anapekṣam karma sva phalam janayati tena asau phala ūṣa bhogaḥ  na bandha hetuḥ mūḍha ādīnām bandha hetuḥ mūḍha ādīnām bandha hetu phala upabhogaḥ sa catādṛśaḥ  rāga ādi sahāyaiḥ karmabhiḥ kriyate na evam uttarottara prasaṅga itayatideśena parīkṣitā iti ṣoḍaśā api pramāṇa ādayaḥ parīkṣitāḥ teṣām tattva jñānam niḥśreyasa adhigama hetuḥ iti uktam tatra api prameya tattva jñānam sākṣāt niḥśreyasa hetuḥ itareṣām tu tattva jñāna aṅgatayā iti uktam idam iha idānīm parīkṣyate kiṃpratyekam ātma ādīnām prameyāṇām tattva jñānam niḥśreyasa adhigama hetuḥ uta ahaḥ kasya cit eṣām eka deśasya iti tām imām parīkṣām avatārayati bhāṣya kāraḥ kim nu khavalu bhoḥ yāvantaḥ  viṣayāḥ prameyāṇi tāvat su pratyekam iti pratiprāṇabhṛt bhedam yāvanta ātmānaḥ yāvanti ca indriyāṇipa ca iti arthaḥ pārśva sthaḥ pūrva pakṣiṇam pṛcchati kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ pūrva pakṣiṇa uttaram na tāvat ekaikatra iti samudāya eka deśābhyām anupapatteḥ pramāṇa ādi tattva jñānāt niḥśreyasa adhigama iti ayuktam iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ siddhāntam āha mithyājñānam vai khalu moha iti vaiśabdaḥ khalu pūrva ṣakṣa akṣa māyām khalu śabdaḥ  hā iti arthe ayuktaḥ pūrva pakṣaḥ  yasmāt mithyājñānam moha iti na tattva jñānam ajñāna nivṛtti bhavatu etad tathā api pūrva pakṣasya kim āyātam iti ata āha tad ca mithyājñānam yatra viṣaye pravartamānam iti sva sambandhinaḥ  hi ātma ādayaḥ  viparyayeṇa paricchinnāḥ saṃsāra hetava iti tad viṣayam eva mithyājñānam apaneyam na ātma ādi antara viṣayam jñānam tena tatra mithyājñānam mā nivartiṣṭa nivartatām vā sva ātma ādi dṛṣṭāntena na tu tasya saṃsāra nivṛttim pratyupayogaḥ yasya tu upayogaḥ tatra tattva jñānam duṣkaram iti pṛcchati kim punar tad mithyā jñānam santi khalu vādinām nānā vipratipattayaḥ ke cit āhuḥ vidhūta vividha nāma rūpa prapañca upaplava viśuddha vid ānanda ghanā dvaita brahma sākṣātkāraḥ tattva jñānam iti anye tu sattva puruṣa anya tā ākhyātim dharma mudgala nairātmya jñānam iti apare śarīra indriya ādyanitva vyatirikta nitya ātma darśanam iti vṛddhāḥ tad evam vipratipatteḥ praśnaḥ uttaram anātmani ātma grahaḥ  aham asti iti mohaḥ  ahaṅkāraḥ na tāvat advaita ānanda ghana ātma jñānam tattva jñānam bhedasya pratyakṣa siddhasya asati bādhake apahnotum aśakyatvāt  na ca prakāśa ānandau  ātma dharma atiriktau  ātma svabhāvau bhavitum arhataḥ satyam vijñānam ānandam brahma iti śrutiḥ ānanda caitanya śakti abhiprāpayā bheda eva ca tadvat tayā katham cit  sāmānādhikaraṇyam upapadyate abhede tu ānanda vijñānayoḥ tad padayoḥ paryāyatayā saha prayoga anupapattiḥ na ca prakṛṣṭa prakāśaḥ savitā iti atra prakṛṣṭa prakāśayoḥ abhedaḥ  aprakāśasya api prakarṣa sambhavāt  aprakṛṣṭasya api khadyota ādeḥ prakāśa sambhavāt  tasmāt yad kim cit etad  sattva puruṣa anya tā ākhyātiḥ tu sattvasya eva prakṛteḥ asambhavāt ayuktā satkārya vāda mūla tvāt pradhāna sadbhāvasya tad nirākaraṇena eva nirākaraṇam dharma pudgala nairātmye tu kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅge nitya ātma sadbhāva kathanena nirākṛte tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam anātmani ātma grahaḥ  aham asmi iti mohaḥ  ahaṅkāra iti ata eva sarvasya evam ātma āśīḥ kṛmeḥ api mā na bhūvam bhūyāsam iti saḥ  ayam īdṛśaḥ  abhiniveśaḥ śarīra ādīnām ātma tvena adhyavasyataḥ  bhavati na ātma tattva viduṣaḥ sa khalu ahi nirlvaya nīmi vāhiḥ tatas  vyatiriktam śarīra ādi paśyan  tatra snihyati sneha virahān na tapyate na api anuśocati iti atattva jñānavataḥ saṃsāram darśayitvā tattva jñānavataḥ saṃsāra nivṛttim āha yaḥ tu duḥkham iti tad evam uktena prakāreṇa moha tattva jñānayoḥ saṃsāra apavarga hetu bhāvaḥ  yasmāt tasmāt mokṣamāṇaiḥ pretyabhāva phala duḥkhāni ca jñeyāni vyavasthāpayati ityādi pūrva upasaṃhāraḥ āsevamānasya abhya syataḥ  bhāvayata iti paryāya kathanam bhāvanā dārḍhyepa darśana artham artha gatim pariśodhya atra arthe sūtram paṭhati doṣa nimittānām tattva jñānāt ahaṅkāra nivṛttiḥ sūḥ śāstra artha saṃgrahaḥ  anūdyate śāstra tātparya saṃgrahaḥ  dvitīya sūveṇa anūdyatā eti arthaḥ kim nu khalu bhaḥ iti bhāṣyam tad anupapannam yatas  na viṣaya mātra jñānam apavarga hetuḥ api tu prameya tattva jñānam iti ata āha vārtikakāraḥ tatra viṣaya antarāṇām iti yāvantaḥ  viṣayā iti na viṣaya mātra abhiprāyam api tu prameya abhiprāyam iti arthaḥ sugamam anyat vārtikam śarīra ādiṣu anātma sva ātma buddhiḥ nivartanīyā iti uktam tatra prathamam kasmin  ātma buddhiḥ nivartanīyā iti apekṣāyām āha prasaṃkhyān ānupūrvyā tu khalu prasaṃkhyānam samādhi jam tattva jñānam tad ca viṣaye sukaram iti tatra eva prāthamikasya prathamam prayatnaḥ  yuktaḥ sūtram doṣa nimittam rūpādayaḥ  viṣayāḥ saṃkalpa kṛtāḥ sū mithyājñānam saṃkalpaḥ tena viṣayīkṛtā iti arthaḥ kāmāḥ kāmyāḥ anye khalu avayavi saṃjñām nivartayantaḥ  avayavinam eva pratyācakṣate tān pratyācakṣāṇa āha atas  param kācid iti sūtram tad nimittam tu avayavi abhimānaḥ sū nimittam dantatva ādi tad viśiṣṭā viṣayāḥ saṃjñāḥ priyāyāḥ kāmukaḥ  danta uṣṭha nāsikā ādīn avayavān anubhāvayan tasyām saktaḥ  bhavati vyañjanāni avayavinaḥ  avayavāḥ taiḥ saha upalambhāt teṣām anuvyañjanam tad sādṛśyam tena tad āropaḥ tathā ca straiṇānām vyavahāraḥ dravat kanaka nirmala dyutiḥ anaṅga līlā ekabha rmahebha kaṭa vibhrama stana bhara alasa aṅgī yadi priyā na parirabhyate tulita siddhaṃsaṃjīvinī sa hemahi kutaḥ anyathā viṣama bāṇa bāṇa vyathām madana saritam enām gāhamānaḥ  janaḥ ayam jaghana pulinanābhī maṇḍala āvarta ramyām mukha nalina sanāthām ullasat bhrulatā ūrmiṃ cira viraha hutāśāyāsam ujjhāṃ cakāra vivekinaḥ tu aśubha saṃjñām bhāvayantaḥ prāhuḥ majja āmasthnām atha plīhnām yakṛtām śakṛtām api pūrṇāḥ snāyu śirā syūtāḥ striyaḥ carma prasevikāḥ ṛṣayaḥ  api ūcuḥ sthānāt bījāt upaṣṭambhāt niṣpandāt nidhanāt api kāyam ādheya śauca tvāt paṇḍitā hi aśucim viduḥ aśubha saṃjñā bhāvanā prayojanam āha tāmasi abhāvayata iti tad kim idānīm avayava anuvyañjana saṃjñayoḥ viṣayaḥ  na asti aśubha saṃjñā viṣaya eva paramasti iti ata āha sati eva ca dvividha viṣaya iti dvividha eva asau kāminī lakṣaṇaḥ  viṣayaḥ tathā api rāga ādi prahāṇa artham avayava ādi saṃjñā gocara tvam parityajya aśubha saṃjñā gocara tvam asya upādīyate vairāgya utpādanāya iti arthaḥ atra eva dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā viṣa saṃpṛkta iti na hi viṣa madhunī paramārtha taḥ  na staḥ api tu vairāgyāya viṣa saṃjñā tatra upādīyataiti arthaḥ tad evam sva matena prasaṃkhyāna upadeśam uktvā para abhimata prasaṃkhyānam nirākarttum upanyasyati atha idānīm artham nirākariṣyatā vijñāna vādinā avaya vi nirākaraṇam upapādyate artha viśeṣe khalu avayava anuvyañjana saṃjñe tatra artha mātrasya abhāvāt kutaḥ avayava anuvyañjana saṃjñe tad nirākaraṇāya prathamam avayavī nirākriyate paścāt paramāṇuḥ tatas ca jñāna mātram artha rahitam siddham bhavati iti abhiprāyaḥ tatra saṃśaya pūrvaka tvāt upapādanasya vicārasya saṃśayam prathamam āha vidyā avidyā dvaividhyāt saṃśayaḥ sū upalabdhiḥ vidyā anupalabdhiḥ ca avidyā sat ca upalabhyate yathā taḍāge toyam asat ca upalabhyate yathā maru marīcikāyām udakam sat ca na upalabhyate yathā cira nikhātam bhūmau nidhyādi asat ca na upalabhyate yathā bhū tale dṛśyamāne tad tulya upalambhana yogyatas  ghaṭa ādiḥ tad evam vidyā avidyā dvaividhyāt avayavini saṃśayaḥ yadi avayavi upalabhyate tathā api saṃśayaḥ atha na upalabhyate tathā api saṃśaya iti arthaḥ tatra siddhāntī vakṣyamāṇam api avayavi nirākaraṇa hetum nirākariṣyāmi iti āśa yavān āha tad asaṃśayaḥ pūrva hetu prasiddha tvāt  sū avayavinaḥ vārtikakāraḥ tu svayam saṃśayam nirākaroti na vidyā avidyā t vaividhyam saṃśayasya kāraṇam iti pūrva pakṣa vādī āha vṛtti anupapatteḥ iti vṛkṣaḥ tiṣṭhati śākhā ādiṣu śākhādayaḥ vā vṛkṣa iti laukikīm pratipattim anurudhyamānaḥ  vikalpayati vārttikakāraḥ avayavā avayavinī iti eka dravyaḥ ca avayavaḥ prāpnoti kutas  eka avaya vi vṛtti tvāt  bhavatu kaḥ  doṣa iti ata āha na ca eka dravyam dravyam avinaśyat ādhāram asti kṛtakasya nityatva prasaṅgāt iti śeṣaḥ avayavi eka deśena iti avayavinaḥ  ya eka deśāḥ tena avayavaḥ  avayavini varttataityarthaḥ na hi asya avayavinaḥ  anye avayaveṣu eka deśā avayavāḥ santi iti ekena avayavena ārabhyata iti satata utpatti prasaṅgaḥ saṃyogāya kila carama bhāvine avayava vyāpāraḥ tad nimittāni ca apekṣyante eka dravyasya utpattim prati na saṃyoga apekṣā iti yāvat avayavam avayavi utpadyeta iti avayavi anavaruddhaḥ  na kadācid avayavaḥ  dṛśyeta iti arthaḥ avayavi atirekeṇa varttamānaḥ  avayavi upalabhyeta na ca asya ādhāra antam upalabhyate dṛśyamānaḥ ca avayavaḥ  na adhikaraṇam asya iti bhavatā eva vādinā abhyupagatam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha nityaḥ ca syāt  yaḥ tu manyate avayavānām dharma mātram avayavī na tu avayavebhyaḥ  atyantam bhinnaḥ abhinnaḥ vā bhinna tve gavāśvavat varma dharmi bhāva anupapatteḥ abhede api dharmi rūpavat tad anupapatteḥ ca tasmāt katham cit bhinnaḥ abhinnaḥ ca katham cit dharma mātram avayavānām amayavi iti tam pratyāha na ca avayavi avayavāḥ sū na tāvat bheda abhedau paraspara abhāva ātmānau  ekatra samaveta iti uktam na api ātyantike abhede dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ tasmāt yathā ātyantika bhede api keṣāñcid eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tathā keṣāṃ cit eva dharma dharmi bhāva iti eṣitavyam tathā ca dūṣaṇam iti arthaḥ avayavī ca eka deśena avayave varttata iti avayava samūha mātram avayavī prāpnoti iti asya ayamaryaḥ avayave hi varttamānaḥ  avayavī iti ucyate avayavi eka deśāḥ ced avayaveṣu varttante eka deśa eva tarhi avayavinaḥ te ca nānā itti avayava samūha mātram avayavī prāpnoti ekasmin  ca avayave eka deśe varttamānaḥ  avayavi iti na tāvat avayavī kvacid avayave varttata iti tad eka deśānām tatra tatra avayave vṛtteḥ tāvat mātreṇa ca avayavinaḥ  grahaṇam iti yatra eva asya eka deśaḥ  varttate tatra eva grahītavyaḥ tathā ca ekasmin tantau paṭa eka deśaḥ  varttata iti tantau  ekasmin paṭaḥ dṛśyeta iti arthaḥ siddhāntavādi
