āha eka deśanena ca avayavī na sva avayaveṣu vartta taityatra pratijñā arthe avayava antara abhāva āditya hetuḥ kasmāt  yadi api avayava antaram avayavinaḥ  bhavati tathā api avayava antarāṇi avayavinaḥ  avayava antareṣu varttante kim āyātam avaya vi vṛtteḥ iti eka śca anekatra varttata iti pratijñānānaḥ kim kārtsnyena kim eka deśena iti na anuyoktavyaḥ kasmāt  ubhayena kārtsnyena eka deśena vā nānātva eka artha samavāyinā ekasya avayavinaḥ  vyāghātāt  etad upajīvi āha yadi avayavī na eka deśena varttane na kārtsnyena atha katham varttata iti śaṅkate rūpa antara anirddeśāt iti ced  sa upahāsam dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā acitrāḥ tantavaḥ paṭam citram ārabhanta iti naiyāyikaiḥ kila acitraiḥ tantubhiḥ citraḥ paṭa ārabhyataiti abhyupeyate tad ca etad ayuktam na tāvat citram rūpam ekam paṭa sam evatam sva vacana virodhāt  nānā hi citram ucyate tad katham ekam iti tena yad uktam bhavati na anā ekam iti tad uktam bhavati citram ekam iti yad āhuḥ citram tad ekam iti ced idam citrataram mahat iti na ca nīla pīta ādaya eva bahavaḥ  avyāpya vṛttayaḥ citrapada āspadam iti sāṃpratam rūpādanām vyāpya vṛtti tvāt te amī vivāda adhyāsitā nīla pīta āt ayaḥ  vyāpanīyā āśraya vṛttayaḥ rūpa jātīya tvāt  śukla paṭa gata rūpavat iti upapanna upahāsaḥ  yathā acitrāḥ tantavaḥ paṭam citram ārabhanta iti nirākaroti na upalabhyamāna rūpa ādhāra tvāt avayavinaḥ  rūpam nirddiśyatām iti bruvāṇena iti avayavaḥ  asya asti iti avayavī avayavaḥ ca kāraṇam tad vā anavayavī kāryam iti kārya kāraṇa bhāva abhyupagamaḥ kutaḥ bhavati na ca prasaṅga sādhanam nāma kim cit asti pramāṇam tarkaḥ tu bhavet  na ca ayam pramāṇena itikartavyatām vinā pramāṇam artham sādhayitum arhati iti arthaḥ yad api tvayā upahāsa abhiprāyeṇa paṭa rūpam citram dṛṣṭāntīkṛtam tatra abhiprāyaḥ tāvat tava yādṛśaḥ tādṛśaḥ vā sacanāt tāvat ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ pratibhāti dṛṣṭāntaḥ ca vādi prativādinā ūḥ avivāda viṣaya iti tad sādhanam vyartham tathā api upetya citravādam brūmaḥ tvām prati citram rūpam paṭa sambandhi tayā sādhayāmaḥ tvad abhiprāya vyāpta upahāsa nirākaraṇāya iti arthaḥ paṭasya citram rūpam iti anubhava eva atra ābādhitaḥ pramāṇam iti bhāvaḥ bauddhaḥ sva abhiprāyam udghāṭayati anekatva prasaṅga iti śced iti nirākaroti citra śabdasya eka aneka viṣaya tvāt yadi nānā eva citramucyeta tatas  syāt virodhaḥ kim tu ekasmin  api citra padam prayujyate tasmāt na eka tvena asya virodha iti arthaḥ deśaka āha na ekasmin  adṛṣṭa tvāt  ekasmin  citra grāhiṇaḥ  anubhavasya adṛṣṭa tvāt  puruṣa vivakṣā dhīna pravṛttayaḥ tu śabdāḥ kva nāma durlabhā iti bhāvaḥ pariharati na abhyupeta hāneḥ iti na tāvat aneka pada paryāyaḥ citra śabdaḥ  anekam citram iti aneka pradena sāmānādhikaraṇyam pratipattum arhvati paryāya śabdānām saha prayoga anupapatteḥ dṛśyate tu prayogaḥ  anekam citram iti tasmāt yathā śuklāni nānā tathā citrāṇi nānā iti abhyupetavyam tathā ca ekam śuklam anabhyupagacchataḥ  yathā śukla nānātva abhyupagamaḥ  hīyate evam eva ekam citram anabhyupagacchataḥ citra nātvā abhyupagamaḥ  hīyata hati arthaḥ śaṅkā antaram āha atha anekam acitram iti nirākraroti evam api iti śaṅkate atha acitrāṇi iti pariharati evam ca na kim cit iti iṣyata eva asmābhiḥ yathā avayava samavetaiḥ sita harita lohita ādibhiḥ asamavāyi kāraṇaiḥ avayavini citram rūpam ārabhyata iti deśayati puṭa antara iti puṭa antaram pārśva antaram pariharati bhavatā eva īdem uktam iti ekaḥ  api guṇa ārabhata iti matvā śaṅkate citra pratyayaḥ tatra iti samādhate na prasakta iti nanu yad citrā citrābhyām ārabdham avayavinaḥ  rūpam tad api pīta ādivat niddiṃśyatām na ca śakya nirddeṣṭum tasmāt na asti iti ata āha etāvat iti anirvācyam api anubhūyamānam aśakya apahūvam yathā ikṣu kṣarīra ādīnām mādharyasya antaram mahat iti arthaḥ na tāvat avayava rūpa ādayavavinaḥ grahaṇam yuktam iti na dravya antara rūpeṇa dravya antare cākṣuṣa tvam dṛṣṭam na khalu pṛthivī ādi rūpeṇa vāyuḥ cākṣuṣa iti arthaḥ prakṛtam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti avikalpitā avicāritā iti arthaḥ sarva agrahaṇam avayavya siddheḥ iti atra pratyavasthitaḥ pūrva pakṣī atha idam āha iti keśa samūhe taimirika upalabdhivat tad upalabdheḥ iti ādi sūtra bhāṣya vārtikāni pūrva pakṣa siddhāntayoḥ atirohita arthāni api ca ayam vṛtti vikalpam āśraya vyāghātāt ayukta iti āha avayava avayavi prasaṅgaḥ ca evamā pralayāt  sū atra trayaḥ pakṣāḥ saṃbhavanti yaḥ  ayam avayaveṣu avayavi vṛtti vikalpa anupapattyā avayavinaḥ  abhāva prasaṅga āpādyate sa ā pralayāt vā nivarttatā paramāṇoḥ vā na kva cit api nivarttate iti tatra prathama  dvitīya vikalpau  āśritya idaṃsūtram yathā eva vṛtti vikalpaḥ sthūle ghaṭa ādau  avayaveṣu tad avayaveṣu iti tad abhāvāt pralaye vyavatiṣṭheta na ca tadā pralayaḥ sarva upākhyā virahitaḥ  darśana viṣayaḥ saṃbhavati iti darśana viṣaya abhāvāt anāśrayaḥ  vikalpa ātmānam eva na labhate upalakṣaṇam ca etadā pralayāt iti ā paramāṇoḥ iti api draṣṭavyam paramāṇūnām api atīndriya tvena darśana viṣayatva abhāvāt anāśrayatā vikalpasya tad avasthā eva tad idam uktam niravayavāt vā parama aṇutaḥ  nivartteta iti atha api iti api ca iti arthaḥ api ca pralayam abhyupetya idam uktam ā pralayāt iti vastutas tu na pralayaḥ  aṇu sadbhāvāt  sū niravayava tve pramāṇam āha niravayava tvam tu paramāṇoḥ iti atha ananta eva ayam avaya vākya vivibhāgaḥ kasmāt na bhavati iti ata āha param vā truṭeḥ sū truṭistra sareṇuḥ iti anarthāntaram jāla sūrya marīci stham trasareṇa rajaḥ smṛtam yadi truṭeḥ param dvi tri padake avayava vibhagaḥ  na vyavatiṣṭhate tatas  avayava vibhāgasya anavasthānāt  dravyāṇām asaṃkhyeya tvāt  truṭitva nivṛttiḥ truṭiḥ api sumeruṇā tulya parimāṇaḥ syāt  na khalu ananta avayava tve kaścid viśeṣa iti arthaḥ vārtikam yāvat vā pralayaḥ  anivṛttiḥ vā iti pralaya paramāṇu pakṣe vikalpa nivṛtiḥ na asti darśana viṣayaḥ tu na asti iti anāśrayaḥ  vikalpaḥ ananta avayava tve sarvasya vikalpa āghrāta tvā iva darśana viṣaya abhāva iti anāśrayaḥ  vikalpa eti arthaḥ saṃkhyā udāharaṇam iyantaḥ ca te paramāṇavaḥ saṃhatāḥ truṭi bhāvam āpadyanta iti sāvayava tve tu paramāṇu śabdasya arthaḥ  vaktavyaḥ kim uktam bhavati paramāṇuḥ iti paramatva viśiṣṭaḥ  hi aṇuḥ paramāṇuḥ yatas  kṣodīyaḥ  na aparam asti iti yāvat  tasmāt api ced  kṣodīyaḥ  anyat asti na eṣa paramatva viśiṣṭaḥ  aṇuḥ iti arthaḥ atha bhinna parimāṇāḥ paramāṇu avayavāḥ tatas  nyūna parimāṇā iti yāvat  tatas  na paramāṇuḥ pratiṣidhyate paramāṇu avayavā eva paramāṇavaḥ te ca anavayava tvāt akāryāḥ tvayā ca paramāṇu ārabdham kāryam paramāṇuḥ iti kṛtvā āropya vṛtti tri kalpena pratiṣidhyata iti atha idānīmānupalambhikaḥ tasya vyākhyānam sarvam na asti iti manvānam āha ākāśa vyatibhedāt tasya paramāṇoḥ niravayavasya anupapattiḥ sāvayatve tu vṛtti vikalpāt tad abhāva iti śūnyatā eva tattvam bhāvānām anāśritopi vikalpaḥ  yathā loka pratīti kalpanā mātra nirmitaḥ tāttvikīm śūnyatām gamayati mithyājñānānām api tattva avagama hetutva darśanāt  yathā dūrāt vanaspatau hasti pratyaya pravāhaḥ  vanaspati tattva pratipatteḥ ddetuḥ yathā rekhā gavayaḥ  vā gavayatva pratipatteḥ ityādi bahu ut prekṣitavyam iti bhāvaḥ teda tad vārttikakāra udūṣayati ākāśa vyatibhedāt anityaḥ paramāṇuḥ iti abhidhānaḥ  vyatiśreda artham praṣṭavya iti antar bahis iti vacanam kāryasya kāraṇa antara vacanam iti kāraṇa antaram kāraṇa viśeṣaḥ tasya vacanam iti arthaḥ upetya paramāṇoḥ avayavān na tad vibhāgasya ākāśam kāraṇam iti ākāśa vyatibhedāt iti ākāśa hetukam vyatibhedam vibhāgam āha na ca ākāśam vibhajyamānayoḥ dravya antarayoḥ vibhāgasya kāraṇam api tu karma iti arthaḥ sarvatas  avyavahitasya yasya madhye avayavā na santi iti tad su piram iti sarvatas  avyavahitaspaya nirantarasya āvayavinaḥ sva avayava dvāreṇa etad uktam bhavati yasya avayavāḥ paritas  nirantaram avasthitā madhye ca na santi tad suṣiram iti yad mūrtimat tena sarveṇa sambadhyate mūrtimatā sarveṇa sambaddhat tvam sarvatatvam vadataḥ  vārtikakārasya aja saṃyogasya abhyupagamaḥ prauḍhi vādatayā iti lakṣyate syāt etad  ākāśam ced sarva gatam tatas  mūrtimatām dravyāṇām tena pratibandhāt gateḥ āvaraṇam vyūha antara āpādanam ca jala oghasya iva nāvādinā bhavet na ca asti tasmāt na sarva gatam iti ata āha avyūha aviṣṭambha vibhu tvāni ca ākāśa dharmāḥ sū yata eva avyūha aviṣṭambhāvata eva apratyūham vibhu tvam asya iti arthaḥ punar  śūnya tāvādī pratyavatiṣṭhate mūrttimatāṃva ca saṃsthāna upapatteḥ avayava sadbhāvaḥ sū caḥ tu arthaḥ siddhāntam nivarttayati yadi api mūrtimatām iti saṃbandhitva mātreṇa upāttam sūtram tathā api hetu padatayā vārtika kāraḥ vyācaṣṭe sa avayavāḥ paramāṇa vomūrttimat tvāt  ghaṭa ādivat iti prayoga antaram āha saṃsthānavat tvāt iti sūtra antaram anuvṛtti sahitam paṭhati saṃyoga upapatteḥ ca sū iti paunaruktyam deśayati nanu idam iti pariharati na caritārtham iti mūrtiḥ nāma avyāpinaḥ  dravyasya ṣaḍvidham parimāṇam iti para mahva svatva parama aṇu tve parama sūkṣma eva dravye vyavatiṣṭhete vyāpi tu gṛhītvā parama mahattva parama dīrgha tvābhyām aṣṭavidham parimāṇam bhavati parama mahattva parama dīrgha tvam ca sarva gata vyāpinī iti na mūrtiḥ asarva gata dravya parimāṇam mūrttiḥ iti pāramarṣaṃvacanāt  saṃsthānam nāma pracaya ākhyaḥ saṃyogaḥ  ghaṭa ādi vṛttiḥ ghaṭatva ādi jāti vyakti hetuḥ iti saṃyogaḥ saṃyoga mātram na tu aprāpti pūrvikā prāptiḥ iti tasmāt apaunaruktyam tad etad śūnya tām atam apākaroti yad tāvat mūrtimat tvāt iti śūnya tāvādī pralaya antatva abhimānena āha atha tāvat iti siddhānti āha antaḥ niravayava iti pralaya anta tvam adhastāt nikākṛtam iti bhāvaḥ nanu adhastāt nirākaraṇāt mā bhūt pralaya antaḥ  vibhāgaḥ  vibhāga antaḥ tu bhaviṣyati kim paramāṇu anta tā graheṇa iti āśaṅkate atha antaḥ  vibhāgaḥ nirākaroti sa na yukta iti na asati guṇini guṇa u asti iti arthaḥ etāvantaḥ ca kalpāḥ sambhavinaḥ tatra prathama kalpe anaikāntikatva vyāghātau dvitīye vibhāgasya anādhāratva prasaṅgaḥ tṛtīye truṭeḥ ameyatva prasaṅga iti āha etāvat ca etad  kalpa jātam syāt iti paramāṇu anta tām vibhāgasya bruvat niravayavam mūrttimantam paramāṇum pratipadyasa iti ananta tve tu truṭeḥ ameyatva prasaṅgaḥ  vyāghātaḥ pralaya anta tve ca vibhāgasya anādhārattva prasaṅgaḥ  vyāghātaḥ sāvayava śabdasya arthaḥ samāna jātīya avayavam na kevalam tadāravdham api tu tad āśritam tantu ādi ārabdham paṭa ādi dravyam tantu ādi āśritam ca nanu evam api kutas  sāvayava tvam iti ata āha avayavaḥ tad ādhāraḥ tasya samāna jātīya ārabdhasya kārya dravyasya ādhāraḥ tasmāt sāvayava tvam kārya viśeṣaḥ tasmāt sāvayavāḥ paramāṇava iti atibruvatā kārya viśā eṣaḥ paramāṇuḥ iti uktam bhavati kārya viṣeḥ ca paramāṇuḥ iti vyāhatam ānantye tu truṭeḥ ameyatva prasaṅgāt  sā khalu anava yavasya kalpitasya parama sūkṣma tayā paramāṇu ākhyā tena paramāṇuḥ iti kim uktam bhavati anavayavaḥ  akāryaḥ ca iti sāvayava iti kim uktam bhavati sa avayavaḥ kāryaḥ ca iti pratijñā padayoḥ vyāghāta eti arthaḥ atha mā bhūt trṛṭerameya tvam iti eka paramāṇu pūrvaka tvam paramāṇoḥ pratipadyase śeṣam ati rohita artham yadi dve dravya adhikṛtya abhidhīyata iti madhyasya hi paramāṇoḥ upayardhaḥ pārśva vartibhiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ ye saṃyogāḥ tatra madhyasya pūrveṇa paramāṇunā yaḥ saṃyogaḥ  na asau madhyapaścima paramāṇu āśritaḥ evam madhyama paramāṇu saṃyogaḥ  na eva madhyama pūrva paramāṇu āśraya iti eva manyatra api draṣṭavyam ṣaṣ api bhinna deśā eva iti samāna deśa tvam aṃsiddham atha paramāṇūnām sambandhinam paramāṇum madhyam adhikṛtya ucyate tad āśritā hi saṃyogāḥ ṣaṣ api bhavanti iti tatra āha na kim cit bādhyata iti syāt etad  saṃyoga samāna deśa tvena paramāṇavaḥ  api saṃyuktāḥ samāna deśā iti piṇḍasya aṇu mātratva prasaṅga iti para uktam anuvadati yad punar etad iti tad  dūṣayati tad na iti yatra yad samavetam sa tasya dośaḥ yathā rūpa ādīnām dravyam na ca paramāṇavaḥ kva cit samavayanti kim tu tad saṃyogāḥ tena deśavatām saṃyogānām astu samāna deśa tā na tu paramāṇū nām adeśa tvāt iti arthaḥ deśayati nanu kārya kāraṇe iti yathā iha kuṇḍe badaram iti yathā badaram kuṇḍadeśa evam tad avayavāḥ tad avayavāḥ na ca samavāya eva deśa deśitva nibandhanam api tu saṃyogaḥ  api na hi iha kuṇḍe badaram iha paṭe śukla tvam iti vā ādhārya ādhāra pratyayaḥ viśiṣyate tasmāt bahūnām dravyāṇām samāna deśattva darśanāt na asiddhaḥ  dṛṣṭānta iti arthaḥ tad  dūṣayati etad anabhyupagamena pratyuktam dravyāṇām ekatra samavāyena samāna deśa tām vyāsedhāmaḥ  na tu saṃyogena samavāyena hi samāna deśa tā sthaulya paripanthinī yathā gandha rasa rūpa sparśāḥ samāna deśā na sthaulyam ārabhante tad kasya hetoḥ eṣām amūrtānām samāna deśa samavāyāt mūrtāḥ tu sparśavantaḥ samavāyena asamāna deśāḥ paraspara saṃyoginaḥ  yadi sthaulyam ārabhante kim bādhyate tasmāt saṃyoginaḥ  yadi sthaulyam ārabhante kim bādhyate tasmāt saṃyogena samāna deśa tā na pratiṣadhyate samavāyena tu pratiṣidhyate sā hi sthaulya virodhinī iti siddham abhyupetya evam uktam saṃyogāḥ samāna deśā iti paramārthataḥ tu kuṇḍa badara saṃyogasya kuṇḍabadare āśrayaḥ tad avayava kuṇḍa badara saṃyogasya kuṇḍa badara avayavā iti siddham saṃyogānām api bhinna deśa tvam iti āha na ca saṃyogā api iti upasaṃharati ṣaṇṇām samāna deśa tvāt iti vākyam iti yad punaruktam diś deśa bhedaḥ  yasya asti tasya eka tvam na yuktam iti paramāṇoḥ kila bhavat abhimatasya ekasya digbhāgāḥ ṣaḍ  na ca ekasya digbhāge bhedaḥ  asti iti ṣaṭ eva paramāṇavaḥ etad  dūṣayati ka evam āha diś deśa bhedaḥ  yasyāḥ  sti iti svarūpeṇa ekā diś  sarva gatā ca na asyāḥ  bhedaḥ  asti iti arthaḥ yadi ekā eva diś  kva tarhi paramāṇau  asmāt ayam paramāṇuḥ pūrvaḥ ayam paścima ityādayaḥ  buddhi vyapadeśa bhedā iti ata āha diś deśa bhedāḥ ca diśaḥ saṃyogā ekatve api diśa āditya udaya deśa pratyāsanna deśa saṃyuktaḥ  yaḥ sā etarasmāt viprakṛṣṭa deśa saṃyogāt paramāṇoḥ pūrvaḥpa evam āditya astamaya deśa pratyāsanna deśa saṃyuktaḥ  yaḥ sa itatasmāt viprakṛṣṭa deśa saṃyogāt paramāṇoḥ paścimaḥ tau ca pūrva paścimau paramāṇū apekṣya yaḥ sūrya udaya astamaya deśa viprakṛṣṭa deśa saṃyogaḥ sa madhvavatīm evam etayoḥ yau tiryak deśa sambandhinau madhyasya ārjavena vyavasthitau pārśva vartinau tau dakṣiṇa uttarau paramāṇū evam madhyandina varti sūrya sannikarṣa viprakarṣau pūrva saṃkhyā avacchinna tvam ca alpa tvam para saṃkhyā avacchinna tvam ca bhūyas tvam tasmāt ekasya api paramāṇoḥ paramāṇu antara saṃyogā avyāpya vṛttaya eva bhāgāḥ evam diśaḥ  api ekasyā api saṃyogā eva bhāgāḥ saḥ  ayam paramāṇoḥ ṣaṭkena yugapad yogaḥ  mūrttatva mātra prayuktaḥ  na sāvayavatva prayukta iti na sāvayava tvam gamayitum arhati iti tena yudacyate prasaṅga sādhanam paraiḥ yad nirayavam tad na ṣaṭkena saṃyuktam yathā vijñānam tathā ca paramāṇuḥ iti vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ iti tad nirastam mūrtatva prayukta tvena ṣaṭka saṃyogasya sāvayava tvena vyāpteḥ asiddheḥ chāyā ātapa yogaḥ  api paramāṇoḥ eka saṃyogasya avyāpya vṛtti tvena upapannaḥ nanu anavasthā na upapadyata iti uktam tad kuta iti ata āha bhāṣya kāraḥ anavasthāyām pratyadhikaraṇam dravya avayavānām ānantyāt  kriyāvattva ādīn hetūn sarvathā vikalpya vārtikakāraḥ  dūṣayati ye tu kriyāvat tvāt iti etena asiddhatvena na hi ghaṭa ādi kam avayavinam anabhyupagacchataḥ  ghaṭa ādiḥ asti iti arthaḥ matupaḥ ca artha antare dṛṣṭa tvāt viruddha iti kriyā paramāṇoḥ artha antaram anicchataḥ  matup prayogaḥ  viruddha iti arthaḥ vijñāna vādī āha yad idam bhavān buddhīḥ iti yadi paṭaḥ tantubhyaḥ bhinnaḥ bhavet tantu atinekeṇa gauḥ iva aśva atirekeṇa upalabhyeta na ca upalabhyate tasmāt paṭa iti mithyā buddhiḥ iyam tantuḥ iti api mithyā buddhiḥ aṃśubhyaḥ  bhedena anupalambhāt  evam aṃśuḥ iti api tad anena krameṇa paramāṇuṣu api buddhyā vivicyamāneṣu yāthātmya anupalabdheḥ na bāhya vastu sthūlam vā kṣodīyaḥ  vā asti iti sarvā eva buddhayaḥ sva ākāram abāhyam bāhya tayā ālambamānā mithyā bhūtā iti nanu paṭa ādayaḥ sa avayavā bhavantu evam paramāṇūnām tu anavayava tvāt  buddhyā vivecanāt bhāvānām yāthātmya upalabdhiḥ iti ata āha paramāṇavaḥ  api bhāgaśas vi bhajyamāna am tāvat yāvat pralaya iti bhavantu paramāṇavaḥ  anavayavāḥ saṃyogebhyaḥ tu ṣaḍbhyaḥ  buddhyā vivicyamānasya yāthātmyam upalabhyata iti tad etad  dūṣayati vyāhata tvāt ahetuḥ iti yasya vivicyāmānasya yāthātmya anupalabdhiḥ tad kutaścit vivecanīyam avadhya bhāve tad anupapatteḥ tathā ca tena avadhipanā kva cit avasthātavyam anavasthāyām truṭeḥ ameyatva prasaṅgāt iti uktam tasmāt paramāṇuṣu vā tad saṃyogeṣu vā tena avasthātavyam tathā ca yatas  vivicyate bhāvaḥ sa eva āspaya avadhiḥ yāthātmyena upalabhyata iti buddhyā vivicyamānasya sarva bhāva anupapattyāvyāghāta iti siddham dūṣaṇa antaram āha sarva bhāva anupapattiḥ iti pramāṇasya api bhāvāt  tad gata tvena tad anupapattau sarva bhāva anupapattiḥ iti arthaḥ tad āśraya tvāt apṛthak grahaṇam sū apṛthak grahaṇāt iti bruvāṇaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ  jāyate kim vilakṣaṇa vyavahāra abhāvaḥ uta bheda abhāvaḥ uta tantu vyatirekeṇa deśa antare anupalambha iti na tāvat ādyaḥ tantavaḥ  hi bhinna ābha buddhi vedyāḥ paṭaḥ tu abhinna ābha buddhi vedya iti na api dvitīyaḥ tantūnām aṃśu deśa tvāt paṭasya tantu deśa tvāt  tasmāt tantubhyaḥ  anyatra adarśanam apṛthak grahaṇam tad ca bhede api tad āśrita tvena upapadyamānam nābhedam gamayitum arhati iti arthaḥ bhāṣyam buddhyā vivecanāt tu bhāvānām pṛthak grahaṇam atīndriyeṣu aṇuṣu yatra khalu avayava avayavinā vaindriyakau tatra pṛthak grahaṇam avivecakānām asphuṭataram atīndriyebhyaḥ  aṇubhya ānumānikebhyaḥ pratyakṣa dṛśyānām tad āśritānām avayavinām pṛthak grhaṇam iti ati sphuṭam iti arthaḥ saṃprati aindriyake api avayave avayavinaḥ  vivicyamānasya yāthātmyena pṛthak grahaṇam āha pramāṇataḥ ca artha pratipatteḥ iti yad asti paṭa ādikam avayavi dravyam yathā ca sva avayava samaveta tvena guṇa ādhāra tayā ca yad na asti śaśa viṣāṇa ādi yathā ca kārya kāraṇa bhāvena tad sarvam pramāṇata upalabdhyā sidhyati sugamam bhāṣyam yad uktam pramāṇa upapatti anupapattibhyām na sarva bhāva anupapattiḥ iti tatra pratyavatiṣṭhate vijñāna vādī svapna viṣaya abhimānavat ayam pramāṇa prameya abhimānaḥ sū na khalu vāstavaḥ pramāṇa prameya bhāvaḥ kim tu anādi vāsanā nibandhana kalpanā adhīnaḥ yathā hi na svapne santi viṣayā atha ca pratibhānti kalpanāmatreṇa tathā ca sāṃvṛtena aparamārtha satā pramāṇa prameya bhāvena bāhya artha śūnyatā sidhyati parama artha satī pratyayānām dṛṣṭā mithyā pratyayānām api tattva pratipatti hetuta iti āveditam purastāt iti arthaḥ tad vyācaṣṭe vārttikakāraḥ yathā na svapne viṣayāḥ santi iti nanu svapna pratyayānāmaḥ tu evandharmaka tvam ye punar abhī jāgratyat prayāḥ stambha iti vā kumbha iti vā kim āyātam teṣām atyanta vailakṣaṇyāt ityata āha māyā gandharva iti jāgrat pratyayā api evaṃvidhāḥ sahasraśas  dṛśyante na ca ete stambha kumbha ādi pratyayāḥ tatas  vilakṣaṇā iti arthaḥ tad etad dūṣayati hetu abhāvāt asiddhiḥ sū tad vyācaṣṭe bhāṣya kāraḥ svapna ante viṣaya abhimānavat iti anta śabdaḥ  avayava vacanaḥ  api āśritatva mātreṇa avasthāyām prayuktaḥ tena svapna avasthāyāḥ  miti arthaḥ etad uktam bhavati svapna jñānasya āyāthārthyam icchatā vādhaka pantareṇa tad anupapatteḥ jāgrat pratyayaḥ asya bādhakaḥ  vaktavyaḥ na ca asau  asamīcīnaḥ tad bādhitum utsahata iti samīcīna tvam jāgrat pratyayasya abhyupagantavyam tathā ca jāgarita ante viṣaya upalabdhivat iti anupapannam vārttikam khyātiḥ iti ced  pratyaya tvam eva svapna udāharaṇa sahitam pramāṇa prameya abhimāna bhithyātve hetuḥ iti arthaḥ viparyaye ca sāmarthya abhāvāt iti pūrvam pratibuddhena iti viśeṣaṇam vivakṣitvā uktam adhunā tu anupalabdheḥ iti vivakṣitvā ucya taityayau naruktyam atra vijñāna vādī sva pakṣe pramāṇam āha na citta vyatirekiṇaḥ  viṣayāḥ grāhya tvāt  vedanāvat iti idam atra ākūtam vijñānasya hi bāhyoḥ  athaḥ grāhyaḥ  bhavat nirākārasya sattā mātreṇa vā bhavet  kāraṇa tvena vā eka sāmagrī adhīna tvena vā jñāna ahita phala ādhāra tvena vā na tāvat sattā mātreṇa anyasya anyaḥ  viṣayaḥ sattā mātrasya viṣaya antareṣu bhāvāt sarve arthāḥ sarva viṣayā iti sarva sarvajña tā āpattiḥ na ca sattā mātrām api viṣayatva vyavasthāpakam asataḥ  api viṣaya tvāt  ata eva na kāraṇa tvena viṣaya bhāvaḥ api ca cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ api vijñānasya kāraṇam iti viṣayā rūpa vijñānasya prasajyeran varttamāna avabhāsi ca vijñānam na bhavet  kṣaṇika tvena utpādakasya artha kṣaṇasya utpādya vijñāna samaye vinipātāt  eka sāmagrī adhīna tvena tu viṣaya tve varttamāna avabhāsitā upapadyate sā tu na upapadyate asatoḥ api atīta anāgatayoḥ grahaṇe vyāpaka tvāt ati vyāpaka tvāt ca indriya ādi kṣaṇasya ekasāmagrī adhīnasya ālambanatva prasaṅgāt  vijñāna ahita phala ādhāra ālambanam iti ced  kim punar vijñānena arthe janyate prākaṭyam na ca etad artha dharmaḥ  api śukla ādivat sarva puruṣa sādhāraṇam jñāna ahitasya artha dharmasya api jñānavantam pratyasādhāraṇatva darśanāt yathā yasya apekṣā buddhi janitam dvi tvam artha dharmaḥ saḥ  apekṣā buddhim antam eva puruṣam pratyasādhāraṇa iti tad na avyāpaka tvāt  santi khalu atīta anāgata viṣayāṇi sahasraśas  vijñānāni śabda anumāna jāni ca na caitanī arthe phalam ādhātum utsahante arthasya tadānīm asambhavāt na khalu asti sambhavaḥ  asanna nutpanna rūpaḥ  dharmī dharmaḥ  asya avinaśyan pratyutpanna rūpa iti sva kāraṇāt ātmānātma prakāśana śakti yuktam utpadyate jñānam tādṛśam yena kaścid eva asya viṣayaḥ  na sarvam iti ced  hanta bhoḥ śakteḥ śakya niṣṭha tvāt kim asya śakyam iti vaktavyam artha iti ced na na tāvat ayam asya nirvartyaḥ arthasya eva jñāna nirvarttaka tvāt  na ca artha ādhāram phalam ādhat taiti uktam na ca asati śakye śakti saṃbhavaḥ tasmāt anākāram vijñānam bāhmam gocarayati iti manoratha mātram astu sa ākāram eva bāhya gocaram tathā hi nīla ādi ākāram jñānam nīla ādi gocaram nīlam asya svarūpam yatas  atra evam vaktavyam kim sarva ātmanā sārūpya bhāvāt  viṣaya bhāva āhaḥ katham cit sā rūpya bhāvāt na tāvat arthasya jaḍa ātmanaḥ  jñānena prakāśa ātmanā sarvathā sārūpyam sārūpye jñānam api jaḍam bhavet iti jñānatva hāniḥ eka deśena ca sārūpye tad  kva nāma na asti iti sarvam jñānam sarvam vedayet  api ca nīla jñānāt samanantara pratyayāt utpannam jñānam na tathā nīla artha sarūpam yathā nīla jñāna sarūpam iti samanantara pratyaya tad sārūpyābhyām viṣayaḥ sya ānana ca etad asti tasmāt na sārūpya samutpattī api viṣaya lakṣaṇam stāmasya sārūpya samutpattī manaskāra indriya ādibhiḥ tathā api yam adhyavasyati saḥ  asya viṣayaḥ  artham ca adhyavasyati iti artha eva asya viṣayaḥ  na manaskāra ādīticed  atha kaḥ  aya madhyavasāyaḥ na tāvat grahaṇam na khalu dvau  ākārau gṛhyete nīlam iti anubhavaḥ  na tu nīle iti su ākārasya bāhya samāropaḥ  adhyavasāya iti ced  sa kim gṛhyamāṇe bāhye uta āgṛhyamāṇe na hi nīla dvayam prakāśa taiti uktam na cāra upaviṣayam agṛhītvā āropyam āropayitum arhati iti na hi ananubhavan puras vartati śukla bhāsvaram rajatam āropayati tatra api ca āgṛhyamāṇe bāhye pravṛtti niyamaḥ  na bhavet  itareṣām agṛhyamāṇa tvena aviśeṣāt teṣu api pravṛtti prasaṅgāt  na ca sa ākāra jñāna naye bāhya sadbhāve pramāṇam asti agṛhyamāṇa tvāt  nanu nīla ādi ākārasya kādācid ka tvam eva pramāṇam tathā hi yadi asmin sati api kadā cit bhavet tad tad itara apekṣam yathā sati api sopāne vicchinna gamana racana pratibhāsāḥ pratyayāḥ santāna antara apekṣāḥ tathā ca sati api ālaya saṃtāne ṣaṣ api pravṛtti pratyayā iti svabhāva hetuḥ vāsanā paripāka pratyaya kādācitka tvāt  kadā cit utpāda iti ced  nanu eka santāna patitānām ālaya jñānānām tad tad pravṛtti vijñāna janana śaktiḥ vāsanā tasyāḥ ca kārya jananam pratyābhimukhyam paripākaḥ tasya ca pratyayaḥ svasantāna varttī pūrva kṣaṇaḥ  hetuḥ santāna antara apekṣā anabhyupagamāt tathā ca sarve ālaya santa anapatitāḥ paripāka hetavaḥ  bhaveyuḥ na vā kaścid api aviśeṣāt  kṣaṇa bhedāt śakti bhedaḥ tasya kādācid ka tvāt kāryakādācid ka tvam iti ced  nanu ekasya eva nīla vijñāna janana sāmarthyam śakti prabodha janana sāmarthya ca kṣaṇa antarasya tad na syāt  sattve vā katham kṣaṇa bhedāt sāmarthya bheda iti ālayasanta anavatrinaḥ sarve samarthā iti samartha hetu sadbhāve kārya kṣepa anupapattiḥ sva santāna mātra adhīna tve tu niṣedhyasya kādācid ka tvasya viruddham sadātana tvam tasya upalabdhyā tu kādācid ka tvam nivarttamānam hetu antara apekṣa tve vyavatiṣṭhata iti pratibandha siddhiḥ na ca saṃtāna antara nimittāni pravṛtti vijñānāni santati antarāṇām api nitya sannidhānāt vijñānānām adeśa ātmaka tvena dūratva anupapatteḥ vyatiriktasya anabhyupagamāt  na api kālataḥ  viprakarṣa sambhavaḥ apūrva sattva prādurbhāva anabhyupagamāt tad idam anumānam sautra antikānām bāhyāmi upagama iti tad ayuktam sva santāna mātra nimitta tve api nīla ādi vijñānānām kādācid katva upapattau sandigdha vyatiroki tvena hetoḥ anaikāntika tvāt  nanu uktam na kṣaṇbhedaḥ kārya bheda hetuḥ iti kalpitasya santānasya sarva sāmarthya virahiṇaḥ  bhedaḥ kārya bheda hetuḥ iti na tu parama artha satas  kṣaṇasya kārya bheda hetutvam iti kaḥ  anyaḥ  bhadantāt vaktum arhati nanu yadi kṣaṇa bhedaḥ śakti bheda hetuḥ tatas  bhinānām kṣaṇānām na ekā śakti syāt  tathā ca ekena kena cit nīla jñāne janite tad nīla jñānam kṣaṇa antarāt na syāt  yadi bhinnānām na ekam sāmarthyam atha bāhya artha vādinaḥ  api katham bhinnānām nīlotpala santānānām eka nīlotpala ākāra jñāna dhārā sāmarthyam yadi ucyate anyat eva nīla vijñānam yad nīlotpala santāna antarāt vayam api brūmahe anyat eva nīla vijñānam yad  kṣaṇa antarāt iti tasmāt kaścid eva tādṛśaḥ sva lakṣaṇa bhedaḥ  jāyate yaḥ kam cit eva kārya bhedam janayati na kārya antaram iti tasmāt sa ākārasya api jñānasya arthaḥ  na gocaraḥ  na ca agocaraḥ śakyaḥ  anumātum iti na ca pratyakṣavat anumānam api artha gocaram tasmāt sādhu uktam vārttika kṛtā na citta vyatirekiṇaḥ  viṣayaḥ grāhya tvāt vedanāvat iti nīlādayaḥ  hi viṣayā ubhaya vādi siddhāḥ teṣām citta bheda abhedayoḥ vipratipattiḥ tatra eṣām citta vyatirekaḥ paraiḥ abhyupagataḥ pratiṣidhyate yāvān  ca pratiṣidhyate sarvaḥ  anupalabdheḥ iti grāhya tvāt iti ayam hetuḥ viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ citta vpayatiḥ ekaḥ tad viruddhaḥ tad avyatirekaḥ tena vyāptam grāhya tvam tasya upalabdhiḥ eva tad niṣedhyasya anupalabdhiḥ iti atra tāvat etad vaktavyam grāhyat tvasya abhedena vyāptau satyām bhedam nivartayet  na tvabhedena asya vyāptiḥ tathā hi yad etad nīlam sthūlam vicchinnam upalabhyate tasya asya vicchedaḥ sthaulyam ca na jñānasya ātmā nānā diś deśa vyāpitā hi sthaulyam na ca ekamadiś deśa ātmakam anavayavam vijñānam nānā diś deśa vyāpi sambhavati yathā āha tasmāt na arthe na vijñāne sthūla ābhāsaḥ tad ātmanaḥ ekatra pratiṣiddha tvāt vahuṣu api na sambhava iti evam artha vicchedaḥ  api na jñāna ātmakaḥ tasya tathā tve paramārtha toḥ  atha advicchinnam jñānam syāt  tasmāt ayam api na jñānam iti asan  abhyupagantavyaḥ na ca sat asatoḥ eka tvam iti anātmā api vijñāne prakāśa taiti anicchatā api svīkarttavyam tathā ca sat api prakāśiṣyate nanu anātmni arthe akiṃñcit karam vijñānam katham artha prakāśakam atha akiñcitkaram jñānam sthaulye katham asya prakāśakam svabhāvāt iti ced  atra api asau na daṇḍa vāritaḥ yad hi yasya svabhāvaḥ tasya na anya apekṣā yathā liṅgasya sva sādhya sambandhe svabhāvataḥ ca arthasya jñānam iti na tadīya tve anyat apekṣate asambaddha tvāt katham jñānam arthasya iti ced  atha sambandha eva sambandhinoḥ katham sambandha antara kalpanāyām anavasthā tasmāt yathā sambandha eva sambandha antara manteraṇa sambandhinoḥ evam jñānam api sambandha antaram antareṇa arthasya iti samānam na ca atiprasaṅgaḥ sva kāraṇāt utpannasya kasya cit vijñānasya kaścid eva viṣayaḥ  na anyaḥ na svabhāvāḥ paryanuyogam arhanti evam bhavatā evam mā bhavata evam kasmāt na bhavatā iti akiñcitkarasya rūpa vijñānasya katham rūpa viṣaya tā iti ced  kim rūpa vijñānam pramāṇam vivakṣitvā idam ucyate āhaḥ phalam vivakṣitvā yadi pramāṇam tatas  na tad akiñcitkaram tatra hāna upādāna upekṣā prasava hetu tvāt atha phalam tad ayuktam kva nāma phalam kiñcid karam na hi gati janyā nagara prāptiḥ caitrasya caitra nagara saṃyoga samavāyāya kim cit karoti evam artha viṣaya tvāya svābhāvikāya na jñānena kim cit aparam janayitavyam artha pratibaddha tvam jñānasya artha viṣaya tvam na hi jñānim anu vyavasāya jñānena nirūpyamāṇam artha nirūpaṇam vinā śakyam nirūpayitum iti uktam karmaṇi asamavetam katham karmaṇaḥ tad pāratantryāt iti ced  kim idam pāratantryam tad nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇa tvam iti ced  tad iha api samānam anyatra abhiniveśāt tasmāt abhedena grāhyasya avyāpya tvāt grāhya tvam viruddha vyāptam na bhedam nivartayitum arhati iti dūṣaṇe sthavīyasi sati eva dūṣaṇa antaram āha vārtikakāraḥ vedanā sukha duḥkhe cittam vijñānam iti abhyupetya āha atha abhinnaṃvijñānam vedanāta iti yathā aṅgulī agram na tena eva aṅgulī agreṇa spṛśyate evam jñānam na tena eva jñānena grahītum śakyate nanu na gṛhītiḥ grāhyā na hi asyāḥ karma bhāvaḥ  vidyate kriyā phala śāli tayā karma bhavati na ca asyām asti phala antaram api tu svayam āvirbhūta svabhāvā gṛhītiḥ apara adhīna prakāśā grāhyā iti ucyate yadi vā eṣā svayam na prakāśeta na arthā api prakāśeran tad prakāśa adhīna prakāśā hi te tathā hi yad yad prakāśa adhīna prakāśam tad tasmin prakāśamāne prakāśate yathā daṇḍa prakāśa adhīna prakāśaḥ  daṇḍi prakāśaḥ jñāna prakāśa adhīna prakāśaḥ ca viṣaya iti svabhāva hetuḥ na ca jñānāt anyat sva saṃvedanam na dṛṣṭam iti etāvatā sva saṃvedanam vijñānam na bhavet iti darśana adarśanābhyām na hetuḥ gamakaḥ  api tu sva sādhya avinā abhāvāt sa ca viparyaye bādhaka pramāṇa pravṛttyā sidhyati iti kṛtam dṛṣṭāntena iti atra āha na karma kriyā ca ekam bhavati iti idam atra ākūtam kim punar idam arthānām saṃvid prakāśa adhīnatva prakāśa tvam nāma na hi saṃvid prakāśena arthe prakāśa antaram janyate api ca liṅga prakāśa adhīna prakāśaḥ  hi liṅgi prakāśaḥ na ca liṅge prakāśamāne prakāśate kim tu liṅga prakāśe vinaṣṭe yadi ucyeta na jñānāt atiriktaḥ  aratha prakāśaḥ  jñāna prakāśaḥ ca kim tu jñānam eva sva saṃvedanam arthasya sva ātmanaḥ ca iti evam tarhi kim āyātam na hi ātmā eva ātma āyattaḥ na ca jñānam eva ātmanaḥ parasya ca prakāśa iti siddham anyaḥ  hi jñāna prakāśaḥ  mānasa aindriyakaḥ ca artha prakāśaḥ na ca pramāṇa jñāna prakāśa adhīnor atha prakāśaḥ kim tu pramāṇa jñāna satta adhīnaḥ phala adhīnam tu na kim cit iti viditam tad siddham etad vivāda adhyāsitam vijñānam sva prakāśāt bhinnam prakāśamāna tvāt  sattva antara prakāśasya sattva antara prakāśavat tad anena abhisaṃdhinā uktam na ca karma ca kriyā ca ekam bhavati iti etena saha upalambha niyamāt abhedaḥ  nīla tad dhiyoḥ iti parāḥ tam veditavyam artha jñāna upalambhayoḥ eka upalambha tā eva na asti kutas  punar asya niyama iti atha yathāśrutaḥ saha upalambhaḥ  hetuḥ iti ucyate tatas  viruddhaḥ abhede saha artha asaṃbhavāt kṛta prapañcaḥ ca ayam arthaḥ  nyāya kāṇikāyām iha tu vistara bhayāt na prapañcita iti uparamyate saḥ  api dṛṣṭam vijñāna bhedam anuvayoktavya iti na saṃtāna mātra nibandhanaḥ  vijñāna bhedaḥ  bhavitum arhati nīla pīta ādi rūpaḥ na api saṃtāna antara ādhipatya sannidhāna nibandhanaḥ  vijñānānām adeśa ātmakānām sva rūpeṇa deśa viprakarṣā yogāt na api kāla viprakarṣaḥ  apūrva sattva prādurbhāva abhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ śaṅkate svapnavat vijñāna średam iti bāhya abhāve api ādhyātmikaḥ vijñāna bheda hetuḥ asti iti bhāvaḥ nirākaroti saḥ  api iti svapna jñānam api pāraṃparyeṇa bāhya nibandhanam iti arthaḥ avāhya nimittaka tvam svapna pratyayasya abhyupetya āha atha svapna pakṣe api iti vargaḥ pakṣaḥ na ca ekam vijñānam cintanīyam aparam cintakam iti vācyam vyatirikta ālambanatva anabhyupagamāt iti bhāvaḥ abhyupetya tu abāhya nimitta tvam svapna pratyayānām etad uktam bāhya nimitta tvam eva tu pāramārthikam iti āha ye ca ete svapna pratyayā iti samāpi iti api śabdaḥ saṃbhāvanāyām mama pakṣe saṃbhāvyata etad  yad sarva eva pratyayā mithyā bhavanti iti arthaḥ sugamam itarat  mithyā nidrā viṣayam antareṇa vijñāna sphuṭa tā ca avaktavyā iti sāmānya viśeṣa tadvatām grahaṇam sphuṭa tā sāmānya mātra grahaṇam asphuṭa tā tad ca etad asati viṣaye duṣkaram tad ākāra utpatteḥ aśakya tvāt iti arthaḥ śaṅkate asati arthe vijñāna średaḥ  dṛṣṭa iti ced  svapna māyā gandharvanagara mṛga tṛṣṇā ādi vijñāneṣu anuvartamāneṣu viṣayenrdiya manaḥ doṣana nimitta tvam astu ye punar amī pratīnām sarveṣām anuvṛttimantaḥ pūya pūrṇa nadī pratyayā na te bāhya viṣayā doṣavat tvāt bhavitum arhanti doṣa nimitta tvāt bahu nām anu vṛtteḥ abhāvāt  aduṣṭa indriya artha sannikarṣaka tve tu jala rucira ākāra virodhāt tasmāt anādi vāsanā vaicitrya labdha janma tayā artha nirapekṣā eva vicitra ākārā buddhaya udayante vyayante ca iti sāṃpratam iti śaṅkā arthaḥ na tatra nadī asti iti sva mata dārḍhyena uktam na vyāghāta ādi tañ ayim abhisaṃdhiḥ jana rudhirayaḥ rasa vīrya vipāka ādi bhedāt toya rasa vīrya paripāka ādi darśanāt nadyāḥ toya pūrṇa tve niścite pūya pūrṇatva niścayaḥ pretānām mithyā iti niścaye tad anuvṛtteḥ deṣa anuvṛttiḥ kalpanīyā doṣaḥ ca pretta śarīra nivarttakam karma eva yathā uktam tulya karma vipāka utpannāḥ pretā iti karmaṇaḥ  vāsanā anyatra phalam anyatra kalpata iti phana palam putra paśu annādi tad yadi vijñānam tadā yatra jñāna santāne karma vāsanā tatra eva putra ādi ākāram vijñānam phalam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam upapadyate putra paśu annādau tu artha rūpe phale vaiyadhikaraṇyam syāt  tathā ca atiprasaṅga iti bhāva nirākaroti tad na anabhyupagamāt iti na putra ādi sva rūpeṇa phalam api tu tad nimittā prītiḥ tasyāḥ  eva cetanena kāmyamāna tvāt  tad lakṣaṇa tvāt ca phalasya iti bhāvaḥ muktakena artham sādhayitvā prayogān āha madīyāt cittāt iti yadi cittamātram pakṣīkriyate tadā dṛṣṭāntaḥ  na asti iti ata uktam madīyāt citāt iti madīya ahaṅkārān āspada tve sati iti viśeṣaṇāt na sva cittena vyabhicāraḥ āropanirākaraṇa artha tvāt ca hetūnām na asamartha viśeṣya tā iti api ca mitya upalabdhīnām bāhya anālambana tvam āsthāya tattva buddhīnām bāhya anālambana tvam sādhanīyam tāsām bāhya anālambana tvam bādhaka adhīnam bādhakam ca atra samāropita rajata ādi abhimānam nivarttayati na tu puraḥ avasthitam artha sāmānyam śukla bhāsvaram tasmāt na bādhaka anurodhāt api mithyājñānam bāhya anālambanam iti svapnavat iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya vikala iti āha evam sati mithyājñānasya pradhāna āśraya tve mithyā upalabdheḥ vināśaḥ tattva jñānāt bādhakāt  svapna viṣaya abhimāna praṇāśavat pratiṣedhaḥ  na sāmānyasya api iti śeṣaḥ śeṣam bhāṣye bhāṣyam su bodham yaḥ tu mādhyamikaḥ  mithyā buddhi dṛṣṭāntena bāhya apahnavam kṛtvavā tena eva dṛṣṭāntena vijñāna abhāvam kṛtvā vicāra asaha tvam tattvambhāvānām vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūva tam pratyāha buddheḥ ca evam nimitta sadbhāva upalambhāt  sū arthe hi niṣiddhe bhavet api etad  tad vyavasthāpane tadvat eva apratyūham buddhi sadbhāvaḥ  api sidhyati na ca evam vādinaḥ pramāṇa m asti asatā ca pramāṇena vicāra asahat tvam bhāvānām vyavasthāpayan ślāghanīya prajñaḥ  devānāṃpriya itañ ni ca kalpanā mātrarmita upāyaḥ tattva jñānāya paryāptaḥ na ca vanaspati ādi tattva jñānasya mithyā ahasti jñānam nibandhanam api tu praṇihita manasa indriya artha sannikarṣa viśeṣaḥ na ca asau mithyājñāna samaye āsīt  na ca moha abhyāsaḥ samīcīnāya jñānāya kalpate sa hi māhem iva draḍhayati iti sarvam avadātam saḥ  ayam mādhyamikaḥ  anubhūyamānām mithyā buddhim na apahnotum arhati tathā ca mithyā buddhim pratipadyamānena tasyāḥ  nimittam vaktavyam iti uktam tattva pradhāna bhedāt ca mithyā buddheḥ dvaividhya upapatiḥ sū mithyā buddhyā sva nimittam lakṣyate tena mithyājñāna nimittasya dvaividhyam iti arthaḥ yatra sthāṇau puruṣa iti jñānam bhavati tatra tattvam sthāṇuḥ iti pradhānam puruṣa iti yaḥ pūrvam puruṣaḥ  abhūt iti arthaḥ evam tāvat rūpa buddhīḥ pratipādya gandha ādi buddhīḥ api pratipādayati bhāṣya kāraḥ gandha ādau ca prameya iti upasaṃharati tasmāt ayuktam etad iti doṣa nimittānām tattva jñānāt ahaṅkāra nivṛttiḥ iti uktam atha tattva jñānam katham utpadyata iti na tāvat āgamata upapattitaḥ  vā tattva jñānam ahaṅkāra nivṛttim kartu mutsahate doṣa nimitteṣu utpanna jñānānām api pūrvavat ahaṅkāra doṣa anuvṛtteḥ sākṣātkāraḥ tu upāya abhāvāt ayukta iti asya uttaram sūtram samādhi tattva abhyāsāt sū samādhi padam vyācaṣṭe bhāṣya kāraḥ sa tu pratyāhṛtasya indriyebhyaḥ  manasa iti anena vikṣepam nivarttayati indriyebhyaḥ pratīpam āhṛtasya manasaḥ kva cit  hṛd puṇḍarīka pradeśe ātmanaḥ  nija okasi dhārakeṇa prayatnena dhāryamāṇasya ātmanā saṃyogaḥ  ayam sa khalu supta avasthāyām asti iti ata uktam tattva bubhutsa āviṣiṣṭa iti tad abhyāsaḥ ca tad viṣaya prayatna utpāda ṣaunaḥ punyam tasmāt ādara nairantarya dīrgha kāla viśiṣṭāt tattva buddhiḥ utpadyate etad ākṣepa sūtram avatārayati yad uktam sati hi tasmin  iti indriya viṣayaiḥ apahṛta manasaḥ  dhāraṇā tathā ca tad abhyāsa abhāvāt na sattva sākṣātkāra iti sūtra arthaḥ samādhāna sūtram avatārayati astu etad samādhi vyutthāna nimittam iti sūtram pūrva kṛta phala anubandhāt tad utpattiḥ sū pūrva kṛtaḥ samādhiḥ tasya phalam saṃskāraḥ tasya anubandhaḥ sthemā tasmāt iti sūtra arthaḥ tad vyācaṣṭe bhāṣya kāraḥ pūrva kṛta iti pravivicyate anena iti pravivekaḥ prakṛṣṭaḥ saṃskāraḥ sa tu ātma dharma iti kasmāt punar adṛśyamānaḥ saṃskāraḥ kalpyatā etyata āha niṣphale hi iti prayatna viśeṣā hi viśara āravaḥ  bahavaḥ  api parasparam asahabhavantaḥ  na tattva sākṣātkārāpaya pāryāptā iti tad janitāḥ saṃskārāḥ kalpyante teṣām sthemnā sambhavati sambhūyakāritā iti arthaḥ pracaya kāṣṭhā pracaya avadhiḥ yatas  parama paraḥ pracayaḥ na asti tad sahakāri śālitayā prakṛṣṭāyām samādhi bhāvanāyām samādhi prayatnaḥ samādhi bhāvanā tasyām iti arthaḥ pūrva pakṣa vādī āha yadi artha viśeṣa prābalyāt iti sa khalu ayam īdṛśaḥ  bāhya arthasya mahimā yata indriya ādi anapekṣāt eva ātmanaḥ  buddhim janayivyati iti abhimānaḥ pūrva pakṣiṇaḥ siddhānta sūtram na niṣpanna avaśyam bhāvi tvāt  sū vyākhyātam na khalu taṇḍulā atyantam phalīkṛtā api piṭhara udaka dahana saṃyoga pracayam antareṇa pulākā bhavanti iti bhāvaḥ kim samādhi viśeṣa eva tattva jñāna sādhanam mā evam kim tu tad artham yama niyamābhyām ātma saṃskāraḥ  yogat ca adhyātma vidhi upāyaiḥ sū samānam āśramiṇām dharma sādhanam ahiṃsā satyam asteyam brahmacaryam aparigraha iti yamaḥ niyama iti yasya āśramiṇaḥ  asādhāraṇaḥ  dharma upāyaḥ yoga iti viṣayeṇa yoga śāstram pātan jalam lakṣayati yoga ācāraḥ ekākitā āhāra viśeṣaḥ ekatra anavasthānam ityādi yati dharma uktam ete api tattva jñāna krama utpāda krameṇa apamarga sādhanam iti arthaḥ nanu yadi ete tattva jñāna utpāda krameṇa apavarga upāyaḥ kṛtam tarhi ānvīkṣikya ityata āha jñāna grahaṇa abhyāsaḥ tad vidyaiḥ ca saha saṃvādaḥ sū tad vyācaṣṭe tad artham iti prakṛtam ātma vidyā anvīkṣikī abhyāsaḥ satata kriyā tatra prayatna iti arthaḥ prayojanam āha prajñā paripāka artham paripākaḥ tu saṃśaya  chedanam kim deha ādyatirikta ātmā uta na iti saṃśayaḥ tasya cchedanam lokasya tattva jñānam ātmani tad avarodhaḥ adhyavasitam pramāṇena tasya abhyanujñānam tarkeṇa sa brahmacārī saha adhyāyī guru śiṣya sahā dhyāyibhyaḥ  anyaḥ śāstreṇa anuśiṣṭaḥ śiṣṭa śreyorthinaḥ śreyasi mokṣa lakṣaṇe śrāddhāḥ teṣām apavarge śraddhā darśanāt asti tad upāya abhyāsaḥ prāc abhavīya iti anumīyate tena teṣām api prāc bhavīya saṃskāra vaśāt pratibhā upāvasanīya iti abhyupeyāt abhimukham upetya jānīyāt  guru ādibhiḥ saha iti arthaḥ nīta artham gata artham tad anena guru ādibhiḥ vādam kṛtvā tatu anirṇaya uktaḥ yadi ca manyeta pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahaḥ pratikūlaḥ parasya guru ādeḥ tasmāt na vādaḥ  api ucita iti tatra idam sūtram upatiṣṭhate pratipakṣa hīnam api vā prayojana artham arthi tve sū vyācaṣṭe tam abhyupeyāt iti varttate paratas  guru ādeḥ prajñām upāditsamānaḥ tattva bubhutsā prakāśanena ātmanaḥ śarīra ādibhyaḥ  bhedam bubhutsaiti abhidadhānaḥ sva pakṣam anavasthāpayan sva darśanam guru ādi kṛtāt vicārāt pūrva pakṣa ucchedena siddhānta vyavasthāpana lakṣaṇāt  sva darśanam pariśodhayet  anyonya pratyanīkā nim ca prāvādukānām darśanāni ayukta parityāgena yukta parigrahaṇena ca pariśodhayet iti saṃbadhyate nanu yatra vādasya eva daśā iyam īdṛśī tattva nirṇaye datta jalāñjalī tarhi jalpa vitaṇḍe iti ata āha sva pakṣa rāgeṇa ca ekai nyāyam ativarttante tatra tattva adhyavasāya saṃrakṣaṇa artham jalpa vitaṇḍe bīja praroha saṃrakṣaṇa artham kaṇṭaka śākhā āvaraṇavat sū iti sūtram tad  vyācaṣṭe anutpanna tattva jñānānām iti na kevalam tad artham ghaṭamānānām jalpa vitaṇḍe api tu vidyā nirveda ādibhinaḥ ca pareṇa avajñāyamānasya tābhyām vigṛhya kathanam sū iti sūtram yaḥ tu sva darśana vilasita mithyā jñāna avalepa durvidagyatayā sa dvidyānavairāgyāt vā lābha pūjā khyātyarthitayā kuhetubhiḥ īśvarāṇām jana ādhārāṇām puratas  veda brāhmaṇa para loka ādi dūṣaṇa pravṛttaḥ tam prati vādī samīcīnadūṣaṇam apratibhayā apaśyan jalpa vitaṇḍe avatārya vigṛhya jalpa vitaṇḍābhyām tattva kathanam karoti vidyā paripālanāya mā bhūt īśvarāṇām mati vibhrameṇa tad caritam anuvartinīnām prajānām dharma viplava iti idam api prayojanam jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ na tu lābha khyāti ādi dṛṣṭam na hi para hita pravṛttaḥ parama kāruṇikaḥ  muniḥ dṛṣṭa artham para pāṃsula upāyam upadiśati iti śaṅkā vārttikam vyāpaka tvāt antar  karaṇasya iti asya vakṣyamāṇaḥ  abhisandhiḥ nirākaroti na ukta uttara tvāt  sāṃkhyam dūpayadbhiḥ iti arthaḥ śaṅkitā sva abhiprāyam udghāṭayati sva aṅga gatī kṣaṇa iti yāvat hasta avacchinne ātma pradeśe prayatnaḥ  na jāyate na tāvat tatra karma na ca tatra ātma manaḥ sannikarṣam vinā prayatnaḥ na ca manasa indriya saṃyogam vinā īkṣaṇam na ca aṇunā manasā indriyeṇa haste ca aparyāyeṇa sambhavaḥ tasmāt vyāpakam mana iti śaṅkā arthaḥ nirākaroti na śarīra ātma manaḥ saṃyoga yaugapadyāt  prayatna darśanayoḥ ī upagat utpatteḥ tatra ātmanaḥ śarīra sambandhāt svāṅga gatiḥ iti pāṇi cālana iccha apekṣeṇa ātma manaḥ saṃyogena pāṇim cālayāmi iti evam ākāraḥ prayatnaḥ  jāyate tatra prayatnavat ātma manaḥ saṃyogāt pāṇau kriyā jāyate yadi api ātmanaḥ sarva aṅge saṃyogaḥ  na viśiṣyate tathā api icchā viśeṣāt utpannaḥ prayatna viśeṣaḥ pāṇau  eva karma karoti na anyatra prayatnavat ātma sa yogāt cakṣuṣaḥ preraṇam yadi api ca anayoḥ prayatnayoḥ na yugapad utpādaḥ tathā api tad atyanta saukṣmyāt kāla bhedaḥ  na lakṣyate nanu ekasmin  ātma pradeśe varttamāna saṃyogaḥ  vā prayatnaḥ  vā katham deśa antare asaṃyogitya prayatnavati kāryam ārabhata iti ata āha na ca ātmanaḥ pradeśāḥ santi iti pariśiṣṭa vārttikam bhāṣya vyākhyayā vyākhyātam iti miśra śrī vācaspati viracitāyām nyāyavārttika tātparyaṭīkāyām caturthodhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ adhyāye āhnike sūtrāṇi prakaraṇāni āhnike sūtrāṇi prakaraṇāni ādita ārabhyamilitvā sūtrāṇi prakaraṇāni **************************************************************************** atha pañcamaḥ  adhyāyaḥ atha pramāṇa ādayaḥ padārthā uddiṣṭā lakṣitāḥ ca tad kim aparam avaśiṣyate yad artham pañcamaḥ  adhyāya ārabhyataityata āha sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthānasya vikalpāt jāti bahutvam iti bhāṣyam tasya artham āha vārttikakāraḥ jāteḥ saṃkṣepeṇa uktāyāḥ  ityādi yadi api jāti nigraha sthāna bhedā jāti nigraha sthāna sāmānya lakṣaṇa anantaram prathame adhyāye yuktā lakṣayitum tathā api eṣām bahu tvāt prameya parīkṣāyām vilambhā umā abhūt apekṣitā ca asau śiṣyaiḥ saṃśaya ādi parīkṣām tu vinā prameya parīkṣā na śakyate tasmāt muniḥ śiṣya anurodhena parīkṣām tāvat varttayām babhūva tad anantaram avaśiṣṭam jāti nigraha sthāna viśeṣa lakṣaṇam varttayati jalpa vitaṇḍā parīkṣā ca anantaram pravṛttā tad aṅgam ca jāti nigraha sthāne iti avāntara saṃṅgatiḥ asti iti sarvam adātam viśeṣa upayogi sāmānya lakṣaṇam āha tatra jātiḥ nāma iti pratiṣedha buddhyā prayukta iti śeṣaḥ āhnika ārambham ākṣipati jāteḥ prayoga pratiṣedhāt iti parivarjanam tu sāmānya jñāna ādipa bhavat na viśeṣa jñānam apekṣata iti bhāvaḥ samādhatte na ārambha prayojanasya ukta tvāt etad eva smārayati svayam ca sukaraḥ prayoga iti prāśnikaiḥ katamā jātiḥ iti ukte svayam ca sukaraḥ prayoga iti atha vā sat vidyā vidviṣā adhikṣipte tatve ahnāya tad nirāsa heta  asphurati sākṣiṇām purata ekānta parājayāt varam saṃdehaḥ  api astu katham citpara parājayovā iti buddhyā pāṃśabhiḥ iva avakiran jātim prayuṅkte tena hi loke tattvam avasthāpitam bhavati anyathā asat mārga pravṛttaḥ  lokaḥ syāt  na ca nakha capeṭa ādibhiḥ vidyā vidveṣiṇaḥ  nirākaraṇe tad utthāpita kuhetu nirākaraṇa dhīḥ asti laukikānām tasmāt na nakha capeṭādaya upadeṣṭavyāḥ śāstra kṛta iti abhiprāyavān āha sādhu sādhana nirākaraṇa artham vā iti atattva viṣaya tvena paramārtha taḥ  asādhu api sādhana mahnāya dūṣaṇasya apratibhāsanāt sādhu iti uktam lābha pūjā khyāti kāmaḥ ca iti anvācaye cakāraḥ prasiddham tāvat tatva paripālane prayojanam tasmin sati etad api anvācīyatā etyarthaḥ mata antaram nirākartum upanyasyati asādhu sādhana iti tattva viṣayam api sādhanam asādhu iti viditavān vāda kāle ca apratibhayā asādhuttva upapādanam na sphurati asādhyetat iti smaran  eva asau jātim prayuṅkte tad idam uktam anabhijña tayā sādhana dośasya iti atha vā jānan  api jātim prayuṅktaḥ  tasya sādhanasya doṣa pradarśana artham prasaṅga vyājena madīyam tāvat dūṣaṇa ābhāsam evam tvadīyam api sādhana ābhāsam yadi tvad sādhanam samyak  tadā madīyam api samyak  syāt iti prasaṅgaḥ tad vyājena sādhanam dūṣayati iti arthaḥ tad etad paramatam dūṣayati etad tu iti jāti abhidhāne hi paryanuyojya upekṣaṇam niranuyojya anuyogaḥ ca iti dvayam nigraha sthānam tasmāt buddhvā iti uktam atha na budhyate tad kim iti jātim prayuñjīta iti yaḥ  hi samādarśana mātrāt pūrva abhyastam api vismarati tasya kā eva kathā ananu saṃhita pūrva jāti udbhāvanasya iti bhāvaḥ etena buddha abuddhā vā iti vikalpā sambhavena anaikāntike sādhane prayukte pañcānām sādharmya sama vaidharmya sama vikalpa sama sādhya sama saṃśaya samānām jātīnām prayogaḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvā para bhāva iti pūrvasya yuktasya sādhanasya yuktam uttaram aparasya ayuktasya sādhanasya ayuktam uttaram iti nanu sādharmya samādi iti ucyate na ca vastutas  sādharmya sama ādīnām sāmyam asti sthāpanayā tathā satyajātitva prasaṅgāt ityata āha samīkaraṇa artham prayoga iti ābhimānikaṃsāmyam na vāstavam iti arthaḥ sādharmyam eva samam yasmin prayoga iti śeṣaḥ tad idam uktam sama arthaḥ sādharmya sama arthaḥ samīkaraṇa arthaḥ prayogaḥ  draṣṭavya iti evam vaidharmyam eva samam iti atra vigrahe sva rūpeṇa sāmyam uktvā viśeṣa hatva bhāvena sāmyam āha viśeṣa hetu abhāvaḥ  vā iti ye tu āhuḥ sarveṣu eva ādapeśeṣu sarvāsām eva jātīnām prayoga iti tān pratyāha sarva apadeśa vyāptiḥ sarva jāti prayogasya apadeśaḥ  hetu vacanam ye punar  sādharmya sama iti ādau sama śabdaḥ tasya sādhana vādi jāti vādinoḥ tulya artha tvāt  yādṛśaḥ  vādī tādṛśaḥ prativādi api sādharmyeṇa dvau samau  iti manyante tān pratyāha na ca vādi prativādinoḥ tulya tā sumārthaḥ prativādī jāti vādī vivakṣitaḥ pratiṣedhau  iti sūtra pūraṇena put liṅgam samarthayate anyathā jāteḥ prakṛta tvāt samāna adhikaraṇyena sādharmya vaidharmya same iti syāt  tad dharma viparyaya upapatteḥ kṛte sādhya viparyaya upapatti artham iti arthaḥ bhāṣye nidarśanam kriyāvān ātmā dravyasya kriyā hetu guṇa yogāt iti asti khalvātmanaḥ kriyā hetuḥ guṇaḥ prayatnaḥ  adṛṣṭam vā loṣṭasya api kriyā hetuḥ guṇaḥ sparśavat vegavat dravya saṃyoga iti evam upasaṃhṛte paraḥ sādharmyeṇa eva pratyavatiṣṭhate niṣkriya ātmā vibhu tvāt ākāśavat iti atra ca sādhanam ābhāsam uttaram ca na jātiḥ vibhu tvasya akriyatvepana svabhāvataḥ pratibandhāt  tena etad upekṣya vārtikakāra udāharaṇa antaram āha yathā anityaḥ śabda utpatti dharmaka tvāt  idam tu samyak sādhanam uttaram tu ābhāsam iti sādharmya ukte sādharmya samaḥ vaidharmya ukte vaidharmya samaḥ evam sādharmya ukte vaidharmya samaḥ vaidharmya ukte sādharmya sama iti katham punar iyam jātiḥ atha prakaraṇa sama udbhāvanam samyak uttaram eva kasmāt na bhavati iti ata āha anayoḥ ca sādharmya vaidharmya samayoḥ uttaram gaḥ tvāt gaḥ siddhivat tad siddhiḥ sū bhavet evam yadi anvaya vyatireka mātrāt hetoḥ gamaka tvam syāt  tatas  viśeṣa grahaṇa abhāvāt prakaraṇa sama tvam bhavet  na tu evam bhavati svābhāvika sambandha bhājaḥ  gamaka tvāt  svabhāva saṃbaddham ca kṛtaka tvam anitya tvena na tu amūrtta tvasya nitya tvena svābhāvikaḥ sambandhaḥ buddhi karma ādau vyabhicārāt  tasmāt gṛhyamāṇa viśeṣa tvāt na prakaraṇa samaḥ yathā gaḥ tvāt gauḥ sidhyati svābhāvika pratibandhāt  na tu sāsnādi saṃbandhāt iti bhāṣyam sāsnādi iti atad guṇa saṃvijñanaḥ  bahuvrīhiḥ tena vyabhicāriṇaḥ śṛṅgāt ayaḥ  gṛhyante vārttikam ekasya ananvayāt ekasya avyāvṛtteḥ ekasya sattvasya gavā ananvayāt  aśva ādau vyabhicārāt ananvayaḥ ekasya ekaśaphatva ādeḥ vaidharmyasya goṣu eva avyāvṛtteḥ mahiṣa ādau  api vyāvṛtteḥ iti arthaḥ sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ dharma vikalpāt ubhaya sādhya tvāt ca utkarṣa apakarṣa varṇyāvarṇya vikalpa sādhya samāḥ sū ubhaya sādhya tvāt sādhya samaḥ pañcānām jātīnām sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ dharma vikalpāt iti anena pañca eva lakṣaṇāni sūcitāni tāni ca jāti samākhyābhiḥ mithas  viśiṣyante anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt  ghaṭavat iti ukte yadā evam prativādī prasaṅgena pratyavatiṣṭhate yadi ghaṭa sādharmyāt kṛtaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ tasmāt eva ghaṭa sādharmyāt rūpa ādimatā api śabdena bhavitavyam na ced rūpa ādimān mā bhūt tathā anityaḥ  api na ca asti viśeṣa hetuḥ kṛtaka tvāt anityena bhavitavyam na punā rūpa ādimata iti saḥ  ayam sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ ddharma vikalpāt vaicitryāt yatra utkarṣam prasañjayati sa utkarṣa samaḥ evam tad eva sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ dharma vaicitryam apakarṣeṇa viśiṣyamāṇam apakarṣa samasya lakṣaṇam sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ dharma vaicitryāt svarūpeṇā sādhya asādhanatva prasaṅga janane varṇyāvarṇya samau sādhya dṛṣṭānta dharma vikalpa hetuka varṇyatva nibandhanam tu hetu ādi avayava ugitva prasañjanam sādhya samaḥ ata eva ubhaya sādhyat tvāt iti sādhya tvam hetumāhamādhya samasya sūtra kāraḥ bhāṣya kāraḥ  api hetu ādi avayava sāmarthya yogī iti bruvāṇaḥ tad prasañjanam sādhya samam manyate tad etad vārttika kṛt āha ghaṭā vā anitya iti atra kaḥ  hetuḥ iti na ca yadi samākhyā bhedena viśiṣyamāṇam lakṣaṇa padam bhinna artham tarhi samākhyā padāni eva lakṣaṇāni santu kṛtam lakṣaṇa padena iti vācyam lakṣaṇa pada sahitānām eva teṣām lakṣya bheda pratipādaka tvāt iti āsām ṣaṇṇām jātīnām pratyākhyānam kiñcid sādharmyāt upasaṃhāra siddheḥ vaidharmyāt apratiṣedhaḥ sū yasya dharmiṇaḥ sādhya dharmeṇa svābhāvika saṃbandhaḥ sādhakaḥ  dharma upapadyata aupapannaḥ  bhavati sa dharmaḥ tasya sādhya dharmasya sādhanam sādhya dharthmaṇī upasaṃhviyate tathā ca śabdena iti upanaya padena iti arthaḥ yad punar etad vibhāga jā vibhagaja vikalpavat nitya anitya vikalpa iti tatra āha yathā utpatti dhamraka tvam anvaya vyatireki na evam vibhāga ja tvam ayam arthaḥ vikalpa samam uttaram vadatā hi yathā sati utpattimat tve ghaṭaḥ  na vibhāga jaḥ iti vyavasthitaḥ  vikalpaḥ evam sati utpattimat tve sati api vibhāga javat śabdaḥ  api nityaḥ  bhaviṣyati ghaṭaḥ tu anitya iti uktam tatra tāvat utpatti dharmaka tvam yathā satya nitya tve ghaṭa ādau dṛṣṭam ākāśa ādiṣu ca asatya nitya tve na dṛṣṭam tena anitya tvena svabhāva pratibaddham avadhāritam na evam utpatti dharmaka tvasya vibhāga ja tu ena avibhāga ja tvena vā svābhāvika saṃbandhaḥ  gṛhītaḥ  yena utpattimat kim cit vibhāga jam kim cit avibhāga jam na bhavet  tasmā dvi kalpa samam jāti uttaram vadatā ati nirbandhena vibhāga ja tvena śabdasya nitya tvam vaktavyam tatra dam upatiṣṭhate yathā utpatti dharmaka tvam anvaya vyatirekya nitya tvam prati na evam vibhāga ja tvam śabda nitya tvam pratyanvayavyatireki iti tad hi asādhāraṇam iti arthaḥ asādha araṇyam āha na hi kim cit śabdāt anyat vibhāgāt jāyamānam nitya māna tvam vā dṛṣṭam nanu vibhāga jaḥ  vibhāgaḥ  anitya uva dṛṣṭa iti ata āha tha ukta viśeṣaṇam iti kāraṇa mātra vibhāga pūrvakaḥ śabdaḥ  vibhāga jaḥ tu vibhāgaḥ kāraṇa akāraṇa vibhāga pūrvakaḥ iti siddham kāraṇa mātra vibhāga pūrvaka tvam asādhāraṇam iti arthaḥ ṣaṇṇām jātīnām pratyākhyānam uktvā varṇyāvarṇī asādhya samānām aparam pratyākhyānam āha sādhya atideśāt ca dṛṣṭānta upapatteḥ sū iti tad vyācaṣṭe dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya iti bruvata iti caturdaśavidha jāti vādinām iha dūṣaṇam upanyasyati yad tu atra uktam jātīnām paunaruktyam iti lakṣaṇa bhedābhyām kila lakṣya bheda abhedau lakṣaṇam ca idam ekam iti na ṣaṣ jātayaḥ tasmāt vikalpa samāyām iva utkarṣa sama ādīnām antarbhāva iti arthaḥ dūṣayati na paunaruktyam tad tad lakṣya pada sahitāni pañca lakṣaṇāni ubhaya sādhya tvāt ca iti anena saha lakṣaṇāni ṣaṣ iti na kevalam lakṣya bhedāt prayoga bheda darśanāt ca śaṅkate yadi lakṣya bhedāt jāti bhedaḥ tata ānantyam iti ced  nirākaroti na anavadhāraṇāt iti na lakṣyāṇām avadhāraṇam asti eṣām ānantyāt  lakṣaṇa upagraheṇa caturviṃśatiḥ jātaya iti arthaḥ lakṣyāṇām lakṣaṇa abhede api bhede nidarśanam āha tathā hi prakaraṇa sama eka iti sugamam itarat  prāpti aprāpti samau  iti lakṣya padam śeṣam lakṣaṇam asat sādhyate na tu sat  prāptam sat  asataḥ prāpti asaṃbhavāt tasmāt na sādhyam api ca yena yasya prāptiḥ tena gaṅgā sāgaram prāptā sāgareṇa saṅga tā sāgareṇa abhinnā tadvat eva abhinne ced sādhya sādhane na asti sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ tasya bheda adhiṣṭhāna tvāt iti api draṣṭavyam aprāpti samaḥ tu sphuṭa eva iti nanu prāpti aprāpti samayoḥ militayoḥ sādhana pratiṣedhasya ekatvāt  katham prāpti aprāpti samau bhinnau  ityata āha anayoḥ bheda upadeśaḥ  vivakṣāta iti sādhana pratiṣedhasya ekatve api prāpya vā aprāpya vā iti vikalpa bhedāt bheda vivakṣā iti arthaḥ abheda vivakṣāyām tu ekam eva uttaram yathā vṛkṣāṇām bahu tvam vivakṣitvā bahuvacana prayogaḥ  vṛkṣā iti tad bahutva saṃkhyāyā  eka tvam vivakṣitvā eka vacanam ekam vanam iti udāharaṇena sādharmyaṃvaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthānam iti jāti sāmānya lakṣaṇam manvānaḥ  deśayati jāti lakṣaṇa abhāvāt iti pariharati na sūtra artha aparijñānāt iti sūtre na udāharaṇa sādharmyam vivakṣitam api tu yena kena cit vidyamānena asādhyena sādharmyam aprāptena vā hetunā sādhamaryam iti na sāmānya lakṣaṇā yoga iti pratyākhyānam ghaṭa ādi niṣpatti darśanāt iti sūtram tad vyācaṣṭe mṛd piṇḍa prāptānām daṇḍa ādīnām na gaṅgāsāgaravat aviśeṣaḥ mṛd avayavāḥ pūrva vyūha parityāgena iti sādhyam karma tad ca mṛd avayavāḥ te ca siddhā eva iti avyabhicāraḥ ghaṭaḥ tu phalam na sādhya iti bhāvaḥ kaḥ  aprāpti artha iti aprāptasya sādhaka tve ati prasaṅgaḥ iti bhāvaḥ uttaram paraspara upaśleṣam antareṇa sādhaka tvam iti anyathā tu uddeśena ayam prāpta eva yad uddeśena abhicāraḥ śyena ādinā kriyate tasya eva pratyavāyaḥ  bhavati na anyasya iti niyamaḥ atra api hetu tvam kriyām prati dṛṣṭam yathā paṅka ākhyāyām bhuvi sugamam anyat  dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇa anapadeśāt pratyavasthānāt ca pratidṛṣṭāntena prasaṅga pratidṛṣṭānta samau sū dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇam pramāṇam tasya anapadeśāt prasaṅga pa samaḥ sādhya samaḥ  hi dṛṣṭānte sādhyavat hetu ādi avayavam prasañjayati pañca avayava prayoga sādhyatām dṛṣṭāntasya gatasya anitya tvasya prasañjayati iti arthaḥ prasaṅga samaḥ tu dṛṣṭānta gatasya anitya tvasya pramāṇa mātra sādhyatām iti apaunaruktyam bhāṣyam sādhanasya api dṛṣṭānta gatasya anitya tvaspaya sādhanam pramāṇam vācyam iti vārttikam ghaṭa eva tāvat anitya iti atra kaḥ  hetuḥ iti atra kim pramāṇam iti arthaḥ bhāṣyam pratidṛṣṭānta udāhniyate kiṃyā hetu guṇa yuktam ākāśam akriyam dṛṣṭam tasmāt anena pratidṛṣṭāntena kasmāt  kriyā hetu guṇa yogaḥ  niṣkriya tvam eva na sādhayati ātmana iti śeṣaḥ yadi punar iyama naika anitaka deśanā syāt  kriyā hetu guṇa yuktasya api akriya tvam dṛṣṭam yathā ākāśasya iti tad  etad sat uttaram syāt  na tu evam etad iti jātiḥ śaṅkate vāyu ākāśa saṃyogasya iti nirākaroti na tad samāna dharma upapatteḥ tad samāna dharmaṇaḥ  dharmiṇaḥ kriyāvattva upapatteḥ yadi tathābhūta eva ākāśe kasmāt na karoti iti ata āha yaḥ tu asau  iti yaḥ tu manyate kārya utpāda aikya vyaṅnyam eva kāraṇam na dṛṣṭa kārya kāraṇa sādharmya vyaṅnyam api iti tasya dūṣaṇāni āha yadi ca iti yadi prajñāpana artham uttaram na aprajñātaḥ  dṛṣṭāntaḥ tatra laukika parīkṣakāṇām buddhi sāmyāt iti śeṣaḥ sa ca katham aheḥ tuna syāt iti katham hetuḥ syāt iti abhyupagamāt iti madīyasya ca dṛṣṭāntasya abhyupagamāt na tvadīyaḥ  dṛṣṭānta iti arthaḥ atha evam prayuṅkte yathā madīyaḥ na dṛṣṭāntaḥ tathā tvadīya iti tathā api vyāghātān na dṛṣṭāntaḥ  madīyasya adṛṣṭānta tve sādhye pratidṛṣṭāntena hi tena madīyasyā dṛṣṭānta tā sādhyā sa ced na dṛṣṭāntaḥ madīpasya adṛṣṭānta tā sādhyeti vyāhatam iti arthaḥ udāharaṇa puraḥsaram bhāṣya kāraḥ  vyācaṣṭe anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt  ghaṭavat iti ukta iti tad aśrāvāt kāraṇa abhāvāt anitya tvasya kāryasya abhāve nitya tvam prāptam nityatva anitya tvābhyām rāśi antara abhāvāt iti tasya pratyākhyānam tathā bhāva āpad utpannasya kāraṇa upapatteḥ na kāraṇa pratiṣedhaḥ sū nitya tvena hi śabdasya dharmeṇa anutpattyā pratyavastheyam na ca anutpannaḥ śabda iti nitya iti ca anutpatti dharmaka iti ca sambhavati utpannaḥ tṛd patti dharmā ca śabdaḥ ca ani tyaḥ ca iti na anutpattyā śakyam pratyavasthātum iti arthaḥ kāraṇa upapatteḥ iti prayatna ānantarīyaka tvasya pratiṣedha iti arthaḥ yad uktam kāraṇa abhāvāt anitya tvasya kāryasya abhāve nitya tvam prāptam iti tatra āha vārtikakāraḥ jñāpakaḥ ca ayam hetuḥ na kāraka iti kārakaḥ  hi hetuḥ nivartamānaḥ sva kāryam nivartayati na tujñāpakaḥ tad abhāve api bhūmau cira nikhātānām nidhi ādīnām anivṛtteḥ iti tatas ca viśeṣaṇa manarthakam prāk utpatteḥ ati prāc asataḥ  hi sattā sambandha utpattiḥ prāk api ced asau  abhyupagataḥ prāk iti viśeṣaṇam anarthakam utpatteḥ abhāve sadā eva anutpatti dharmaka tvāt iti arthaḥ apare tu prāk utpatteḥ kāraṇa abhāvāt iti ukte arthāpatti samaiveyam jātiḥ iti matvā asyāḥ  uttaram āhuḥ yadā evaṃmucyeta prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabda iti tad arthāt aprayatna anantarīyaka tve nitya tvam uktam bhavati iti artha āpattitaḥ pratipakṣa siddheḥ arthāpatti samaiveyam jātiḥ iti abhimānaḥ evam kṛte ta eva asyām jātau  uttaram bruvate na ayam niyama iti tad etad pareṣām matam dūṣayati etad tu iti śaṅkate jāti lakṣaṇa abhāvāt na iyam jātiḥ iti ced  sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthānam jātiḥ na ca anutpatti samāyāḥ sādharmyam vaidharmyam vā asti kena cit iti arthaḥ nirākaroti na anutpannaiḥ ahetubhiḥ sārūpyāt iti yathā anutpannāḥ tantavaḥ  na paṭasya kāraṇam tathā śabda utpatteḥ prāk anutpannam prayatna anantarīyaka tvam na anitya tvasya kāraṇam iti sādharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam iti asti sāmānya lakṣaṇam iti arthaḥ etāvatā ca arthāpatti samāyā anutpatti samātaḥ bhedaḥ  darśitaḥ iha anutpannaiḥ ahetubhiḥ sāmyena kārya pratiṣedhāt  arthāpatti samāyām vākya artha viparīta āropeṇa pratiṣedhāt iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvasya hetoḥ ghaṭa iti yathā hi viśeṣa darśanam niścayasya kāraṇam asti iti niścaya utpattiḥ eva sādharmya darśana mātram asti saṃśayasya kāraṇam iti saṃśayena api bhavitavyam iti arthaḥ sūtra artha prayojanam ākṣepa samādhānābhyām sphuṭīkaroti saṃśaya samā sādharmya samāyā iti asya pratyākhyāna sūtram sādharmyāt saṃśaye na saṃśayaḥ  vaidharmyāduśrayathā vā saṃśaye atyanta saṃśaya prasaṅgaḥ  nityatva anabhyupagamāt ca sāmānyasya apratiṣedhaḥ sū na sāmānya darśana mātram saṃśayasya kāraṇam api tu viśeṣa adarśana sahitam viśeṣa darśane tu tad rahitam na kāraṇam iti sūtra arthaḥ ubhayathā vā iti sādharmya viśeṣa darśanābhyām iti arthaḥ nityatva anabhyupagamāt ca sāmānyasya iti nityam saṃśaya kāraṇatva anabhyupagamāt sādharmi asya iti arthaḥ upalakṣaṇam ca etad  ubhaya sādharmyāt iti ubhaya vaidharmyāt iti api draṣṭavyam etad vyācaṣṭe bhāṣya kāraḥ ubhayena nityena ca anityena ca iti dvitīyaḥ ca nitya sādharmyāt pratipakṣam pravartayati nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇa tvāt śabda tvavat iti atha dvitīya sādhana pravṛttau prathamasya sādhanasya kim bhavati iti ata āha evam ca sati prayatna aṃnantarīyaka tvāt iti hetuḥ anitya sādharmyeṇa ucyamānaḥ  na prakaraṇam ativartate mā ativarttiṣṭa prakaraṇam kaḥ  doṣa iti ata āha prakaraṇa anati vṛtteḥ nirṇaya anativarttanam nirṇaya aniṣpattiḥ iti arthaḥ evam ānitya sādhana vādinam pratyuttaram darśayitvā nitya sādhana vādinam pratyāha samānam ca etad nitya sādharmyeṇa ucyamāna iti tad evam sādharmyeṇa prakaraṇa sama dvayam uktam tathā vaidharmyeṇa prakaraṇa sama dvayam nitya anitya sādhana vādinau  eva pratyāha samānam ca etad iti ubhaya vaidharmyāt iti nitya ākāśa vaidharmyāt kṛtaka tvāt anitya ghaṭa vaidharmyāt ca asparśavat tvāt iti tad evam prakaraṇa sama catuṣṭayam pūrva pakṣa vārttikam saṃśaya sama sādharmya samābhyām iti pariharati na ubhaya pakṣa sādharmyāt tad bheda upapattiḥ iti prakaraṇa same hi sva pakṣa niścayena mayā vādi pakṣa sādhanam dūṣaṇīyam iti buddhyā pravarttate sādharmya sama saṃśaya samayoḥ tu vādi sādhanena sāmya mātra āpādanena tad dūṣaṇam na tu pratipakṣa niścayena iti viśeṣaḥ iha tu sāmya mātra āpādanam na sādhanena kim tu dūṣaṇaiḥ iti etāvatā sama arthaḥ prayogaḥ sama iti boddhavyam asya pratyākhyānam pratipakṣāt prakaraṇa siddheḥ pratiṣedha anupapattiḥ pratipakṣa upapatteḥ sū dvayoḥ sādhanayoḥ tad ānīma gṛhyamāṇa viśeṣayoḥ kaḥ  ayam abhimānaḥ prativādinaḥ  yad mayā svapakṣa sādhanena eva vādinaḥ sādhanam dūṣaṇīyam iti samāna balayoḥ ced ayam ātmīyāt sādhanāt sva pakṣa siddhipam icchati atas  anicchan  api vādinā api sādhanāt siddhim abhyupagamayitavyaḥ anyathā sva sādhanāt sādhya siddhim upajīvya vyaktam iyam rājaṅkula sthitiḥ iti evam vyavasthite sūtra bhāṣye yojayitavye pratipakṣāt pratipakṣa sādhanāt prakaraṇasya prakriyamāṇasya sādhyasya iti yāvat  siddheḥ samānāt  sva sādhanāt  pratiṣedhasya prativādi sādhanasya sva sādhya siddhi dvāreṇa parakīya sādhana pratiṣedhasya anupapattiḥ kasmāt pratiṣedhān upapattiḥ iti ata uktam pratipakṣa upapatteḥ phalataḥ parakīya sādhanasya samānāt sva sādhanāt prakriyā siddhim sva sādhya siddhim bruvatā pratipakṣāt prakriyā siddhiḥ uktā bhavati prativādinā nanu evam prakaraṇa samāvhayaḥ  hetvābhāsaḥ  na udbhāvanīyaḥ prativādinā jāti uttara prasaṅgāt ityata āha tattva anavadhāraṇāt ca prakriyā siddhiḥ sva sādhya nirṇayena para sādhya vighaṭana buddhyā prativādinā sādhanam prayujyamānam prakaraṇa sama jāti uttaram bhavati sat pratipakṣa tayā vādinaḥ sādhanam aniścāyakam karomi iti buddhyā pratipakṣa sādhanam prayuñjānaḥ  na jāti vādī sat uttara vādi tvāt sat pratipakṣatāyā hetu doṣasya anaikāntika ādivat upapādita tvāt  tattva anavadhāraṇāt iti anena prakaraṇa sama udāharaṇam darśitam vārtikam viruddha avyabhicāryeṣa ukta uttara iti tulya balayoḥ ekatarasmāt su asādhya siddhim abhyupagacchatoḥ dvayoḥ api phalataḥ vyabhicāraḥ sidhyati na ca viruddha avyabhicārī sambhavati avyabhicāraḥ  hi avinābhāvaḥ sa ca pañca rūpa sampattiḥ catū rūpa sampattiḥ vā na viruddha avyabhicāriṇi sā asti iti arthaḥ sūtra ābhāṣya vārtikāni pramāṇa sāmānya parīkṣā vyākhyānena vyākhyātāni udāharaṇa puraḥsaram sūtram yojayati anityaḥ śabda iti anitya sādharmyāt anityam śabdam bruvāṇaḥ  bhavān anakṣaram nitya sādharmyāt nitya tvam śabdasya brūtaityarthaḥ na sādharmya samādau vādī abhiprāya varṇanam iti atas bhedaḥ asya pratyādeśa sūtram anuktasya arthāpatteḥ pakṣa hāneḥ upapattiḥ anukta tvāt anaikāntikattvāt ca arthāpatteḥ sū tad vyācaṣṭe anupapādya sāmarthyam iti tad eva khalu anuktam vacanāt labhyate yad kalpana manteraṇa vacana arthaḥ  na ghaṭate yathā pīnaḥ  devadattaḥ  divā na bhuṅktaiti ukte rātrau bhuṅkta iti yathā vā yāgena svargam bhāvayet iti ukte antara apūrvam kṛtvā iti vākya artha upapādane tasya sāmarthyāt  na tu avyabhicāriṇaḥ sādharmyāt sādhye sādhyamāne arthāt uktam bhavati vyabhicāriṇā api sādharmyeṇa sādhayitavyam iti tasya vākya artha upapādane asāmarthyāt  tad antareṇa vākya artha upapatteḥ yadi punar anupalabdha sāmarthyam anuktam api gamyeta tatas tvayā nityatva āpādane śabdasya ucyamāne anucyamānam anitya tvam pratyetavyam tathā ca bhavat abhimatasya nitya tvasya vyāvṛttiḥ tad idam āha anitya pakṣasya anuktasya siddhau  arthāt āpannam nitya pakṣasya hāniḥ iti viparyayeṇa api pratyavasthāna sambhavāt  anaikāntika tvam āha ubhaya pakṣa samā ca iyam iti vyabhicārāt ca anaikāntika tvam āha na ca iyam vipayarya mātrāt iti na hi bhojana niṣedhāt eva abhojana viparītam sarvatra kalpate dhana tvam hi grāvṇaḥ patana anukūla gurutva atiśaya sūcana artham na tu itareṣām patanam vārayati vārtikam su bodham yadi ghaṭa sādharmyāti aprayatna anantarīyaka tvāt  ghaṭena aviśeṣaḥ  anityatva ākhyaḥ śabdasya sattvāt sādharmyāt sarveṣām sarva aviśeṣa prasaṅgaḥ na tu evam yathā prayana anantarīyaka tvāt api sādharmyāt na śabda ghaṭayoḥ anitya tvam aviśeṣa iti pratiṣedhaḥ  aviśeṣa samaḥ aviśeṣa iti asya vivaraṇam ubhayoḥ anityatva iti deśyam vārtikam sādharmya samātaḥ na bhidyate iti parihāra vārttikam na eka samasta iti asya pratyādeśa sūtram kva cit tad dharma anupapatteḥ kva cit ca upapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ sū kva cit sādharmye prayatna anantarīyakatva ādau sati śabda ādeḥ ghaṭa ādinā saha tad dharmasya ghaṭa dharmasya anitya tvasya upapatteḥ kva cit sādharmye śabdasya bhāva mātreṇa saha sattva ādau bhāva mātra dharmasya anupapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāva iti yojanā etad uktam bhavati avinā abhāva sampannam sādharmyam gamakam na tu sādharmya mātram iti sadbhāvaḥ  papatti nimittam iti sadbhāva vyāpakam iti arthaḥ atra antare vaināśikaḥ sattā vyāpakam anitya tvam manvānaḥ  deśayati atha matam anitya tvam eva dharma antaram iti nirākaroti evam khalu vai kalpyamāna iti pūrva pakṣa uttara pakṣa pava nirvāhaḥ tṛtīye prapañcitaḥ api ca santaḥ ke cana pramāṇa avadhṛta nitya tvāḥ yathā ākāśa ādigātma paramāṇavaḥ ke cit pramāṇa viniścitā anityabhāvā yathā ghaṭa ādayaḥ tasmāt sattvam anaikāntika tvāt asādhakam iti āha sataḥ ca nitya aniti abhāvāt iti api ca yad pratiṣedhāya prasaṅga āpādanam tad eva pratiṣedhyam sādhayati na tu niṣedhati iti āha sarva bhāvānām sadbhāva upapatteḥ iti vārtikam kva cit sādharmyam upalabhyata iti vyāpyatayā iti śeṣaḥ atha śabda varjamucyata iti tatra āha vyarthaṃvā sarva bhāva grahaṇam uktaḥ ca viśeṣaḥ  anvaya vyatireka saṃpannaḥ  hetuḥ iti prayatna antarīyaka tvam na tu uttaraḥ sadbhāva upapatteḥ iti anvaya vyatireka sampanna iti yadi anityatva kāraṇam prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam upapadyate tad asti śabdasya iti anityaḥ śabda iti prakaraṇa samāyām jātau pakṣa pratipakṣa sādhanayoḥ samāna bala tve api prativādi svāsādhana asu apakṣa siddhpavayā vādi sādhana dūṣaṇe pravarttate upapatti samāyām tu sva sādhanena eva iti viśeṣaḥ asya pratyādeśa sūtram upapatti kāraṇa abhyanujñānāt apratiṣedhaḥ sū vādī abhimatasya sādhanasya upapattau yad kāraṇam tasvaya prativādinā abhyanujñānāt iti bhāvaḥ prakaraṇa sama pratyākhyānavat asya api pratayā ākhyānam draṣṭavyam sugame bhāṣya vārttike anityatva kāraṇasya iti jñāpakasya iti arthaḥ nanu yad vṛtta yoga prāthamyayoḥ sādhana dharmaḥ  viṣayaḥ  na tu sādhya dharmaḥ sa hi tad vṛtta yogasya viṣayaḥ evam prayujyate yaḥ  yaḥ prayatna anantarīyakaḥ sa sarvaḥ  anityaḥ anena hi prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam anityāt anyatas  vyāvarttitam anitya tvam tu aniyatam sa yadi aprayatna ānantarīyake śabde anyatra vā bhavet  kaḥ prayatna ānantarīyakattvasya anityatva niyama virodhaḥ evam hi sa bhavet  yadi nityaḥ  api prayatna ānantarīyakaḥ  dṛśyeta na tu evam asti tasmāt upalabdhi samāyā utthānam eva na asti bīja abhāvāt ityata āha vārtikakāraḥ sarva sādhya adhyāropeṇa avyāpaka tvam sādhanasya iti upalabdhi sama arthaḥ yadi api varṇa ātmakaḥ śabdaḥ  ani tya tvena sādhya tayā vivakṣitaḥ prakaraṇāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt  ghaṭavat iti tathā api śabda mātram anena pakṣīkṛtam iti āropya bhāga asiddhatva āropaṇam sādhanasya iti upalabdhi sama arthaḥ samāropam eva udāharaṇa antareṇa darśayati sarvam anityam iti śabdaḥ nitya iti pratijñāyām api sarvam anityam itna pavayā āropya iti yojanā bhāṣya kāra udāharaṇa apatita upaḥ ca udāharaṇa antara pradarśana bījam yaḥ tu anityaḥ śabda iti pratijñāyām sarva anititva āropaḥ  nirbīja iti na tuṣyati tam pratyāha śrūyamāṇā iti yadi api anityaḥ śabda iti śrūyate tathā api sāmarththa ādādya iti vivakṣitaḥ śabda antara utpādaka tvam sajātīya utpādaka tvam iti evam ca na ayoga vyavacchedena śabda anitya tvam hetuḥ avyāpaka tvāt  na api anya yoga vyavacchedena hetu antarasya vidyamāna tvāt iti jāti vādinaḥ  abhisaṃdhiḥ iti asya pratayā ākhyāna sūtram kāraṇa antarāt api tad dharmoya patteḥ apratiṣedhaḥ sū tad vyācaṣṭe prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt iti bruvata iti kāraṇataḥ prayatnāt śabdasya utpatti niyamaḥ  vidhīyate varṇānām anitya tvaṃva sādhayitum na tu kāryasya kāraṇa niyamaḥ prayatnāt eva sarvaḥ śabdaḥ  jāyate na tu vāyu saṃyogāt vṛkṣa bhaṅgāt iti niyama ucyate yena avyāpaka tvam hetoḥ syāt iti sūtra arthaḥ tu kāraṇa antarāt api jñāpaka antarāt api tad dharma upapatteḥ sādhya dharma upapatteḥ apratiṣedha iti etad eva vārttikakāraḥ  vyācaṣṭe anityaḥ śabda iti bruvatā prayatna anantarīyaka tvena iti śeṣaḥ sādhya antarāṇām śākhā bhaṅga ja śabdānām kāraṇam anityatva jñāpakam na pratiṣidhyate yadi apakṣīkṛtānām api kāraṇa antarāt anitya tvam bhavati kāmam bhavatu iti arthaḥ na api śabdasya sādhyasya anitya tve kāraṇa antaram pratayaya bheda bheditva ādi pratiṣidhyate eka deśi matam āha apare tu parihāram bruvate yad eva prayatna ānantarīya kamitañ tidetat pava dūṣayati etad tu na avivādāt iti ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvam hi koṣṭhyasya vāyoḥ kriyāyāḥ sā hi prayatnavat ātma saṃyogāt jāyate vāyoḥ punar uraḥsthāna ādiṣu saṃyoga vibhāgāt ayaḥ  na prayatna anantarīyakāḥ prāk eva tu śabdaḥ yadā ca ādya śabdasya iyam gatiḥ tadā kā eva katha prayatna ānantarīyaka tve antyasya śravaṇa vivara samavāyinaḥ śrūyamāṇsya śabdasya tasmāt yaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvam śabdaspaya vinā pramāṇena pratipadyate na tam prati kim cit sādhyate pramāṇena pramāṇa an adhīnasya pratibhāsa mātreṇa prameya siddheḥ sarvatra sulabhatavāt iti tad anena aparitoṣa bīja m uktam abhyupetya śabdasya prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam āha yadā tu prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam iti deśayati jāti iti pariharati na iti anupalabdhi sama pratiṣedhasya lakṣaṇam darśayitum tad pratiṣedhyam tāvat āha bhāṣya kāraḥ na prāk uccāraṇāt vidyamānasya anupalabdhiḥ iti tasmāt udaka ādivat āvaraṇa ādiḥ asya anupalambha kāraṇam bhavati iti ata āha gṛhyeta ca etad asya agrahaṇa kāraṇam iti pratiṣedhyam utkvā pratiṣedhasya jāteḥ lakṣaṇam āha tad anupalabdheḥ anupalambhāt abhāva siddhau tad viparīta upapatteḥ anupalabdhi samaḥ sū vyācaṣṭe teṣām āvaraṇa ādīnām anupalabdhiḥ na upapadyate upalabhyamāna tve upalabdhi rūpa tayā anupalabdhitva anupapatteḥ tathā ca anupalabdheḥ anupalambhāt anupalabdhiḥ na asti iti āvaraṇa ādi upalabdhi siddhiḥ iti āvaraṇa iva āvaraṇa anupalabdhiḥ api anupalabdhi sama iti arthaḥ asya pratyādeśa sūtram anupalambha ātmaka tvāt anupalabdheḥ ahetuḥ sū āvaraṇa ādi anupalabdhiḥ āvaraṇa ādīnām abhāvam gamayati na tu ātmanaḥ  abhāvam āvaraṇa ādi upalabdhi rūpam na hi asau  anupalabdhiḥ api ātmanaḥ  yena ātma abhāvam gamayet  upalabdhiḥ api upalabhya viṣayā na ātma viṣayā kim punar anupalabdhiḥ tasmāt anupalabdhiḥ upalabhya abhāva hetuḥ na hetuḥ ātma abhāvasya tathā sati sā eva na syāt iti na syāt upalabhya abhāvaḥ  api iti āvaraṇam tad upalabdhinaḥ ca syāt iti tad idam āha bhāṣya kāraḥ anupalambhāt iti ayamahetuḥ iti kasmāt  anupalambha ātmaka tvāt anupalabdheḥ etad vyācaṣṭe upalambha abhāva mātra tvāt iti mātra grahaṇena jāti vādi abhimata ātmā bhāva rūpa tām vyavacchinatti nanu iyam anupalabdhiḥ bhavatu upalambha abhāvaḥ  mā ca bhūt upalabhyasya kim āyātam āvaraṇa ādi abhāvasya ityata āha yad asti tad upalabdheḥ viṣaya upalabdhyā tad asti iti vijñāyate na punar anupalabdheḥ anupalambha ātma tayā tad pratijñeyam iti bhāvaḥ anupalabdheḥ prajñā iyam āha yajñāsti saḥ  anupalabdheḥ iti nanu jñāyatām kim etāvatā api iti ata āha saḥ  ayam āvaraṇa ādi anupalabdheḥ anupalambha iti tvayā hi jāti vādinā āvaraṇa ādi anupalabdheḥ anupalambhena āvaraṇa upalambham āvaraṇam ca prasañjayatā anupalambhasya sva viṣaya lopena pratayavastheyam evam ced varam asya āvaraṇa tad upalambhau viṣayau evam anena bhāva abhāva buddhi vyapadeśa vyavahārāḥ sakala loka yātrā vāhinaḥ  anukūlitā bhavanti tad idam uktam saḥ  ayam āvaraṇa ādi anupalabdheḥ anupalambha āvaraṇa upalambha niṣedha viṣayam pramāṇam upalabdhi abhāve anupalabdhau sva viṣaye pravarttamānaḥ  na sva viṣaya manupalabdhim pratiṣedhati api tu upalabdhim eva jāti vādinaḥ tu niṣedhyeta tathā ca sarva loka vyavahāraḥ samucchidyeta iti bhāvaḥ apratiṣiddhā ca āvaraṇa ādyavanupalabdhi rāvaṇa ādīnām abhāvam prati hetu tvāya kalpate nanu ca na anupalambha mātram abhāva graha hetuḥ mā bhūt candramasaḥ para bhāge hariṇa sadasadbhāva saṃśaya iti ata āha āvaraṇa ādīni tu iti upalabhyam vā upalabdhiḥ vā na anupalambha mātrāt na asti iti sidhyati api tu darśana yogyam sat iti na ati prasaṅga iti arthaḥ nanu upalabdheḥ sva viṣayasya pratipādikāyāḥ  abhāvāt āvaraṇa ādayaḥ  mā nāma upalabhyantām abhāvaḥ tu teṣām kutastya iti ata āha anupalambhāt pratiṣedhakāt pramāṇāt anupalabdheḥ yaḥ  viṣayaḥ upalabhya abhāvaḥ sa gamyate na santi āvaraṇa ādīni śabdasya agraha kāraṇāni iti tad kim idānīm sākṣāt eva upalambha niṣedhakam pramāṇam upalabhya abhāvam gamayati na iti āha anupalambhāt  upalabdhi niṣedhakāt pramāṇāt anupalabdhiḥ āvaraṇasya sidhyati kasmāt ityata āha viṣayaḥ sa tasya upalabdhi niṣedhakasya pramāṇasya anupalabdhiḥ tatas ca āvaraṇa ādi abhāva iti draṣṭavyam na kevalam niṣedha viṣaya pramāṇa gamyatā anupalabdheḥ upapatti gamyā api tu sarva jana pratyātma vedanīyā iti āha sūtra kāraḥ jñāna vikalpānām ca bhāva abhāva saṃvenāt adhyātmam sū vyācaṣṭe ahetuḥ iti vartate śarīra iti prāc uccāraṇāt  śabdasya anupalabdheḥ asattve sādhyamāne anaikāntika tvam syāt  yadi tu paścāt viśiṣyeta āvaraṇa ādi asaṃbhave sati iti tatas  hetu antaram nāma nigraha sthānam syāt iti āśaṅkya vārtikakāra āha āvaraṇa ādi asaṃbhave sattva abhyupagame ca sati anupalabdheḥ iti prayogaḥ sattva abhyupagame ca iti asya upādāna prayojanam āha āvaraṇa ādi asaṃbhave sattva abhyupagame viparyayasya avyabhicārāt na arthāpatti samaḥ ayam arthaḥ yadi āvaraṇa asaṃbhave sati anupalabdheḥ iti ucyamāne kaścid artha āpati samayā jātyā pratyavatiṣṭhate āvaraṇa ādi asaṃbhave sati anupalabdheḥ iti ucyamāne arthāt āpatitam āvaraṇa ādi saṃbhave sati upalabdheḥ iti yadā tu sattva ādi abhyupagama iti viṣaya viparyayassūcyate tad āvaraṇa ādyasa bhave sati anupalabdheḥ asattvam iti asya viparyaya evam prayoktavyaḥ sattva upagame ca āvaraṇa ādi asaṃbhave sati upalabhyeta iti asya viparyayasya avyabhicārāt  na arthāpatti sama iti arthaḥ asti ghaṭena anityena sarva bhāvānām sattvam sādharmyam iti asya pratyākhyāna sūtram sādharmyāt asiddheḥ pratiṣedha asiddhiḥ pratiṣedhya sādharmyāt ca sū tad idam jāti vādinā sāmyam āpādya parama artha pratiṣedham āha dṛṣṭānte ca sādhya sādhana bhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya hetu tvāt tasya ca ubhayatha abhāva at na aviśeṣaḥ sū sādharmyā mātram ca aśriti asādhyā vinā abhāva rahitam iti deśya vārtti kam aviśeṣa samāta iti pariharati bhidyata iti yad ca aviśeṣa samauttaram iti sarva anitya tvam hi prasañjayatā na śabda anitya tvam niṣiddham bhavati iti tatra uktam iti arthaḥ atra śaṅkate nāsādhanāt iti pariharati na viśeṣa hetu upapatteḥ iti sugamam anyat  dharmasya sarvadā bhāvāt dharmiṇaḥ  api sarvadā bhāvaḥ na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ sāmānya samavāya atirikta dharmā nityā dharmī ca anitya iti asya pratyādeśa sūtram pratiṣedhye nityam anitya bhāvāt anitye nityatva upapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ sū nityam anitya bhāvāt iti hetoḥ abhyupagame anabhyupagame ca doṣa iti arthaḥ utpannasya nirodhāt abhāvaḥ śabdasya anitya tvam tatra ca paripraśna anupapattiḥ yadi hi nirodhakāt abhāvaḥ  anitya tvam tathā api praśna anupapattiḥ atha api asmad mate samavāyaḥ tathā api tad anupapattiḥ anitya tvam hi śabdasya aparānta ava cchinna sattā samavāyaḥ na ca asau śabda ādheyaḥ tasya svatantra tvāt eva iti arthaḥ vārtikam pṛthak adharma tvena anitya tvasya anabhyupagamāt iti anātyantika sattā samavāyaḥ  hi anitya tā na ca asau samavāyāt pṛgrak dharmaḥ  na ca samavāyaḥ  api dharmaḥ  anāśrita tvāt pāratantryeṇa tu nirūpaṇāt katham cit dharmī iti ucyata iti api ca anātyantika sattā yogaḥ  anityatā iti ukte na yuktaḥ praśna iti na hi ghaṭam ānaya iti preṣitaḥ parivṛtya pṛcchati kim ghaṭa ānetavya uta paṭa iti tādṛśam etad iti arthaḥ api ca anitya tā nitnapayā anityā vā iti vikalpaḥ  na avatarati virodhāt ityata āha ātyantikānātyantika bhāva yogaḥ ca ekasya iti śaṅkate pratiṣedhya iti evam abhyupagacchataḥ  ayam doṣa iti etad param etad  na tu sva pakṣa upavarṇana param etad iti śaṅkā arthaḥ nirākaroti na vikalpa anupapatteḥ iti virodhasya ca ukta uttara tvāt iti paripraśna anupapatteḥ iti uttaram virodhasya uktam iti arthaḥ udāharaṇa vapūrva kam asya artham vyācaṣṭe prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabda iti kāryatva anitya tve ca paraspara asaṃkīrṇe prathama  eva adhyāya īdarśite udāhṛtya jātim avatārayati evam avasthite prayatna kārya aneka tvāt iti pratiṣedha ucyata iti prayatna anantarīyaka tvam prayatna anantara utpādaḥ  vā syāt  prayatna anantara upalambhaḥ  vā na tāvat pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ  asiddha tvāt  tasmāt prayatna anantara upalambha āstheyaḥ tatra kārya samam pratiṣedham āha prayatna anantaram upalabhyamānānām prayatna anantaram ātma lābhaḥ ca dṛṣṭaḥ  yathā ghaṭa ādīnām vyavadhāna apohāt ca abhivyaktiḥ vyavahitānām mūlaka kīlaka ādīnām tad kim prayatna anantaram ātma lābhaḥ śabdasya ahaḥ svid abhivyaktiḥ iti viśeṣaḥ  na asti tad evam kāryā viśeṣeṇa pratyavasthānam kārya samaḥ yena tu kārya samā jātiḥ anyathā eva uktā tad yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt  ghaṭavat iti ukte anyat  mṛd piṇḍa ādi kārya tvam ghaṭasya anyat ca vivakṣā prayatna vāyu preraṇa abhighāta kārya tvam śabdasya tasmāt śabda kṛtaka tvasya ghaṭa ādi kṛtaka tvāt bhedān na sādhanam kṛtakattvam anitya tvasya iti sā iyam kārya anya tvena pratyavasthānāt kārya sameti tad āha kāryatva anyatva leśena yad sādhyā siddhi darśanam tad kārya samam iti bhadantena uktam kīrtiḥ api āha asādhyena anugamāt kārya sāmānyena api sādhane sambandhi bhedāt bheda uktiḥ deṣaḥ kārya samaḥ  mata iti tad anena yadi īśvara sādhana nirālaraṇāya uktam tanu giri sāgara ādīnām anyat kārya tvam anyat ca prāsāda aṭṭāla gopura ādīnā miti tad api jāti uttaramena iti uktam bhavati na ca pratyakṣa dṛśyamānam buddhimat anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānam saudha ādīnām iva tanu bhuvana ādīnām tāsti iti etāvatā bhedena kārya bhede śabda mātra abheda iti sa aprantam abhūtvā bhāva lakṣaṇasya kṛtaka tvasya saṃsthānavat tvasya vā vastuna eva abhedāt  tasmāt etad api ayuktam avastu bhede pravṛttepi śabda sāmyāt abhedinaḥ na yuktā anumitiḥ pāṇḍu dravyāt iva hutāśane na ca iyam jātiḥ utkarṣa apakarṣa samābhyām bhidyate sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ dharma vikalpena pravartamāna tvāt tasmāt sūtrakāra ukta eva kārya samosaṃkīrṇa iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ asya pratyādeśa sūtram kārya anya tve prayatna ahetu tvam anupalabdhi kāraṇa upapatteḥ sū kāryasya utpattiḥ na lakṣaṇasya anya tve abhivyakti lakṣaṇāt kāryāt prayatnasya abhivyaktim pratyahetu tvam na bhavati iti ata āha anupalabdhi kāraṇasya āvaraṇa ādeḥ upapatteḥ abhivyakti hetu tvam syāt  evam tu na asti iti vyatireka param draṣṭavyam sati kārya anyatva iti bhāṣyam sūtravat yojanīyam yatra prayatna anantaram iti atra yatra tatrayoḥ vyatyāsaḥ tatra prayatna anantaram abhivyaktiḥ yatra anupalabdhi kāraṇam vyavadhānam upapadyata iti kasmāt anupalabdhi kāraṇa upapatteḥ prayatna abhivyaṅgya tvam iti ata āha vyavadhāna ayogāt ca iti ca u hetu arthe prayatna anantara bhāvina iti viṣayeṇa viṣayiṇam upalakṣayati prayatna anantara bhāvina iti arthaḥ anupalabdhi kāraṇa upapatteḥ iti asya vyatireka pradhāna tām āha na tu śabdasya anupalabdhī iti deśya vārtikam saṃśaya samāta iti pariharati ubhaya sādharmyāt iti viśeṣa anupalabdhau satyām ubhaya sādharmyāt saṃśaya samaḥ idam tu viśeṣa upalabdhim avivakṣitvā iti viśeṣaḥ tad idam ukta mayam tu na tathā iti deśayati sādharmya samāta iti nirākaroti na het tu adhi āropaṇāt iti prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt iti ayam prayatna anantaram upalabdheḥ iti adhyāropya pratiṣidhyate sādharmya same tu na āropaṇam iti arthaḥ tad evam jāti uttara vādinam prati sādhana vādinā sarvatra eva samyak  samādhānam sva sādhanasya vaktavyam evam sati tattva nirṇaye kathā paryavasānam bhavati yadi punar vādī api jāti vādinam prati sādhana ābhāsena pratayavatiṣṭhate tatas  ṣaṣ pakṣyām satyām na tattva nirṇaya avasānā kathā bhavet iti śiṣya hitaḥ sūtra kāraḥ samādhāna ābhāsa vādinam prati ṣaṣ pakṣīm avatārayati pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ  doṣaḥ sū tad etad sūna trāvatāra param bhāṣyam hetoḥ ced anaikāntika tvam upapādyate prativādine anaikāntika tvāt asādhakaḥ syāt iti yadi ca anaikāntika tvāt asādhakam vādinaḥ  vacanam pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ  doṣaḥ yaḥ  ayam prayatna kārya aneka tvāt iti pratiṣedhaḥ  jāti vādi nanaḥ saḥ  api anaikāntikaḥ evam hi aikāntikaḥ syāt yadi sarvam eva pratiṣedhet  yatas tu kim cit pratiṣedhati kim cit ca na tasmāt ayam anaikāntikaḥ atas  asādhaka iti arthaḥ vyākhyā antaram āha atha vā śabdasya iti nitya pakṣaḥ  abhivyaktiḥ na utpāda evam anitya pakṣe utpādaḥ  na abhi vyaktiḥ iti ayam viśeṣaḥ  na sidhyati ayam pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ  doṣa iti arthaḥ na kevalam asyām jāta avayam samādhāna ābhāsaḥ  vādinaḥ  api tu sarvatra eva jātau  iti śiṣyān śikṣayati sūtra kāraḥ sarvatra evam sū asmin sama ādhāne prayukte vādinā punar jāti vādī pratyavatiṣṭhate pratiṣedhaḥ  jāti vādinaḥ tasya vipratiṣedhaḥ  mūla sādhana vādinaḥ tasmin  tulyaḥ  doṣa iti jāti vādinaḥ pratyavasthānam iti arthaḥ atha pañcamam pakṣam sādhana vādinaḥ caturtha pakṣa vādinam prati mata anujñāpa āpādanam āha pratiṣedham sa doṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe samānaḥ  doṣa prasaṅgaḥ  mata anujñā sū sā iyam mata anujñā tṛtīye pakṣe pañcama pakṣa vādinaḥ  api sādhana vādina iti jāti vādī ṣaṣṭha pakṣa sthita āha sva pakṣa lakṣaṇa apekṣā upapatti upasaṃhāra hetu nirdeśe para pakṣa doṣa abhyupagamāt samānaḥ  doṣaḥ sū sva pakṣaṇe lakṣyate tad utthāna tvāt jātiḥ sva pakṣa lakṣaṇā anaikāntikatva udbhāvana lakṣaṇā tām
