abhyupetya anuddhūti pratiṣedhe api jāti lakṣaṇe samānaḥ  anaikāntikatva doṣa  iti upapadyamānam sva pakṣe api doṣam para pakṣe jāti vādi pakṣe sādhanavādi upasaṃharati tatra ca anaikāntikam hetum brūte tad evam sva pakṣa lakṣaṇa apekṣā upapatti upasaṃhāre hetu nirddeśe para pakṣe yad svayam dūṣaṇam dattam tasya abhyupagamāt vādinaḥ  api samāna uva doṣa iti jāti vādinaḥ  vacanam ṣaṣṭhe pakṣe sthitasya tad evam vistīrya saṃkalayya āha tatra khalu sthāpanā hetu vādina iti sā iyam ṣaṣ pakṣī samāna doṣa āpādanena anirṇāyaka tvāt paunaruktyāt ca na tattva nirṇayāya paryāptā tasmāt samādhāna ābhāsena jāti vādinam prati na pratyavastheyam kim tu samyak  sādhanena tathā ca ṣaṭra pakṣī upahatānāvatarati tattva nirṇaya paryavasānā ca kathā bhavati yadi tu asya kadā cit samyak sādhana vādinaḥ  api pratibhā kṣayāt samādhānam na sphurati tatas  atyanta parājayāt varam saṃśayaḥ  api iti nyāyena samādhāna ābhāsena api pratyavastheyam eva iti āśa yavān āha teṣām sādhu asādhu tāyām iti bhāṣya vyākhyayā vārtikam api vyākhyātam etāḥ tu jātayaḥ na tattva vivekam upakurvanti prayujyamāna tayā nirākaraṇīya tayā tvāsām api upakāra iti iti miśra śrī vācaspati viracitāyām nyāya vārtika tātparyaṭīkāyām pañcamasya adhyāyasya ādyam āhnikam **************************************************************************** miśra śrī vācaspati viracitāyām nyāya vārtika tātparyaṭīkāyām pañcamodhyāyaḥ vipratipatti apratipattyoḥ vikalpāt vaicitryāt nigraha sthāna bahutvam iti saṅkṣepeṇa uktam tad idānīm vibhajanīyam tatra ya evam āhuḥ sarvaḥ  ayam sādhana dūṣaṇa prakāraḥ  buddhi ārūḍhaḥ  na vāstava iti tān pratyāha parājaya vastūni iti parājayaḥ vasati eṣu iti parājaya sthānāni iti arthaḥ kālpanika tve kalpanāyāḥ sarvatra sulabha tvāt sādhana dūṣaṇa vyavasthā na syāt iti bhāvaḥ nigraha sthānāni paryāya antareṇa spaṣṭayati aparādha iti ya āhuḥ asādhana aṅgam vacanam adoṣa udbhāvanam dvayoḥ nigraha sthāna tvam anyat tu na yuktam iti tān pratyāha sāmānyatas  dve nigraha sthāne sāmānya vivakṣāyām pratijñāhānyādayaḥ  dvārviśatiḥ api na bhidyante tattva sādhana aṅgam vacanam adoṣa udbhāvanam iti bhavadbhiḥ saṃgṛhītam ṛṣiṇā ca vipratipatti apratipattibhyām iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ atra vicārayati kartṛ karma karaṇānām iti tatra eke varṇayanti pakṣasya iti yathā pakṣa uddeśena sādhanam pravartamānam pakṣasya evam tad uddeśena dūṣaṇāni pravartamānāni pakṣasya eva iti evam ca āhuḥ dūṣaṇāni iti nyūna tādayaḥ  hi sarve pakṣa uddeśena pravartamānāḥ pakṣasya eva iti arthaḥ dūṣayati etad tu na samyak iti pakṣa uddeśena pravṛtteḥ pakṣa viṣaya tām na apajānīmaḥ sākṣāt tu tad viṣaya tām nirākurmaḥ tasya vastu sataḥ tādavasthyāt  evam sādhanam api yatra asamartham tatra prayujyamānam na svatas  duṣyati yatra tu samartham tad sādhayati eva tasmāt kartuḥ eva doṣa iti āha tasmāt asamarthayoḥ iti na kevalam svātantryāt kartuḥ nigrahaḥ  api tu tad ādhāra tvāt vipratipatti apratipattyoḥ iti āha vipratipatti apratipapattyoḥ ca iti nanu vākye nyūna tādayaḥ  doṣā na puruṣa āśrayā iti ata āha vipratipatti apratipattī ca iti na sva rūpeṇa vākyam duṣṭam tasya tādavasthyāt iti uktam kim tu puruṣasya vipratipatti apratipattibhyām tathā pratibhāti tena vākya gata nyūna tā ādi darśanāt puruṣe vipratipratti apratipatī pratīyete tena dvāreṇa puruṣaḥ  nigṛhyate na tu vākyam etāvatā ca pratijñā doṣa iti ucyate nacāyam api niyamaḥ  yad vākyadvāreṇa puruṣī nigṛhyate ajñāna ādiṣu tad abhāva ādi tyāha kāni cit nigraha sthāni iti śaṅkate dva vidhyā anupapattiḥ iti sāmānyam vivakṣyate viśeṣaḥ  vā sāmānya vivakṣāyām nigraha sthānam iti eva astu tasya sarvatra aviśeṣa akutaḥ dvaividhyam viśeṣa vivakṣāyām pratijñāhānya ādīni bahūni iti ayuktam dvaividhya abhidhānam ubhayathā api iti arthaḥ nirākaroti na sāmānya bheda vistarasya vivakṣātaḥ pravṛtteḥ iti sāmānya vivakṣāyām api nigraha sthānam iti na uktam uddeśāt aviśeṣa prasaṅgāt  tasmāt  lakṣaṇam praṇayatā anyathā tad asambhavāt avāntara sāmānya dvaividhya vivakṣayā sāmānyam lakṣitam bhedānām tu vistara vivakṣayā pratijñā ahā anyā dayaḥ api prapañcitā iti arthaḥ āntar gaṇikānām tu bhedānām ānantyam iti āha udāharaṇa mātra tvāt ca iti dvāviṃśati saṃkhyā avacchinnaḥ bheda udāharaṇa mātram āntar gaṇika bheda vivakṣayām tu ānantyam iti arthaḥ bhāṣyam anubhāṣya akṣivapati prāyeṇa pratijñā iti samādhatte kriyā vacana doṣa dvāreṇa iti vacana doṣa dvāreṇa iti etāvat mātre vaktavye kriyā doṣa āmidhānam dṛṣṭānta artham nanu āśraya arthaḥ  api ayuktaḥ puruṣa āśraya tvāt ityata āha na ca ādhāra ādheya bhāva iti aparam api bhāṣyam anubhāṣya ākṣipati tattva vādi nam atattva vādinam ca iti samādhatte na para apadiṣṭa iti samyam sādhane jāti uttare datte tasya jāti tvam anudbhāvayan  tattva vādī api nigṛhyataiti arthaḥ lakṣaṇam tu pratidṛṣṭānta dharma abhyanujñā sva dṛṣṭānte pratijñāhāniḥ sū tad etad sūtram bhāṣya matena tāvat  vyācaṣṭe pratidṛṣṭāntasya yaḥ dharmaḥ tam yadā sva dṛṣṭānte abhyanujānāti iti tad etad bhāṣya vyākhyānam upanyasya vārttikakāraḥ  dūṣayati etad tu na budhyāmahe kadhamatra pratijñā hīyata iti anityaḥ śabda aindriyaka tvāt  ghaṭavat iti sādhane prayukte prativādinā ca anaikāntika tve sāmānyena udbhāvite tṛtīya sthāna patitaḥ  vā adya āha astu tarhi sāmānyavat  ghaṭa ādiḥ nitya iti tathā satya aindriyaka tvam anaikāntikam na bhavati nitya mātra āgāmi tvāt  ghaṭa ādīnām api nitya tā abhyupagamāt iti āśayena yadi apapi tathā api sākṣāt anaikāntika doṣa udvāram akṣara ārūḍha manukvā sva dṛṣṭānte nityatām pratipadyate nitya tā pratipatteḥ ca asiddha tā dṛṣṭānte doṣaḥ  bhavati sādhya vikalatā iti arthaḥ saḥ  ayam dṛṣṭānta doṣeṇa hetu doṣeṇa vā viruddha tvena ghaṭa ādīnām api nityatva abhyupagamena aindri nayaka tvasya hetoḥ sādhya anityatva viruddhena nitya tvena vyāpta tvāt  nigrahaḥ  vādinaḥ  na pratijñāhāniḥ na khalu anena astu śabdaḥ  nitya iti pratijñā parityaktā kim tvastu ghaṭaḥ  api nitya iti uktam yadi dṛṣṭānta parityāgena pratijñāta arthasya asiddheḥ pratijñā ahāniḥ iti ucyate tatas  sarva eva doṣaḥ pratijñāhāniḥ sarvasmāt eva doṣāt pratijñā hāneḥ upapatteḥ tasmāt katham cit  dṛṣṭānta parityāgena pratijñā ahāniḥ upacarita vnayā ca ca asau pradhānam pratijñāhānim vinā bhavitum arhati iti āha dṛṣṭāntam cajahat iti tad evam bhāṣya karīyam vyākhyānam dūṣayitvā sva matena vyācikhyāsuḥ pṛcchati katham tarhi iti dṛṣṭaḥ ca āsau  ante nigamane vyavasthita iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ dṛṣṭānta pratidṛṣṭāntau pakṣa pratipakṣau  ucyete etad uktam bhavati pratidṛṣṭāntasya pratipakṣasya sāmānyasya yaḥ  dharmaḥ  nitya tvam tam sva pakṣe śabde abhyanujānāti udāharaṇam āha yathā anityaḥ śabda aindriyaka tvāt iti dvitīya pakṣa vād iti sāmānyena pratayavasthita edam āha tṛtīya pakṣe sthitaḥ  vādī yadi sāmānyam aindri payakam nityam śabdaḥ  api evam bhavatu iti pratijñāhāniḥ atra ca anaikāntika tvena pratyavasthitā eti upalakṣaṇam yena kena citgnakāreṇa sva pratijñāta arthā nirvāham paśyan pratijñārthan jahat pratijñā ahānim āpnoti iti parama arthaḥ yad api ucyate svayam eva ghaṭam anityam aindriyakam udāhṛtya ghaṭasya aindriyaka tvam paśyan katham anunmataḥ san sāmānyasya nityasya aindriyakatva darśana mātrāt śabde nityat tvam abhyupagacchet kintū bhayatra darśanāt saṃśayittaḥ syāt  tatra sarvam nitya miti sāṃkhyīya rāddhānta avaṣṭambhena api sva pakṣa nirvāham paśyataḥ  anaikāntikatva uddhārāya prekṣāvataḥ  api pravṛtti sambhavāt  na ca ātyantikam prekṣāvat tvam iha grāhyam tādṛśasya nigraha adhikaraṇatva anupapatteḥ tasmāt yathā jaḍam prati vicāraḥ  na asti evam prāmāṇikam api prati nigrahāvatā tāraḥ  na asti iti madhyamaḥ  janaḥ nigrāhyaḥ tasya ca sambhavanti evam pramādā iti śaṅkate prasaṅga vidhānāt iti ced  nirākaroti tad ca na ata eva tad prāpteḥ hetu doṣam uddidhīrṣuḥ prasañjayan  abhyupagacchati eva na hi sāṅkhyīyam rāddha antam anabhyupagacchan  anaikāntika tvam uddhartum arhati iti bhāvaḥ tad anena paramatam nirākṛta prāyam api sākṣāt nirākarttum upanyasyati hetu doṣeṇa anaikāntikatva lakṣaṇena caritārtha tvāt na pratijñā ahāni rnigraha sthānam iti anye yad āha kīrtiḥ atasmāt aindriyaka tu asya nitya anitya pakṣa vṛtteḥ vyabhicārāt asādhana aṅgasya upādānāt nigrahaḥ  na pratipakṣa dharmasya abhyanujñānāt iti nirākaroti na anā ekāntika doṣa parihāreṇa vipratipatteḥ tad upapatteḥ yadā hi sāṃkhya pakṣa avalambanena śabda nitya tvam abhyupa iti tadā pratijñāhāniḥ na viruddhaḥ  hetuḥ na api anaikāntikaḥ  vipakṣa abhāvāt kevalam pratijñāta artha hānam eva asya parājaya sthānam vipratipatteḥ svasādhya viruddha pratipatteḥ iti sarvam avadātam etad vyācaṣṭe pratijñātaḥ  mīmāṃsakam prati vaiśeṣikeṇa anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tasya sādhana mainrdiyaka tvāt haṭavat iti evam uktasya pratiṣedhaḥ  mīmāṃsakena kriyate pratidṛṣṭāntena hetu vyabhicāraḥ tam āha sāmānyam aindriyakam nityam iti tasmin pratiṣedhe mīmāṃsakena kṛte dharmavavikalpāt tathā nirddenaśa iti yāvat na ucayate tāvat ardha ukta eva dharma vikalpāt itya nūdya vyācaṣṭe dṛṣṭānta pratidṛṣṭa antayoḥ  dhaṭa sāmānyayoḥ sādharmyam aindriyaka tvam tad yoge tad dharma bhedāt  sāmānya maindriyakam sarva gatam aindriyakaḥ tu asarva gataḥ  ghaṭa iti dharma vikalpāt tad artham prati jñāta artha siddhi artham śabdasya asarva gata tvam mīmāṃsakānām pratipādayitum nirddeśaḥ tasya hi śabdasya asarva gata tvam asiddham praśna pūrvakam nirddeśa svarūpam āha katham yathā ghaṭaḥ  asarva gataḥ  anitya iti evam śabdaḥ  api asarva gataḥ  anitya iti idam hi pratijñā vākyam anityaḥ śabda itivat asarva gataḥ śabda iti mīmāṃsakam vipratipannam prati nirddeśāt na tu kṛtaka tvāt itivat udāharaṇa sādharmyāt asya hetu lakṣaṇam asti sādhya nirdeśaḥ pratijñā iti tu pratijñā lakṣaṇa yogāt pratijñā antaram eva yadi api asya manasi viparivartate asarvatatvam sādhayitvā mayā asarva gata tve sati iti aindriyaka tvam hetuḥ viśeṣaṇīya iti tathā api etad anena na kṛtam kim tu asarva gataḥ śabdaḥ  ghaṭavat iti uktvā eva virataḥ para artha anumāne ca vacana gatā guṇa doṣā vicāryante na tu vacana anapekṣam vastu tad idam āha asarva gataḥ śabda iti dvitīyā pratijñā hetuḥ ahitā asya praśna pūrvakam nigraha sthāna tvam āha tad katham iti anarthakam niṣprayojanam iṣṭa artha siddheḥ abhāvāt iti vārttikam tatra anityaḥ śabda iti pratijñāpa prathamā asyām sāmānyena aindriyakeṇa hetoḥ anaikāntika tvāt pratihataḥ  vādī prativādinā asarva gataḥ śabdaḥ  anitya iti pratijñā antaram pūrva pratijñā siddhi artham karoti iti anuṣajyate pṛcchati katham iti uttaram sādhana sāmarthya aprajñānāt anityaḥ śabda aindriyaka tvāt  ghaṭavat iti etā  avat uktvā nirākāṅkṣaḥ  vādī na tu asarva gata tve sati iti sādhanam viśeṣitavān na ca aviśiṣṭam sādhanam atra arthe asamartham viśiṣṭam tu samartham tasya sāmarthyam aparijñāya aviśiṣṭe tad āropya aviśiṣṭa sādhanam prayuktavān tatra nirākāṅkṣaḥ  vādī savyabhicāra hetu prayogāt eva parājīyate na tu pratijñā antara prayogāt  yadi tu vādinya paryavasita vāda eva madhye prativādinā hetoḥ anaikāntika tve udbhāvite tam eva hetum asarva gata tve sati iti viśeṣṭum mīmāṃsake prati śabdasya asarva gata tvam pratijātīte asarva gataḥ śabda iti pratijñāya ca na hetum bravīti tadānaikāntikatva uddhārāya pratijñā antara karaṇāt na anaikāntika tvena parājīyate api tu pratijñā antarāt eva na hi pratijñā pratijñā antaram sādhayitum arhati iti saḥ  ayam pratijñāṃmātrasya asādhakatva apratipattyā asādhakasya eva vā sādhakatva pratipattyā parājīyate tad etad āha na ca pratijñā pratijñā antaram sādhayati tena pratijñā yatra arthe samārthā tad aparijñānāt pañca avayava sādhye ca sāmarthya āropaṇāt aparijñānāt iti śliṣṭa nirddeśaḥ prasajya pratiṣedha paryudāsau vivakṣitau tena ajñānāt viparīta jñānāt ca pratijñā antaram nigraha sthānam iti yad punar ucyate paraiḥ atyanta asambaddham etad  yad pratijñā pratijñāsādhanāya iti yaḥ  hi prāk  pratijñām uktvā hetu udāharaṇa ādikam vaktum jānāti sa katham cit anukramam sādhanasya jānāti eva jānan katham avi kalā antaḥkaraṇaḥ pratijñām eva pratijñāna sādhanāya upādadīta iti tatra brūmaḥ na ayam pratijñayā pratijñā sādhanīya iti buddhyā pravṛttaḥ kim tu asarva gata tvam śabdasya mīmāṃsakam prati sādhayitvā tena aindriyaka tvam viśiṣya anaikāntika tvam uddharaṇīyam iti manorathena pravṛttaḥ pratijñām kṛtavān asarva gataḥ śabda iti atha asya prativādyavaṣṭambhāt pariṣad darśanāt vā stambhita tve sādhana apratibhanayā tūṣṇīm bhavataḥ prekṣāvataḥ  api pratijñā antaram bhavati nigraha sthānam ayam ca vikala antaḥkaraṇasya nigrahaḥ  bhavadbhiḥ api ukta eva tad abhyupagamya apratibhayā tūṣṇīṃbhāvāt iti vadadbhiḥ saḥ  ayam īdṛśaḥ  asat pralāpaḥ  bhavadbhiḥ śāstre nibandhanīyona tu asmābhiḥ iti vyaktam iyam rāja kula sthitiḥ iti sarvam caturasam atra pratijñā hetvoḥ iti pratiyogi dvaya mātra upalakṣaṇa param tena dṛṣṭānta ādayaḥ  api pratiyogina unneyāḥ etad uktam bhavati yeṣām vākya gatānām padārthānām mithas  vyāghātaḥ pratīyate pramāṇa antaram ca virodhakam sa virodhaḥ  nāma nigraha sthānam lakṣya sthitaspaya pratijñā grahaṇasya api upalakṣaṇa artha tvāt na ca evam bhāṇḍālekhya nyāyaḥ eka deśena avyāpakena samudāya saṃgrahe sa hi bhavati na tu vyāpakena saṃgrahe vyāpakam ca anavayavena idaṃpratiyogi mithunayoḥ virodhaḥ atas  yathāśruti tāvitsūtram vyācaṣṭe vārtikakāraḥ yatra pratijñā hetunā virudhyata iti dvayoḥ virodhe yasya pramāṇa antara anugrahaḥ tena tad bādhyata iti tena tad virudhyataiti ucyate yatra pratijñayā hetuḥ virudhyate tad udāharati yathā guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam bhedena agrahaṇāt iti atra hi bhedena agrahaṇāt iti anena grahaṇa pratiṣedhena grāhya abhāva upalakṣyate tena evam hetu arthaḥ  bhavati guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam avyatirekāt iti saḥ  ayam pratijñā hetu padayoḥ vyāpti smaraṇa anapekṣa eva paraspara vyāghātaḥ  astitāstipadayoḥ eva na ca evaṃvidhaḥ śabde nityatva kṛtaka tvayoḥ yena kṛtaka tvavat viruddhaḥ  ayam hetvābhāsaḥ syāt  tatra hi kṛtaka tvasya nitya tvena vyāpti smaraṇa apekṣa eva virodhaḥ pratīyate na tvayam tathā astināstivat svabhāva virodhāt yadi api ayam asiddhaḥ  api hetuḥ tathā api asya asiddhiḥ bādhakam pramāṇa antaram anusṛtya pratipattavyā pratijñā virodhaḥ tu uccāraṇa mātrāt eva prathamata eva gamyata iti tena eva dūṣitena asiddhiḥ paścāttanī na dūṣaṇa tvāya kalpate bhasmīkṛte dahanavat  pratijñā hetu virodha mātreṇa ca nigraha siddheḥ suhṛd bhāva mātreṇa pratijñāyā balavat tā smaraṇam pratijñāyāḥ ca atra balavat tvam pramāṇa antara anugrahāt tathā hi darśana sparśanābhyām ekārtha pratisaṃdhānāt rūpa ādi vyatiriktam dravyam sidhyati iti tad anugṛhītā pratijñā eva hetu artham bādhata iti etena eva iti lakṣaṇena śramaṇā garbhiṃṇī iti śramaṇā brahmacāriṇī na antarvatnī bhavitum arhati jita indrayasya upastha saṃyamaḥ  hi brahmacaryam na ca asādhana aṅgasya pratijñāyā vacanāt eva nigṛhīta iti kṛtam virodha udbhāvanena niṣpādita kriye karmaṇi aviśeṣa abhidhāyinaḥ  dūṣaṇasya dūṣaṇa nyāya atipātāt iti sāṃpratam pratijñāyāḥ sādhana aṅga tvasya prathama  eva adhyāye darśita tvāt  hetu virodhaḥ  api yatra hetunā pramāṇa antareṇa anugṛhītena pratijñā bādhyate yathā sarvam pṛthak iti pratijñā na kim cit ekam iti arthaḥ hetuḥ samūhe bhāva śabda prayogāt iti eka samuccaye ghaṭa ādi prayogāt iti arthaḥ na asti ekam eka samuccayaḥ ca iti vacanam mithas  virudhyate vinā eva vyāpti anusmaraṇam iti na ca sarva nāstitva vādinaḥ  na eka samuccayova asti iti vaktavyam asati hetau sādhya siddheḥ ayogāt  na ca kalpitasya hetoḥ sādhana aṅgatā iti tatra tatra niveditam atra ca ekasamuccayasya pramāṇa anugrahāt na ekam kim cit iti pratijñā hetunā bādhyate etena lakṣaṇena pratijñāyā dṛṣṭānta virodhaḥ  api vaktavyaḥ yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameya tvāt  yad prameyam tad nityam yathā ākāśam iti sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ yadi api atra vastu tas  hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ tathā api dṛṣṭāntasya pratijñā virodhena eva nigṛhyate virodhasya vākye prathamam avagateḥ anityam ghaṭa ādi unnīya anaikāntikatva pratipatteḥ tad jadhanya tvāt iti hetoḥ ca dṛṣṭānta ādibhiḥ virodha etena vaktavya iti anuṣajyate yathā nityaḥ śabda aindriyaka tvāt anaindriya dvi aṇukavat iti atra api aindriyakatva an aindriyaka tvayāḥ śabdataḥ virodhaḥ pratīyate sādhana vaikalyam tu vastu svabhāva ālocanayā iti viśeṣaḥ evam upanayena virodhaḥ  anaindriyakaḥ ca śabda iti atra api vastu svabhāva ālocanayā anaindriyakatva asiddhiḥ pratīyate śabdataḥ tu virodha iti pramāṇa virodhaḥ ca pratijñā hetvoḥ vaktavyaḥ yadi api bādhita viṣayam hetvābhāsa antargatam tathā api ihā api asti iti virodha hetvābhāsayoḥ atra nigraha sthānayoḥ samāveśaḥ  astu na kva cit viṣaye samāveśāt ānarthakyam viṣaya antare samāveśa abhāvāt arthavat tvāt  darśitam ca anantaram eva bhinna viṣaya tvam iti tad evam sādhana vādinaḥ  virodham nigraha sthānam abhidhāya uttara vādinaḥ  api nigraha sthānam anena eva saṃgṛhītam iti āha para pakṣa siddhena gotava ādinā iti yadā hi bauddhena prābhākaram prati sādhyate anityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇa tvāt iti yadi anitya tvam na bhavet śrāvaṇa tvam na syāt iti prābhākaraḥ  anaikāntika tvam udbhāvayati śrāvaṇam śabda tvam nityam ca iti tad āsya anaikāntikatva udbhāvanam svakīya śabdatva nirākaraṇa viruddham iti para pakṣa siddham gaḥtva ādi api īdṛśa eva viṣaye viruddhe draṣṭavyam siddhānta viruddham ca sādhanam viruddham iti āha sva pakṣa anapekṣam ca nanu yadi anaikāntika udbhāvanam api viruddham kaḥ tarhi anaikāntikatva āpādanasya viṣaya iti at āha ubhaya pakṣa sampratipad naḥ tu iti deśayati dṛṣṭānta ābhāsā iti avayava antaram hi pratijñā ahet pava ādibhya udāharaṇe tena hetvābhāsa uktyā tasya saṅgrahaḥ pāramparyeṇa tu udāharaṇa ābhāsasya hetu dūṣaka tvena sarvam eva hetu dūṣakam iti bhāvaḥ pariharati hetvābhāsa pūrvaka tvāt iti hetvābhāsā iti atra hetu śabdaḥ sva artham aparityajya dṛṣṭāntam upalakṣayati upalakṣaṇe hetuḥ uktaḥ hetvābhāsa pūrvaka tvāt hetvābhāsa pradhānaka tvāt  dṛṣṭānta ābhāsena api hetuḥ eva dūṣyate yatas  na ca etāvatā pratijña ādi doṣa upalakṣaṇa prasaṅgaḥ na hi yatra yatra nimittam asti tad sarvam upalakṣaṇīyam kim tu yad upalakṣyate tatra avaśyam nimittam vaktavyam na ca sūtrakārasya sarvatra lāghava ādaraḥ  dṛḍha iti uktam tasmāt sarvam ramaṇīyam aindriyaka tvasya hetoḥ anaikāntiṅkatva udbhāvanena śabda anityatva pakṣe pratikṣipte vādī prativādinam brūyāt anaikāntika tvam uddidhīrṣuḥ kaḥ punar āha anityaḥ śabda iti yadi aham anityaḥ śabda iti pratijñātam apahvotum śaknoti tadā na sāmānyena nityena me hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ  bhavati iti buddhyā ahnupate saḥ  ayam evaṃvādī na śakyaḥ  anaikāntika tvena jetum apahvavasya apahnavatva āvedane anaikāntikatva uddhārāt tasmāt anaikāntikasya anaikāntikatva sthāpanāya apahnavasya apahnava tvam udbhāvanīyam tatra kim apajnava tvam udbhāvya anaikāntika tvam vyavasthāpya nigṛhyatāmuta apahnavāt eva iti saṃśaye apahnavatva udbhāvanena eva pūrva apara parāhate nirgṛhyate na anaikāntika tvena tad pūrvaka tvāt anaikāntikatva sthāpanasya tasmāt yad uktam kīrtinā kim idānīm hetvābhāsāt uttara pratijñā saṃnyāsa apekṣayā tasya prativādinaḥ  hetvābhāsa eva ādyam nigraha sthānam iti tad api apāst pratijñā saṃnyāsasya eva pūrva bhāvi tvāt  yad api tena uktam pakṣa pratiṣedhe tūṣṇīṃbhavataḥ tūṣṇīṃbhāvaḥ  nāma nigraha sthānam pralapataḥ ca pralapitam nāma ityādi api vācyam syāt iti tad api asāṃpratam na hi tūṣṇīmbhāvena pralapita ādibhiḥ vā śakyam anaikāntika tvam uddhartum yathā pratijñā artha apahnavena na ca ete hetvābhasa udbhāvanasya purastāt tanāḥ tasmāt etad api anirūpita abhidhānāt yad kiñcid iti vyākhyātum nidarśanam āha nidarśanam eka prakṛti idam vyaktam bhūta bhautika indriyam eka prakṛtīnām vikārāṇām parimāṇāt  tad yathā eka mṛd pūrvā ghaṭa śarāva udañjana ādayaḥ parimitā dṛṣṭāḥ yāvān prakṛteḥ vyūhaḥ saṃsthānam tāvān vikāra iti na ca etad udāharaṇam sādhana vikalam iti āha dṛṣṭam ca iti upanayam āha asti ca idam iti nigamanam āha tad eka prakṛtīnām iti asya parimita tvasya hetoḥ vyabhicāreṇa pratyavasthānam prativādinaḥ nānā prakṛtīnām ghaṭa rucaka ādīnām eka prakṛtīnām ca ghaṭa śarāva ādīnām dṛṣṭam parimāṇam iti evam pratyasthite prativādini vādī paścāt parimita tvam hetum viśinaṣṭi eka prakṛti samanvaye sati śarāva ādi vikārāṇām parimāṇa darśanāt iti prakṛtiḥ svabhāvaḥ eka svabhāva samanvaye sati iti arthaḥ eka prakṛti samanyavam sphuṭayati sukha duḥkha moha samanvitam hi idam sarvam vyaktam parimitam gṛhyate tathā hi metra dāreṣu narmadāyām maitrasya sukha buddhiḥ bhavati tad sapatnīnām ca duḥkha buddhiḥ caitrasya tām avindataḥ  raṇa raṇakavataḥ  mohaḥ  vibhādaḥ narmadayā bhāva antarāṇi vyākhyātāni tad evam yatra eka svabhāva samanvaye sati parimāṇam tatra eka prakṛti tvam eva tad yathā eka mṛd piṇḍa svabhāveṣu ghaṭa śarāva udañcana ādiṣu ghaṭa rucaka ādayaḥ tu na eka svabhāvāḥ mārda sauvarṇa ādīnām svabhāvānām bhedāt  nidarśya atra sūtram yojayati tad idam aviśeṣa ukte hetau pratiṣiddha  iti asya nigraha sthāna tvam āha sati ca hetu antara bhāva iti api ca yadi hetu antara vacane viśvam eka prakṛti sādhyate tadā nidarśanam na asti sarvasya pakṣe nikṣepāt  atha nidarśana siddhi artham kim cit pakṣāt vyatiricyatetatas tena eva anaikāntika tvam anvitānām parimitānām bhinna prakṛtika tvāt iti āha hetu antara vacane sati yadi hetu artha nidarśana iti hetuḥ sādhanam arthaḥ sādhyaḥ tau hetu arthau nidarśayati vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvena iti nidarśanaḥ nidarśanaḥ hetu arthayoḥ nidarśanaḥ  hetu artha nidarśanaḥ  dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa yadi upādīyate tatas  na idam vyaktam eka prakṛti bhavati dṛṣṭāntasya prakṛti antara upādānāt vārttikam sādhana antara upādāne pūrvasya iti datta uttara avasara eva vādini yadi prativādī hetu artham vyabhicārayati vādīca tṛtīya padake sthitaḥ  hetum viśeṣayati tadā sādhana antara upādānāt nigṛhyatām uta anaikāntika sādhana upādānāt  na tāvat anaikāntika sādhanāt asya nigrahaḥ  hetu viśeṣaṇenanapava samāhita tvāt iti tasmāt hetu antara vacanāt eva nigṛhyate pūrvasya vastu tas  asamarthasya asāmarthya khyāpanāt  sāmarthye vā hetu antarānarthakyam iti sūktam vyācaṣṭe yathā ukta lakṣaṇe pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahe sati vāde jalpe vitaṇḍāyām iti arthaḥ hetutaḥ sādhya siddhau prakṛtāyām vādī sādhanam brūyāt  nityaḥ śabdaḥ  asparśa tvāt iti atra antare sūkha ādibhiḥ vyabhicāreṇa hetoḥ asāmarthyam paśyana tad pracchādana artham prasakta anuprasaktyā tam tam artham upanyasi an  artha antareṇa nigṛhyate abhidheyasya kriyā antara yogāt kriyā viśeṣasya yogāt viśiṣyamāṇa rūpaḥ  bhidyamāna rūpaḥ śabdaḥ  nāma iti yathā vṛkṣaḥ tiṣṭhati vṛkṣam chinatti vṛkṣeṇa candramasam paśyati vṛkṣāya udakam āsiñcati ityādi tad evam abhidheyasya kriyā viśeṣa yogāt viśiṣyamāṇa rūpaḥ śabdaḥ  nāma iti ākhyāta svarūpam āha kriyā kāraka samudāya iti viṣayeṇa viṣayiṇam upalakṣayati pacati pacyata eti evamādayaḥ śabdāḥ kriyām kartāram karma ca abhivadanti tad etad lakṣaṇam asiddham ati vyāpakam ca na hi kartā karma vā ākhyātena abhidhīyate kriyākṣepeṇa eva tayoḥ pratilambhāt  ananyalabhyasya ca śabda artha tvāt kartṛ karmaṇoḥ ca kāraka antaremyaḥ  bhāvanāyām abhyarhitatama tvena tad saṅkhyā abhidhāna niyamāt asiddham kāraka abhidhānam ati vyāpakam ca pācakaḥ pākya iti ādeḥ nāmnaḥ  api kriyā kāraka samudāya abhidhāyi tvāt tad asmin lakṣaṇe aparituṣyan lakṣaṇa antara dvayena ākhyāta padāni upasaṃgṛhṇāti kāraka saṃkhyā viśiṣṭa kriyā kāla yoga abhidhāyi ākhyātam pacati pacyataityādau kartuḥ karmaṇaḥ  vā saṃkhyayā kālena vartamāna ādinā viśiṣṭā kriyā pratīyate kālaḥ ca kva cit asti iti etau  ava uktaḥ  na tu vivakṣitaḥ  lakṣaṇe pacata yajeta iti evamādau tad yoga apratīteḥ anena lakṣaṇena sthīyate supyataityādīnām ākhyātānām asaṅghahaḥ kāraka tad saṃkhyayoḥ apratīteḥ tad saṃgrahāya dvitīyam lakṣaṇam āha dhātu artha mātram ca kāla abhidhāna viśiṣṭam abhidhīyataiti abhidhānam prayogeṣu iti nāmnaḥ  vā ākhyātasya vā tad arthāt abhidyamāna rūpā nipātāḥ yathā samuccaya vikalpa ādi nām apadaiḥ samuccaya ādayaḥ samuccetavyāt nāma arthāt ākhyāta arthāt vā bhedena ucyante tatra ṣaṣṭhī prayogāt  teṣām samuccayaḥ  vikalpaḥ  vā iti na evam ca ādayaḥ sva arthāt nāma arthāt ākhyāta arthāt vā bhedena abhidadhati rūpyante pratipādyante rūpāṇi arthāt nāma arthāt ākhyāta arthāt vā bhidyamānam rūpam pratipādyamānam yeṣām nipātānām te tathā uktaḥ upasūjyamānāḥ samīpe prāk  prayujyamānāḥ kriyā avadyotakā upasargāḥ avadyotanam ca upalakṣaṇam adhika arthā viparīta arthāḥ ca upasargā gṛhyante yathā abhyāgacchati pratiṣṭhata etyādiṣu tad asya nigraha sthāna tvam vārtikakāra upapādayati abhyupagata iti yathā ca sādhana vādinoḥ  atha antaram nigraha sthānam evam uttara vādinaḥ  api draṣṭavyam varṇa krama nirddeśavat iti vatiḥ atra yadā drāviḍaḥ sva bhāṣayā tad bhāṣā anabhijñam āryam prati śabda nitya tvam pratipādayati tadā tad nirarthakam nigraha sthānam sa khalu ārya bhāṣām jānan  asāmarthya pracchādanāya tad bhāṣā anabhijña tayā vā sva bhāṣayā sādhanam prayuktavān saḥ  ayam pūrvasmin kalpe vipratipattyā nigṛhyate uttarasmin  tu apratipattyā vastutas  sādhana sāmarthye api mūkavat ārya pratipādaka śabda apratīteḥ tad pratipādana ārambha vaiyarthyāt  atra eva dṛṣṭānta mātra tayā vatinā atra varṇa kramaḥ  darśitaḥ  na punar etad udāharaṇam nigraha sthānasya yena kapola vāditra ādau  api prasaṅgaḥ yathā hi drāviḍasya artha bheda vivakṣa utthāpitam vacanam na evam varṇa krama nirddeśaḥ kapola vāditram vā apratipādakatva sāmānyāt varṇa krama nirddeśavat iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ ata eva āha bhāṣya kāraḥ evaṃprakāram iti na punar idam eva iti arthaḥ vārtikam udāharaṇam bhāṣya iti evaṃprakāra udāharaṇam iti arthaḥ sādhana anupādānāt iti para pratipādakam pañca avayavam vākyam sādhanam tad tena na upāttam tasya sva samayena pratipādaka tve api āryān pratyapratipādaka tvāt iti arthaḥ yad vākyam pariṣadā prativādinā ca na vijñāyate samāna saṃketena vādinā tris abhihitam yāvadbhiḥ vāraiḥ pariṣad prativādinoḥ artha pratyayaḥ bhavati sa ca prāyeṇa tribhiḥ iti tris abhihitam iti uktam nanu samāna saṅketena vādinā tris abhihitam avijñāta artham ca iti na saṃbhavati sambhave vā pariṣad prativādinai jaḍau na ca jaḍa anavabodhe pratipādakasya kaścid aparādhaḥ na hi badhiraḥ  gītam na śṛṇoti iti gāyanasya kaścid aparādha iti ata āha śliṣṭa śabdam asati prakaraṇa ādau niyāmake yathā śvetaḥ  dhāvati iti apratīta prayogam jarbharīturpharī tū iti atidruta uccāritam iti evamādinā kāraṇena tad avijñāta artham asya nigraha sthāna tvam āha asāmarthya iti vārtikam bhāṣya vyākhyayā gata artham yatra anekasya padasya āśliṣṭasya pratīta yogasya adruta uccāritasya vākyasya ca anekasya paurvāparyeṇa ayogaḥ sambandhaḥ  na asti iti tasmāt asambaddha artha tā gṛhyate tad apārthakam nigraha sthānam niṣprayojanam kasmāt  samudāya arthasya vākya arthasya vā apāyāt vākya mahā vākya artha pratyāyana prayojanaḥ  hi padānām vākyānām vā prayogaḥ  asati tasmin  apārthakam iti arthaḥ vākyasya paurvāparya asambandha audāharaṇam āha yathā daśa dāḍimāni ṣaṣ apūṣā iti padānām paurvāparya asambandhe udāharaṇam āha kuṇḍamaja ajinam iti raurukam raru sambandhi pāryya pāyayitavyam apratiśīnaḥ  vṛddhaḥ vārtikakāraḥ śaṅkate nirarthaka apārthakayoḥ iti para pratyāyana prayojanam hi vacana uccāraṇam tatra nirarthakena iva apārthakena api na paraḥ pratipādyata iti ubhayoḥ abhedaḥ na ca varṇa krama mātram ekatra anyatra ca padāni iti etāvatā bhedena upādanam yuktam ekatra vākya upādānam anyatra pada upādānam iti apārthakayoḥ api avāntara bhedena bheda upādāna prasaṅgāt iti śaṅkā arthaḥ nirākaroti bhidyata iti pṛcchati katham uttaram tatra anarthake varṇa mātram abhidheya śūnyam iha tu apārthake padāni padyate gamyate abhidheyam ebhiḥ iti padāni vākyāni ca abhidheyavanti asambaddhāni nirabhidheya niṣprayojanayoḥ nirarthaka apārthakayoḥ mahān viśeṣaḥ na tu īdṛśaḥ  vākya padayoḥ niṣprayojanayoḥ viśeṣaḥ  yena avāntara bhedam ādriyāmahe para pratyāyana prayojana abhāvā mātra vivakṣayā tu aviśeṣe sarva nigraha sthāna aviśeṣaḥ sarvatra para pratyāyana abhāvāt bhāve vā nigraha sthāna anupapatteḥ avayava viparyāsa vacanam aprāpta kālam sū vyācaṣṭe pratijñā ādīnām avayavānām yathālakṣaṇam artha vaśāt  kramaḥ lakṣaṇa anatikrameṇa kramaḥ uktam etad asmābhiḥ prathama adhyāye yad apekṣita abhidhāyinaḥ  vacanāt pare pratipadyante na anyasya tatra prathamam sādhya nirddeśaḥ  apekṣitaḥ paraiḥ na tu sādhana nirddeśaḥ tatra yadi ayam prathamam sādhanam eva prayuñjīta katham apokṣitam brūyāt  anapekṣita abhidhāyī ca katham pratipādakaḥ  nāma tad evam sarvāṇi eva hetu vacana ādīni api kramavanti na akramāṇi pratipādayitum arhanti iti viparīta kramebhyaḥ  api ārtha krama anusaraṇāt eva artha pratipatteḥ saḥ  ayam pratijñā ādīnām artha etādṛśaḥ  ya eṣām kramam antareṇa na śakyaḥ  jñātum iti avayava viparyāse tava ākāṅkṣā bhāvāt tad pūrvaka tvāt ca padārtha sambandhasya asambandham nigraha sthānam iti arthaḥ vārtikam na evam apiva siddheḥ iti eke yathā āhuḥ atra api na kaścid  krama niyama iṣṭa arthapa siddheḥ ubhayatra aviśeṣāt  yadi ucyeta artha śabdavat ayam asmākam samayaḥ  yad anena krama viśeṣeṇa arthaḥ pratyetavyaḥ  na anyena iti atas tathā iva pratīyate na krama antareṇa ityata āha samaya anabhyupagamāt ca padeṣu eva samaya pūrvakaḥ pratyayaḥ na vākyeṣu abhinavaka vi racita tad samaya anapekṣāt eva vākyāt artha pratīteḥ syāt etad  vākyeṣu api krama niyamaḥ  dṛṣṭaḥ yathā pācayām babhūva iti na punarvabhūva pācayām iti ata āha prayogāt ca iti tatra laukikaḥ prayogaḥ  niyata iha tu avayava vyatyayasya api dṛṣṭaḥ prayoga iti arthaḥ tad etad dūṣayati yad tāvat na evam api siddheḥ iti tatra uttaram prayogaḥ  peta śabdavat etad  etad eva vivṛṇoti yathā gaurityasya eva padasya arthem gāvī iti prayujyamānam padam kakudādimantam artham pratyāyayati yadi api śabdānām artha pratyāyanam na svābhāvikam tathā api parameśvara saṅketa pūrvaka m adya yāvat anuvarttate ata eva sādhava ūr atha bhede śabda bhedā yeṣām pārameśvara saṅketaḥ tad asaṅketāt tu pravarttamānā api arthe asādhavaḥ śabdā apabhraṃśā bhavanti tad apekṣāḥ ca sādhubhiḥ bhāṣitavyam iti ādayaḥ  vidhayaḥ  dharmeṣu nindā artha vādāḥ ca mantraḥ  hīnaḥ svarataḥ  varṇata ityādayaḥ vedānām ca prāmāṇyam pratipāditam dvitīye adhyāye na ca ayam arthaḥ  ye ye sādhavaḥ te sarve dharma hetava iti kim tu dharma anuṣṭhānam tad anurūpa bhāṣaṇe prāpte sādhubhiḥ evati niyamyate tad evam vyavasthite aviśeṣeṇa gaḥ gāvī ādi śabdā āryeṇa prayujyamānā dṛśyante tatra ete kim aviśeṣeṇa eva sādhava uta kaścid ekaḥ sādhuḥ tad pūrvikā itarebhyaḥ pratītiḥ tatra eka śabdasya sādhutva kalpanāyāmitarasmāt  tad mūla tayā artha pratipatti upapattau na sarvatra sādhutva kalpanā yuktā yathā āha smātra bhavān jaiminiḥ anyāyaḥ ca aneka śabda tvam iti tatra api katamasya asādhu tvam ekasya etoṣu iti jijñāsāyām tatra tattvam abhiyoga viśeṣāt syāt iti yaḥ  abhiyuktatamaiḥ indra pāṇiniprabhṛtibhiḥ sādhu tvena avigānataḥ smaryate sa sādhuḥ itaraḥ  asādhuḥ iti niścīyate tena yadi api laukikā gāvi ādi śabdebhya eva gavā ādi artham adhigacchanti iti dṛṣṭa artha mātra vyavahāriṇaḥ pratipattiḥ tathā api parīkṣakāṇām vicārayatām evam vicāra kramaḥ  yad vṛddhatamena gaḥ śabde prayoktavye pramādāt gāvī śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ tatas ca vṛddhatareṇa gaḥ śabdam unnīya gaḥ tvam pratītam yathā āhuḥ aamba amba iti yadā bālaḥ śikṣamāṇaḥ prabhāṣate avyakte tad vidān tena vyakte bhavati nirṇayaḥ evam sādhau prayoktavye yaḥ  apabhraṃśaḥ prayujyate tena sādhu vyavahitaḥ kaścid arthaḥ  abhidhīyate pārśva sthāḥ ca atas  anena mūla śabdam unnīya arthaḥ pratīta iti agṛhītvā eva gāvī śabdāt eva ayam amum artham pratītavān iti tam eva gaḥ tvasya vācakam avagamya ani eṣām vṛddhaḥ  babhūva tatas  prabhṛti ananusṛta mūla śabda anām ayam vācakatva bhramaḥ  apabhraṃśe vartate na vṛddhatarasya ubhaya vedinaḥ  mūla śabda anusāriṇasī pad artha pratipattiḥ idānīntanānām tu apabhraṃśāt eva ata eva anavākhyānam api prayojanavat  asati asmin vācaka apabhraṃśa vibhāge jñāna an abhāvāt sādhubhiḥ bhāṣitavyam iti niyama vidheḥ na mlecchita vai na apabhāṣita vai iti niṣedhasya ca viṣaya saṃśayena duradhigama tvena dharma anuṣṭhānasya aśakyatva prasaṅgāt  yatra arthe yasya śabdasya bhagavatā īśvareṇa saṅketaḥ kṛtaḥ sa tatra sādhuḥ asādhuranyatra yathā ya eva asva śabdaḥ  daridre sādhuḥ sa eva asādhuḥ vājini prayujyamānaḥ yathā nakula daṃṣṭa agra spṛṣṭā yā kā cit oṣa dhiḥ asau sarpa viṣam hanti evam īśvareṇa kṛta saṅketaḥ śabdaḥ sādhuḥ dharma aupayujyate na anya iti yava varāha ādi śabdānām āri mlecchayoḥ artha vivāde vaidikāt vākya śeṣāt ārya saṃmata ūr athaḥ grahītavyaḥ  na mleccha saṃmataḥ tatra vaidika vāki aśeṣa virodhāt  yeṣām tu śabdānām āryeṣu na dṛṣṭa caraḥ prayogaḥ kevalaiḥ mlecchaiḥ eva artha bhede prayujyante yathā pika nema tāmarasa ādayaḥ vede tu prayuktāḥ teṣām mleccha vyavahārāt eva arthaḥ  avadhāraṇīyaḥ tatra teṣām abhiyopagāt iti ārya vyavahāra aparipanthi tvāt ca iti tad evam vyavasthite nyāya mīmāṃsā pariśīlana vikalānām bāhyatarāḥ pralāpā upekṣaṇīyāḥ tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam prayoga apeta śabdavat iti na ca śabdānvā ākhyānam vyartham iti ca iti pratijña ādīnām krama niyama kāraṇam praśna pūrvakam darśayati tad etad katham pūrvam tāvat iti dvitīyam deśyam anubhāṣya pariharati yad punar etad samaya anabhyupagamāt iti saḥ  ayam arthasya anurvīm pratiti bala pravṛttām anvācakṣāṇaḥ  nābhi ākhyeya iti na upālabhyaḥ śāstre vākyāni artha saṃgraha artham upādīyanta iti na hiśāstre kṛtsnā sa divādara bhūtadivā iti artha saṅgrahaḥ yathā katham cit  kriyata iti vāde api tathā kriyatām iti yuktam vāda ādiṣu pakṣa pratipakṣavat vakroḥ api parīkṣyamāṇa tvāt  parīkṣitasya ca śāstrita tvāt  pratijña ādīnām pañca avayavānām militānām sādhana tvam upapāditam nyūna tve sādhana tvam na asti tad abhāve na sādhya siddhiḥ na hi sāmagrī niṣpādyam kāryam sāmagrī eka deśāt bhavati iti arthaḥ pareṣām matam upanyasti eke tu iti eke tu pratijñānyūnam nāma nigra sthānam na asti iti bravate dūṣayati etad tu na yuktam iti kim pratijñānyūnam nigraha sthāna antaram na bhavati atha nigraha sthānam eva na bhavati etad eva āha kim asau nigṛhyate na vā iti prathama kalpe doṣam āha yadi iti dvitīya kalpe doṣam āha atha na nigraha iti pratijñāyāḥ sādhana aṅga tvam uktam iti arthaḥ yad ca bravīṣi diṅnāga siddhānta parigraha eva iti etatu dūṣa prati etad api iti siddha sādhya arthayoḥ siddhānta pratijñayoḥ mahān bheda iti arthaḥ tad etad niyama abhyupagama iti bhāṣyam tatra katham etad sādhyam sidhyati iti jijñāsā tatra ekena eva sādhanena sādhya siddheḥ sādhana antara abhidhānam anarthakam iti niṣpādita kriye karmaṇi aviśeṣa abhidhāyinaḥ sādhanasya sādhana nyāya atipātāt  yatra tu prativādinaḥ pariṣadaḥ  vā jijñāsā bhavati kati sādhanānisaṃbhavanti asmin sādhya iti tatra yāvanti sādhanāni tāvanti sarvāṇi eva vācyāni anyatara abhidhāne nigraha prasaṅgāt iti na adhikam nigraha sthānam iti ya āhuḥ tad matam upanyasyati tad ca na dārḍhyāt iti dūṣayati na dārḍhya artha iti yadi niścayaḥ  dārḍhyam tad ekasmāt eva pramāṇāt bhavati aniścāyakasya apramāṇa tvāt  atha sphuṭha tvam tad api ced niścayaḥ sa datta uttaraḥ atha sāmānya viśeṣa tadvatām grahaṇam na tad anumāna sahasraiḥ api teṣām sāmānyavat dravya mātra viṣaya tvāt śaṅkate atha bravīṣi dve api jñāpake iti na asmākam anadhigata artha gantṛ tvam pramāṇa tvam yena ekena adhigate pramāṇa antaram apramāṇam syāt  api tu gantṛ mātram pramāṇam tad ca dvitīyasya api aviśiṣṭam iti śaṅkā arthaḥ nirākaroti satyam dve api jñāpate iti puruṣaḥ  atra aparādhyate yaḥ  jñātam artham ajijñāsitam jñāpayati na tu pramāṇam tad hi sāmarthyena mene pravartata eva yadi jijñāsāyām sityām pravartate pratipādayati jñeyam na asya kaścid aparādha iti na hi dhānyeṣu alūneṣu dātram avraścanam bhavati tasmāt anapekṣita kāraṇāt anavasthā prasaṅgāt ca puruṣasya nigraha iti sthitam tad anena sūtra dvayena punaruktam ekam eva nigraha sthānam katham cit ava antara bheda vivakṣayā trividham uktam prāpañca artham tad eva punaruktam kva cit śabda abhyāsāt kva cit paryāya antarāt kva cit arthāt iti ākṣipati na ābādhanāt iti samādhatte satyam iti jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ vaktuḥ naipuṇyam cintyate punarukta prayoge tu anipuṇaḥ syāt  anapekṣita abhidhānāt sādhanasya viṣayaḥ sādhyaḥ  arthaḥ  na siddhaḥ tasya aparijñanāt nigṛhyate vaiyarthyam ca anarthakyam viruddha prayojana tvam vā abhimatam tathā hi punarukta prayoge tad prayojana anusaraṇa samākula cittaḥ prathama abhidhānāt āpātatas  pratītam api artham apratītam iva manyamānaḥ  na niścetum arhati iti tatas ca pratipādanāya pravṛttaḥ  na pratipādayitā iti viruddha prayojanavattva vaiyarthyam syāt iti upapannam nigraha sthānam iti vyācaṣṭe vijñātasya vākya arthasya iti nigraha sthāna tve asya upapattim āha apratyuccārayan kim āśrayam pratiṣedham brūyāt iti vārttikam na idam nigraha sthānam iti ke cit  uttareṇa uttara guṇa doṣa nirūpaṇena prativādinaḥ  mūḍhatva amūḍhatva avasthāpanāt  etad vibhajate uttareṇa guṇa doṣavatā iti iti tasmāt kim punar uccāritena uccāraṇena asti prayojanam iti śeṣaḥ asti hi kaścid iti kva cit pāṭhaḥ tatra asti hi iti nipāta dvayam vākya avatāre draṣṭavyam puṃsām vicitra svabhāva tvāt kaścid uttare samarthaḥ  na pratyuccāraṇe na asau sat utta param abhidadhānaḥ tāvatā ananubhāṣaṇa mātreṇa nigraham arhati nanu yadi ananubhāṣaṇam na nigraha sthānam tadā anubhāṣitum upakramya sarvam ananubhāṣamāṇaḥ  na nigṛhyeta iti ata āha yaḥ tu ārabhya na nirvāhayet  sat uttaram tu brūyāt  tasya syāt  khalīkāra mātra samāmarthya kṛtam na tu tattva vāditva vihatiḥ iti arthaḥ tam evam bhadanta ākṣepam samādhatte na uttara viṣaya aparijñānāt iti dūṣya viṣayam hi dūṣaṇam asati dūṣya abhidhāne na śakyam vaktum na khalu pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanaya nigamana doṣāḥ tad svarūpam anabhidhāya śakyā doṣa tvena avasthāpayitum iti anuccārayan   doṣam abhidhātum arhati iti tad idam uktam tad idam vyāhatam ucyate na uccārayati uttaram ca bravīti iti syāt etad  na prativādinā sarvam dūṣaṇīyam anyatama avayava dūṣaṇena eva sādhanasya dūṣita tvena doṣa antara abhidhāna vaiyarthyāt  na khalu mṛtaḥ  mṛtyunā rakṣitaḥ  mārayitum śakyaḥ evam dūṣitam api dūṣayitum tasmāt  sati api dūṣya bāhulye anyatamam dūṣyam tathā ca sarva anubhāṣaṇe sarvasya adūṣya tvāt  yad dūṣaṇīyam tad punar anuvādyam iti sarva anuvāde dvis anuvādaḥ  adūṣya anuvādaḥ ca iti dūṣaka nigraha sthāna dvayam tasmāt anubhāṣaṇam eva nigraha sthānam iti viparītam āpatitam iti ata āha apratijñānāt ca iti etad vibhajate na ca idam pratijñāyate pūrvam eka granthena sarvam uccārayitavyam paścāt uttaram yad dūṣyam tad anuvādena abhidheyam yena dūṣya anuvādaḥ  dvis anuvādaḥ ca doṣau syātām api tu yathākatham cit uttaraṃvaktavyam uttaravāda parasya uttaram āśraya abhāve na yuktam iti tad āśraya mātram anuvaditavyam tad antareṇa aśakya abhidhāna tvāt uttarasya iti tasmāt yuktam tanmātrasya apratyuccāraṇam ananubhāṣaṇam na sarvasya apratyuccāraṇam ananubhāṣaṇam iti arthaḥ nanu apratibhāyā nigraha sthānatva vidhānena ananubhāṣaṇasya api viditam tasya tad viśeṣa tvāt na khalu na anubhāṣata eti etāvatā eva nigṛhyate api tu ananubhāṣamāṇaḥ  dūṣyam na budhyate abudhyamānaḥ ca tatra uttaram na pratipadyate tatas  apratibhayā nigṛhyate tad evam ananu bhāṣaṇam apratibhā viśeṣa iti apratibhāyā vihitam nigraha sthāna tvam tad viśeṣe api vihitam bhavati yathā gavi sāsnādimattvam vihitam śābaleye api vihitam bhavati na punar tatra sāsnādimatva vidhānāya pṛthak  yatna antaram ārabhante atra brūmaḥ na tāvat uttara apratipatti sāmānya viśeṣaḥ  ananubhāṣaṇam puṃsām sāmaryya vaicitryāt  kaścid dūnaṣyam dūṣaṇam ca vidan  api na anubhāṣitum pārayati bahuvacana kuṇṭha tvāt  tasmāt asati āmapratibhāyām ananu bhāṣaṇa sambhava anna apratibhāyā viśeṣaḥ  ananubhāṣaṇam iti kaścid dūṣaṇa viṣayam veda anubhāṣate ca uttara pratipatti vikalaḥ tu syāt saḥ  ayam apratibhayā nigṛhyate na ananubhāṣaṇena tatra sāmarthyāt  kaścid punar dūṣyam eva na jānāti saḥ  ajñānena nigṛhyate na ca ajñāne ananubhāṣaṇam avaśyaṃbhāvi dhāraṇāvator ayānirūpaṇe vādi udīrita akṣara sva rūpa mātra pāṭha sambhavena anubhāṣaṇa upapatteḥ apratibhā tu avaśyam bhevat  na hi asti sambhavaḥ  dūṣyam na veda asya dūṣaṇam tu veda iti tathā api svarūpataḥ tāvat bhedaḥ na hi yad eva dūṣaṇa viṣayam ajñānam apratibhā tad eva dūṣya viṣayam ajñānam tasmāt sati api ananubhāṣaṇa apratibhā jñānānānām uttara anabhidhāna phala tve tulye avāntara bheda vivakṣayā bhedena upanyāsaḥ tris abhihitasya iti tris abhidhānam evam api apratipadyamānasya ati jaḍa tayā na vāde adhikāra iti abhisaṃdhimata iti tad vyācaṣṭe vijñāta arthasya pariṣadā iti nigraha sthāna sāmanya lakṣaṇam atra yojayati vārtikakāraḥ apratipattitaḥ  nigraha sthānam iti tad vyācaṣṭe para pakṣa iti vārtikam śloka pāṭhā ādibhiḥ avajñām darśayan  iti artha antare hi nigraha sthāne prasakta anuprasaktam tad siddhi artha tā vyājena avatārayatā na prakṛtauvajñānam kriyate iha tu avajñānam etāvatā bhedena upanyāsa iti iyam ca apratibhā samyak sādhana upanyāse draṣṭavyā sādhana ābhāsa upanyāse tu paryanuyojya upekṣaṇam sādhanasya dūṣaṇasya ca upanyāsam abhyupagamya tad avasthaḥ pratīyamāna eva prativādinaḥ  dārḍhyam sabhyānām vā kaṭhora tvam avagamyā akasmāt kāryam vyāsa jya abhyupagatām kathām vyavacchinatti tatra vikṣepaḥ  nāma nigraha sthānam tad anena apratibhayā tūṣṇīṃbhāvaḥ  api saṃgṛhītaḥ  veditavyaḥ kārya vyāsaṅgasya abhyupagata kathā viccheda mātra upalakṣaṇa tvāt na ca idam artha antaram tatra prakṛtam eva sādhayāmi iti vyājena prasakta anuprasakta avatāreṇa kathā viccheda abhāvāt  iha tu kathā vicchedāt na ca asya hetvābhāseṣu antarbhāvaḥ na hi vikṣepasya anyatama liṅga dharma anuvidhānam na api prakṛta sādhya siddhaye prayogaḥ  yena hetvābhāsaḥ syāt  na ca vādinaḥ  vikṣepaḥ  hetvābhāsaḥ anantaram kathām amī upatyā eva hetum anabhidhāya apasāraṇāt yadi ca ayam samyañcam hetum abhidhāya tad samarthanā samarthaḥ  apasaret  kim etāvatā na nigṛhyeta hetvābhāsena vā nigṛhyeta kim tu vyāsaṅgāt eva anarthaka apārtha kāmyām tu bhede asya sphuṭa eva na hi atra asamāna saṃketaḥ pratipādakaḥ  yena anarthakaḥ syāt  na api iha padāni vākyāni vā paurvāparyeṇa asambandhāni yena apārthakaḥ syāt  na ca avajñānam yena apratibhā bhavet  tasmāt vikṣepaḥ pṛthak  nigraha sthānam iti siddham vyācaṣṭe yaḥ pareṇa deśita doṣam sva pakṣe abhyupagamya katham jñāyate abhyupagamyataityata āha anuddhṛtya iti anabhyupagame asābuddharet iti bhāvaḥ vārtikam kim tu para svena anati sṛṣṭena ādattena iti arthaḥ prasaṅga vidhānāt na nigraha sthānam iti anya iti yadi puruṣa tvāt ca uraḥ  aham tatas  bhavān api coraḥ syāt  na ca bhavata evam iṣṭam tasmāt tvayā eva anaikāntika tvāt na ayam hetuḥ iti prasaṅga viparyayaḥ tasmāt na ātmanaḥ cora tvam anena abhyupagatam iti mata anujñā na asau nigraha sthānam iti arthaḥ nirākaroti etad tu na kasmāt  ata eva kutas  yata eva asau uttare kartavye prasaṅgam karoti ata eva nigṛhyate yadi hi vādī prativādinam brūyāt satyam aham cora eva iti tadā kim anaikāntika tvam śaknuyāt kartum tasmāt puruṣa tvam na coratva hetuḥ api tu para svena ādattena sambandha iti uttare kartavye yad uttara ābhāsam āha tena jñāpayati nūnam ayam sabhyak uttaram na jānāti samyak uttara ajñānāt nigṛhyate tad ca uttarā parijñānam mata anujñā t vāpareṇa udbhāvyamānam mata anujñā iti ucyate vyācaṣṭe paryanuyojyaḥ  nāma iti nigrahasya upapattiḥ pramāṇataḥ siddhiḥ tayā iti arthaḥ etad tu na tāvat vādinā udbhāvanīyam na hi asau sva sva sādhana avadyam anunmatta udbhāvayati na api prativādinā na hi anunmatta ātmānam ātmanā nigṛhṇāti api tu paryanuyojyam jānānaḥ kasmāt upekṣatetasmāt sabhāpanitā vādi prativādibhyām anuyuktayā vā pariṣadā tad nigraha sthānam udbhāvanīyam atra ca tattva nirṇaya avasāne vāde dvayoḥ api nigrahāt pariṣad eva vijayate jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ ca tattva anapekṣam puruṣa sāmarthya parīkṣaṇa pravṛttayoḥ prativādī nigṛhyate sādhana ābhāsa vādinā api vādinā sphuratā prativādī stambhitaḥ  yatas  samyak sādhana upanyāsaḥ  vihitaḥ prativādina uttara apratipattiḥ apratibhā sādhana ābhāsa upanyāse ca uttara apratipattiḥ paryanuyojya upekṣaṇam iti viśeṣaḥ vārtikam na anya vacanāt iti eke yatra prativādī tūṣṇīṃbhavati tatra tūṣṇīmbhāvena eva vādina uttarān arhatām darśaya nnasya sādhana ābhāsa vāditām sūcayati yatra asya doṣa udbhāvanam samyak doṣam anuktvā karoti tatra api asau duṣṭam uttaram dadat tad sādhana doṣam eva sūcayati upadiśanti hi vṛddhāḥ duṣṭe hi sādhane dṛṣṭa uttaram deyam iti tasmāt avacane anya vacane vā na paryanuyojya upekṣaṇam nigraha sthānam ubhayathā api anupekṣaṇāt iti arthaḥ dūṣayati tad ca na iti sādhanasya hi samyañcam doṣam jānan tam eva brūyāt  saḥ  ayam prāptau  asaraḥ  abruvan vibruvan vā nūnam na samyan jam doṣa jānāti niścita pramāṇa bhāvasya puruṣasya iṅgita ādibhiḥ abhiprāyaḥpa sūcyate na tu aniścita pramāṇa bhāvasya yathā ahuḥ śruti smṛti atirekeṇa yukta jalpāka bhāṣitam tad yathā āśrati duṣṭam ced  duṣṭam eva avadhāryatām iti suṣṭhu uktam jānānaḥ  api ayam kim artham anyat  bravīti iti na ca ayam apratibhātaḥ  na bhidyate sā hi unara apratipattiḥ iyam tu anuttarasya eva uttara tvena vi pratipattiḥ iti mahān viśeṣaḥ anena eva sarvā jātayaḥ nigraha sthāna tvena saṃgṛhītā bhavanti na ca hetvābhāsānām itas  na bhedaḥ te hi vādinaḥ  nigraha sthāna mayam tu prativādina iti mahān viśeṣaḥ ata eva bhavatām api gāthā aasādhana aṅgam vacanam adoṣa udbhāvanam tayoḥ nigraha sthānam anyat tu na yuktam iti na iṣyate iti apratibhāyā eva prasajya pratiṣedha ātmikāyāḥ  asyāḥ  niranuyojya anuyogasya bhede darśayati bhāṣya kāraḥ nigraha sthāna lakṣaṇasya mithyā adhyavasāyā tsamāropāt iti arthaḥ sugamam vārtikam abhyupet payeti asya vyākhyānam kasya cit arthasya tathā abhāvam pratijñāya iti pratijñāta artha vipayaryāt iti abhyupeta artha viparyayāt siddhānta viparyayāt iti arthaḥ tad etad aniyama ādityasya vyākhyānam tatra sāṃkhyīyam siddhāntam āha yathā na sat iti tasya paryāya antareṇa kathanam na sata itañ na asidātmānam iti asya paryāya antareṇa vivaraṇam na asat utpadyata iti saḥ  ayam siddhāntaḥ sāṃkhyānām tam abhyupetya tad viparyayāt kathā prasaṅgam āha sva pakṣam vyavasthāpayati pakṣa avasthānam darśayati ekā prakṛtiḥ vyaktasya upalabhyamānasya artha jātasya yuktā iti pratijñā vikārāṇām iti vyaktasya eva anuvādaḥ anvaya darśanāt iti hetuḥ mṛd anvitānām iti sādharmya udāharaṇam tathā yam avyakta bhedaḥ sukha duḥkha moha samanvitaḥ gṛhyate iti upanayaḥ nigamanam āha tasmāt samanvaya darśanāt viśva vyaktasya kaiḥ iti apekṣāyām uttaram sukha ādibhiḥ iti eka prakṛtiḥ sarvaḥ  vikāra iti sā iyam kathā siddhāntam abhyupettyā evam uktavān sāṃkhyaḥ  naiyāyikena paryanuyujyate dūṣaṇāya pṛcchyate atha prakṛtiḥ vikā para iti katham lakṣitavyam iti sa evam naiyāyikena pṛṣṭaḥ sāṃkhya uttaram āha yasya avasthitasya mṛd ādeḥ dharma antara nivṛttau śarāva vināśe yad dharma antaram maṇimādi pravartate asat eva jāyate sā prakṛtiḥ mṛd ādi yad dharma antaram nivartate pravartate vā sa vikāra iti etāsmin  udāharaṇe apasiddhāntam yojayati soyam pratijñāta arthasya siddhānta arthasya vādī viparyayāt aniyamāt kathām prasañjayati pratijñātaḥ siddhāntaḥ khalu anena na asat āvirbhavati iti utpadyate na sattiraḥ bhavati iti na vinaśyati iti tathā api kasmāt anena siddhāntaḥ  bādhyate atha siddhāntena eva kasmāt na bādhya taityata āha sat asatoḥ ca iti idam hi laukikam pramāṇa siddham siddhāntaḥ tu abhyupagama mātra siddhaḥ  aprāmāṇikaḥ tasmāt anena siddhāntaḥ  balavatā bādhyate tad etad mṛd dharmāṇām api na syāt iti na kevalam prekṣāvatām kartṝṇām api tu sat dharmāṇām api utpāda vināśau pravṛtti una paramau dṛśyamānau na syātām iti arthaḥ evam pratyavasthitaḥ sāṃkhyaḥ naiyāyikena pṛṣṭaḥ  yadi asata ātma lābham sataḥ ca ātma hānam abhyupa iti tatas  asya apasiddhāntaḥ  bhavati atha na abhyupaiti pakṣaḥ  asya na siddhyati vikāraḥ  hi anena pakṣīkṛta eka prakṛti tvena tatra vikārāṇām anirūpaṇāt  tad abhāve na pratijñā arthaḥ  na ca hetu arthaḥ āśraya asiddha tvāt nanu evam pratijñāta artha virodhi tvāt sataḥ  nirodhasya asataḥ ca utpādasya hetvābhāsa eva nigraha sthānam bhavet  pratijñā virodhaḥ  vā iti āśaṅkya vārtikakāra āha pratijñāta artha vyatirekeṇa iti na hi atra eka prakṛtayaḥ vikārāḥ eka prakṛtika tvāt iti ayam hetuḥ sādhya viruddhena vyāpta udbhāvitaḥ  yena viruddhaḥ  bhavet  na api eka prakṛtika tvam vikārāṇām śabdataḥ viruddham samanvayena hetunā yena pratijñā virodhaḥ  bhavet  vaibhava mātreṇa ca pratijñā hetvoḥ virodha iti atra uktam vārtika kṛtā sva siddhāntaspaya gaḥtva ardeḥ nityatva virodhāt virodha iti api ca tatra balavatā siddhāntena anaikāntika deśanā bādhyate iha tu siddhānta eva bādhyate durbala iti udāharaṇa paunaruktyam api na asti tasmāt yatra pratijñā arthena virodhaḥ tatra viruddhaḥ  hetvābhāsaḥ pratijñā virodhaḥ  vā iha tu pratijñā artha vyatirekeṇa abhyupagama antareṇa virodha iti puruṣasya pūrva apara viruddha artha abhidhāyinaḥ  asāmarthyāt nigraha sthānam jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ iti siddham vyācaṣṭe hetvābhāmāḥ ca iti yadi anuktam api kim cit avaśiṣyate nigraha sthānam tad cakāreṇa samucceyam yathā uktā iti sūtra avayava nirākaraṇīyām āśaṅkām āha kim punar lakṣaṇa antara yogāt hetvābhāsā nigraha sthāna tām āpadyante yathā pramāṇāni prameya tvam teṣām eva pratyakṣa ādīnām upalabdhi sādhana tvena lakṣyamāṇānām pramāṇa tvam pramāvya āpi atayā prameya tvam lakṣaṇa antareṇa pramāṇāni prameya tvam āpadyanta iti śaṅkāyāḥ sambhavādata āha bhagavān sūtra kāraḥ yathā uktā iti sakala śāstra artham upasaṃharati ta ime pramāṇa ādaya uddiṣṭā lakṣitāḥ parīkṣitāḥ ca iti itiḥ śāstra pa parisamāptau vārtikakāraḥ saṃgṛhṇāti jātīnām sa prapañcānām iti nigraha sthāna lakṣaṇam iti samāsena jātīnām api prativādi nigraha sthāne asti niveśa iti sūcayati śāstrasya ca upasaṃhāra iti ta ime pramāṇa ādaya uddiṣṭā iti anena kṛta iti arthaḥ yad alambhi kim api puṇyam dustara kunibandha paṅka magnānām uddyota kara gavīnām ati jaratīnām samuddharaṇāt  saṃsāra jaladhi setau vṛṣaketau sakala duḥkha śama hetau tasya phalam akhilam arpitam etena prīyatām īśaḥ tattva jñāna prasava surabhiḥ gūḍha bahu artha jātā sā iyam mokṣa amṛtamayaphalā sūkti mañju pravālā pratyakṣa āpta āgama maya mahānyāya mūlā manojñā ṭīkā vīrudbhavatu kṛtinām nandrinī ṣaṭhpadānām krūrāḥ kṛtaḥ  añjaliḥ ayam baliḥ eṣa dattaḥ kāyaḥ  mayā praharata atra yathā abhilāṣam abhyarthaye vitatha vāc maya pāṃśu varṣaiḥ  mā mā āvilīkuruta kīrti nadīḥ pareṣām iti miśra śrī vācaspati viracitāyām nyāya vārtika tātparyaṭīkāyām pañcamodhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ samāptaḥ ca ayam granthaḥ śubham bhūyāt
